title: The Hero Returns
alt_title: Hero, Returns, 영웅, 회귀하다, Герой возвращается, Heroe, regresa
description:
The strongest hero of humanity, Kim Sung Bin.

He threw everything on the line and fought… but he still couldn’t prevent the destruction of the world.

However, his legend has just begun as he returns 20 years into the past.

“I’ll definitely… kill it this time.”

Now fully equipped with overwhelming power and experience, the hero’s raid isn’t over yet!
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: B. Ain (흑아인)

title: Juujika no Rokunin
alt_title: La cruz de seis personas, Six People on Crosses, Распятие Шести, 十字架のろくにん, Cross of Six Men
description:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Harem, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
author: Nakatake Shiryuu

title: Gensou Gourmet
alt_title: Fantasy Gourmet, Gourmet in different world., 幻想グルメ, 幻想グルメ〜健康で文化的な最低限度の異世界生活〜
description:
One day, Shunichirou suddenly transferred to a different world.  
His reason for living in this different world… to see, touch, and smell, -eating unknown food!  
Along with Sylphin, a Beastman Maid, they have an adventure eating fantasy gourmet in a different world!  
  


---

Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!

title: P.S. Waiting for You by the Lake
alt_title: 利奥, Leo, P.S.我在湖边等你
description: Leo and Alexis lived in the same small town when they were kids and were best buddies. The two loved to spend their summers at the Green Rock Lake summer camp near town. But during the summer when they were eleven, Alexis ended his friendship with Leo over a stupid reason. After that, the two did not see each other again because of their families' situation. But during the summer when they were eighteen, the two met once again at Green Rock Lake...
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

title: Herami Shimai wa Docchi mo Yanderu
alt_title: 平良深姉妹はどっちもヤんでる, Insecure Herami Sisters, The Yandere Little Sister and the Menhera Big Sister, La hermana pequeña Yandere y la hermana mayor Menhera, 平良深姐妹都“病”得不轻
description: Sera, (Real Name: Herami Sera) is an approval-seeking girl (26 years old) who works at a maid cafe. Her younger sister, Kira, is an idol (19 years old) who is rapidly gaining popularity with her cool, and mature character. However, the real Kira only ever thinks of her sister and tries to cheer her up in every possible way to help her sister with her mental health and anxiety.
genre: Comedy, Incest, Girls' Love, Drama
author: Kaneko Aru

alt_title: ハーフサキュバスを拾った, Taking Home a Half Succubus, Llevando a casa una medio súcubo
description: Take a child half succubus and half human.

author: Zurikishi

title: The Academy's Genius Swordsman
alt_title: 아카데미의 천재칼잡이, Academy Cheonjaekaljabi, Academy’s Genius Swordmaster, 皇家学院的天才剑豪
description:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Military, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Sichi

alt_title: Bloodborne - Lady Maria and The Old Hunters, Порождение крови - Леди Мария и старые охотники
description: The tale of Lady Maria becoming a hunter who hunts the beasts that terrorizes the city of Yharnam.

title: Douse Shinu Nara Kiss Shitai!
alt_title: どうせ死ぬならキスしたい！
description:
Kanamaru, a man who has had many romantic relationships, is currently in love with Liu, a foreign student working part-time at a Chinese restaurant he frequents.

The two happen to be alone in the restaurant, and just when he thinks he's ready to confess his feelings, they are attacked by a gang of robbers!?

Every time the two get along well, for some reason their lives are in danger. Where will their tenuous love lead?!

A chaotic and frustrating love comedy about a playboy and a kuudere with runaway sexual desires!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
author: Mitao Den

title: Juvenile Prison
alt_title: 소년교도소, Тюрьма для несовершеннолетних
description:
'Cha Ju-young' is imprisoned in a juvenile detention center for rendering his gangster father comatose.
Not long after, the father, who was thought never to wake up, comes to visit...
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Cheongmin

title: Buddy Go!
alt_title: バディゴ！, Buddy Go!
description: Shizuku Ishiai, a 2nd year middle school student, loves dancing, but is bad at expressing herself, so she crossdresses and posts videos of her dances on the popular website "Smile Douga," under the alias "Ai." And she had declared the "dancing prince," Hayate, her rival. But, after a few unexpected events, and her attempts to best him, she's somehow thrown into an idol unit with him; furthermore, a MALE one?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life
author: Kurosaki Minori

title: The Heavenly Demon Destroys the Lich King's Murim
alt_title: 천마, 리치왕의 무림을 부수다, Небесный Демон уничтожает Мурим короля Лича
description:
An unknown voice disturbed me while I was levitating during my cultivation to reach the transcendent demonic state.

My concentration had been broken, and I fell into an unconscious, overloaded state. When I awoke a month later, the Lich King had already taken control of the Murim.

After the battle that ended with the destruction of the Heavenly Demon Cult, I awoke a hundred and forty years later in a Murim where magic and martial arts coexisted.

---

title: Confession Attack
alt_title: 고백어택, Gobaek Attack, Ataque de confesión
description:
Hana was never first. Always because Han Geon Woo came in first every time!
Hana would do anything to best Geon Woo, even though she can't figure him out.
This time, she tried to shock him by confessing...
He believed and accepted the confession though? 
Does he like me?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: 늠개

title: The Swordmaster's Son
alt_title: Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan, 검술명가 막내아들, The Youngest Son of a Renowned Family of Swordsmen, Младший сын фехтовальщика, Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan, Swordmaster's Youngest Son, El hijo menor del maestro de la espada
description:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Emperor Penguin (황제펭귄)

title: OL Vtuber to Oshi JK-chan
alt_title: OL Vtuberと推しJKちゃん, OL Vtuber与她推的JK, OL Vtuber與她推的JK
description:
Kumagai Hinano, a regular office worker, relieves her stress with baths, alcohol, and Vtubing! She is a streamer of video games. Her favorite Vtuber is Emori Ato, a character with a seductive and sexy voice that just makes one melt!

As chance would have it, Hinano decided to collaborate with her fave. When she went to meet up with her, the person waiting for her was...?!

The story of a tired office worker Vtuber and a mysterious JK onee-san who collaborate with each other in a very exciting way.
genre: Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Sinogiasa

title: I Became the Tyrant of a Defense Game
alt_title: 디펜스 게임의 폭군이 되었다, Tyrant of the Tower Defense Game, Defense Game Pokguni Doeeotda, 成为塔防游戏里的暴君, Me convertí en el tirano de un juego de defensa
description:
Protect the Empire was considered unbeatable for over a decade until streamer extraordinaire Mr. Gamer Geek comes along and defeats the game on its hardest mode. But just when he's about to rest on his laurels, he's sucked into the world of the game by some mysterious figure and thrust into Prince Ash's body!

Ash now realizes that every click and command he had mindlessly sent out had real, gruesome costs - including his teammates' lives that he sacrificed for the sake of victory. To make up for his previous actions, Ash promises to keep his whole team alive this time while using his wits and knowledge to survive the hellish onslaught of monsters. 

But who brought him to this world in the first place, and why?

Ash may soon find the answers to these questions - if he can survive the bloody battlefield first!
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ha Jung (하정)

title: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!
alt_title: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular, わたモテ, 私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!, 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!, No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!
description:
Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! 

How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!
genre: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Tanigawa Nico

title: Minecraft: Journey to the World's End
alt_title: MINECRAFT～世界の果てへの旅～
description:
The adventure to the end of the world begins!

The world-famous game with the theme of "freedom" makes its grand debut as a manga!
Don't miss the crafting that is even freer than in the game!
Join the main character Nico and his friends as they set off on an adventure to the "end of the world"!
Familiar characters and items from the game will also appear!
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Slice of Life
author: Kazuyoshi Seto

title: Osoto Gohan wo Goisshoni
alt_title: おそとごはんをご一緒に, 邀你一起在户外共进美餐, Let's Eat Outdoors!, Please Join Us For Osoto Gohan
description:
Fuuka, a college student who enjoys cooking but is confined by her apartment's small kitchen, meets Yomogi, a wild outdoor girl who isn't particularly good at cooking. Their outdoorsy meal that started by chance is somehow very delicious and heartwarming....

This is the start of a gourmet outdoor manga about two women helping each other out!
genre: Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Hazuki

title: Kuro Gal-san ga Kuru!
alt_title: 黒ギャルさんが来る！, Black Gal–san Is Coming!, A Black Gal Is Coming!, A black gyaru is coming!, 黑辣妹小姐来啦！
description:
A beleaguered office worker finds his way to a cafe where he decries the hardships of his routine. In there, a friendly gyaru high schooler notices his lamentations and after hearing him vent out, she cheers him up the "gyaru" way and they exchange contacts.  
  
What will become of this unlikely friendship?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Tamagoro

title: Black Kanojo
alt_title: Девушка в чёрном, ブラック彼女, 黑色的她, 블랙 그녀
description: Hoshino Teru, a mediocre middle school boy has a crush on Amamiya, his childhood friend. However, "Micchan" stands between them, and brings chaos upon Teru's life.
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Horror, Mystery
author: Yoshihara Masahiko

title: ??? Rank no Ura Soubi Musou
alt_title: ？？？ランクの裏装備無双, Unparalleled ??? Rank Hidden Equipment
description:
A young man named Jinfrey, decides to become an adventurer in order to earn a lot of money and make his family happy.

However, the moment he tries to become an adventurer, Jinfrey remembers the memory of his previous life.

This world that Jinfrey was born and raised, was exactly the same world as “Ground Seven”, a shitty game that he played in his previous life to the point where he was called a “Hardcore Player” !

Although confused by the suddenly revived memories, by using this knowledge, Jinfrey aims to become unparalleled with the help of the secret “Hidden Equipment” in this world.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kiyoro

title: The 31st Piece Turns the Tables
alt_title: 31번째 말은 게임판을 뒤엎는다, 31 Beonjjae Mareun Geimpaneul Dwieopneunda, 31-я фигура перевернёт игровую доску, The 31st Piece Overturns the Board, La 31ma pieza revierte la situación
description:
Ever since Kang Seol was a child, he's had strange dreams where he and several people wear masks while playing "World of Eternity," a board game full of quests and adventures. And although Seol was great at the game, he was never able to win. But now, his dreams have become reality, and humans have become game pieces!

Humanity's only hope is for Seol to recall what he did in his dreams to survive. Even though he's never won, will he be able to turn the tables and finally make his way to victory?
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Nungwi (눙귀)

title: Ippo
alt_title: Step, イッポ
description: A maker of individually crafted shoes returns home from a trip to Florence, Italy. One day, a surprise visitor comes to his studio…
genre: Drama, Slice of Life
author: est em

title: Archmage Streamer
alt_title: BJ대마도사, BJ Archmage, Grand Warlock Streamer
description:
Jung Hyunwoo is just an unlucky gamer barely making ends meet in the VR game "God Wars." He even ends up losing access to his game account due to a horrible accident and is forced to create a new character. 

In the process, he discovers that he has an ability that allows him to see hidden information in the game, which leads him to become a Grand Warlock. 

Now equipped with a mind-blowing skill and a legendary class, all that's left is for him to level up and go from zero to hero...

---

title: Zatsuyou Fuyo Jutsushi ga Jibun no Saikyou ni Kizuku made
alt_title: 雑用付与術師が自分の最強に気付くまで, Until the Chore-Granting Sorcerer Realized That He Is at His Strongest
description:
Wimme Strauss is an adjunct sorcerer who provides support and does odd jobs. However, after defeating the master of the hierarchy, he is expelled from the party by the leader, whose pride is hurt. Wimme is at a loss, but his childhood ~~stalker~~friend Heidemarie finds him and recruits him for the biggest party, the Wings of the Dragon.
"It's like a miracle ...... fuhehe."
He claims that his achievement is a coincidence, but it's only a matter of time before everyone around him realizes what he's capable of.
genre: Action, Adventure, Magic, Adaptation
author: Tokura Haka

title: Houkago no Idol ni wa Himitsu ga aru
alt_title: The After School Idol Has a Secret, 放課後のアイドルには秘密がある, У школьных айдолов есть свои секреты, 放学后的偶像有一个秘密
description:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Amane Kashiko

title: The Ultimate of All Ages
alt_title: Rebirth Of The Ultimate Master, The Eternal Supreme, 万古至尊, The Ancient Sovereign of Eternity, 这一世我要当至尊, 這一世我要當至尊
description: First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Tai Yi Sheng Shui

title: Marrying The Villain
alt_title: 嫁反派, Marry My Nemesis
description: In Yu Lingxi's previous life, she was forced to be sacrificed to the Prince Regent Ning Yin - a twisted and cruel madman who killed his brothers and father. Within two years of her marriage, Yu Lingxi passed away suddenly. After her death, Ning Yin did not set up a mourning hall nor attend her funeral, buried her, and even became more crazy, slaughtering the whole city. After she is reborn, she is still the noble daughter of the General's palace. Yu Lingxi and her guards try to find Ning Yin who was living on the streets, intending to avenge her former lover. However, when she arrives at the scene, she sees the thin boy being pressed to the ground and about to have his left leg broken.
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: 布丁琉璃

title: Suterare Elf-san wa Sekai de Ichiban Tsuyokute Kawaii!
alt_title: 捨てられエルフさん は世界で一番強くて可愛い！, The Abandoned Elf is the Strongest and Cutest in the World!
description:
“Dear top players, this game is a real parallel world. If you reincarnate and save the world, any wish you have will be granted.”

Former popular voice actress Ayano responded to the proposal from the goddess. In order to shine as a voice actress once again. Reincarnated as the strongest species of high elf, she aims to “clear the game” in the parallel world with the strongest and cutest kemo-eared heroine using her gaming knowledge, but –!?
genre: Reincarnation, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Tsukiyo Rui

title: Critically-Endangered Species Hacchin-Pamos
alt_title: 絶滅寸前動物ハッチンパモス
description:
The Hacchin-Pamos is a critically-endangered species. Let's find out why.

A daily comic series from Q-Rais.
genre: Animals, Comedy, Self-Published, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Q-Rais

title: The Vampire Dies in No Time
alt_title: The Vampire Dies In No Time., The Vampire Dies Now, 吸血鬼すぐ死ぬ, 吸血鬼即将便当
description:
Vampires are said to have many weaknesses to balance out their incredible powers. The vampire lord Draluc just so happens to be weak to... everything. He dies, disintegrating into a pile of sand, at the slightest shock.

After a disastrous encounter with the vampire hunter (and author) Ronaldo leaves Draluc’s castle destroyed, Draluc decides to pack up his remaining belongings and adorable armadillo familiar John and move into Ronaldo’s office (despite the hunter’s protests). Chaos ensues as this unlikely duo is forced to work together while fending off perverted vampires, Ronaldo's terrifying editor, Draluc’s eccentric family, and more—with Draluc dying continuously along the way.
  
[Anime Adaptation Announcement](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-06/itaru-bonnoki-the-vampire-dies-in-no-time-manga-gets-anime/.159208)
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Vampires, Supernatural
author: Bonnoki Itaru

title: Koda-chan and Fukumura-san
alt_title: 小田ちゃんと福村さん
genre: Romance, Self-Published, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Saone Kushima

title: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun
alt_title: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun, Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!, 入间同学入魔了, 魔入りました！入間くん, 마에 들어갔습니다! 이루마 군
description:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy
author: Nishi Osamu

title: Isekai Mahou wa Okureteru!
alt_title: Магия другого мира так отстаёт!, 異世界魔法は遅れてる！, 이세계 마법은 뒤떨어졌다!, The Magic in this Other World is Too Far Behind!, The Other World's Magic Is Too Far Behind!, 異世界魔法實在太落後！, 异世界魔法实在太落后！, 異世魔法滯哉！ (Classical Chinese)
description:
Suimei and two of his best friends find themselves mysteriously summoned to another world. There’s a cute princess, magic galore, a Demon Lord that needs to be defeated, and a world that needs to be saved — the works! Too bad Suimei isn’t interested.

His friends are all too ready to play the parts of heroes, but Suimei just wants to get home. He has an advantage as a magician... but he’s in for a rude awakening when he finds out what actually passes for magic in these parts.
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hitsuji Gamei

title: Tengoku Daimakyou
alt_title: Иллюзия рая, 天国大魔境, 天國大魔境, Heavenly Delusion, Великая небесная стена
description: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

title: Kumamiko
alt_title: Girl Meets Bear, Жрица и медведь, くまみこ, Bear Shrine Maiden
description: In the deep regions of the Touhouku area, the comedic story of the miko of bears, 14-year-old Machi, and her childhood friend, the talking bear Natsu, takes place as Machi struggles to qualify for city-life with Natsu's assistance.
genre: Animals, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Yoshimoto Masume

title: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters
alt_title: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇, The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate, The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters, El Gran Villano Hermano Mayor y todas sus Hermanas Menores Yandere
description:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Pikapi (噼咔噼)

title: The Hero is Beating Up the Bullies
alt_title: 용사님이 일진들을 물리쳐요, The Hero Defeats the Delinquents, The Warrior Defeats the Bullies
description:
The Hero, who defeated the Demon King and saved the world, is being summoned to a shitty delinquent school?!

The otherworld Hero who was summoned to a den filled with the worst bullies ever, the ‘Southern Suseong High’.

Though the Hero doesn’t use his powers against fellow humans, he begins to school these bullies after finding out about their ‘demonic’ nature…!

Can the Hero defeat the bullies and return back to his world?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Nyamnyam-i (냠냠이)

title: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess
alt_title: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头, Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой, Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness
description:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Villainess, Full Color
author: Shisi Xia Xiang (十四夏乡)

title: Boy's Abyss
alt_title: Бездна подростка, 少年のアビス, 소년의 어비스, World End Boy Meets Girl, Юношеская бездна, 少年的深淵, El Chico del Abismo, Chico en el abismo, El abismo del joven
description:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
genre: Psychological, Romance, Survival, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Minenami Ryo

title: The Nine Heavens Swordmaster
alt_title: Heavenly Inquisition Sword, 구천구검, Gucheongugeom, La Espada de la Inquisición Celestial
description:
“He is the master of the Nine Heavens.”

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his father’s first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness…

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

“I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.”

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Cardok

title: Love War's Victory
alt_title: 战恋告捷
description:
Collection of one-shots about an egocentric and workaholic couple.  
  
This series is from the artist's Weibo, so no set update.  
Weibo: @喜喜果  
Twitter: @kikiko_xixiguo
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

description: Brainrot Girlfriend
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Slice of Life
author: Senukin

title: My Wife Is Actually the Empress?
alt_title: 我家娘子竟然是女帝?
description: With my wife's breathtaking beauty, not even the newly enthroned empress can match her! With my wife's marvelous culinary skills, not even the empress's royal chefs can match her! My wife loves me and cares about me very very much, and I wouldn't trade her for even the empress! Wait, what? My wife is the empress?!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Isekai, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Lǎo gǒu (老狗)

title: Rocket Science Love
alt_title: 로켓 사이언스 러브
description:
I thought it was just platonic, spending the rest of our lives together as nothing more than friends… That was until Han Jei broke the news: “Seojin, I’m getting married.” 

Seojin, who was adopted to Germany when he was a child, has maintained a 15 year long relationship with Jei. When confronted with the prospect of Jei’s marriage, he realizes he’s in love with him. Working as a pilot, Seojin moves back to Korea in an attempt to run away, but his plan starts to unravel when Jei boards the flight to follow him. The two find themselves living together in Korea as Jei’s wedding date rapidly approaches. 

“Seojin, you’re not acting like this because of me, are you?”

As Seojin tries to push Jei away due to his emerging desires and Jei wishes to rekindle their precious friendship, they spend more time with each other and the tension between them begins to arise…
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 물컹

title: Shangri-La Frontier
alt_title: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~, Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре, シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～, 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～
description:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Zombies, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: katarina

title: Fairy Cat
alt_title: 手のひらねこ, Сказочный котик
description: A slightly mysterious and heartwarming story about the smallest cat in the world and a high school boy. A fantastic cat named Tenohira Neko, small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, appears to Kanade, a first-year high school student. He is told that if he likes it, it will live with him...?
genre: Animals, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Takano Hisa

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands
alt_title: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Parte 9 - Las JOJOLandias, Невероятные приключения ДжоДжо, ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ
description:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Araki Hirohiko

title: 3-Gumi no Osananajimi
alt_title: ３組の幼なじみ, 3 Sets Of Childhood Friends
description: Depicts the journey of three sets of childhood friends - 'childhood friends with a physical difference,' 'childhood friends who are conscious of height differences,' and 'childhood friends with an age gap' - until they start dating.
genre: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Itonoko (イトノコ)

alt_title: The Disaster Of PSI Saiki Kusuo, 斉木楠雄のΨ難, 齐木楠雄的灾难
description: Kusuo Saiki is a sixteen-year-old high school student with innate supernatural powers. What are his hassles and troubles triggered by his extraordinary ability? And what misfortunes fall upon him?
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Asou Shuuichi

title: Futsuu no Koitte Nani?
alt_title: フツウーの恋って何？, What is Normal Love?, フツーの恋って何？
description:
**Is my "red string of fate" connected to you?**

The high school first year "me" that fell in love at first sight at the school entrance ceremony. But that love was not normal...
A yuri story depicted from the point of view of three high school girls.
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Ikuta Hana

title: Empress's Harem
alt_title: Queen's Palace, 女帝的后宫
description: Super sweet and super-sand sculptured female statue against the harem! I often hear: "Three princes and three princesses! Your puppets are fighting again!" The overbearing female CEO traversed to the world of female honors and woke up with seven husbands.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Island Project (岛上project)

title: I Created a Salvation Organization
alt_title: 我打造了救世组织
description: He got a doomsday salvation system. As long as he saves the world, he can have everything. He recruited top talents to build the Pan-Human Principle Guardian Association. He descended into the doomsday worlds as the guardian of human principles, allowing the whole world to admire him and worship him as a god. The ultimate natural disaster. The mutation frenzy. The whisper of the evil god. Thus, a huge organization spanning many worlds, taking the protection of human principles as its own responsibility and saving civilization from the fate of destruction, gradually appeared in the eyes of the world.
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Superhero, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Xiao Dong Zai (小东仔)

title: Musket Girls! ~Tensei Sanbou to Senretsu Otome-tachi~
alt_title: Musket Girls! Reincarnated Staff Officer and Line Formation Maidens, マスケットガールズ！～転生参謀と戦列乙女たち～
description: After my previous life was cut short, I was reincarnated in a world of early modern-style warfare where line infantry exchanges gunfire. Being a commoner second lieutenant, I was shunned as "Krombertz the Grim Reaper" because of the many deaths of my men in battle. With that, I was assigned to the 6th Special Tasks Brigade, an all-female unit, as a staff officer. The brigade commander, who is up to something, and the carefree non-commissioned officer are women, while the foot soldiers are just girls who are practically amateurs. In this world, if you don't fight, you will be killed. That being the case, I have to do something about this... but how?!
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Military, Isekai, Adaptation
author: Hyougetsu

title: Kuro no Senki II: Isekai Teni Shita Boku ga Saikyou na no wa Bed no Ue dake no You desu
alt_title: Kuro no Senki II: It seems that I, who has moved to another world, is the strongest only on the bed, Record Of Kurono's War II, クロの戦記Ⅱ 異世界転移した僕が最強なのはベッドの上だけのようです
description: Kurono Crawford (Chrono Crawford), a noble of Cepheus Empire had a secret. It was that he came from a Different world… Modern Japan. Having the knowledge about the modern weapons and his sense of values, he was an existence almost like a cheat, aiming to be the “Harem king”.    Abandoned by his superiors, left in command of the Empire’s rejects consisting of demi-humans such as Minotaurs, Dwarfs, and Elves, and thrust into a position as head of a poor fiefdom, Chrono will do everything he can to rebuild and strengthen his forces and revitalize the land, aided in part by his knowledge of the other world.
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Yurishiro

title: Miyu-chan wa Zutto Tomodachi
alt_title: みゆちゃんはずっと友達, Miyu-chan Will Always Be Your Friend, Miyu-chan Siempre Será tu Amiga
description:
In the summer of his second year of high school, Yuushin Tahara finds that his childhood friend, Miyu Fukagawa, who had moved away, has returned to the house next door. Although Miyu has grown up to be quite cute, there's something a little strange about her... 

A fresh and suspenseful romantic comedy about the gentle protagonist and his cute but rather quirky childhood friend, along with their friends and the adventures they get into!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Hideki

title: Neko ni Tensei Shita Ojisan
alt_title: ねこに転生したおじさん, The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat
description: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.
genre: Reincarnation, Animals, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Yajima Kenji

title: Battle Studies
alt_title: バトルスタディーズ, 배틀 스터디즈
description:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!
genre: Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Nakibokuro

title: Hell Mode: Yarikomi Suki no Gamer wa Hai Settei no Isekai de Musou Suru
alt_title: Hell Mode: The Hardcore Gamer Dominates in Another World with Garbage Balancing, ヘルモード ～やり込み好きのゲーマーは廃設定の異世界で無双する～ はじまりの召喚士
description:
Yamada Kenichi, a single, 35-year-old businessman, has spent the majority of his adult life playing every MMORPG to hit the market.

Tired of the constant cycle of repetitive, newbie-centric gameplay, he is immediately drawn in by the promise of a new game that, on top of being never-ending, offers up a "Hell Mode" — a difficulty level that makes it nigh impossible to level up but also promises uncapped growth potential.

Upon selecting the newly released Summoner class, Kenichi finds himself reborn as Allen, an infant in a serf family, with nothing but his wits and old memories to guide him. Allen works diligently to level himself up despite Hell Mode requiring vast amounts of experience between levels. In doing so, he hopes to uncover the secrets the Summoner class holds.

All the while, he dedicates himself to freeing his new family from serfdom.
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hamuo

title: Bungou Stray Dogs Official Anthology
alt_title: 文豪ストレイドッグス 公式アンソロジー ～麗～, 文豪ストレイドッグス 公式アンソロジー ～華～, 文豪ストレイドッグス 公式アンソロジー ～凛～, 文豪ストレイドッグス 公式アンソロジー ～暁～, 文豪ストレイドッグス 公式アンソロジー ～奏～, 文豪ストレイドッグス 公式アンソロジー ～睦～
description: A collection of Bungou Stary Dogs one-shots chapters by various manga artists.
genre: Action, Comedy, Anthology, Slice of Life, Supernatural

title: Demon King of the Royal Class
alt_title: 마왕은 학원에 간다, The Demon Prince Goes to the Academy, El Principe Demonio va a la Academia, 魔王去上學, 魔王在学校的生活, 魔王様は学園に行く
description:
Upon dying, the author of "The Demon King is Dead" is given two choices: go to hell or be reborn in his novel and survive till the end.

The problem? He's reborn as Baalier Junior, a weak demon prince, after his realm was conquered! To make things worse, his attempt to escape somehow gets him enrolled as a student of the Royal Class in Gradias Temple, a prestigious human school.

In the midst of plotlines and political schemes, can this author keep his identity a secret and reach a happy ending?
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: 로노푸

title: The Magical Revolution of the Reincarnated Princess and the Genius Young Lady
alt_title: 転生王女と天才令嬢の魔法革命, 轉生王女與天才千金的魔法革命, 转生王女与天才千金的魔法革命, MagiRevo, 전생 왕녀와 천재 영애의 마법 혁명, Магическая революция перерождённой принцессы и гениальной юной леди
description:
Despite her supposed ineptitude with regular magic, Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy's expectations 
by developing "magicology," a unique magical theory based on memories from her past commoner life.
 One day, she witnesses the brilliant noblewoman Euphyllia unjustly stripped of her title as the kingdom's next monarch. 
Thus Anisphia concocts a plan to help Euphyllia regain her good name  somehow involving them living together and researching magic! 
Little do these two ladies know, however, that their chance encounter will alter not only their own futures, but those of the kingdom... 
and the entire world!

---
- [Official Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8558fh/)
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Karasu Piero

title: OMORI
description:
After something changed his life four years ago, Sunny has not left his house once, living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son, his mother decides to move their family out of town. 

However, when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life, Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move, the duo come across familiar faces as they go through town — reawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.
genre: Psychological, Horror, Adaptation
author: Nui Konoito

title: The Great Wizard Transcendent
alt_title: 회귀로 초월하는 대마도사, Hoegwiro Chowolhaneun Daemadosa, Archmage Transcending Through Regression, Архимаг, преодолевающий регрессию, 回帰して世界を変える大魔法使い, 超越时间的大魔导士, Archmage Who Transcends by Returning
description:
Mikhail Walpurgis, the world’s only 9th-circle Archmage, fell in battle due to a damned hero, and managed to cast one final advanced magic spell, <TIME REVERSAL>. As time rewound, he regressed to 20 years ago.

“Fine. I’ll just become the hero instead.”

---

title: I Choose the Emperor Ending
alt_title: 황제엔딩으로 가겠습니다, 皇帝エンディングでいきます, 娶个公爵当皇后
description: Obsessed with medieval fantasies, Marina develops a revolutionary VR device that can bring fictional worlds to life. Her dreams come true when she transports herself to Lasnorok, the setting of her own novel. The problem is, she can't get back out! Disguised as a runaway slave boy named Rino, she comes face-to-face with the main character she created, the ambitious Edward Allen Dihas. Can Marina help him overthrow the emperor and survive to make it out alive?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kim Suo

title: Marriage Toxin
alt_title: マリッジトキシン, Брачный токсин, MARRIAGETOXIN
description:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, Delinquents, Web Comic

title: My 100th Chapter!!
alt_title: 俺の100話目!!, オフサイドトラップ, Offside Trap, 食べてからのお楽しみだよっ!, Look Forward To When You Eat It!, You'll Find Out When You Eat It!, ブレイブリー・サーガ, Bravery Saga, BattleSexer SEISHIRO, BattleSexer Seishiro, バトルセクサー セイシロウ, BattleSexer SEISHIROU, BattleSexer SEISHIRO, 新鬼伝 ナグゴハイネガー, New Oni Legend - Any Crying Children Here‽, カンタンZ～完全探偵・勘太、最初で最後の事件～, Simple Z ~The Perfect Detective Kanta's First And Last Case~, モザイク!!, Mosaic!!, ササに願いを★, Wishing To Sasa ★, わんわんプロヴィデンス―異説・八犬伝―, BOWWOW Providence ―An Alternative View Of The Eight Dog Chronicles―, バリうま食堂 桐島!!, The Very Delish Restaurant Kirishima!!, The Super Delicious Restaurant Kirishima!!, 贄巫女のトーヤ, Sacrificial Shrine Maiden Touya
description:
A series in *Young Magazine* and *Young Magazine the 3rd* where authors create the 100th chapter of a series… without creating Chapters 1–99 first!

1. *Offside Trap* by Kumeta Kouji ([Young Magazine 2015 No. 6](https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/ym/2015/2015-6.html))
Ashida Isami is the star player of the Kota High Soccer Club, and childhood friends with its manager, Kaneda Chiyo. Just as his teammates go missing, his mysterious rival recovers from an injury…

title: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou
alt_title: Мой дом — это место волшебной силы, 俺の家が魔力スポットだった件 ～住んでいるだけで世界最強～, 原来我家是魔力点~只是住在那里就变成世界最强~, 우리 집이 마력스팟이었던 건에 대하여 ~살고 있는 것만으로 세계최강~, My House is a Magic Power Spot: Just by Living there I Become the Strongest in the World
description: Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!

alt_title: 勇者と呼ばれた後に ―そして無双男は家族を創る―, After Being Called a Hero - The Unrivaled Man Starts a Family -
description: In a world where humans and demons clash — the one who decimated the Demon Lord’s army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd’s companion!? This is the story of a man, hailed as the strongest, yet unable to recognize his own worth, finding a “family”.

author: Sorano Kazuki

title: Assassin de Aru Ore no Sutetasu ga Yuusha Yori mo Akiraka ni Tsuyoi Nodaga
alt_title: 暗殺者である俺のステータスが勇者よりも明らかに強いのだが, My Status as an Assassin Obviously Exceeds the Hero’s, My Status as an Assassin Obviously Exceeds the Brave's, 身为暗杀者的我明显比勇者还强, 身為暗殺者的我明顯比勇者還強, 암살자인 내 스테이터스가 용사보다 명백히 강합니다만, Но я убийца, а не герой!, Ассасин, с которым не мог потягаться герой
description:
Oda Akira, a high school student who excels in erasing his presence, was summoned along with his classmates to another world. In this world of sword and magic, Akira and his classmates were asked to become heroes and bring down the demon king. Having a bad feeling about the king and the princess who asked them, Akira uses his special skills to sneak into the king’s library, in hopes of discovering the truth. Whether to help or abandon his classmates who knew nothing, it all depended on Akira.  
  


---
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Akai Matsuri

title: The Voodooist's Wrathful Return
alt_title: 회귀했는데 FFF급 부두술사, I Returned as an FFF-Class Witch Doctor, Hoegwihaessneunde FFF Geup Budusulsa, Regrese como un chaman de clase FFF
description:
Ma Jinsung was once a top-ranked player in Arsia Chronicle, but he was brutally killed by his trusted leader. After that, he thought he'd wake up in his room... not 10 years in the past! 

Now, prepared to exact his revenge, he jumps right back into the game. But this time, his job class is voodooist, and he gets bonuses for killing other players. The only downside -  if he dies in the game, he dies in real life.

Can Jinsung get his revenge without causing too much carnage? Don't bet on it...
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Pinbol

title: Surviving the Game as a Barbarian
alt_title: 게임 속 바바리안으로 살아남기, Game Sok Babarian-euro Saranamgi, Sobreviviendo al juego siendo un bárbaro
description:
After spending nine years on Dungeon and Stone, the role-playing game that no player has ever beaten, Lee Hansoo finally reaches the dungeon of the final boss.

As soon as he opens the gate, however, he suddenly sees a message that says his tutorial has been completed and finds himself in the body of Bjorn Yandel, a real barbarian within the game.

An exciting adventure awaits him as he endeavors to abide by the laws of the fictional world!

----

description: Youki was reincarnated in another world. However, instead of being reincarnated as the hero or the demon lord, he was instead reincarnated half-assedly as a minion of the Demon Lord. One day, the Hero's Party attacked the Demon Lord's castle with the intent of defeating the Demon Lord. Of course, Youki was able to repel their attempt with ease. In spite of this, he ended up falling for the cleric, Cecilia, at first sight… The super popular love comedy fantasy set in another world!

title: Kamitachi ni Hirowareta Otoko
alt_title: By the Grace of the Gods, Избранный богами, Милостью богов, Человек, выбранный богами, 神拾之男, 神達に拾われた男, ками-тати ни хироварэта оток, 众神眷顾的男人, 眾神眷顧的男人, 신들에게 주워진 남자, The Man Picked Up by the Gods
description:
Upon his sudden death, middle-aged otaku businessman Ryoma Takebayashi finds himself in a curious situation. Three gods request his cooperation in their divine plot, which requires him to reincarnate in another world as a young boy!

Equipped with magic, young Ryoma undertakes a carefree existence in the forest, leisurely learning more about his new abilities and surroundings. And when he encounters slimes like those in video games from his former life, Ryoma uses his newfound magical powers to get creative with his research!

Will the gods get more than they bargained for in Ryoma?!

[MangaUp!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/273)

Friends, lovers, fashion and hanging out after-school...
For Hoshino Ouka, a gal who grew up in the city those are important things. But when she unexpectedly had to move to the country side town 'Yutakamachi', everything she hold dear vanishes...? In an unfamiliar town the fresh and tender days of youth begin!

title: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King
alt_title: 이계 검왕 생존기, The Survival Story of the Sword King in Another World, Otherworldly Sword King's Survival Records, 拔剑九亿次, 異界劍王生存記, Igye Geomwang Saengjongi, Король меча, История выживания короля меча в фэнтезийном мире, 異世界剣王生存記
description:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

title: I Bought the Land, Not a Man
alt_title: 제가 산 건 땅이지 남자가 아닌데요, I Bought the Land, Not the Man, What I Bought Is Land, Not a Man, Yo Compre La Tierra, No Un Hombre
description:
I was envious of the side character who seemed to easily raise money compared to the distressed female lead. And one day, I was looking at inflating land and thought I could get rich if I bought it. Suddenly, a fortune comes with a suspicious voice! Eliana is a countess’ loyal lady-in-waiting and an extra maid. Many have been eyeing the land to make investments as she got wealthy... even a creepy duke started to follow her around!
“Let me do what I want, Eliana.”

“I don’t want to.”

With her own ability, will she be able to keep her land and family safe while getting rich? Follow the female lead in this messy, romantic, comedy story!

---
She envies the life of an extra in the novel who earns money easily. One day, she possessed an extra character who is the loyal maid of the heroine in a novel. All she needs to do now is to become a rich man in the land! But... can she protect it from the cunning duke who covets her abilities?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ilgwa

alt_title: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました, Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia, It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend, It's a Little Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend, さらなみ, Слишком поздно я влюбилась в друга детства
