title: Tonikaku Kawaii
alt_title: Fly Me to The Moon, TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You, Унеси меня на Луну, トニカクカワイイ, 总之就是非常可爱, 어쩄든 귀여워, Cute Anyways
description:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Hata Kenjiro

title: Aiseki Ii desu ka?
alt_title: 相席いいですか？, Is It Okay If We Share a Table?
description:
Tsubaki is a working woman struggling with the relationships between her subordinates. Momoko is a university student struggling with her part-time job. Two people of different ages and backgrounds happen to sit together...? 

It's a breath of fresh air, a relaxing lunchtime comedy.
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Kawakami Daishirou

title: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!
alt_title: 身为恶役女配的我养成病娇女主很正常吧？！
description:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 云隐雁鸣

title: Gyakusatsu Happy End
alt_title: 虐殺ハッピーエンド, Happy Massacre Ending, Massacre Happy End
description: High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Gore, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Miyatsuki Arata

title: Moto Ansatsusha, Tensei Shite Kizoku no Reijou ni Narimashita
alt_title: 元暗殺者、転生して貴族の令嬢になりました, A Former Assassin Was Reborn as a Blue-Blooded Daughter
description:
The story is about Serena, a former assassin who was reincarnated as a duke's daughter after failing her mission. She initially thought that pretending to be a noble would be easy, but she struggled with the gap in perception between herself and her mother, who had a flighty personality, and her adoptive sister, who deceived those around her in an attempt to push Serena out of the picture.

Despite skillfully dodging the harassment she faced at the tea parties full of rivalry and navigating the complex social life of a school embroiled in love and hate, Serena's cold demeanor resulted in her being ostracized and isolated. One day, she discovers that her adoptive sister is engaged to the second prince, which leads her to run away from home. However, it is at this point that the first prince, Evan, appears in front of her...

Follow Serena, a former assassin who knows nothing of love, as she charges forward into the aristocratic society of another world in this comedic, occasionally romantic tale.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Otonashi Satsuki

title: 【Oshi no Ko】
alt_title: Hijos predilectos, 【My Star】, Звёздное дитя, 推しの子, 【推しの子】, Ребёнок идола, 【我推的孩子】, 【최애의 아이】
description:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?
genre: Reincarnation, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Akasaka Aka

title: Kirin
alt_title: キリン
description: A manga about the story of a 38-year-old salaryman named Kirin who is also a street racer.
genre: Action, Sports, Office Workers, Drama, Delinquents
author: Harumoto Shohei

title: Royal Marriage
alt_title: 로열 메리지, Королевский брак, Королевская свадьба, ロイヤル・マリッジ, 皇家婚姻, 皇室婚姻
description:
The symbol of beauty and money, Tatiana Cartien, the most eligible bachelorette of the Freya Empire. The despair of being betrayed by her trusted fiancé lasted only a moment, as who could've known a bigger shock would happen.

"I'll only endure for a few days, getting discovered in an idiotic manners of all ways."

To think that her family, who she believed was on her side, knew her fiancé's nature. Tatiana threatened to never get married, and her mother, who once coddled her, abandoned her.

"If you say you don't want to then I guess you should leave this house."

"..."

"Of course, you should leave behind everything I've given to you."

The time she has left is one week. If she can't find someone worth marrying, she'll be kicked out onto the streets with nothing.

Just when she thought, "Is this the end?" one person came to mind! Kainel Towncent, an illegitimate child who had once been treated with contempt, who then rose from mercenary to the hailed war hero of Freya in 3 years.

A road with a dead end, there's nothing left to lose. In order to survive in this grim world, grabbing the hand of the devil is enough.

"Tatiana Cartien. No matter what anyone says from now on, you're the lady of Towncent. If you come to me with an offer of marriage first, then you need to take responsibility until the end."

---
As the beloved daughter of a viscountess and the fiancée of a duke, Tatiana Cartienne was the belle of high society. But when she refuses to marry after discovering the duke's infidelity, she begins to see that she was simply a pawn in her family's power play. In her attempt to break free, she turns to Kynell Townsend, a war hero who was once humiliated by the viscountess for his attempt to woo Tatiana. With title and fortune out of the picture, will they be able to reset their love story?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Heeya (희야)

title: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darou ka Gaiden - Sword Oratoria
alt_title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Sword Oratoria, Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье - Оратория Меча, ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか 外伝 ソード・オラトリア, 던전에 만나기를 원하는 것은 잘못 일까 외전 소드 오라토리아 소드 오라토리아, Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? On the Side: Sword Oratoria
description:
After having descended upon this world, the gods have created guilds where adventurers can test their mettle. These guilds, known as "familia," grant adventurers the chance to explore, gather, hunt, or simply enjoy themselves.  
Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria begins in Orario, the lively city of adventurers. The Sword Princess, Ais Wallenstein, and the novice mage, Lefiya Viridis, are members of the Loki Familia, who are experts at monster hunting. With the rest of their group, they journey to the tower of Babel in hopes of exploring the dungeon underneath. Home to powerful monsters, the dungeon will fulfill Ais's desire to master her sword skills, while bringing Lefiya closer to her dream of succeeding Riveria Ljos Alf, vice-captain of the Loki Familia, as the most powerful mage in the land.

---

**Links:**
[Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/is-it-wrong-to-try-to-pick-up-girls-in-a-dungeon-on-the-side-sword-oratoria-manga)
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Oomori Fujino

title: Unforeseen Engagement
alt_title: 뜻밖의 청혼, An Unexpected Engagement, An Unexpected Proposal, Una propuesta de matrimonio inesperada
description:
I spent one night with the man who destroyed my country. Then, I ran away with his child in my arms.
I think that’s the end of my relationship with him…
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Dancheong

title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?
alt_title: Will it be wrong to demand an encounter from dungeon?, Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье?, ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか。, 在地下城寻求邂逅是否搞错了什么, 在地牢里寻求邂逅难道有错吗, 期待在地下城邂逅有错吗, 던전에서 만남을 추구하면 안 되는 걸까, Is it wrong that I want to meet you in a dungeon?, Can't I Expect A Chance Encounter In The Dungeon?, Разве плохо искать себе пару в подземелье?, 在地下城尋求邂逅是否搞錯了什麼, Zindanda qız tutmağa çalışmaq düz deyil?, Дандзён ни дэаи о мотомэру но ва матигаттэиру даро, 伏城求逑蓋有罔乎 (Classical Chinese), Is It Wrong to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?
description:
Bell Cranel is just trying to find his way in the world. Of course, in his case, the “world” is an enormous dungeon filled with monsters below a city run by gods and goddesses with way too much time on their hands. He’s got big dreams but not much more when a roll on the random encounter die brings him face-to-face with the girl of his dreams—but what’s an amateur adventurer got to offer a brilliant swords woman? And what if the lonely goddess who sponsors his solo adventuring gets jealous?

(Series was cancelled in 2018 for an unknown reason and restarted in 2020 under a sequel title.)
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Oomori Fujino

title: Venus Wars
alt_title: ヴィナス戦記, 金星战记, Record of the Venus Wars
description:
May 2003. An icy planet from distant space crashes into Venus, changing its qualities completely. These qualities prove to present some habitability for humans, enticing men to eventually colonize it for themselves...

80 years later, Venus is home to many people who call it home. However, an ever-present tension between the two major continents, Aphrodia and Ishtar, points to an ominous fate for Venus.

Hiroki Senoo is a rather rebellious member of a motorsport popular within Aphrodia's capital. One day, members of Aphrodia's military approach Hiroki, and, impressed by his skills, invite him to join. Thus, Hiroki finds himself enveloped in Venus's political landscape...

Note: Chapter count resets with Volume 3 to correspond with the second part.
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Delinquents, Tragedy
author: Yasuhiko Yoshikazu

title: Nine Peaks
alt_title: ナインピークス, Девять вершин, Пиковая девятка
description:
A heartwarming tale of a father and son's bond.

After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him.

Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water...

When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
genre: Time Travel, Action, Delinquents
author: Tetsuhiro Hirakawa

title: Cohabitation with My Fiancée
alt_title: Cohabitation with the Fiancee, The Fiancées Live Together, Yaghyonjaneun Donggeojung, Совместная жизнь с невестой, 약혼자는 동거중
description: His fiancee lost her parents so she will be living with the Hyeons, but Sang-Won is a middle school student and the fiancée is a 24 year old adult!? Sang-Won tries to deny that his fiancée is 9 years older than him, but seeing that she does not act her age, he then feels comfortable around her. His fiancée seems kind and innocent on the outside, but on the inside…
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Tam Rin

title: As My Husband Said, I Brought in A Lover
alt_title: 남편의 말대로 정부를 들였다, As My Husband Said, I Brought in the Government, As My Husband Wish, I Will Bring in the Concubine, Я доверилась мужу и завела любовника, 听丈夫的话包养情夫, Como dijo mi marido, traje un amante, I Listened to My Husband and Brought In a Lover
description:
Luise is a woman who married an unfaithful nobleman, who keeps having affairs with other women. Tired of her miserable life, she decides to follow her husband's advice and take a lover for herself. She meets a mysterious man who wears a mask, he is the most famous lover in the underworld.

However, when he takes off his mask, she discovers that he is actually Edward, the grand duke of the empire. Edward is a powerful and dangerous man who has his own plans for Luise. He teaches her to fight, to use magic and to become a strong and independent woman.

Protects her from the dangers that surround her, such as her ex-husband, the emperor and the enemies of the empire. Luise falls in love with Edward, but does he feel the same way about her? And will they be able to stay together amid so much intrigue and conflict?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Heo Hyojung

title: Iljin Romance
alt_title: 일찐로맨스, カーストロマンス
description: Jin Daim has no friends, but likes drawing. Iljina is the most popular girl in school, even though she rejects every confession. Daim thinks she and her friends are an annoyance and disturbs his drawing time before class, but all he ever draws is her. Things get complicated when his secret sketch books gets discovered by one of Iljina's friends.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic
author: Yuhwa Yuhwa

title: The World of That Otome Game is Tough for Us
alt_title: あの乙女ゲーは俺たちに厳しい世界です
description: Leon was reincarnated in the world of an otome game that he was forced by his sister to conquer just before his death. He tried to live a peaceful life as a mob character, but he encountered a scene where a female student ignored the flow of the story and tried to become the main character. Leon ended up seizing Marie, a girl who had a similar atmosphere to his sister from his previous life, and succeeded in thwarting the scheme. It should have have been the right choice... but why was he feeling uneasy about it?
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Mishima Yomu

title: Rikai no Aru Karen-chan
alt_title: 理解のあるカレンちゃん, Thoughtful Karen-chan, Understanding Karen-chan
description:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
genre: Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Anu

title: Writing My Male Lead's Happily Ever After
alt_title: 남주의 복지를 책임지겠습니다, Namjueui Bogjireul Chag-imjigessseubnida, 男主的幸福我來負責, 男主的幸福我来负责, 主人公の幸せ、私が責任を取ります, I Will Take Responsibility for the Welfare of the Male Lead, Tomaré La Responsabilidad Del Protagonista Masculino
description:
I possessed a character in the novel I had been writing roughly for a year: A wicked woman who was destined to die horribly within the next two years.  
  
‘Is this the price for making the readers suffer?’  
  
Anyway, the male lead was suffering from rolling over like a hoop. For the welfare of my creation, the poor male lead, and for my survival, I got a job at the mansion as a maid. And now…  
  
“Lady Laria is the best, after all. I want you to be the mistress of the Blackwell Grand Duchy.”  
  
“Laria is the best!”  
  
“Laria, like my mother?”  
  
The whole family of the Grand Duke likes me. Even the Grand Duke is obsessed with me, performing all sorts of tricks…  
  
“The Lady and I are engaged.”  
  
Yes? Since when?  
  
“My children and I need Lady Sherwood. I have no intention of letting her go.”  
  
What’s wrong with everyone all of a sudden? I just worked for the welfare of the male lead.
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Lee Jiha

title: The Duke Ashleyan's Contractual Marriage
alt_title: 아쉴레앙 공작의 계약 결혼, Duchess Aishling's Contract Marriage, The Contractual Marriage of the Duke Ashillean, The Conclusion of the Contract of the Duke of Ashileans, The Duchess's Contract Marriage
description:
After the 'Tyrant King' killed our parents, we managed to defeat him in a *coup d'état*. My younger sister became Empress and I became the Duchess who ruled the beast-infested Northern territory. We took our revenge and my younger sister has become the Empress, so there's only one task left - the oath I made to God right before helping my younger sister. In order to fufill that oath, I'll have to get married. But for someone like me who has never had a relationship before, 'love' is more difficult than war or fighting a dragon. However, the illegitimate son of the tyrant, the Prince, has just proposed a contractual marriage…?

"Three years. Please just stay married to me for three years. I will divorce you right after that."

What is he saying? And yet, why does he keep catching my eyes?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dan Cheong (단청)

title: Tensai Majo no Maryoku Kare
alt_title: The Genius Witch Lost MP., 天才魔女の魔力枯れ
description: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Tsujishima Moto

title: Maraya
alt_title: Malaya, マラヤ, 玛丽雅
description: In the far off the future, man has lived for his own selfish, personal gain. Ignoring the demands of God, mankind is brutally punished from the skies during an event known as "The Calamity". With half of humanity eradicated, clans of males and females soon rise and become separatist. The male led kingdom of Zod fight tirelessly against the kingdom of Halwatat - a misandrist matriarchy where men are deemed both inferior and bringers of every form of destruction. Maraya, a warrior princess and soon to be "Queen Mother" of Halwatat, is banished from her kingdom due to the machinations of her rival Deborah after a misunderstanding. Will Maraya be received back into her kingdom? Or will she find out the true meaning behind "The Calamity"?
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Yasuhiko Yoshikazu

title: A Splendid Revenge Story Of A Super-Dreadnought Cheat Villainess
alt_title: 超弩級チート悪役令嬢の華麗なる復讐譚, A Splendid Revenge Story of a Super-Dreaded Cheat Villainess
description:
Lunaria il von Solfege. The protagonist, who was reincarnated as the villainess of her favourite game, was flooded with tragic memories of Lunaria. She was condemned, left alone and uncared for, and tried to commit suicide by stabbing herself with a dagger.
"Leave everything to me, Lunaria. Now that I'm Lunaria, I won't show them any mercy."
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess
author: Minato

title: Undead Unluck (Official Colored)
alt_title: Undead Unluck - Digital Colored Comics, Undead Unluck, アンデッドアンラック, アンデッドアンラック カラー版
description: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Official Colored, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Zombies, Martial Arts, Drama, Supernatural
author: Tozuka Yoshifumi

title: Killing Me / Killing You
alt_title: Убить себя / Убить тебя, キリングミー/キリングユー
description: Ever since a meteorite fell, the world has become strange. Two young immortals, Mithia and Youthanasia, are traveling through this crazy world in hopes of finding a way to die.
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Narita Imomushi

title: I'm Trapped in a Drama
alt_title: 막장드라마에 갇혀버렸다, I’m Trapped In A Terrible Drama
description:
The main character, who grew up as an orphan, finally achieves her dream of owning her own home after suffering.
Her joy was short-lived and she suddenly died while watching a drama she enjoyed, feeling pain in her chest. However, when she opened her eyes again, she was in a drama she had watched before she died! And that too, while possessing Shin Sera, a villain who tries to kill the female protagonist, but is destroyed by the male protagonists!

Shin Sera Loving's main character tries to escape from the drama to prevent her destruction, but there is a succession rival who hates her, a fiancé who doesn't even treat her as a human being, and a pervert with a blank face.... With a variety of male protagonists with outbursts of personality, are you getting more and more entangled?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kang Noh

title: Progolfer no ore ga Imouto no Putter ni Tensei shiteshimatta ken
alt_title: プロゴルファーの俺が妹のパターに転生してしまった件, The Case of Me, a Pro Golfer, Being Reincarnated as My Little Sister's Putter, 本是職業高爾夫選手的我轉生成妹妹的推桿
description:
On the green of the All Japan Open final, professional golfer Kazuma Yagami is killed by a lightning strike just before he is about to win! His soul, unable to leave his sister behind, resides in the putter he was carrying at the time, and his younger sister, Ryoko, who inherited the putter, decides to win the tour championship using only her brother's putter!


In order to become a professional golfer, Ryoko enrolls in the prestigious Seven Two Academy, where the elite golfers gather. The challenge of the two of them together is about to begin. ----!
genre: Comedy, Sports
author: Yui Daisuke

title: Normality and Monsters
alt_title: フツーと化け物, The Story About a Monster Teaching Common Sense
description:
Itou-san, who’s poor at interpersonal relations, was jealous of her mild-mannered classmate Takahashi-san, who gets along well with everyone. But one day, she witnesses Takahashi-san swallow a person whole. Takahashi-san was a monster mimicking a human!

Such a terrifying monster was calmly blending in with the class – that’s extremely admirable!! I definitely want to be her friend!!

And so Itou-san learns the “normality” of human society from Takahashi-san the monster. But while Itou-san is in high spirits, Takahashi-san has her own motives…

A tag team between a prodigy author and the spirited illustrator behind “Youjo Senki” brings forth a thundering tale of maidens whose youthful impatience and yearning jumble together and accelerate! (Translated from the Bookwalker description for Volume 1.)
genre: Monsters, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Horror, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: Warugi Wanai

title: Summertime
alt_title: Temporada de verano, Summer Season, Un verano inolvidable, Летняя пора, 夏季, 青い夏の先に、, 하절기
description: Yeo Eunho and Cha Dohyeon have been friends all their lives. After 19 years, Eunho seems to have a good grasp on Dohyeon, even knowing that his “perfect” image at school is a façade. But what Eunho is absolutely oblivious to is the fact that Dohyeon has had an obsessive crush on him for years. Though Dohyeon has been able to keep it a secret in order to slowly ease his way into Eunho’s heart, the sudden arrival of a new student named Kwon Yihyeon throws a wrench into his plans. What will Dohyeon do to keep Eunho by his side? And will Eunho ever realize his best friend’s feelings for him?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Minggur

title: THE ISEKAI DOCTOR　Any sufficiently advanced medical science is indistinguishable from magic.
alt_title: 高度に発達した医学は魔法と区別がつかない, Any Sufficiently Advanced Medical Science Is Indistinguishable From Magic, Highly Advanced Medicine Is Indistinguishable From Magic, I Used High-Level Medicine to Counter Magic, Высокоразвитая медицина неотличима от магии
description:
Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules!

Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries!

Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10576/episode/352607)
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Animals, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Tsuda Houkou

title: You Shou Yan
alt_title: 有兽焉, Fabulous Beasts, There Are Beasts
description:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
genre: Historical, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: 靴下猫腰子

title: Elis, the Emperor's Wife
alt_title: 네임드 엘라이스 : 황제의 그녀, The Emperor's Wife, the one named Elise, 放置された側室ですが恋したいの で離婚してください, Soy Una Concubina Abandonada, Pero Quiero Enamorarme, Así Que Por Favor Divórciate De Mí
description:
*(Note: The Korean cover comes from the novel, the adaptation was made in Japanese, so the true manhwa's cover is the Japanese one.)*

I am one of the 48 concubines of the emperor who can play and eat for the rest of their lives. But I never saw the emperor's face.
So one day I was thinking about trying to have a love life in a virtual reality game.
When I was trying to catch a monster, I accidentally PKed a beginner player.
That novice player is… His Majesty the Emperor!?
Then he secretly offered me a deal.

“What do you want? Shall I give it to the Empress?”
"No, please divorce me. So that I can love as much as I want."

The emperor, a beginner player, and the concubine, an advanced player,
An exhilarating fantasy romance unfolding in the game world!

Will I be able to safely divorce the emperor...?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: IIAKI (이야기)

title: I Stan the Prince
alt_title: 황자님께 입덕합니다, Hwangja-nimgge Ibdeoghabnida, Я фанатею по принцу, 皇子さまにハマってます, 关于我写的同人被正主发现了这件事, 关于我的二创被正主发现了这件事, 被皇子殿下圈粉了
description:
Angela's fanfic became such a sensation that it even reached the Imperial Family, leading her to get arrested on charges of treason. Nevertheless, her fanfic improved the First Prince's image, and his sister, the Princess, decides to take political advantage of this and keep Angela by their side. The heroine who can now fangirl to her heart's content, and the Prince who doesn't know how to act around her. As they bicker back and forth, they start growing closer…

---
Angela is mortified when her cringey fanfic about the dethroned Prince Rayburn is published behind her back and becomes a wildly popular bestseller. Not only is it super embarrassing, but the book gets her in trouble with the current imperial family, who now want her head for treason!

Luckily, Rayburn's sister Hoya offers to protect her-- but in exchange, she must write a sequel that will improve Rayburn's tarnished reputation. But that's easier said than done, when the scary prince already hates her for writing the first novel. Will Angela be able to chip away at Rayburn's cold exterior and gather enough inspiration for her next book?

---

title: Mikakunin no mura no Ohanashi
alt_title: 未確認で進行形　【みかくにんの村のおはなし】
description: Spin-off de "Mikakunin de Shinkoukei". Acerca de la vida cotidiana de los personajes en un universo paralelo donde Benio es la alcaldesa de la villa que todos habitan.
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
author: Arai Cherry

title: Yarinaoshi Reijou wa Ryuutei Heika wo Kouryaku-chuu
alt_title: やり直し令嬢は竜帝陛下を攻略中, The Do-Over Damsel Conquers the Dragon Emperor, The Returnee Noble Lady in the Middle of Conquesting His Majesty the Dragon Emperor, 重生大小姐正在攻略龙帝殿下, 새출발 영애는 용제폐하를 공략중, Win Over the Dragon Emperor This Time Around, Noble Girl!
description:
The curtains rise on the tale of a young lady who once stormed the battlefields now getting to start her life all over again!  
  
The young noblewoman, Jill, was sentenced to death by her fiancé, the Crown Prince. Just as she was on the brink of death, time rewinds back to when she was 10 years old, to the party where her engagement had been decided!   
  
Determined to avoid going down the same path to ruin, Jill hastily proposes to the person behind her, only to discover that he’s none other than Hades, the Emperor of the neighboring kingdom who’s (set to) fall into darkness, ergo the worst villain.
genre: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Nagase Sarasa

title: Turning the Mad Dog Into a Genteel Lord
alt_title: 미친개 도련님 만들기, 狂犬な彼を貴公子に変えてみせます!
description: Diarin, a priestess without any noteworthy family background or connections, always gets the toughest assignments. So when her boss tells her to help Ceres, a war hero, reintegrate into society, she decides to stop being a pushover and get as much as she can out of it, including a juicy promotion. But upon reaching Ceres' manor, she’s greeted by a growling hound instead of a human. Tasked with the impossible job of turning the mad dog into a proper gentleman, she dedicates herself to caring for him. But his unexpected obsession with her was never part of her plan.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Mystery, Full Color
author: V_An

title: Please Go Home, Akutsu-san!
alt_title: ヤンキー娘, 帰ってください！ 阿久津さん, Пожалуйста, иди домой, Акуцу-сан!, Пожалуйста, иди домой, Акуцу!, 请你回去吧！阿久津同学, Por favor vete a casa, ¡Akutsu-san!
description:
Ooyama-kun normally doesn’t get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place!

Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san’s sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space… he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn’t?

A teasing comedy under a single roof!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Nagaoka Taichi

title: X -kai-
alt_title: X - Kai, X Kai, X-kai
description: Kaito Yagami is a florist/gardener by day and a hired assassin by night. He kills using poisons from plants to make money to care for his brother who is confined in a hospital.
genre: Action, Psychological, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Tohjoh Asami

title: It's a Cat, Adopted by a Wolf Family?
alt_title: 고양이인데, 늑대 가문에 입양당했다?, 猫なのにオオカミ一家の養子になりました, You're a Cat, But You've Been Adopted by a Wolf Family?, Soy un gato, pero... ¿fui adoptada por una familia de lobos?
description: Kitia, es una gatita huérfana. ¡El mundo da demasiado miedo para que un gatito viva solo! A Kitia se le ocurre un truco y se dirige al territorio de los lobos. "¿Hola? Mi nombre es Kitia, una loba joven pero valiente”. "...Definitivamente es un lobo".
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Full Color
author: NoChanJoo (노찬주)

title: The Poisonous Healer
alt_title: 독 먹는 힐러, Dok Meongneun Healer, Poison-Eating Healer, Sanador Devorador de Venenos
description:
In a world where monster hunters are hailed as heroes, Cheon Haesun has been treated like an outcast because of his abnormal looks. As if that wasn't bad enough, a pack of monsters attacks his neighborhood on the day he discovers he's dying from an unknown illness!

With his sister's sacrifice, Haesun survives and somehow awakens to become a Poisoner, a rare hunter with toxic healing abilities.

But will his poisonous powers cure Haesun's illness and guarantee a normal life he's always dreamed of?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Park Kyeong-won

title: On and Off: Work-Life Imbalance
alt_title: 会社と私生活－オンとオフ－, Vida Empresarial y Privada: ON y OFF, Company and Private Life: On and Off
description:
Working people have company (on) and private lives (off). 

Meet two office workers whose professional lives "on" the clock and private lives when they’re "off" couldn't be more different. He dresses like a lolita. She dresses like a punk. 

When their contrasting "on" and "off" modes collide, it inevitably leads to heart-pounding antics!

---

A serialization of the [Twitter series](https://mangadex.org/title/0fa5d834-fdab-4ac4-b3c9-821f1580f991/company-and-private-life) about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.
genre: Romance, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Kanazawa Shinnosuke

title: Chounin A wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Doushitemo Sukuitai
alt_title: 町人Aは悪役令嬢をどうしても救いたい～どぶと空と氷の姫君～, Villager A Wants to Save the Villainess no Matter What!, Крестьянин хочет спасти злодейку любой ценой!
description:
Allen, an eight-year-old boy from a poor family in the royal capital, is living a poor but happy life together with his mother. One day, however, memories of his previous life suddenly come back to him and he remembers that he is in an dating sim game and that the capital will be destroyed by war if he doesn’t do something about it. If this continues, both he and his mother will be killed! With a sense of urgency, he decides to rise to the occasion in order to save his precious mother’s life and save his favorite character, the villainous young lady Anastasia, the only girl he liked in the game, from her all too tragic and ruinous end.

This is the story of a man who isn’t even a character in the game, but who strives with his steely determination and uses all the knowledge he has to turn overcome fate!
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Isshiki Kotaro

title: Necromancer Academy and the Genius Summoner
alt_title: Necromancer Academy's Genius Summoner, 네크로맨서 학교의 소환천재
description: Necromancers have built a name for themselves as fearsome practitioners of magic capable of dropping entire empires to their knees. Simon Follentia is a necromancer with incredible latent talent! After being scouted for the necromancer's academy, this genius is ready to be nurtured and taken to the next level. But could Simon's insane talents attract some unforeseen consequences?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Full Color
author: AZI

title: Karakai Jouzu no (Moto) Takagi-san
alt_title: Skilled Teaser (Former) Takagi-san, Мастер дразнилок (Бывшая) Такаги-сан, からかい上手の（元）高木さん
description:
Takagi and Nishikata are now married and have a kindergarten-aged daughter named Chi. See how much some things have changed, and others have curiously stayed the same!  
  
*Note: The volumes collect the chapters in a different order than the web version. The chapters here follow the web numbering without any volumes.*
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Inaba Mifumi

title: Takou no Koori Hime wo Tasuketara, Otomodachi kara Hajimeru Koto ni Narimashita
alt_title: 他校の氷姫を助けたら、お友達から始める事になりました, After Helping the "Ice Princess" From Another School, I Decided to Start as a Friend
description:
Nagi Shinonome, known as the "Ice Princess," is a beautiful girl with a cold attitude who does not allow others to get close to her. 

One day, Souta Minori, who saw her being molested on the train, saved her with all his courage, but the next day she appeared again and said, "I want you to stay by my side." 

Can Souta continue as friends with the Ice Princess, who only sweetly melts for one person in the world, that is, himself?
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
author: Satsuki Hiryuu

title: Saha (Gye Piya)
alt_title: 사하
description:
Saha cross-dressed as a woman in order to disguise himself as his twin sister who was supposed to be
Kang Heetae’s unlucky wife, but ran away that night. Saha met Kang Heesu; the younger brother of the sick Kang Heetae. Heesu felt obligated to take care of Saha who was in danger. As time passes, Saha slowly begins developing feelings for Heesu, “her” savior.
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Drama, Full Color
author: Gye Piya

title: IDOL×IDOL STORY!
alt_title: アイドル×アイドル　ストーリー！, Айдол×Айдол история!, Idol x Idol Story!
description:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
genre: Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Music
author: Tokunou Shoutarou

title: Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Meteor Mission!
alt_title: スーパードラゴンボールヒーローズ メテオミッション！
description:
After defeating Dark King Demigra, Goku, and his allies go to visit the Planet of the Kaio, only to find that Kaio North and co. are nowhere to be seen...
While our heroes are trying to figure out what could have happened, a mysterious new foe appears!
genre: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Video Games, Supernatural
author: Nagayama Yoshitaka

title: I Think I Have Transmigrated Somewhere
alt_title: 제가 어딘가 빙의를 한 것 같은데요., I Have Possessed the Body of the Protagonist, I Think I've Transmigrated Somewhere, It Seems I've Transmigrated Somewhere, I Think I've Been Possessed Somewhere, Creo que he transmigrado en alguna novela
description:
Even though the harsh reality feels like living as a beggar, to think that the end would be death from overworking!
If it’s going to end like this, I should’ve been in a lot of relationships, but wait,
oh my... who are you in the mirror?

I’m a little flustered but this body… it’s really pretty!
It feels like I’ve been transmigrated into a romance fantasy novel.
Since I’m already like this, should I enjoy the romance while I’m at it?

“But which novel did I get transmigrated into?”

I’ve read dozens of books where the ‘Northern Duke’ and ‘Childhood Friends’ exist,
I’ve read so many with a black-haired male lead and a blonde female lead,
Ah~ I don’t know!! For now, let’s start by conquering the male characters!

“I already have a promised marriage."

“I volunteered for the Western Guard. We won’t be able to meet for several years.”
What is this, is this really a romance fantasy novel? Why is everyone running away?!
In the first place… was I really transmigrated as the female lead?

What kind of novel is this!!!!
<It Seems I’ve Transmigrated Somewhere>
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dalbicho

title: Tensei Pandemic
alt_title: Gender Change Pandemic, Re-Gender Pandemic, 性转传染病, 転性パンデみっく
description:
Imamura Hinata is a high school boy with a cute appearance.  
Since his trauma with the first love, he wanted to be more manly than anybody else. But one day he woke up to something different…  
The total opposite of his ideal male body!   
Pandemic love comedy!  
  ***
Trivia : Tensei Here Written as (転性) = (性) Means Gender, Not Tensei (転生) = Reincarnation/Re-Living (生)  
  


---
genre: Genderswap, Comedy, Crossdressing, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Fuyuno Nabe

title: Spoiled Medical Princess: The  Legend of Alkaid
alt_title: 盛宠医妃之摇光传, Magnificently Spoiled Medical Imperial Concubine: Biography of Eta Ursae Majoris, 盛寵醫妃之搖光傳
description: Nangong Yue was an excellent doctor from a famous and noble family in her previous life. She helped Han Lingfu ascend to the throne, but she got an order of execution for her whole family. She was reborn in the past and she swore to revenge on him, but a man changed everything
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Xiaoxiang Academy of Reading Group (阅文集团潇湘书院)
artist: Xiaoxiang Academy of Reading Group (阅文集团潇湘书院)

title: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w
alt_title: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w, After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL
description:
After I beat a noob in an FPS, he challenged me to a fight in real life!?

I decided to go along with it just for fun, but when I got there, a cute girl was waiting for me!

This is a romcom featuring a scummy male lead and a feisty female lead!

(Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1564434/vol_no/001))
genre: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Medatarou

title: Quick Transmigration: Top-Notch Villain Must Be Cleansed
alt_title: Kuài Chuān Zhī Dǐngjí Fǎnpài Yào Xǐ Bái, Quick Transmigration: Top-Notch Villain Must Whitewash, Quick Transmigration: Top-Notch Villain Must Be Cleansed, Rapid Transmigration: First-Rate Villain Wants to Whitewash, 快穿之顶级反派要洗白
description: Once the big boss with a thousand lifetimes is reincarnated, the boss will be the little pitiful Lonely Star? In order to change that fate, Liang Yin transmigrates through time and space, oppresses scums and bitches, and strives to cleanse their reputations and reverse the fate of tragic characters. But cleansing always involves a kiss (no) and the location is always in the bath (no!), on the bed (no!!), and out in the open? (no no no!!!). Several times after, Liang Yin fell into deep contemplation. Could the answer be in the riddle? Cleansing until they're clean?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Isekai, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 共小创

title: Red and Mad
alt_title: 레드 앤 매드, Rojo y Loco
description:
Lee Ye-joo, a lone female college student, has a secret. A special ability to leap over time beyond the unknown door! But the uncontrolled ability is just a curse, and what she faced one day after moving for as many as a thousand years was a mad world in which the absolute red-eyed ran wild. An unidentified man who causes earthquakes and lightning by beckoning only refers to her as a "timer" and makes her his target of extermination for that reason.

In a hurry to survive and return to the past, she lies without even knowing what the meaning of "timer" is.

"Take me to the other humans and I'll tell you where to live!"

The contractual relationship tied in exchange for the reserved death, but the man's back was stronger and warmer than expected.

Is that why? She didn't plan it.

I want to melt the frozen future...

"Not only do you live, but you've also created feelings that I don't know."

An omnipotent obsession with a woman who was tied up in the future to avoid death, and a chasing romance that risked her life.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Gwon Gyeoeul (권겨을)

title: Oishinbo
alt_title: 美味しんぼ, 맛의 달인, 美味大挑戰, The Gourmet
description:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Tragedy
author: Kariya Tetsu

title: The Villainous Doctor
alt_title: Unscrupuous Consort: the Evil Doctor, 邪医狂妻, 復讐の魂術師, 혼의록, Unscrupuous Consort: the Evil Dotor
description: When she met him for the first time, she just wanted to escape from him. From then on, however, she gradually got used to his company. He is the god of death to everyone else, but he will always give the barest hint of a smile to her. Whenever there was a danger, he would always help her like a real god fallen from the heaven, mocking her at the same time. With the lapse of time, her feelings for him was more than just dependence. If she doesn’t love him, she wouldn’t let him stay by her; If not, how would she feel so different…
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Adaptation, Music, Full Color
author: SANFU A&C (三福动漫)

title: Cacomistle's Anthology
description: An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.
genre: Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Comedy, Mecha, Anthology, Adventure, Magic, 4-Koma, School Life, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural
author: Cacomistle

title: Eden no Uragawa
alt_title: The Backside Of Eden, エデンのうらがわ
description:
Akiba is indebted to a man named Arimura for giving him work, and so is obliged to take in Ikumi, who appears to be the ostensibly-straight Arimura's lover. It soon becomes obvious that the other man doesn't intend to pay much attention to Ikumi after foisting him off on Akiba. Though initially annoyed by the troublesome situation he's become tangled up in, Akiba slowly finds himself being won over by Ikumi's pleasant, easy-going nature.  
  
The gentle, blessed days of an up-and-coming photographer and a cute freeloader… Can they continue indefinitely?
genre: Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Miyoshi Ayato

title: The Ice Guy and His Cool Female Colleague
alt_title: 氷属性男子とクールな同僚女子, The Ice Guy and the Cool Girl, Ледяной парень и классная девушка-коллега, 빙속성 남자와 쿨한 동료녀, 冰属性男子与酷酷女同事, 冰屬性男子與無表情女子, Ice Guy and the Cool Female Colleague
description:
A cute fluffy romance about the decendant of a yuki-onna who freezes the surrounding area every time he talks to his cute coworker.

x.5 chapters are longer than normal chapters and have more fluffy content, make sure to read them!

---
Himuro is a living descendant of the Snow Woman from Japanese folklore. But anytime he's around his eccentric yet kind colleague, Fuyutsuki-san, he totally freezes up! Despite the snowstorm of love that rages on in his heart, and her complete cluelessness, will he take a step forward or stay frozen in place?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Penguin Random House](https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/series/FQP/the-ice-guy-and-the-cool-girl/)
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Tonogaya Miyuki

title: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san
alt_title: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん, Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски, Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски, 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學, Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian, My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
description:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Sansan Sun

title: Comeback of the Reborn Lady
alt_title: 重生之嫡女不善, Have Mercy, Your Ladyship!, The Reborn First Lady Is Not Pure, The Rebirth of the First Daughter, 이번 생은 악녀가 되겠습니다
description:
Drowned to death, born again. That's what it took for Huo Tianxin to realize how blind she had been to the truth. In this life, she was determined to retaliate. She refused to remain a timid, cowardly little girl. She would kill anyone who tried to hurt her loved ones! She narrowed her cold eyes dangerously.

"Shen Ruoqiu, do your worst. You're destined to fail!"

However, when the dust settled, she found herself in yet another tricky trap...

---
Original Web Comic: [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/647550), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28153), [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6866/)

Official English Translations: [BiliBili Comics (Defunct)](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc410), [Mangatoon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/1035988), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/429), [Webcomics](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/6152e63c8c252b5d370ac55a)
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Isekai, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Hotread

title: Demon Lord Exchange!!
alt_title: 魔王さまエクスチェンジ!!, Обмен повелителями демонов!!
description: Hero Filina’s party is on the brink of annihilation in the face of a powerful Demon Lord. The almighty demon proposes to spare their lives on one condition - that he may swap bodies with the hero for a year. Atty, a Priest and Filina’s childhood friend, naturally objects to the proposal, but Filina agrees to the terms to protect her companions. Thus begins a new journey for the Demon Lord, naive to the ways of the world, and the quirky group of adventurers, as they set out to vanquish the new Demon Lord once and for all...!!
genre: Genderswap, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Hozumi Riya

title: I Took Away the Tyrant’s Virginity
alt_title: I Took Away the Tyrant's Chastity, I Took Away the Tyrant's First Time, 폭군의 순결을 빼앗아 버렸다, Robé la virginidad del tirano
description:
“After all, a man must have big breasts… … .”

The man's chest visible through the sunlight is very handsome... … .
for a moment. Who are you naked next to me?

"Emperor… … your majesty?"

Unbelievable.
Unintentionally at a masquerade ball
It seems like he spent the night catching a tyrant.

“How dare you take away the emperor’s virginity and leave?”

No, last night was an agreement!

“If you knocked me down on the bed, you will be responsible.”

yes?
The look in your eyes that silently urges me to answer... … .

“I will take responsibility for the book, Your Majesty.”

I curled my tail.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 백단

title: For My Derelict Favorite
alt_title: 버려진 나의 최애를 위하여, Beoryeojin Na-eui Choeaereul Wihayeo, For My Forsaken Beloved, For My Abandoned Love, For My Derelict Beloved, 为了我被遗弃的爱
description:
I entered my favorite romantic fantasy novel! I may be a commoner, but I'm rich beyond belief. I quietly watched the romance of the main characters in the original novel, assuming I would go back to reality after reaching the novel's ending... However, even after the ending, I am still stuck in this world! As a result, I learned the behind-the-scenes stories that I didn't want to know. My favorite second male lead, Kaelus, died. Living in poverty without him, I eventually became ill and died as well. I thought I would return to reality, but I went back in time instead. This is definitely... This means I have to save my beloved, right?

---
**Notes:**
* The novel of this series was originally released as R15, 7 months after being completed the book/ebook was later re-released as R19. The webtoon will follow how the novel was originally released which is R15.
* *For My Derelict Favorite* is the official English name on the Korean novel.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8423030), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=794155)
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ryuho

title: Catenaccio
alt_title: カテナチオ
description: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
genre: Psychological, Sports
author: Morimoto Daisuke

title: Gift of Poison
alt_title: ドクの贈物
description: Gift Hisono is a gifted painter cursed with financial woes. On the brink of finishing his latest work, his trusty palette knife suddenly snaps! In a desperate attempt to afford a replacement, he steals paint from his close friend and fellow art club member, Taima. This act of theft witnessed by another club member, Kadomi, marks the beginning of his poisonous downfall...
genre: Psychological, Drama, Web Comic
author: Dodotan

title: Shibatarian
alt_title: シバタリアン, Cибатарианец
description: In the spring of my third year of middle school, I found Shibata buried beneath a sakura tree. We watched movies and became fast friends, even planned to make a movie together for the school festival...but no one at school seemed to know him. I will discover Shibata and the whole world will turn into Shibata. This is a story of, by, and for Shibata. Now showing in a theater near you.
genre: Psychological, Horror, Supernatural
author: Iwamuro Katsuya

title: DOGSRED
alt_title: ドッグスレッド, Dogs Red, Догсред, Красные Псы
description:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!
genre: Sports
author: Noda Satoru

title: How to Win My Husband Over
alt_title: 남편을 내 편으로 만드는 방법, Nampyeon'eul Nae Pyeon'euro Mandeuneun Bangbeob, How to Get My Husband on My Side, Как переманить мужа на свою сторону, 夫を味方にする方法, 让丈夫站在我这边的方法, 讓丈夫偏愛的方法, 讓丈夫站在我這邊的方法
description:
In the original lines of the novel, I was a villainess—used as a political tool by my father and older brother—who ended up dying at the hands of my future husband.

To save his kingdom, my father desperately begged my fifth groom to take my hand in marriage. The problem is that the man I’m supposed to marry, the legendary knight of the North, is the same man who will end up murdering me and my entire family.

I have to find a way to survive.

Within the novel itself, there are many daunting challenges ahead of me: I have to find a way to save my husband’s little sister, win over my cold-hearted husband, and gain the support of the people of the North, all of whom currently despise me.

“I’m in love with you!”

So please, don’t kill me!

---
I thought I'd finally escaped my hellish life when I died in an airplane crash, but I fell into another nightmare when I awoke as Rudbeckia de Borgia, a minor villain from a historical novel destined to die at the hands of her husband, Iske van Omerta. Surviving with the dysfunctional Borgia family is hard enough, but now I have to marry the man who will kill me! Still, it’s okay, I just have to convince Iske, his family, and all his countrymen that I’m completely harmless! How hard can that be?

---

alt_title: 廻天のアルバス
description:
The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But... it was too late.

Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. 

Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn’t matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster.

title: Corrupting the Heroine's First Love
alt_title: 여주인공의 첫사랑을 타락시켜 버리면, If You Corrupt the Heroine's First Love, Corrupting Your Heroine's First Love Will Result With This, Robé al primer amor de la heroína
description:
“I am a knight of Latem. We’re not destined to stand under the same sky.”

She had become Karina Apocalita, the personification of evil and a member of the heterogeneous race that ruled the world with malevolence. The plot began to twist and turn when Karina unknowingly saved the life of Reneiger, a justful knight and the heroine’s first love.

Reneiger became doubtful of his faith, eventually losing his glow and radiant platinum blond. Soon the sacred knight fell from grace and aligned himself to Karina’s fate.

“There’s no turning back now. Dear God, please forgive me.”

He knew he would never be able to escape from her hands.

---
"I am a knight of Latem, and that means I cannot coexist under the same sky as you."

After entering the book *A Trapped Bird Cannot Escape*, I realized that I had taken over the body of Karina Apocalypta, a member of a species that reigns as the evil of the world. However, the novel's plot begins to twist after I saved the life of Reneiger, the first love of the female protagonist, who happens to be a holy knight. Reneiger begins to doubt his faith, ultimately losing his brilliant platinum hair. Thus, the once sacred holy knight turns corrupt and eventually sympathizes with Karina's fate...

"Now we have each other's desires," Karina said while caressing his cheek. It was a feeling of being pulled in by each fascinating tendril of thorny vines.

Reneiger couldn't bear it, "It can't be undone."

---
In a land overshadowed by darkness, Karina Apocalita rises as a formidable figure, her being a tapestry of power from a diverse race. Her destiny intertwines with Reneiger, a knight from the virtuous Latem order, known for justice and as the former love of a legendary heroine. Their paths take an unforeseen turn when Karina, unaware of her impact, saves Reneiger's life. This act, challenging his convictions, triggers a crisis within him, tarnishing his once radiant aura and precipitating a fall from grace.

Faced with his altered fate, Reneiger prays for forgiveness, realizing his escape from Karina's shadow is but a dream. This pivotal moment raises a haunting question: will Reneiger rediscover the light, or be consumed by the darkness emanating from Karina?
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

title: Shameless School
alt_title: ハレンチ学園, 破廉恥學園, 파렴치 학원
description:
The first ecchi in history.

Beginning in the first issue of Weekly Shonen Jump (ch 2). The nature of the content is very extreme with both teachers and students being involved in perverted situations. Over the publication, Go Nagai included more extreme content at the encouragement of his editor. As the manga continued its serialization, it garnered more and more controversy from parents. As a result, the Jump Editorial Dept. decided to cancel the serial. 

Nagai, in response to the controversy, decided to end off the manga [End of part 1] with the very infamous "Harenchi War" (Shameless War) arc.

_(spoiler)
The arc kills off the majority of the cast in a very gory and disturbing manner and remains a very infamous arc to this day._


Shameless School is controversial in Japan even today and is regarded as a "traumatic work" by several news publications.

The manga consists of 3 parts, with the last left unfinished due to the cancellation. + last volume includes 3 chapters backstory arc for Bearded Godzilla.
genre: Sci-Fi, Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Harem, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Shota, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

title: One Night of a 19 Year Old Friendship
alt_title: 19년지기의 하룻밤
description:
“What’s wrong? Are you nervous?”

A warm hand caressed my cheek.

“It looks like you’ll start crying any moment now if you if I went any further.”  He murmured in a low voice.  “Well, shall we put that to the test?”  He snaked his hand across my waist and pulled me in.
The moment our bodies touched, my breath caught in my throat.

“Lately,”

“Our relationship has become a little strange.”  His whisper wrapped around the shell of my ear perilously.

The water inside the pot had started boiling, but neither of us dared to move.

We merely stayed in place, facing each other.


For 19 years, under our status as friends,

The once indifferent man has slowly became heated over time,

Until he has transformed into a man consumed by infatuation in the course of one month.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

alt_title: 악당의 소중한 따님, Akdangi Sojunghan Ttanim, The Villain's Precious Daughter, La preciosa hija del villano, Драгоценная дочь злодея, 悪党公爵の愛娘, 恶人奶爸的宝贝女儿, 恶棍的宝贝女儿, 惡徒的寶貝女兒
description:
My name is Rosaria von Valencia, but I didn't always have this name. According to a book I read, I'm supposed to be murdered in place of the saint, Cordelia, just because I look like her. I decided to run away to avoid ever meeting my future killer, Duke Valencia, but ended up running into him as he was on the brink of death. After I saved him in the hopes of being spared, he adopted me as his daughter! Now that my new dad's spoiling me with love, does this mean I'll get to live until the end?

---
It's already unfair that I suffered greatly because I closely resembled the saint, but why did the villain kill me without any mercy at all? No, actually, it said in the book that I was really bound to die. 'My life is already ruined. Of all things, why do I have to be the one to die a ridiculous death?' There's still hope! I haven't met any of the characters yet so I'll just run away! But why did the villain collapse in front of me...?

With a lot of effort, I barely saved the life of the villain who was on the brink of death. But now he's saying that he wanted to adopt me as his daughter and raise me to be a saint?! Just like that, I decided to become his daughter for a few days before leaving quietly.

"My daughter is a genius. There's no child who is more angelic in this world other than my daughter."

...I think I have coaxed my dad too well. Even the guys who originally followed the real saint started to pay attention to me. What went wrong? Aren't you guys supposed to hate me?!

---
**Original Web Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55069889), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8231327), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3885006486)

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/content/59664271)

author: Yoon On

title: Uzugami
alt_title: 渦神 - 分裂増殖人間
description:
Satoru Takeichi, also known as Ichigo, works at a sawmill. 

While working, he got into a mechanical problem and ended up having the first joint of his right little finger amputated. He and other employees searched for the cut off part, but couldn't find it. 

Ichigo goes straight to the hospital and receives treatment. However, when he returned to his apartment after being hospitalized for a few days, he found another version of him... 

From there, a strange shared life with another [Himself] begins...
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural
author: Mitsuru Oshiro

title: Fate/Grand Order - Daily Chaldea (Doujinshi)
alt_title: Daily Chaldea
description:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.
genre: Self-Published, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Rednal

title: During the Live Streaming, I Proposed to a Female Ghost - And She Actually Agreed?!
alt_title: 直播整活，我向女鬼求婚——她居然真答应了？！, During the Live Broadcast, I Proposed to a Female Spirit - And She Said Yes?!, I Proposed to a Ghost Girl During the Livestreaming - And She Actually Agree?!
description: For the sake of the show’s effect, Fang Ning invited a cheap drama crew to prepare for an overnight live broadcast at the Princess Tomb. However, unexpectedly, something happened midway through the live broadcast – Fang Ning mistook a female ghost for a cast actress and proposed to her directly! Now, what should he do if she takes it seriously?!
genre: Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: 创星漫艺工作室

title: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu
alt_title: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～, Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls
description:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Ayano (絢乃)

title: Drunken D-Rank Pulls Out the Legendary Sword
alt_title: Заброшенный геройский дар, 万年Dランクの中年冒険者、酔った勢いで伝説の剣を引っこ抜く, Eternal D-Ranked Middle-aged Adventurer, Pulls Out the Legendary Sword While Drunk.
description: Lucas has a hard life. In his mid-thirties, a mixture of failures has left him old and crippled, playing pack mule to a couple of young adventures. Then one day, he pulls a magic sword from a stone that tells him he has been chosen to become a hero. Given a youthful form, Lucas must use the power of the sword to vanquish evil and attain a massive harem.
genre: Action, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kuzu Shichio

title: Yomekura
alt_title: ヨメクラ, 新娘特别班, Bridal Class, Yomekura - A Class-ful of Wives!
description: Before she died, Taga Reiji's mother made arrangements to ensure her son would not be alone. What Taga did not know about these "arrangements" was that he would be enrolled in a special class at the school his mother founded where prospective fiance candidates would all vie for his hand in marriage. How will Taga's new life of constantly being surrounded by girls unfold and will he be able to choose just one?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life
author: Chiaki Tarou

title: Seijo no Maryoku wa Bannou desu: Mou Hitori no Seijo
alt_title: 聖女の魔力は万能です ～もう一人の聖女～, The Saint's Magic Power Is Omnipotent: The Other Saint, The Power of the Saint is All Around: The Other Saint
description: Aira Misono is a run-of-the-mill high school girl, and never imagined that she’d be summoned to another world, let alone declared its savior. Yet from the moment the handsome Prince Kyle lays eyes on her, he’s convinced that she’s the long-awaited Holy Saint destined to banish darkness from his world. Aira herself maintains significant doubts. Is she really up to this challenge? She might be able to use magic, but is she really a Saint? Aira’s fears and struggles only deepen when the woman summoned alongside her begins to look more and more like the one who truly deserves that title.
genre: Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy
author: Tachibana Yuka

title: Beauty and the Beasts
alt_title: 悠哉兽世：种种田，生生崽精品
description: As soon as she fell into the world of beastmen, a leopard forcibly took her back to his home. Indeed, Bai Jingjing is at a complete and utter loss. The males in this world are all handsome beyond compare, while the women are all so horrid that even the gods shudder at their sight. As a first-rate girl from the modern world (she's even a quarter Russian) Bai Jingjing finds herself sitting at the center of a harem filled with beautiful men – at the very peak of existence.
genre: Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yuewen Manhua (阅文漫画)

title: Otokojuku Gaiden - Date Omito
alt_title: Otoko Juku Gaiden Date Omito, Otokojuku Gaiden: Date Omito, Otokojyuku Gaiden Date Omito
description: A spin-off of Sakigake!! Otokojuku focusing on Date Omito.
genre: Action, Martial Arts
author: Miyashita Akira

title: Oyaji to Nyankichi
alt_title: オヤジとにゃん吉, Old Man and Nyankichi
description: Hisahide Matsukata, ex-leader of the Yakuza's Onikaku clan, resigned his position to live alone for the rest of his life...  Until a stray cat showed up at his house! His daily life, which was completely peaceful, turned completely upside down and he was completely at the mercy of the cat's unpredictable behavior! Now, every day is as noisy as it was when he was in the yakuza!!!
genre: Animals, Comedy, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Katakura Yori

title: Tameshi ni Komando Itte mita
alt_title: ためしにコマンド言ってみた
description:
“Masa, kneel.” Select shop owner Masa’s current crush is his best friend, Oto, a fashion model.
They’re both high-ranking doms who attract a lot of attention when they walk the streets. Oto has been feeling under the weather lately, since he was dumped by his sub partner… At the same time, Masa has been building good relationships with three partners.
Feeling that his commands are too forceful and scary, Oto asks Masa for advice, but then Oto jokingly commands Masa to kneel down…?!
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Yukue Moegi

title: Ossan Teihen Chiyu-shi to Manasume no Henkyou Life
alt_title: おっさん底辺治癒士と愛娘の辺境ライフ ～中年男が回復スキルに覚醒して、英雄へ成り上がる～, The Frontier Life of The Low-Class Ossan Healer And The Lovely Girl, The Frontier Life of the Low-Class Old Man Healer and His Beloved Daughter, Old Man, the Low-tier Healer, and the Beloved Daughter's Frontier Life ~A Middle-aged Man Awakens to Healing Skills and Rises to Become a Hero~
description: F-rank healer, Reda Dixon (30), is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken, Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there, he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina, who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight, the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus, Reda, who starts a new life with the girl, becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople, thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level 『Healing Magic』! Together, they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Iida Eisei

title: Futago Matomete "Kanojo" ni Shinai?
alt_title: 双子まとめて『カノジョ』にしない?, Why Don't You Make the Twins Your "Girlfriend" Together?, ¿Por qué no juntar a las gemelas y convertirlas en una novia?
description:
Usami is a beautiful classmate with good morals and top grades. At school, she views Sakuto as her rival. But when he bumps into her after school, he sees a different side of her. She was playing at an arcade after classes, and she had this innocent smile that one couldn't imagine on her at school.

For the sake of getting along with her, he gets close to her at school and then plays together with her after school. They each have their places where they can deepen their bonds, and at last...

This is the start of a heart-warming love triangle romcom!

---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (JP)](https://fantasiabunko.jp/special/202311futago)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Shirai Muku

title: Reader
alt_title: Читатель, 리더-읽는자, 리더(Reader)-읽는자, The True Reader, Leader Reader, Lector, Reader〜活字中毒者が大魔導士の後継ぎになった〜, The Best Reader
description:
Bookworm - Soo-Hyuk. Reading fun number one, always looking for a new way to read books. Even joined new game <Pangea> so no one could disturb him from reading books. The moment Soo-Hyuk finished reading his first book and closed it, he received notification: Wisdom +1 level ….  


---
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Kang Cheol-Mil (강철민)

title: Mane Mane Nichi Nichi
alt_title: マネマネ にちにち
description: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
genre: Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yamamoto Souichirou

title: Yowamushi Pedal
alt_title: Weakling Pedal, 弱虫ペダル, 飆速宅男, Трусливый велосипедист
description:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn’t have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.  
  
Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.  
  
Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal, Go!**

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Watanabe Wataru

title: A Story About a Perfect Girl Breaking Down
alt_title: A Story About a Perfect Girl Gradually Breaking Down, 完璧な女の子がぶっ壊れる話
description:
Minamino Himeka is the physical embodiment of the word *perfect* and she got her eyes set on Natsume-kun who doesn't really have any interest in her. Just how will Himeka make Natsume-kun look her way?  
  
*Sidenote: It feels like Teruhashi the manga without Saiki, offu~* (Hey, you're in the wrong manga)
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic
author: itona

title: Arcane Sniper
alt_title: 마탄의 사수, Магический стрелок, Mystic Musketeer, Matan's shooter, 魔弾の銃士, 魔彈-射手, El Francotirador de Nivel Arcano
description:
Paraplegic ex-sniper Ha Yiha is getting a fresh start in the VR game “Middle Earth.” He hopes to become a powerful player and earn enough money to afford surgery, but there’s a small problem… an untimely logout leaves him playing as a musketeer, the game’s most ineffective class. Luckily, he’s able to use his real-life sharpshooting skills to take musketeering to new heights. As his unprecedented progress turns heads and prompts new quests, Yiha thinks he’s got a shot at success, but he may have just landed himself directly in danger’s sights.

---
