title: Concubine Walkthrough
alt_title: 후궁공략, Concubine Attack, Royal Game, 後宮攻略
description: At first, Yona gave some major side-eye to the popular game "Concubine Walkthrough" until she got sucked into it—literally! Now stuck as the villain, she has her hands full facing the infamously cruel emperor, shaking off scheming concubines, and befriending NPCs. There’s only one way the Game Master will let her out and that’s to become the Empress! Will she be able to stay true to her honest and straightforward self despite the palace’s intrigues? One extra problem: she’s got competition...
genre: Reincarnation, Traditional Games, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Virtual Reality, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Bong Bong

title: To Aru Kagaku no Railgun
alt_title: A Certain Scientific Railgun, Некий научный Рейлган, とある科学の超電磁砲, とある魔術の禁書目録外伝 とある科学の超電磁砲, 某科学的超电磁炮, 어떤 과학의 초전자포, 某科學的超電磁炮, 科學超電磁砲, 科学超电磁炮, 科學超電磁砲 (Classical Chinese)
description:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kamachi Kazuma

title: Golden Kamuy
alt_title: ゴールデンカムイ, Золотое божество, 골든 카무이, 黄金神威, 黃金神威
description:
In the early twentieth century, Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi “Immortal” Sugimoto scratches out a meager existence during the postwar gold rush in the wilderness of Hokkaido. When he stumbles across a map to a fortune in hidden Ainu gold, he sets off on a treacherous quest to find it. But Sugimoto is not the only interested party, and everyone who knows about the gold will kill to possess it! Faced with the harsh conditions of the northern wilderness, ruthless criminals and rogue Japanese soldiers, Sugimoto will need all his skills and luck—and the help of an Ainu girl named Asirpa - to survive.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Action, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Samurai, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Tragedy
author: Noda Satoru

title: Fight Class 3
alt_title: Gyeoggi 3 Ban, Gyeok Gi 3 Ban, 격기3반
description:
A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: 2hakkk

title: Hibari's Morning
alt_title: ひばりの朝, 日波里的清晨
description: Teshima Hibari is a 14-year-old girl with a body that is more sensual than most girls her age. Her story includes the opinions and reactions of all of the people around her, as well as the actions of her own life. The chapters explore the thoughts and feelings of classmates and adults, men and women. The males often have romantic or sexual feelings for Hibari, while the women sometimes have feelings of inferiority or jealousy. Whether positive or negative, it seems everyone has a reaction to Hibari.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Yamashita Tomoko

title: Who's Your Daddy?
alt_title: 후즈유어대디, 후즈 유어 대디, 你爸爸是谁
description:
Louis, the commander of the Second Chief of Guards, is abruptly diagnosed as being "in the fourth month of pregnancy" while chasing a serial killer who is making a splash in the capital. Four months ago, an unforgettable night at the palace ball… Who did he spend the night with?

---

title: The Archmage's Restaurant
alt_title: 어느 마법사의 식당, A Wizard's Restaurant, The Wizard's Restaurant, Eoneu Mabeobsaui Sigdang
description:
A man who reincarnated in another world as a 9th class wizard and retired after saving the continent from a dragon war. He decides to open a small restaurant in the countryside, but his routine is anything but ordinary. 

On the second floor of his restaurant, there lives a black dragon who has transformed into a woman, named Rurin. She is greedy, cute and loyal to him, but also ignorant and clueless about the human world. 

They live a fun and warm life, serving customers, solving problems and growing violets in the garden.
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation, Full Color
author: chassi

title: The Infinite Mage
alt_title: 무한의 마법사, Infinite Wizard, El Mago infinito
description:
This is the tale of a boy dreaming about infinity as a human!

Found abandoned in a stable, Shirone is the son of a hunter—and a peasant through and through.
Despite hardships, he's a genius that manages to learn to read by himself and becomes obsessed with it.

Brimming with genius talent, he goes to the city with his father, where he learns about magic—
beginning his journey as an explosive rising star!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Kiraz (REDICE STUDIO)

title: Cutie's Here: Mommy, Where's My Daddy?
alt_title: 萌宝来袭：妈咪我爹地呢？
description:
The female lead, Ye Xiange, used to be a trainee within Linshan Entertainment. Before she could officially debut however, she was plagued by scandals and her nudes were all over the media. The company terminated the contract with her and she was also cheated by her boyfriend. What she didn’t expect most was that she suddenly had a five year old son after waking up. What the hell? Child, who’s your mommy? And who’s your daddy?

title: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.
alt_title: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。, 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。, When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.
description:
Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games.

Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them.

As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...!

But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected....
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Web Comic
author: Matsumoto Kengo

title: Tsuitenai Game Jikkyousha wa Akogare no Hito ni Kakinsareru
alt_title: ツイてないゲーム実況者は憧れの人に課金される
description:
"Hasumi, a university student who meets with misfortune whenever she does anything, is interested in Oikawa, who helped her out at the entrance ceremony.
However, when she steels herself to talk to him, he doesn't even remember her... Then, at the suggestion of her older brother, who noticed how amusing Hasumi's game-playing was, she decides to livestream a let's play. The video unexpectedly goes viral, and Oikawa has found it too...?

Gaming livestreamer x unlaughing guy—who will be the one to get hooked?"
genre: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Slice of Life
author: Ataru Tei

title: Sekai Saikyou no Majo, Hajimemashita ~Watashi Dake "Kouryaku Saito" o Miseru Sekai de Jiyuu ni Ikimasu~
alt_title: 世界最強の魔女、始めました ～私だけ『攻略サイト』を見れる世界で自由に生きます～, I Became the World's Strongest Witch: I Will Live Freely in a World Where Only I can Access the "Guide Site", The World's Strongest Witch Has Begun - I Will Live Freely In A World Where Only I Can View The "Strategy Site" -
description:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Sakaki Mochimaru

title: Wind Sword
alt_title: Cenangkas Angin, Punggeom, Клинок ветра, 풍검
description: The world is riddled with beasts and demons, however little do people know that a magical barrier is currently sealing away high-level demons. There are those who wish to break the barrier and bring about the end of the world, and those who wish to protect it and its inhabitants. A great battle with heroes, villains, demons and magic is about to begin and will determine the fate of the world.
genre: Historical, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Kim Chul Hyun (김철현)

title: Kuitsume Youhei no Gensou Kitan
alt_title: 食い詰め傭兵の幻想奇譚, The Strange Adventure of a Broke Mercenary, Fantasie Geshichte von soldner in groBer Armut, Необычные странствия бывшего наёмника, 빈털터리가 된 용병의 환상기담 제, 穷苦佣兵的幻想奇谭, The Strange Fantasy Story Of A Broke Mercenary
description: After the soldiers’ mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed, Loren, who survived the disaster, decided to walk the adventurer’s path as a way to make a living. However, for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets, receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So, as he was contemplating about what he should do next, another adventurer called out to him.
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru.: Monologue
alt_title: My Youth Romantic Comedy Is Wrong As I Expected. - Monologue, Oregairu - Monologue -, Как и ожидал, моя школьная романтическая жизнь не удалась, やはり俺の青春ラブコメはまちがっている。 - 妄言録〈モノローグ〉 -, 我的青春恋爱物语果然有问题, Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru. Mougenroku
description: Hikigaya Hachiman, a boy with a distorted personality, is brought to the "Service Club", led by a beautiful and harsh girl named Yukinoshita Yukino, by his academic advisor. Hilarity ensues as the isolated boy, through his many mistakes, begins to reshape himself and those around him.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Watari Wataru

title: Touhou - Until the Water Became Wholly Red (Doujinshi)
alt_title: 池水尽く紅, いけみずこくごとくあか
description:
Youkai Mountain, Gensokyo. Even within this closed-off world, the tengu have their own closed-off, multilayered society. All Shameimaru Aya wants is to work on the scoop of a lifetime, but all around her, much more complicated schemes are afoot, and it seems they can't help but get in her way.

Long-running doujin series by Ashiyama, author of "The Gensokyo of Humans" and "The Magician Who Loved a Fake". Published in book form and for free on Pixiv.
genre: Historical, Action, Office Workers, Magic, Doujinshi, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural

title: Kami-sama ga Uso o Tsuku.
alt_title: El Dios miente., Даже Боги лгут., 神様がうそをつく。, Sometimes the Gods Tell Lies., the gods lie.
description:
It's the summer when Natsuru is 11. Ever since he's turned one of them down on Valentine's Day, the girls of his class have been constantly ignoring him. This changes just before summer break, when Suzumura, the tallest girl in the year, suddenly talks to him. Later, Natsuru meets Suzumura again outside school and finds out she has a secret.


---

title: Tune In to the Midnight Heart
alt_title: 真夜中ハートチューン, Finding the girl behind the voice., Midnight Heart Tune, Полуночный мотив сердца
description:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!

title: Sorairo Square.
alt_title: Sky Blue Square, 空色スクエア。, 空色广场
description: Story is based on three childhood friends. A girl who lost her memory, Miyuki. A girl who is a currently a super idol, Fumika. And Shuichi, a childhood friend of Miyuki and Fumika, who likes to take photographs. Two years ago, Miyuki lost her memory by an accident and she kept a distance from people but somehow she begins to open her heart to Shuichi. Their relationship seems like more than just friends but less than lovers, but in five years, Fumika came back from Tokyo to see Shuichi. Their feelings overlap and their childhood times slowly begin to move.
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Hamayumiba Sou

title: Nee, Darenimo Himitsu da yo
alt_title: Akuma ga Kitarite, Como se te ocurra decírselo a alguien... (Spain), Hey, Don't Tell Anyone The Secret, Joou-sama Melancholic, Monolog Monochrome, Ouji-sama Urajijou, عندما يقع الشيطان في الحب, ねぇ、誰にもヒミツだよ, モノローグ・モノクローム, 噓！要對大家保密唷！, 女王様メランコリック, 恶魔降临, 悪魔が来たりして, 惡魔降臨, 王子様裏事情
description:
1. Nee, Dare ni mo Himitsu da yo  
The super plain protagonist whose special skill is studying is asked to help a handsome but arrongant guy study. "Let's do something more fun than studying." However, what was supposed to have been a heart-throbbing moment… ends up taking a weird turn?  
  
2. Joou-sama Melancholic  
  
3. Monolog Monochrome  
  
4. Ouji-sama Urajijou  
  
5. Akuma ga Kitarite  
Ruiji is secretly in love with Wakatsuki. But how can he declare his love when she's frightened to death every time she meets his eyes?

title: Good-for-Nothing Blues
alt_title: ろくでなしBLUES
description:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Morita Masanori

title: Ajin: Demi-Human
alt_title: 亜人, 아인, 亚人, 亞人, Нелюдь, Получеловек, Ajin, Demi-humans
description: The story follows a high school student named Kei Nagai, who is caught in a traffic accident, dies, but immediately revives and learns he is not human, but an Ajin, a mysterious creature that cannot die. Scared, he runs away from humans but is helped by his friend Kai, who joins him in his flee from civilization. He then becomes involved in a conflict between human and Ajin and must choose a side.
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Military, Drama, Horror, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Miura Tsuina

title: Gods of All People: I Sacrificed Hundreds of Millions of Living Beings To Become a God
alt_title: 全民神祇：我献祭亿万生灵成神, Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood, Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King
description:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!

title: Puniru wa Kawaii Slime
alt_title: Puniru is a Cute Slime, ぷにるはかわいいスライム
description: The first unique romantic comedy manga in the history of CoroCoro! The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Maeda-kun

title: Nightwatcher
alt_title: Dafeng's Night Squad, 大奉打更人
description:
In this world, there is: Confucianism; Taoism; Buddhism, Demons, and Magicians. Xu Qi’an, a graduate from the police academy, suddenly finds himself waking up in prison, to be exiled to the border three days later …

His initial goal was to protect himself in this world with no laws, and to be able to live a leisurely life as a rich man..

Many years later, Xu Qi’an looks back on the past, and the long-dead enemies and friends, as well as the numerous bones he has left behind.

As the Yangtze River flows eastward, the waves wash away the heroes; right and wrong, success or failure will all turn into nothing but history. However, just like the sun’s rays gleaming over the towering mountains, after the sunset, a new sun will rise.
genre: Historical, Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: 龙宝

title: Blue Lock
alt_title: ブルーロック, 藍色監獄, Bluelock, 蓝色监狱, 蓝色禁区
description:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---

alt_title: Captain Tsubasa - Rising Sun - Part 3, キャプテン翼ライジングサン   F I N A L S, Capitán Tsubasa - Rising Sun - FINALS
description:
A web-comic continuation of Captain Tsubasa 9th arc: Rising Sun - The Final.

Rising Sun - FINALS is covering the 2nd half of the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain and beyond.

The web-comic came to be when on April 2024 mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, ending Rising Sun - The Final official published serialization half-way through the match opting to continue the story at his own pace with storyboard pencil sketches, publishing them on the official Captain Tsubasa World website.
genre: Action, Sports, Drama, Web Comic
author: Takahashi Yoichi

alt_title: 人族镇守使, Sentinel of Mankind, Guardian of Hominini, Guardian of Terran

title: Hagure Ningyou no Diana
alt_title: はぐれ人魚のディアナ, Diana Is a Strange Mermaid
description: A certain country long ago. A rare mermaid with transformed legs was brought to the castle, supposed to be presented to the king of a neighbouring country... But the prince who saw her suddenly said, "Would you like to be my princess?" A communal life starts from there! How will the love of these two people go?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Suama

title: The Soulless Duchess
alt_title: 빈껍데기 공작부인, Binkkeopdegi Gongjakbuin, The Duchess With an Empty Soul, The Duchess' Empty Shell, The Empty Shelled Duchess, 公爵夫人的百變召喚術, 虚名的公爵之妻, “透明”的公爵夫人, かりそめの公爵夫人
description:
The naïve Yvona is ready to do anything for her amazing fiancé! Summon magical beasts and let him take the glory? Sure! Wreck her body for a powerful spell and die for him? Yes! Watch him secretly embrace her trusted cousin Tristan with passion and deride her openly? Oka— wait. What? Just then, Yvona dies... and wakes up a year in the past with a burdened heart. Armed with her knowledge, Yvona's ready to fight for herself. And hmm, maybe form an alliance with the coldhearted Duke of Azentine...

---
I died miserably on the day I found out the truth. The truth that my fiancé had a hidden lover, and it was my very own male cousin.

On the second morning, after my 20th birthday, a miracle happened. From that point on, I decided not to believe in love anymore. I want to have a relationship with no strings attached and without any superficial feelings such as love.

"Duke Agentine, will you marry me?"

This proposal was nothing more than a marriage to keep up appearances and without love involved.

---

title: Karina's Last Days
alt_title: 시한부 엑스트라의 시간, Sihanbu Ekseuteuraui Sigan, Sihanbu Extra'eui Sigan, Limited Time of the Terminally-Ill Extra, Limited Time Extra, Ограниченные по времени дополнения, Ограниченное время незначительной героини, 余命わずかの脇役令嬢, 路人甲的生命倒计时, 配角时间有限, 配角的倒數人生, The Time of the Terminally-Ill Extra, El Tiempo Adicional De La Enferma Terminal
description:
As the middle child who is neither the heir nor the cherished younger twins, Karina has lived her whole life hidden away from others. She, who only had one hobby of painting, found out that she only had one year left to live. So without a plan, she went to visit her fiancé who she barely knew… To annul the engagement as he always wanted.

"I won’t beat around the bush. I want to spend a year here."

"...Milady, have you gone crazy?"

"In return, I'll agree to annul the engagement."

But, she didn't know then. That she would receive the unconditional love that she had never received her whole life from him, and that she would come to have a desire to live her once meaningless life.

---
Though gifted with an ability to bring her drawings to life, Karina Leopold spent her years in the shadow of her famous siblings, forced to be the good daughter her parents wanted. But when she's told that a deadly disease will kill her in a year, she offers a deal to her fiancé, Milian Pastellio, with the goal to live the remainder of her days far from her family's reach. Much to her surprise, their encounter proceeds to change them both in a way she never imagined...

---

title: Henai Café
alt_title: 偏愛カフェ, Freaks' Café
description: Somewhere there is a strange café called "Statice" where all sorts of even stranger people meet, each with a very special and different fetish. The owner, Mr. Sennichi, welcomes these special customers every day, and tries to help them solve their fetish related problems.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life
author: Arisaki Meika

title: Perfect Show Window
alt_title: 완벽한 쇼윈도
description:
Are we allowed to be so excited?
A 9pm curfew, no short skirts, no independence unless married.
K-Hee-won grew up in a Confucian family and dreamed of freedom.
K - Jihwan, the son of a serf, fights to keep the family name alive.
Will their daring plan for freedom succeed?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: RoseBean

title: S Rank Boukensha de aru Ore no Musume-tachi wa Juudo no Father Con deshita
alt_title: My Daughters, S-Rank Adventurers, Have a Severe Obsession With Their Father, Sランク冒険者である俺の娘たちは重度のファザコンでした, Мои дочери, которые являются искателями приключений S-ранга, очень сильно увлеклись, 身为S级冒险者的我，女儿却是重度父控
description: The youngest A-rank adventurer, child prodigy Kaiser, finds three babies who were the only survivor of a destroyed village. Then he decided to give up his job as an adventurer and raise them. Over time, the girls grow brightly and show exceptional talents in fencing, magic and management. However, these girls also seem to love their father, Kaiser!
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Tomobashi Kametsu

title: The Way of a Flowery Sword
description: Viola Winchester, a lady who chose to become captain of the royal knights of the Anslan kingdom. However, she was accused of running away during the war against the dragon, which cost her noble title and also her position as captain of the royal knights. Feeling unfair, Viola looked for a way to restore her position. Until one day a respected Marquess in the kingdom named Johan Quentin came to help and asked for cooperation by... getting married?!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Dinggopud

title: Yuusha Densetsu no Uragawa de Ore wa Eiyuu Densetsu o Tsukurimasu: Oudou Goroshi no Eiyuutan~
alt_title: I Shall Create the Hero's Legend Behind the Hero's Legend: The Heroics of A Royal-Road Killer〜, 勇者伝説の裏側で俺は英雄伝説を作ります 〜王道殺しの英雄譚
description:
Yukina was a young man who hailed from the same village as the Yuusha who shouldered the fate of the world. Through a certain incident, he got ahold of the talking spear, Gram. It was a weapon that was on par with the legendary sword the Hero wielded. The first volume of an adventure fantasy of the youth with a realistic growth!

**Note:**
The artist Mao retired at chapter 20 and was replaced by Kuuma Arai at chapter 21.
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Nakanomura Ayasuke

title: A Ghostly Song
alt_title: 유령의 노래
description: Since childhood, Noah has been plagued by a debilitating condition – hallucinations. When a mysterious murder rocks the town, the voices whisper that Noah holds the key to the killer’s identity. As Noah grapples with the truth, a series of unsettling events begin to unfold around her.
genre: Long Strip, Crime, Gore, Drama, Horror, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Kim Mun-Gyeong (김문경)

title: Wolf-chan wa Sumashitai
alt_title: ウルフちゃんは澄ましたい, Wolf-chan Wants to Be Clear, Wolf-chan Is Trying to Feign Indifference
description:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Honn Noshiori

title: Demon Prince & The Salaryman
description: A salaryman summons Astaroth, a Prince of Hell, to help him stop getting bullied at work.
genre: Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Merryweather

title: New Employee Kim Chul-Soo
alt_title: Rookie Employee Kim Cheolsu, 신입사원 김철수
description:
On the day he was rejected by the company he had devoted his life to,
He went back to the moment of his first day at work. Kim Cheol-su, a low-spec rookie employee who joined Han-young, a leading domestic company. Can he finally achieve his long-desired position as the ‘CEO’ in this lifetime?
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Studio MW

title: How to Survive as a Dragon with Time-Limit
alt_title: 시한부 드래곤의 생존법, Survival Guide for a terminally-ill Dragon
description:
At the end of my terminally-ill life, I found myself reincarnated as a dragon in a webtoon. Once again, a life with a terminal illness, but this time, as a dragon?!

Lois, born with the heritage of the strongest creature in the world with wealth and thousands of years of lifespan as a dragon.

However, facing unpredictable crises at every turn, not knowing when I’ll die—what kind of Bullshit is this?!

It’s too unjust to just quietly die like this. Utilizing the future knowledge I have, I’ll survive like a villain and give this story a twist!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: 정훈일

title: 99 Boss
alt_title: 99대장, 99 Captain
description: ’99 Boss’ (meaning the best fighter among those born in 1999). The protagonist, Na Seon-wook, was born with the heart of a tiger. He was a troublemaker, but at the request of his parents, he hid his strength and transferred to Gukyang High School, a school located in a remote area that he thought would be quiet. However, it was a place where various old-fashioned cultures and dangerous people gathered. Seon-wook, who wanted to graduate quietly, eventually he couldn’t help but feel his hot blood and began educating them!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Full Color
author: Plan A (GongGam Media)

title: I Am the Descendant of the Divine Dragon!
alt_title: 我，神龙之后！, I, the Queen of Dragons!
description: In the highly competitive world of the Xuan Realm Continent, where warriors strive to refine their bodies, cultivate their martial abilities, harness the essence of the heavens and earth, and push beyond mortal limitations, our protagonist, Lu Hao, faces unjust persecution from his own clan since childhood. However, fate smiles upon him as he awakens the dormant bloodline of the Divine Dragon within him. With an unyielding resolve, Lu Hao embarks on an extraordinary journey, overcoming countless obstacles to ascend to the zenith of power. Along the way, he unravels the enigmatic secrets of his past life.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: iCiyuan

title: Urban God of Medicine
alt_title: The best medical god in the city, 都市极品医神, Divine Urban God
description: "Five years ago, the Ye family was destroyed, and the trash Ye Chen disappeared mysteriously." Five years later, that Ye Family trash is back! He came back with a cultivating body that penetrated the heavens and the earth and cried, "Ghosts and gods!" This time, Ye Chen wants to make the sky fall in awe! Let the Earth tremble! To be in control of everything, to the top of the sky！”
genre: Action, Long Strip, Medical, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yuewen Manhua (阅文漫画)

title: Kiraware Majo Reijou to Dansou Ouji no Kon'yaku
alt_title: 嫌われ魔女令嬢と男装皇子の婚約, The Engagement of the Disgraced Witch and the Cross-Dressing Princess, 万人厌的魔女大小姐与男装皇子的婚约, 萬人厭的魔女大小姐與男裝皇子的婚約, Помолвка презираемой ведьмы и переодетой принцессы, 미움받는 마녀 영애와 남장 황자의 약혼
description:
Vilified by others as a "witch", Evris, the youngest daughter of the House of Bradley, is engaged to Mark, the fifth prince of the Kingdom of Klengel. When he abruptly announces that their engagement is broken off, Evris is plunged into despair. However, someone reaches out to her instead... The cross-dressing crown prince (♀) of a neighboring country!?

This is the story of a red-haired witch who manipulates shadows and a cross-dressing crown prince (♀) who is serving as a body double for her missing older brother. 

The curtain rises on a fantasy romantic comedy of a girl being teased by a princess!

Serialization began in the July 2023 issue of *Yuri Hime*.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Villainess
author: Chiruha Chinmi

title: Subscribed To The Transcendental Channels
alt_title: 초월자의 채널을 구독했다
description:
Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 무심천드래곤

title: I'm a Part-Timer for the Gods
alt_title: 신들의 알바나라, The Part-Time Land of the Gods, Albanala of the Gods, Albanian of the Gods, I Became A Part Time Employee For Gods, Me convertí en empleado a tiempo parcial para los Dioses, The Part Time Nation of the Gods
description:
Devoid of professional skills, unemployed Yu Damduk was forced to take a part-time job. Frustrated with his pathetic life, he vents to the gods, gets stricken by lightning and passes out.
[Hiring] God is waiting for you.
When he wakes up, he finds a status window floating before his eyes.
Since I have nothing to lose anyway, let’s go with the flow…
Jumping into God’s Part-time world to have a better life, the adventure of Yu Damduk, who became the lowest-class God in the part-time world, begins!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Jeon Tae Hwan

title: Return of the War God
alt_title: 무신귀환록, Musingwihwallok, Chronicles of the Martial God's Return, Record of Return, Возвращение Бессмертного, 武神帰還録, 武神回归录, Chronicles of a Returner, Crónicas del Regreso del Dios marcial
description:
The worst talent that no one can compete with. Unstoppable Demon God, Dan Uhyeon.

A thousand years after being sealed for the misdeed. A thousand years was enough to get rid of Dan Uhyeon's sense of superiority. A world that has changed, solitude with no one knows, and the only thing left is despondency and emptiness.

"Time goes like the wind. There's really nothing left."

A little girl who appeared in front of Dan Uhyeon lost her purpose and will to live aimlessly, Hwa Somi. For a girl who seems to have nowhere to lean on, Dan Uhyeon feels the same and gradually begins to open the door of his mind.

"I'm Dan Uhyeon. Come with me."

The story of a warrior with an icy heart and acute and pure girl The story of an unusual family's life in the midfield will warm your heart.

---
The Ultimate Martial Divine Demon, Dan Woohyun, was sealed up because he was too strong for the world to handle.  After a millennium passed by, he was released from his seal and felt like everything was meaningless as he wandered the back alleys… 

Just as he fell down because he was sick of the world, a small hand appeared in front of him.

"What's this?" asked Dan Woohyun. 

"A dumpling!" came a reply. 

This was the first time in his life that someone had been nice to him without any impure intentions, and that changed his fate. This is the chronicle of a martial god who traversed through a thousand years of time and space!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%EB%A1%9D/2891), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59492385)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16060)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112858)
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Myosu (묘수)

title: Supreme Zerg Lord
alt_title: Overlord of Insects, The King of the Insects, 全民：我虫族主宰
description: Having been transported into a world where everyone is a Job-Changer, Jiang Chen awakened the Insect Domination System! The little insects can evolve, attack, and extract talents! Most importantly, they can breed invincible natural disasters!
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Survival, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Aliens, Supernatural, Full Color
author: 飞卢小说网

title: Auto Hunting With My Clones
alt_title: 분신으로 자동사냥, Bunsin-eulo Jadongsanyang, Авто-охота с клонами, Auto-Hunting With Clones
description:
Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Full Color
author: chassi

title: Piccolina
alt_title: ピッコリーナ
description:
Akira, a young yakitori shop owner, has fallen in love with Houka, a bunny girl who often eats at his restaurant. But how can he get close to her when he has to focus on the grill‽ And there are 4 other bunny girls that look just like her‽
___
Serialization of the popular [*Aokishi Bunny*](https://mangadex.org/title/5fc86cdc-ade2-472b-b077-c9f92beb213d/aokishi-bunny) chapter. 
___
Note: “Piccolina” is short for “Picco di Stellina”, which means “Starlet Peak” or “Peak of the Starlet” in Italian.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Ootsuki Ichika

title: The Suspicious Boy Is One of the World's Top Ten Masters
alt_title: 수상한 소공자는 천하십대고수, Susanghan Sogongjaneun Cheonhasibdaegosu
description:
In the aftermath of Madorim's decline following the World War, a captivating tale unfolds as the maternal grandson, son of Lord Daesannim's daughter, returns to the city. Despite initial feelings of abandonment, he emerges as a figure of unexpected beauty in a martial arts world marked by rugged aesthetics.

Unveiling his true identity as the King of the Mu-myeon Mountain, a teenage expert who conquered the Dragon King of the Yellow River, the series promises a gripping narrative. Driven by his mother's last words and a determination to restore Madorim to its former glory, Jin Murip, this unparalleled teenage expert, arrives in Madorim.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Unchan

title: A Barbarian Was Admitted to the Academy
alt_title: Варвар поступил в академию, アカデミーにオランケが入学した, 아카데미에 오랑캐가 입학했다, A Barbarian Entered the Academy
description:
I found myself possessed in a game I used to play occasionally.
And to top it off, I'm the female warrior of a barbarian tribe that only has bad endings.

...Alright, let's escape.
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Olimeok Gosipda

title: I Contracted Myself
alt_title: 我契约了我自己
description: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Zombies, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Meng Yue Culture (萌月文化)

title: Hiding Out in an Apocalypse
alt_title: 아포칼립스에 집을 숨김, Hidden House in the Apocalypse
description:
Three years ago, a doomsday prepper named Park Kyu, who predicted the world’s end and prepared for it in every way possible. As he expected, one day, a nuclear attack on Seoul led to a global nuclear war, resulting in an unprecedented apocalypse.

Despite everyone’s ridicule, the protagonist Park Kyu spent his entire fortune over the past three years to quietly dig out his own bunker. Was it merely a coincidence that he foresaw all these events?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Road Warrior

title: Heavenly Blood Star
alt_title: The Blood Star Damned by Heaven, 天死血星,천사혈성
description: Cheon Yoo-ok is a young orphan who survives by begging, however, as he delves deeper into the mysteries of a sect, dark secrets and unknown threats begin to emerge, in a world where intrigues and conspiracies are everywhere, he will have You have to overcome unimaginable challenges to protect those you love and discover your true destiny.
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: M&K Studio

title: Arctic Cold War
alt_title: Extreme Cold War, 极寒战纪, Frozen Frontiers, Chronicles of the Polar War
description: The Ice Age apocalypse is coming. After being betrayed and killed by my secret crush, I was reborn and gained a magical ability - the snacks I ate suddenly turned into plants? What's surprising is that this ability can be used in this way... Crisis is everywhere, I want to live for myself in this life!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Manchuangtang

title: Keikenzumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Otsukiai suru Hanashi
alt_title: You Were Experienced, I Was Not: Our Dating Story, 経験済みなキミと、 経験ゼロなオレが、 お付き合いする話, キミゼロ, Искушённая ты и незрелый я,, История знакомства опытной тебя и неопытного меня, Our Dating Story: The Experienced You and the Inexperienced Me
description:
Ryuuto Kashima is a gloomy high school student. Because of a punishment game, he was forced to confess to Runa Shirakawa, a girl from the top of school caste and admired by everyone. 

They ended up going out for the unexpected reason of "Err, I'm free now so..." but, Ryuuto ends up following and eavesdropping Runa getting confessed by a handsome soccer club member, and Runa bringing Ryuuto, whom she just started dating, to her own room as a matter of course. 

They have different friends and ways to have fun, different in just about everything. And yet, surprised by their differences everyday, accepting it, they begin to relate with each other.

A love story that will make you feel wonderful when you read it, starts now!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru
author: Nagaoka Makiko

title: Debuff Master
alt_title: 디버프 마스터
description:
Han Tae-Sung thought he was talented in video games and dreamt of turning his life around through BNW. But he would soon realize that life was not as easy as he thought it was.

He’s betrayed by his comrades, hunted down by his enemies, and even chased by debts in real life. He lost everything in the blink of an eye and was thrown down a pit of despair.

What stood in his way? Talent, wealth, connections, and luck.

There was simply no way he could win against those born differently no matter how much he struggled.

However, armed with a second chance and a hidden class, Tae-Sung starts from scratch and embarks on a journey to redeem himself and exact revenge against his enemies.
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dam Hwa Gong

title: Apocalyptic Super Farm
alt_title: 末世超级农场
description: The apocalypse has dawned upon the world, and food and survival are once again the most important topics of people's concern. Rice and flour have become luxuries, and vegetables are even more expensive! But just then, someone posted a video on a website that shocked the world. Sweet vegetables rolled into a hot pot, emitting a tantalizing green color! A golden leg of lamb is seared in oil! Fish soup simmers as white as milk! The little girl beside me begged: Bro,  I really can't eat anymore!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Post-Apocalyptic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: 诶嘿工作室

title: DevilBoy Daemon
alt_title: デビルボーイデーモン, 惡魔男孩守護程式, 恶魔男孩守护进程, 데빌보이 데몬
description:
(Note: comic is made in the right to left reading direction)
15 years ago, Sarah Marine sacrificed her life to give birth to twin sons, by the seed of the Demon King Satan. The two boys, named Daemon and Samael, were recruited as exorcists after their births and were raised in an orphan home. One day, a demon attack caused many at the orphan home to lose their lives, including Daemon's brother, Samael. After the tragedy, Daemon sworn vengeance on Satan and the Legions of Hell.  

7 years later,15 year old Daemon is on the path to becoming an Exorcist, while training under Robert Griffon, an elite level exorcist. The sights are set for God City, marking the location of E.G.O.(Evangelion Genesis Order), a religious organization specializing in demon hunting. Being recruited to E.G.O., Daemon will seek to achieve his vengeance. Despite showing off impressive talents, there are still some things to learn. Will the star rise to the occasion or will the stage be crumbled by the dark desire?
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: RedDevil-Sensei

title: The Second Life of the Archmage Dominates with Close-Range Magic
alt_title: 2周目の大魔導士は近接魔法で無双する, Regression of the Close Combat Mage
description:
"My biggest regret is not choosing that magic… this time I’ll definitely defeat you!!”

The human race is on the verge of destruction at the hands of Vidrak, the evil god who suddenly descended. Setsuna Cromwell, the strongest long-range mage, is defeated by the evil god, who can dispel all magical attacks.

However, when he wakes up he finds himself 10 years in the past, he’s regressed to the "Rite of Mastery" at the Academy of Magic!

While the students choose the magic system best suited to them, such as <Ranged Magic>, <Recovery Magic>, and <Formation Magic>, Setsuna chooses <Close Combat Magic>, which was considered the least popular magic of the time, and chosen by those of lower ranks who lacked magical power.

“This is the only magic that can stand up to the evil god!”

Setsuna chooses this style of melee magic, which is  considered lacking in every way, but utilizes his specialty “precise control of magic power," to dramatically improve his skills and overturn the world's common sense!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Full Color
author: Mayumi Sou

title: The Overpowered Newbie
alt_title: 뉴비가 너무 강함, Слишком сильный нуб, The Newbie is Too Strong, Soy un Novato Demasiado fuerte
description: JaeJu (which means “skill” in Korean) grew up without parents in an orphanage skillfully, just like his name suggests. One day, he heard that the orphanage was having a hard time and would have to close in 3 years. While trying to raise money for the orphanage, JaeJu got an alert on his phone. On it, he saw a video of himself climbing the tower as a BJ (broadcasting jockey aka streamer). Seven years ago, a tower suddenly appeared and randomly took people into it. If you successfully complete the tower and become an “Awakened”, it’s only a matter of time before you get rich!
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Lottery Jackpot (일등복권)

title: The Hero Became the Duke's Eldest Son
alt_title: 영웅, 공작가 장남 되다
description:
Aden Albireo, the "Dragon Slayer King", was a hero who saved the world by eliminating the Berserker and the Underlord. However, he was betrayed by those who whispered friendship to him, and met his death...

"I didn't know I would be resurrected like this?!"

15 years before the Underlord's resurrection, 'Aden Albireo' reincarnated into the body of the eldest son of a unheard-of duke's family, 'Aden Remes'! And...

"It's been a while, Dragon Slayer King!"

"The Underlord I thought I had defeated is inside my soul?!"

Will Aden be able to end his uncomfortable cohabitation(?) with the Underlord and prevent his resurrection?
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Mukun (무꾼)

title: My Ruined Academy
alt_title: 아카데미가 망했다
description:
Amon Drake arrives in the capital with dreams of success. On his first day as a teacher at the prestigious Amonis Academy, he is met with shocking news:

"Haven't you heard? This academy is on the brink of bankruptcy."

On top of that, the only people left at the academy are a gambling-addicted principal and drunken teachers. Amon thought,

"If the academy goes bankrupt, doesn't that mean my contract would become void too?"

They say escape favors the intelligent. If you don’t want to waste your life away, bring the academy to ruin.

The story of a wise man's escape from the academy begins now!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Seoul Media Comics

title: R15+ Ja Dame Desuka?
alt_title: R15＋じゃダメですか？, How About R15?
description: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she’s a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it’s not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie…?
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kishitani Todoroki

title: Gundam Reconguista in G
alt_title: Gundam: Reconguista in G, ガンダム Gのレコンギスタ
description: Set in the Regild Century, the era set after the Universal Century, follow the adventures of a pilot trainee named Bellri Zenam in the Capital Guard, an organization protecting a space elevator.
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music
author: Tomino Yoshiyuki

title: Not My Blood
alt_title: 제 피는 안 됩니다, You Can't Use My Blood
description: A sweet contract romance between a vampire and a human! Siyun accidentally meets Jinwoo, a famous vampire director of a well-known foundation, at a café. He offers him a matching partner proposal where he would provide him with his blood. "I’m already anemic and short on blood—why me of all people?!" As their affection deepens, what will become of them?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Presso

title: Jakdu
alt_title: 작두
description: Kwon Yong-jin, a protagonist who doesn’t believe in superstitions, experiences unbelievable events right after his 16th birthday.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

title: Tatoe Hai ni Nattemo
alt_title: Tatoe Hai ni Natte mo, Though You May Burn To Ash, たとえ灰になっても, 即使化作灰烬
description:
[**Series is cancelled due to author's death**](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-02-27/though-you-may-burn-to-ash-manga-kakashi-oniyazu-passes-away/.143962)  
  
For his beloved younger sister's treatment, Shinomiya Ryouma is working frantically to raise a billion yen while going to high school. One day, a mysterious woman asks him, "Can you put your life on the line for what you desire?" and after receiving a ticket from her, an accident befalls him! When he wakes up, he finds he's turned into a girl and what's more, he's participating in a "game" where a win means he can reverse his fate but a loss means he'll die instantly!
genre: Genderswap, Psychological, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Oniyazu Kakashi

title: Marine Corps Yumi
alt_title: まりんこゆみ, 海兵隊由美, 마린코 유미
description:
Nagumo Yumi is an airhead high school girl, whose post-graduation plan is to go to the US and become president. 
To her high school friends' amazement, she actually manages to make it to the US during summer vacation. 
After befriending some elderly veterans, she becomes convinced that joining the Marine Corps is the best way 
to move her dream forward. The waitress Linda Crawford joins her to sign up at the recruitment center, 
and she also makes friends among the new recruits, Rita Fernandez and Donna King. 
Will they have what it takes to become a Marine?
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Military, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Nogami Takeshi

title: I Became a Childhood Friend of a Mid-Level Boss
alt_title: 중간 보스의 소꿉친구가 되었다, I Became the Childhood Friend of the Middle Boss
description:
Do Kyunwoo is the black sheep of his renowned swordsman family. He cannot even catch a rabbit on his own. On his first day of fifth grade, he meets a tranfer student and recalls his past life.

He had reincarnated into the world of a game he used to play called [Brave Hearts]. He was already frustrated that he had reincarnated as a loser, but on top of that, the transfer student is an intermediate/mid-tier boss who will destroy the world!

“Why are you being so nice to me?”

“Because I want to be friends with you.”

Do Kyunwoo’s plan is to become friends with the transfer student in order to prevent the end of the world!

In order to survive in this new world and to reach an ending he desires. He becomes best friends with the mid level boss.
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yeon

title: Komi-san wa Komyushou Desu.
alt_title: Komi Can't Communicate, Komi-san Can't Communicate., Komi-san Has a Communication Disorder., Miss Komi Is Bad at Communication., У Коми-сан проблемы с общением, 古見さんは、コミュ症です。, 코미 양은, 커뮤증이에요, Коми-сан ва, комюсё: дэсу, У Коми-сан проблемы с общением, 古見同學是溝通魯蛇。, 古見同學有交流障礙症, 古见同学有交流障碍症, 코미 양은 커뮤증입니다, 코미 양은, 커뮤증이에요
description:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Oda Tomohito

title: Bizarre Restaurant
alt_title: 괴식식당, Goesiksikdang
description:
Stinky tofu, durian, surstromming’s era is over. have you heard? cooking that’s so bad that you could die on the spot! but skill is increasing!?

Tera, whose cooking boasts the best(?) taste in all dimensions, through the bravest yoo seungwoo’s help, has come to peaceful(?) earth.

Endure it! if you eat it and don’t die, your level will go up! and then on behalf of me, protect the earth!

‘Extraordinary restaurant’ is open even when the world is going to end.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Mezzed K

title: Hectopascal
alt_title: 헥토파스칼, Hectopascals
description:
Park Han-jun, once called a legend, was frustrated because he had nothing to lose anymore is given a huge amount of money.

An eye for an eye. An eye for a tooth! I’ll make you pay for what I’ve gone through!

As his rage explodes, he’ll get his sweet revenge and make them pay as much as they deserve!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Delinquents, Full Color
author: Beopeoling

title: Noa-senpai wa Tomodachi.
alt_title: のあ先輩はともだち。, Noa Is My Senior, and My Friend., Моя подруга Ноа-сэмпай, 望爱前辈是朋友, Noa-sempai Is My Friend.
description:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Akiyama Enma

title: Mato Seihei no Slave
alt_title: Chained Soldier, Slave of the Hell Soldiers, Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops, Раб спецотряда демонического города, 魔都精兵のスレイブ, 魔都精兵的奴隶
description:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Takahiro

title: I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!
alt_title: 통각 설정 꺼놨다니까요?, I Said I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!, I'm Telling You, I Already Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!, You Turned off the Pain Setting?, I Turned off the Pain Setting?, 100回目プレイヤーなので高好感度はエンリョします！, 已关闭痛觉设置, ¿Se me ha olvidado desactivar la configuración del dolor?
description:
**Pain perception 0, capture rate is 100!**

A virtual reality game with pain perception set to '0'. I was the first to clear all endings, and started the final 100th playthrough... but something is off. Suddenly, I have a strange disease with a terminal setting, and the capture target characters are starting to worry about me.

"I don't feel any pain, so should I pretend to be sick?"

Before I knew it, to the capture target characters, I became a noble hero enduring pain and sacrificing for world peace. Since it has come to this, the concept for this playthrough is a terminally-ill hero throwing herself for the world! I must end it with a happy ending. This is my last playthrough in my life!
genre: Sci-Fi, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yoo Eunwoo (유은우)

title: Eleceed
alt_title: 일렉시드, Элисед, エレキシード, 觉醒吧，铲屎官！, Electricidad veloz
description:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---

title: Designated Bully
alt_title: 일진담당일진, Iljin in Charge Iljin, The Bully In-Charge, Matón a cargo
description: After dropping out of school, Kwon Daegun is preparing for his qualification exam. While working a part-time job in a convenience store he got into a fight with some thugs. Daegun, who easily overpowered them, is offered a project called “Iljin in Charge/The Bully In Charge” by the Educational Foundation, which has been closely watching him for a long time. He, who accepted the offer after much consideration, enters a high school that belongs to the foundation and defeats the core bullies of this school one by one according to the order of the foundation.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: GRIMZO

title: Alice-san Chi no Iroribata
alt_title: アリスさんちの囲炉裏端, У очага в доме Арису-сан, By The Hearth At Alice-san's Home, By the Furnace of Miss Alice’s House
description:
After ten years, Alice returns to her hometown from Tokyo to live alone in a traditional Japanese house with a sunken hearth. Harumi, her childhood friend, nervously meets her again after such a long time, but the warmth of the hearth with Alice is just as warm as it was in the past...

Next to the hearth in Miss Alice's house, let's have a leisurely meal together.
genre: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Kinami Bunta

title: Himitsu no AiPri Full Color Osarai 4-Koma
alt_title: The Secret of AiPri - Full Color Review 4-Koma, ひみつのアイプリ フルカラーおさらい4コマ
description: The anime, "Himitsu no AiPri," is now available as a cute full-color 4-Koma! The main characters are Himari Aozara and Mitsuki Hoshikawa, who enroll in the private Paradise Academy. Himari, who longs to be in AiPri, dreams of making 10,000 friends! She unexpectedly makes her AiPri debut?! She has a secret that she can't even tell her close friend, Mitsuki! However, it seems Mitsuki holds a secret of her own as well... (Translated from Ciao website)
genre: Magic, 4-Koma, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Music, Full Color
author: Takara Tomy ARTS

title: You, I'll Raise You Into a Superstar!
alt_title: I'll Make You a Superstar, 너, 내가 스타로 띄워줄게
description:
“Wanna work as an actor with me then?”

Byeol’s eyes were left wide open by Woohyeon, the new Executive of ‘Pine Entertainment’
Byeol, who was part of the ‘Lala Girls’ idol group that did not succeed and was on the brink of disbandment. But an offer of being an actor, not even a singer to her? Byeol opened her mouth cautiously. “Can I really succeed if I become an actor?” Byeol didn’t seem to know yet, but Woohyeon could see the ‘SuperStar Talent’ she had within her. Woohyeon said confidently, “Don’t worry, I’ll raise you into a superstar!”
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yeongwan

title: The Wicked Ladies in Waiting
alt_title: Bad Maids, 나쁜 시녀들, Malas criadas
description: Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Cotton

title: Sakura Taisen
alt_title: Sakura Wars, サクラ大戦, 樱花大战
description:
The year is 1921, and this is a Tokyo where monstrous steam-powered robots crash a flower-viewing party only to be cut down samurai-style by a young girl in a kimono and traditional hakama pants.  
  
It's eight years after the horrific Demon War, and Japan is a peaceful prosperous place. Meet Ensign Ogami Ichiro, who has just graduated from the Naval Academy. He's assigned to a base in Tokyo, but soon discovers that his headquarters is the Imperial Theater and his first mission is collecting tickets at the gate. He gamely goes about his menial jobs at the theater, surrounded by beautiful girls who seem to know a lot more about what's going on than he does, but he's about to be swept into a roiling world of robots, demons, and hot girls in uniform.
genre: Action, Romance, Harem, Supernatural
author: Hiroi Ouji

title: Pumpkin Scissors - Power Snips
alt_title: Pumpkin Scissors: Power Snips (Supplemental Episodes), パンプキン・シザーズ：パワー・スニップス, パンプキンシザーズ外伝
description:
Power Snips is a collection of side stories that further explores the setting of the manga series, Pumpkin Scissors.  Along with familiar faces from Army Intelligence State Section III, new characters also appear to help tell stories of "what happened before", "what happened during", and "what happened afterwards". 

A young woman worried about her own towering stature meets a certain corporal who's even taller. 
 
Sent to infiltrate the Republic of Frost, Cold Vitter stumbles upon a "cat" and a child "gray" as ash. 
 
Lieutenant Alice and Corporal Oland form a contract. 
 
These stories and more touch on events behind the scenes and between the cracks, expanding the world of Pumpkin Scissors!
genre: Action, Comedy, Drama
author: Iwanaga Ryoutarou

title: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi
alt_title: 嫁ぎ遅れた狐が嫁に来る話, The Story of the Fox Who Was Late Getting Married and Came to be My Bride
description: One day, overworked salaryman Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Zanma Yuu

title: Y13
description: Former NBA star Yoon Young-jae, who was out of the season due to an unexpected accident. An unexpected opportunity brings him back to the past.......I dream of taking a powerful leap forward once again in the NBA, where there are top stars!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Sports, Web Comic, Full Color
author: New Comic

title: Ookii Onnanoko wa Suki Desu ka?
alt_title: Do You Like Big Girls?, 大きい女の子は好きですか？, 高大的女孩子，喜欢吗？
description: Tachibana Souta is a bit of a multi-talented freeter who gets by from one part-time job to the next, his standout characteristic being that he's a bit short. One day he's roped by his older sister into 'serving' their college's volleyball team, of which she's a member. She also happens to be at least 6 and 1/2 ft. tall, as do the rest of the team's members who take quite the interest in Souta.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Sports, Crossdressing, Harem, School Life, Delinquents, Shota, Slice of Life
author: Aizome Gorou

title: Hajime no Ippo - The First Step
alt_title: Fighting Spirit, Первый шаг!, はじめの一歩, 第一神拳, 더 파이팅
description:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
genre: Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Morikawa George

title: Batsu-Hare
alt_title: バツハレ, 後宮開在離婚
description: The story begins with the protagonist, Wakou Ichiro, who decides to return home early from work to celebrate his second anniversary with his wife. But, when he opens the door of his house.... He finds his wife cheating on him! Although the marriage was short-lived, his life changes again when suddenly, a certain woman appears in front of him? Thus begins a new story, a new erotic comedy!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Inaba Minori

title: Shoukoku no Altair Gaiden - Toukoku no Subaru
alt_title: The Pleiades of the Island Nation, 将国のアルタイル嵬伝 嶌国のスバル
description: The curtain rises on an Oriental Reconquista spin-off of Kato Kotono's "Shoukoku no Altair", set far to the east of Rumeliana is the once peaceful and beautiful island nation of Kusanagi, which has been annexed by the larger country of Cinili and fallen into ruin.
genre: Historical, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Kato Kotono

title: Trace 2.0
alt_title: Трейс 2.0, 트레이스2
description:
The story is set in contemporary South Korea. Some 30 years ago, unidentified creatures appeared out of nowhere and have attacked people. They have caused massive destruction wherever they go. These monsters are called "Trouble", and due to them the world has fallen into chaos. Along with the first appearance of the "Troubles", some number of humans were born with or acquired supernatural abilities. These mutants called "Trace" are the only ones who can fight off the "Trouble". The "Trace" are also considered freaks and are generally shunned by the community, because some of them misused the powers for their own interest.  
  
The story starts soon after the end of season 1. Captain of National Investigation Service Han Si Hyun tries to start a research program of communicating with Troubles, but gets rejected again and again. While meeting with a friend, who is helping him in his search for Kim Yoon-Sung (Mr. Beggar), he gets the absurd idea of starting research on his own.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Nasty Cat

title: Kiss Shite Kurenakya Shinjau
alt_title: Kisu Shite Kurenakya Shinjau, Your Kiss is the Only Medicine, キスしてくれなきゃ死んじゃう, 키스해주지 않으면 죽어버려, Kiss Me or I'll Die
description: Yuuta Sato accidentally discovers that childhood friend Rinko Uenohara contracted a very rare illness called the "Kissing Disease". The disease forces the person to kiss someone of the opposite sex at regular intervals or die! Yuuta decides that he is going to keep her alive no matter what. Will he succeed? What will the others think when they find out about the two!?
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Nishikida Keishi

title: Salaryman Exorcist - Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

title: The Heavenly Demon Will Give You a Massage
alt_title: The Heavenly Demon Is Giving a Massage, 천마님 안마하신다
description: Heaven-bound Heavenly Demon, once known as Kang Taehan, Returns to his original life after 60 years! "Ah, in such a blessed era, to be in this shape!" "Your body is screaming to be saved, haven't you heard?" The project to physically and mentally rejuvenate everyone, The journey of the Heavenly Demon Kang Taehan begins!! Weary office workers tired from alcohol and overtime, Athletes whose bodies are ruined and performance declined, Heads of families crushed by the weight of life, Modern people who have accumulated fat to withstand life’s burdens. All you modern people who are weary of their life, come and get a massage!
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Lebistokki

title: Chess Pieces
alt_title: The world of objects, 기물들의 세계, Pieza de Ajedrez
description: Namchang Lee Je-oh, who sells his body in a house chang village in the falling downtown. One day when he dreams of revenge on the employees of the business who are not hesitant to beating and rape, a serial killer appears with the death of a small employee. Jeo finally faces the "god" he has been waiting for… Will he be saved from this terrible hell?
genre: Thriller, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Crime, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

title: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Master of Garden ~Shichikage Retsuden~
alt_title: 陰の実力者になりたくて！マスターオブガーデン～七陰列伝～, The Eminence in Shadow: Master of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~, I Want To Become The Eminence In Shadow! Master Of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~, Восхождение в Тени! ~Хроники Семи Теней~
description:
Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the “eminence in shadow” setting in another world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called the Seven Shadows (they are very serious), such that the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe).

The curtain rises on an overwhelmingly chuunibyou and misunderstanding-filled serious comedy about the strongest Seven Shadows (and the protagonist)!?
genre: Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation

alt_title: 今日から始める幼なじみ, Starting Today We're Childhood Friends, Starting Today She's My Childhood Friend, 오늘부터 시작하는 소꿉친구, 從今天開始的青梅竹馬, 从今天开始的青梅竹马, 今日おさ
description:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Obiya Midori

title: Be Obsessed With Me
alt_title: 내게 집착하세요, Naege Jibchaghaseyo, Naege Jipchakhaseyo, Please Be Obsessed With Me, Cling to Me, Please Obsess Over Me, Obsess Over Me, 执迷于我, 執迷於我, Obsesiónate por mi, OBSESIÓNATE CONMIGO
description: Arabella is a forgotten outcast princess who vomits blood whenever she moves. After being killed during the rebellion against the oppression of the imperial family which inherited the dragon's blood, she returns to the time before her 20th birthday. Realizing that she must survive until her 25th birthday in order to stop the regression cycle, Arabella decides to look for a way to cure her illness, even if it means seeking answers from the rebel forces themselves.

description: A sweet, open-minded mother starts suspecting one of her sons might be gay.
