title: Fate/Grand Order -Turas Réalta-
alt_title: Fate/Grand Order turas realta, フェイト／グランド オーダー－トゥルス・レアルタ－, Судьба/Великий приказ: Звёздное путешествие, Fate/Grand Order -真實之旅-
description:
"The human race will become extinct in 2017." The Chaldea organization, an organization charged with preserving the future of humanity, observes a singularity. To solve it, Rika Fujimaru and Mash Kyrielight will be transported to the city of Fuyuki in 2004. The battle for the future of humanity has begun.

---
**Note**: This manga adapts the first, third, fifth, seventh and final singularity from Part 1 of Fate/Grand Order.
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Zombies, Martial Arts, Samurai, Magical Girls, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: TYPE-MOON

title: Our Sunny Days
alt_title: 해뜨는 집, Nuestros días soleados
description: Sung Ho’s not the kind you’d typically expect to settle down in the countryside. He’s in his late 20s, ex-military, and…a single father with a year-old baby his ex-girlfriend pawned off on him. Jobless and without any prospects but a house, Sung Ho hopes the peaceful Nuldongmae village will make a good new home for him and his daughter. Rumor has it that the head of the village, despite his young age, is a real jerk… But he won’t have to deal with that, will he? But on the very day he moves in, Sung Ho clashes with a tall, good-looking guy who’s got quite the temper and accuses Sung Ho of stealing from his store. This new guy really gets on his nerves, but he does seem to know a lot about the village… Sung Ho’s always been a bit of a lone ranger wherever he goes, so will he be able to let someone else in his life for sunny days up ahead?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Jeong Seokchan

title: I Am Not a Regressor
alt_title: 나는 회귀자가 아닙니다, Naneun Hoegwijaga Anipnida, No soy un regresor, I'm Not a Regressor
description: The Mara destroyed everything in its path, including the Awakened. It selected humans with the stigmata of each sign in the night sky, except for one—Shin Hyuk Lee. This lone Awakened dealt the final blow against the Mara. Upon achieving such a feat, Vega, the goddess of Lyra, appeared to grant his wish. Shin Hyuk wished to go back with the Lyra stigmata to prevent this tragedy from happening again. Upon returning, Shin Hyuk’s body rejected the Lyra stigmata and died... with the Mara beside him.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Butterfly Valley (나비계곡)

title: Fate Rewinder
alt_title: 運命の巻戻士
description:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, School Life, Police, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Kimura Fuuta

title: I Don't Want to Be a Lady
alt_title: 레이디는 싫습니다, No quiero ser una dama, No Me Gusta La Dama
description:
Before being sold as the Crown Prince’s concubine, I proposed a contract marriage to the Duke.

“Will your father allow you to marry me?”
“Of course not. So there is only one way.”

“We have to make an accident.”

It will taste better when I break that mol*ster’s head.
I could shoot a gun at the alley gangster. Even the prince of the neighboring empire was also knocked out by me.

The man snorted.

“You’re so arrogant as the captive subject. I never knew that Count Bornes would be a jerk to his dog.”

I said with a smile, “Our mansion didn’t have a dog. Because the owner of the mansion is already a dog.”

This is the story of Arianne Bornes, who seemed to be a villainess but not a villainess.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Jeommyeon (점면)

title: The Heavenly Demon Lord Who Doesn't Want to Level Up
alt_title: 레벨업하기 싫은 천마님
description:
"Jin Yuseong, the absolute master of the Middle Kingdom, found life too boring. 'I must be crazy. Just unifying the martial world…'"
"'I should have just been a farmer.'"
"'No, I wish I wasn't born at all.'"
"In 'The Heavenly Demon Lord Who Doesn't Want to Level Up,' one day, he encounters a gate… And upon passing through it, a new world unfolds."
"Jin Yuseong, the top martial deity and leader of the Celestial Demon Cult, arrives in Korea.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Shaynak

title: Cheolsu Saves the World
alt_title: 철수를 구하시오, Regression of Cheolsu, Looking for the Evacuation
description:
A massive asteroid is about to hit earth!

Humanity has failed to stop a giant asteroid from plummeting into Earth, and life as we know it has ended. An ordinary Korean office worker named Cheolsu is somehow given the chance to go back in time and prevent this catastrophe from ever happening. Does he have a chance?
genre: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Fake Scientist

title: Don't Trust the Female Lead
alt_title: 여주를 믿지 마세요!, DTTH!, Don't Trust the Heroine!, No confíes en la heroína
description:
She was reincarnated into a novel as the villainess’ supporter and died a tragic death after harassing the heroine. To avoid her death, she gave everything to Suzanne, the heroine and helped her get her happy ending. But…  
  
“Think back on your sins. You are convicted of attempted murder, high treason…”  
  
She was betrayed in the end…  
  
“Goodbye, foolish countess. Ah, I forgot that you’re not a countess anymore,” Suzanne chuckled.  
  
The heroine’s vicious nature, which she learned on the brink of her death. At that last moment, she thought.  
  
‘If I was given another chance, I…’  
  
* * *  
  
“No way! …I returned?”  
  
She went back to the day before she met the heroine. The worst mistake she had made in her previous life.  
  
[History is written by the victors.]  
  
She will no longer be the heroine’s s*ave. She swears to come out victorious and have her own happy ending!
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Geolgeom (걸검)

title: Dou Ganbattemo H ni Nacchau Osananajimi
alt_title: どう頑張ってもHになっちゃう幼なじみ, A Childhood Friend Who's Always Horny No Matter What You Do
description:
Serialization of [A Childhood Friend Who's Always Horny No Matter What You Do](https://mangadex.org/title/9cadfb91-ff0c-41ef-9f73-26b5fe669acd)

A hot topic on social media! It's the best kind of laughter from the most vulgar 4-koma romcom♡ 

Airi-chan, a naturally airheaded heroine, loves her childhood friend Yuu-kun. However, both her feelings of love and lust are sky-high, and she's always getting into lewd accidents! Meanwhile, the shadow of NTR by a shallow playboy is creeping around Airi-chan!?

Good boys and girls who read this when they're alone should have a tissue in one hand, okay♫

(Source: Young Magazine Web)
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

title: Harapeko Succubus wa Ikasetai noni!
alt_title: はらぺこサキュバスはいかせたいのに！, The Hungry Succubus Wants to Make Him Cum, But...!, The Hungry Succubus Wants to Consume Him, La succubus hambrienta quiere hacerlo eyacular, ¡Pero...!
description:
Kururi-chan The Succubus is an unprecedented super elite!! She's been in a rut lately because her luscious body is too powerful and she can easily be promiscuous. Kururi then discovers Jien, a young virgin monk in training. 

Lucky☆Happy☆Strongest Kururi-chan is going to charge in with great pleasure!! The greedy and confident Succubus and the serious monk clash in this happy love comedy!♡
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Tabireco

title: Akuyaku Ouji no Eiyuutan
alt_title: 悪役王子の英雄譚, Heroic Tale of Villainous Prince
description: Alfred, the third prince of the royal family who was born with black hair and black eyes, was hated. One day, he comes across his older brother, the first prince, Leolu, announcing to his fiancée, Charlotte, that she has broken off their engagement. In order to save Charlotte, who was falsely accused, Alfred took her place and thought the situation was settled...!?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hidari Ryuu

title: J<->M
alt_title: J and M, J⇔M　ジェイエム
description:
J is a lone assassin feared as "untouchable" in the underworld.
Megumi is a lonely girl who has no place at home or school.
When the two meet, an unexpected story begins.
genre: Genderswap, Action, Comedy, School Life
author: Ohtake Masao

title: Maou ni Natta node, Dungeon Tsukutte Jingai Musume to Honobono suru
alt_title: Я стал Повелителем Демонов и создал подземелье, чтобы проводить время с девушками-монстрами, 魔王になったので、ダンジョン造って人外娘とほのぼのする, 魔王建造地下城转生到异世界建造人外娘, 마왕이 됐으므로 던전을 만들고 인외아가씨와 훈훈해진다, 魔王建造地下城轉生到異世界建造人外娘, Now I'm a Demon Lord! Happily Ever After with Monster Girls in My Dungeon, I Became the Demon Lord so I Created a Dungeon and Spend Heartwarming Time There with Non-Human Girls
description:
Before I realized, I had become the guardian of a dungeon, a Demon Lord. I was suddenly in a dangerous world with giant monsters loitering around, fighting for their existence. So I thought to go about developing the dungeon in order to not die, but for some reason I was having quite the good time…. How did it turn out like this?  
  
The protagonist, Yuki, having to live in that world now, uses his bold and sharp senses and spends time with a supreme dragon girl and a vampire girl, sometimes laughing, sometimes being angry, passing days doing what he likes.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Ryuyu

title: Isekai Metaller
alt_title: 異世界メタラー, Another World Metaller, Otherworld Metaller, Metalero de Otro Mundo, Isekai Metalhead
description:
Alex, a devoted metalhead, finds himself in deep sorrow at his band’s breakup concert. Amidst the sadness, he experiences an electrical accident due to equipment trouble...

When he wakes up, he discovers he has been transported to another world! In this new world, Alex encounters situations that are a metalhead’s dream, featuring werewolves and dragons, which excite him immensely. 

Determined to lead this otherworld to peace with his metal spirit, Alex sets out on an adventurous journey!
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Music
author: Kasuga Ryo

title: Your Regrets Mean Nothing to Me
alt_title: 당신의 후회는 받지 않겠습니다, I Won't Accept Your Regrets, Dangsinui Huhoeneun Batji Anketseumnida, 後悔也為時已晚, No aceptaré tus arrepentimientos
description:
"I may not be able to promise you love, but I promise to not have any women other than you."
I thought everything would be okay. 
even if he doesn't love me back, i thought my love would be enough to make this marriage work. 
But before long that foolish wish got broken. 
Regina, Raymond's first love, was back bringing along her child.
"I'm Going to crown Regina's son as the first prince." he told me.
"let's divorce."
I decided it was time to go, to abandon him.
"... What?!"
At that moment, Raymond's eyes shook as if he couldn't understand what I was saying.
For some reason, seeing how agitated he was made me feel so relieved.
With a soft smile, I opened my mouth once again:
" I want to leave you now. So, Raymond, let's stop this and get divorced"
That will be the end of my long unrequited love.
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: 투캣

title: Geboku-san to Aruji-chan no Nichijou ~Aruji no Tame nara Nandemo shimasu~
alt_title: 下僕さんと主ちゃんの日常, 大大仆人与小小主人的日常, 大僕人與小主人的日常, 下僕さんと主ちゃんの日常～主のためなら何でもします～, The Daily Life of Servant-san and Master-chan ~I'll Do Anything For My Master~
description:
A sweet master-servant yuri comedy about an innocent master and a mad dog high school girl!
Satsuki, a small and innocent high school girl, and her servant named "Sato-san'' who is the strongest delinquent in the school...
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Imai Haruka

title: Gyaru Sen
alt_title: ギャルせん, Gal-Sen, 辣妹教師
description: When Sora enters high school, his homeroom teacher is a sexy gal with huge breasts and she’s none other than the changed version of Suzune, the innocent girl next door who was his first love! As the teacher’s “educational guidance” escalates day by day, Sora is awakened to pleasures he’s never known before…!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Gyaru
author: Ueno Meguru

title: The Game That I Came From
alt_title: I Back From a Game, I Came From the Game, ふりだしから始まる覚醒者, 我来自游戏, 어웨이크닝: 회귀 플레이어, Ultimate Rogue's Awakening
description:
With the rise of a popular RPG called Tianyong Game, its max-level players called "awakeners" have come to dominate the real world in terms of wealth and power. 

Despite Ling Ce's natural talent for the game, it's nearly impossible for him to catch up to these players because he started playing the game a year after its release. But as luck would have it, a glitch in the game's teleportation system takes him back three years into the past with his memories intact.

Now, Ling Ce is determined to utilize his knowledge and experiences to become an awakener and turn his life around. No amount of carnivorous plant monsters or insanity level dungeons will stop the determined hero from reaching the peak!


---

title: Goblin Slayer
alt_title: Убийца Гоблинов, ゴブリンスレイヤー, 고블린 슬레이어, 哥布林殺手
description:
A young priestess has formed her first adventuring party, but almost immediately they find themselves in distress. Luckily for her, the Goblin Slayer chose that place as his next killing grounds–a man who's dedicated his life to the extermination of all goblins, by any means necessary. And when rumors of his feats begin to circulate, there's no telling who might come calling next.  

**NOTE:**   
- There are *currently* no English scanlations of this manga. The chapters on the net are the official YenPress chapters.  
As long as they **(YenPress' chapters)** are in publication they are not allowed on MangaDex.  
  
**Links:**

title: Skeleton Double
alt_title: スケルトンダブル, Двойной Костяк
description: A man dies a mysterious death just outside Shinjuku Station. Eight years later, his son, Yodomi Arakawa, is leading a tranquil life until he meets… an invisible man?! And to learn the truth behind his father's death, Yodomi will have to become invisible himself…
genre: Action, Drama, Supernatural
author: Tokaku Kondo

alt_title: The Eminence in Shadow, Восхождение в тени, 陰の実力者になりたくて！, 숨은 실력자가 되고싶어서, I Want To Be The Eminence In Shadow!, To Be a Power in the Shadows!
description:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Aizawa Daisuke

description:
As an UNLUCKY girl prepares to face her death, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Vicious, violent and buck naked! An unprecedented picaresque hero appears in Shonen Jump!  
  
- Winner of the 2020 Tsugimanga award.

author: Tozuka Yoshifumi

title: You and I are Polar Opposites
alt_title: 正反対な君と僕, You're the Opposite of Me, You and Me, On the Contrary, Ты и я — полные противоположности, The Polar Opposite You & Me, You and I Are Polar Opposites
description:
Suzuki, a girl who goes along with the flow, is attracted to Tani, a quiet guy who can speak his mind.
Find out how they are dating each other!

author: Agasawa Koucha

title: Everyday is Sunday
alt_title: 毎日が日曜日
description: It all begins when a girl, Yumi, narrowly avoids a car accident thanks to the intervention of a magician named Tohru, who had a very promising career ahead of him. As a result of this event, Tohru suffers from a severe hand injury, cutting short his dreams of making it big in Hollywood. After 8 years they run into one another again, but Tohru's become a common criminal, and Yumi a rookie police officer.
genre: Comedy, Police
author: Takada Yuuzou

title: Odoriba ni Skirt ga naru
alt_title: 踊り場にスカートが鳴る, 與妳翩翩共舞, The Skirt Sings at the Landing, The Skirt Rings at the Landing
description:
Haruma Kiki always dreamed of doing ballroom dance as the feminine "follower" role, but as she aged she only grew taller and taller, eventually causing her to give up ever looking good in a dress or anything ladylike. Now, as a second year in high school, she specializes in the masculine "leader" role—until one day, her partner suddenly leaves her. When Toribami Michiru, a short and pretty first year, shows up wanting to join the ballroom dance club, Kiki asks her to be her new partner, but Michiru reveals that she only plays the leader role—and she wants none other than Kiki as her partner.  
  
Bimonthly serialisation in Yuri Hime.
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Utatane Yuu

title: One Piece
alt_title: 원피스, 海贼王, 海盗路飞, 航海王, 海賊王, One Piece. Большой куш, Ван Пис, ワンピース
description:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Oda Eiichiro

title: Becoming the Sacheon Dang's Swordsmaster-Rank Young Lord
alt_title: Became a swordsman-level Sogami of the Sacheondang family, 사천당가의 검신급 소가주가 되었다, He Became the Head of the Four Heavenly Dang Family, Becoming the Swordmaster Rank Young Lord of the Sichuan Tang Family
description:
Sacheondanga was a famous family of poison and memorization, but has now fallen.
Yeon Myeong, who was born there, suddenly became crazy about the sword.
I awaken to my past life where I reached the state of swordsmanship.

'I want to live a normal life this time.'

If I wanted to live a normal life, I would have to hide my swordsmanship skills.
But there are too many things that get in the way.
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: PSG

title: The Constellations Are My Disciples
alt_title: 성좌들이 내 제자
description:
300 years ago, the invincible warrior Hyeon-oh Kim brought down the Tower of the End, preventing the world’s demise. Though he should have died the moment the Tower of the End collapsed, Hyeon-oh is reborn 300 years later in the body of a 17-year-old boy named Juhyeok Kim.

Meanwhile, he discovers the existence of the Constellations, who were once his disciples 300 years ago but were born during the time when he did not exist in this world. Will he be able to find them again and train them?
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Cha Jiwoon

title: My Hyung's Lover
alt_title: 형의 애인
description:
“Tell me, Seo Won hyung, what can I do to make you feel better?”
Recently, Jin Ha’s hyung, who had been out of contact for a while, has passed away. Jin Ha ran into his hyung’s roommate, Seo Won, at his funeral. Rather than the sadness of losing his hyung whom Jin Ha wasn’t on good terms with, his eyes was fixated on observing Seo Won who is on the verge of collapsing. While looking into Seo Won’s puffy red eyes, Jin Ha is filled with strange desires. Meanwhile, Seo Won approaches Jin Ha unaware of how he truly feels.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Lee Hana

title: Soshite Akuma wa Seigi wo Kataru
alt_title: そして悪魔は正義を騙る
description: At Chesthill, a boys' school where the students are judged only for how right their acts are without regards for their wealth or birth, the top student is granted the position of “Angel”, head of the “Angel Council” who guides his fellow students to be right. Taiga, a teacher arrived from a country in the far east firmly believes in that which is right and aims to guide his students towards being right, but one student, Lucas, the black sheep of the school nicknamed “the devil” has other plans than going along with the ideals of rightness that the school embodies. After the Angel is murdered and Taiga is framed for the murder, he has no choice but to accept Lucas' offer to save him and follow the mad, coquettish Devil in his quest to solve the mystery of the Angel's murder and become the new Angel.
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Mystery
author: Aobe Mahito

title: Miss Overprotected
alt_title: 과보호 아가씨, An Overprotected Lady, Overprotective Lady, 過保護なお嬢様, 溺爱少女, Mujer Sobreprotectora
description: Archduke Rahan El Kanox, who has been criticized for saying, 'It must be a demon sent by God to wreak havoc on this world. A young woman who grew up beloved in her family due to the wounds of her childhood, one day receives a proposal from the fearsome Archduke Kanox, whom she had only heard of through rumors. Despite his family's opposition, Isel decides to marry Archduke Kanox for the sake of the family. The person who appeared before her was a kind and wonderful gentleman who helped Isel in danger in the village. Then Isel could not understand the infamy of the many who followed Prince Canox. 'For a person who is so kind and kind... Why is everyone doing this?'
genre: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Yeon Baekrim(연백림)

title: Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu
alt_title: Moon-led Journey Across Another World, TSUKIMICHI - Moonlit Fantasy -, Лунный бог, приключение и другой мир, 月が導く異世界道中, 月光下的异世界之旅, 달이 이끄는 이세계 여행길, Dali Ikkeuneun Isegye Yeohaenggil
description: High school student Misumi Makoto is called into a fantasy world by the god Tsukuyomi, in order to be a hero. However, powerful others in this world aren't as thrilled to have him there, and they kick him to the edge of the world just as Tsukuyomi declares that he must leave Makoto to find his own way. Now it's up to Makoto to find his own way!
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Adaptation

title: Saint Seiya - Episode G Assassin
alt_title: 聖闘士星矢EPISODE.Gアサシン
description: Tasked with a secret mission by the Oracle of the goddess Athena, Shura travels through time and space to present-day Japan. There, he becomes involved in a bloody war against a group of assassins who are targeting a new reincarnation of Athena. Along the way, he meets fellow Gold Saints who have taken the same journey, but not all of them have come out on the other side as allies.
genre: Time Travel, Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Okada Megumu

title: Morgana and Oz
description: What happens when a struggling witch meets an angsty vampire? Either love or war. Morgana belongs to a long line of witches, and Oz to the rival vampire clan. After a chance encounter… and maybe a few stray spells… these two need to find a way to work together, or risk all-out war between coven and clan.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Miyuli

title: My In-laws Are Obsessed With Me
alt_title: 시월드가 내게 집착한다, The In-Laws Are Obsessed With Me, Mis Suegros están Obsesionados Conmigo
description:
My family and my husband killed me. Because of the inheritance. Returning to the past, I made up my mind.

“I have to protect my life and my inheritance.”

Grand Duke Lapireon of the cursed family. I offered him, who was not interested in property and women, a one year contract marriage. Now, all we have to do is get a divorce…

“Lady, do you think you can leave me now?”

My husband is weird.

“Would you like a land or a mine? Or an empire?”

“Sasha, did Theo do something wrong?”

“Mom, don’t leave me.”

“Sister… I can’t live without you.”

Even my in-laws began to obsess over me.

(Taken from NU)
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Han Yoon Seol (한윤설)

title: My Father, the Possessive Demi-God
alt_title: 어느 날 아빠가 나타났다, Eoneu Nal Appaga Natanatda, One Day, My Dad Showed Up, 突然現れたパパは溺愛夫でした, 有一天我的父亲出现了, 我的半神爸爸是癡情郎, Mi Padre, El Semidiós Posesivo
description:
Young Claire lives with her mother and her twin sister in a humble country home. Feeling mature for her age, Claire is tired of being different from everyone she's ever met. However, when her father suddenly appears, she realizes that she wasn't the only "strange" one in the family. As she slowly learns about her family's past, she understands more about herself and her destiny.

title: Saint Seiya - Episode G
alt_title: 聖闘士星矢EPISODE.G
description: Set seven years before the events of the original Saint Seiya manga, the story of Episode G revolves around Athena's Saints, a group of humans with superhuman powers who are devoted to the Goddess of War Athena. Their duty is to protect the world from evil. The protagonist is Leo Aiolia, who is mistrusted by his fellow Saints because of the seemingly traitorous actions of his brother Sagittarius Aiolos in the past. In turn, Aiolia holds a grudge against the Saints as a whole, and against the elite order of the Gold Saints in particular. While Aiolia is sent on mission after mission to prove his loyalty, a modern-day Titanomachy begins as the Titans, ancient gods with a desire for revenge on the Olympian gods, attack the earth.
genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Okada Megumu

title: Second Life Ranker
alt_title: 두 번 사는 랭커, SLR, The Ranker Who Lives Twice, Ранкер, который живёт второй раз, 二度生きるランカー, Ranker Who Lives A Second Time, 異界攻塔戰記
description:
Yeonwoo’s brother disappeared years ago, and he’s devastated to learn of his death.

As he copes with his loss, he’s given a pocket watch and learns there’s more to his brother’s death: he was betrayed while competing in the Tower of the Sun God.

Now it’s Yeonwoo’s turn to use the knowledge his brother left behind.

Can Yeonwoo navigate that world and gain enough power and experience to reach the top of the tower, defeating his brother’s enemies and all those who stand in his way?

---

title: Saihate no Paladin
alt_title: 最果てのパラディン, The Faraway Paladin, 世界尽头的圣骑士, Паладин издалека
description:
A man dies alone after living a stagnant and fruitless life — but that's not where his story ends, as a boy named William is born into a land of fantasy and magic.

Raised in a city of the dead by his new family — a mummy, a skeleton, and a ghost — he can remember glimpses of his past life, enough to know his time on Earth was wasted, and he vows not to let that happen again.

Schooled in magic and combat, Will sets out on a journey to see the world. Along the way, he'll meet beings of all shapes and sizes. Each of these people has a story to tell and a lesson to teach Will about how to live his life to the fullest.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yanagino Kanata

title: The Guild Member Next Door
alt_title: Neighbor Guild Member, 이웃집 길드원, Miembro del Gremio de Vecinos
description:
After suffering from a stalker, Yoon Ji-gu becomes extremely wary of people. Just in time, a man with a strange sexual orientation moved into the neighbor's house...?
"Looks like there's a pervert living next door..."
In reality, Lee Yeo-woon and Yoon Ji-gu are suspicious neighbors who are full of misunderstandings.
In the game, the couple neutaaaa (Lee Yeo-woon) and ji9byeol.
How will the relationship between the two change in and out of the game and reality?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Video Games, Fantasy, Full Color
author: 허니트랩

title: Welcome to Japan, Ms. Elf!
alt_title: 日本へようこそエルフさん。, Welcome to Japan, Elf-san., Welcome to Japan, Elf-san!, Добро пожаловать в Японию, Эльф-сан!, 歡迎來到日本，妖精小姐, 精灵来日
description:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.  
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!  

- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Makishima Suzuki

title: Otomege Sekai wa Mob ni Kibishii Sekai desu
alt_title: 乙女ゲー世界はモブに厳しい世界です, 여성향 게임 세계는 엑스트라에게 어려운 세상입니다, Мир отомэ-игр — это тяжёлый мир для мобов, Trapped in a Dating Sim: The World of Otome Games Is Tough for Mobs, 女性向遊戲世界對路人角色很不友好, The World of Otome Games Is Tough for Mobs
description: Leon, a former Japanese worker, was reincarnated into an “otome game” world, and despaired at how it was a world where females hold dominance over males. It was as if men were just livestock that served as stepping stones for females in this world. The only exceptions were the game’s romantic targets, a group of handsome men led by the crown prince. In these bizarre circumstances, Leon held one weapon: his knowledge from his previous world, where his brazen sister had forced him to complete this game. This is a story about his adventure to survive and thrive in this world.
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Mishima Yomu

title: Of All Things, I Became a Crow
alt_title: 하필이면 까마귀가 되어버렸다, Hapirimyeon Kkamagwiga Doeeobeoryeotda, Hapil-imyeon Kkamagwiga Doeeobeoryeossda, The Crow's Prince, After All, I Became a Crow, I Became a Crow, I Have Become a Crow, I Have Turned Into a Crow, I Have Turned Into a Crow of All Things, I've Become a Crow, Out of Everything, I Became a Crow, Так ли плохо быть вороной, よりによってカラスになってしまった, 偏偏变成了乌鸦, 偏偏變成了烏鴉, Me Converti En Un Cuervo
description:
After dying in an accident, I was reincarnated in an otome game …as a **crow**! I can't believe that I am a crow! Not an extra character, but a crow! When I was looking for a person near me… the first person who appeared was the Crown Prince.

"How could you be so lovely, Reinel?"

"Cawk cawk, cawk! (Take me with you and raise me!)"

The Crown Prince, Kamut, gave me a name and treated me with love. I'm just a crow anyway, there'd be no problem if I liked him or if my heart fluttered for him. There was no problem until…

"Hello, Reinel?"

"What is happening to me all of a sudden?"

---
Life is about survival of the fittest... But what do you do when you're reborn as a crow? Find someone big and strong to take you in, of course! After saving Prince Camute's life, Rainelle is brought to the imperial palace to live as his pet. However, just as she believes she's set to live a life of comfort, she finds herself caught at the center of a dangerous power struggle between Prince Camute and his brother. Now that her survival depends on his, will Rainelle find a way to help her prince?

---

alt_title: 나태 공자, 노력 천재 되다, Reformation of the Deadbeat Noble, The Lazy Prince Becomes a Genius, От нерадивого аристократа до усердного гения, 怠惰公子、努力の天才になる, 懶惰公子成長記
description:
After witnessing the shocking death of his mother, young Airen Farreira uses sleep to escape his painful reality, earning him the nickname, “the lazy lord”. Yet, in spite of others’ jeers and whispers, Airen has no intention of changing his ways.

But when he awakens one day from a dream about a mysterious swordsman, his life’s trajectory takes a complete turn...

The shop is located inside a school for young ladies!? Can a boy bad at communicating, who can't even look straight in the eye and speak properly run a cake shop with four JK patissiers? Enjoy a teen romantic comedy sweeter than a cake♪

Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.

alt_title: 恋に恋するコイビト関係, Becoming Her Lover For the Sake of Love
description:
Asako Ichijou, the student council president at a prestigious girls' high school, has been racking her brain about the ladykiller Nagi Tenma. That's the sort of person Asako is, but Nagi discovers Asako has broken school rules by bringing a shoujo manga to school...

Asako pleads with Nagi to keep it a secret, and Nagi reveals her condition: "Become my lover."

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)

She can't help getting scolded by her master for crafting the craziest weapons! In this dungeon-city where heroes dare to delve, experience the everyday life of the regular folk that keep things running smoothly! Welcome to your "Craft Fantasy!"

alt_title: 洞窟王からはじめる楽園ライフ ～万能の採掘スキルで最強に!?～, A Cave King’s Road to Paradise: Climbing to the Top with My Almighty Mining Skills!, Пещерный король будет жить как в раю, The Cave King Will Live a Paradise Life -Becoming the Strongest With the Mining Skill?, The King of Cave Will Live a Paradise Life, 洞窟王からはじめる楽園ライフ
description: Hiel was ridiculed for having a useless crest and was exiled to a remote island. When he grabbed an pickaxe to reclaim the island, the true effect of his crest was revealed. With his production cheat he will reclaim this uninhabited island and start his life in paradise.

title: Adopted by a Murderous Duke Family
alt_title: 암살자 가문의 수양딸이 되었다, Adopted by a Murderous Ducal Family, Became the Adopted Daughter of a Family of Assassins, Become the Foster Daughter of an Assassin Family, Я стала приемной дочерью в семье убийц, Me convertí en la hija adoptiva de una familia de asesinos
description: After ten years of being exploited by Duke Gerwehr for her healing powers, Agnes meets her death in a dungeon. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her uncle's house before she was sold to Duke Gerwehr in the slave market. Desperate for her past life not to repeat itself, she lets Duke Rodwick adopt her and starts her new life with a new name, Tuariche Rodwick. Will she be able to keep her healing powers secret in this notorious family of assassins and find true happiness and love in her new life?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Rogang

title: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms
alt_title: My Charms Are Wasted on Medaka Kuroiwa, 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない, Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности, Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka, 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用
description:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.

---

title: Gyakkou Reijou no Fukushuu Keikaku
alt_title: 逆行令嬢の復讐計画, I Became the Sister-in-Law of My Ex-Fiancé, Sofia Has New Plans for Marriage, 전 약혼남의 형수가 되었다, 大小姐的复仇婚约, Me Convertí En La Cuñada De Mi Ex Prometido
description:
Sophia was betrayed by her fiancé, Prince Raymond, and her best friend, Samantha, and was executed with the family. When she woke up, she was back in the past before she got engaged to the Prince?!

In order to escape her fate, Sophia needs to prevent her engagement with the second Prince Raymond and she decided to approach the first Prince Alexis and take revenge on Raymond and Samantha. However, the road ahead is dangerous...

How will the battle for the crown end? Can Sophia change her fate?

---
Betrayed by her fiancé Prince Raymond and her best friend Samantha, Sophia and her whole family were executed. When she wakes up in the morning, she realizes that she is back it time before her engagement. In order to change the fate of her family's execution, she refuses the engagement with the second prince Raymond and decides to make the first prince Alexis the crown prince to avenge her family. However, it is not an easy road... 

How will the fierce battle for the crown end? Will Sophia be able to change her destiny? 

The epic revenge drama is about to begin.

---

Her dream life as a wealthy landlord is about to begin—but there are no living tenants, only spirits, and her new property is a rollercoaster ride of psychic phenomena. Kaoru embraces her new specter-filled life as the owner of Ghost Mansion and starts recruiting for new non-living residents!

alt_title: 『人斬り』少女、公爵令嬢の護衛になる, "Hitokiri" Girl Becomes Bodyguard for Duke's Daughter, "Hitokiri" Girl Becomes Bodyguard For The Duke's Daughter
description:
Shurine, a girl raised for the sole purpose of becoming a bodyguard, is framed by the state and branded a "hitokiri". 

Following a life on the run, she meets Lutecia, a duke's daughter, aboard a magical train. With Lutecia's life in danger, Shurine offers a solution:

"If you need a bodyguard, why not hire me right now?"

alt_title: No te burles de mi, Nagatoro, Не издевайся, Нагаторо, イジらないで、長瀞さん, 괴롭히지 말아요, 나가토로 양, 不要欺負我，長瀞同學, No me Molestes, Nagatoro-san, Please Don't Bully Me, Nagatoro, Don't Toy With Me, Miss Nagatoro!
description:
Naoto Hachiouji —our spineless— MC (Known also as "Senpai") is a second-year high school student and a loner who spends his afternoons at the Arts Club room. He attracts the attention of one of his schoolmates, a sadistic freshman girl named Nagatoro. However, in between the bullying and teasing, something else begins to blossom.

A lovey-dovey(…?) story between a shy nerd and an S-Dere (Sadistic Tsundere) begins.

---

title: Before Death Do Us Part
alt_title: 죽음 대신 결혼, Jugeum Daesin Gyeolhon, Jug-eum Daesin Gyeolhon, Marriage Instead of Death, Marrying Rather Than Dying, Marriage or Death, Брак вместо смерти, 死より結婚, 生存之婚, 婚姻代替死亡, 生存婚約
description:
She would have to marry the son of another organization?!

Yang Hye-jin had completely cut ties with her family right after she entered college, in pursuit of peaceful a daily life. It has been nine years since she left her violent father and her ignorant brother, who resembled him. However, her family suddenly appears and unilaterally announces her marriage with an unwanted partner, Moo Kang. Can Hye-jin and Moo Kang swear their entire lives in this marriage, which consists of a contract between organizations, and where death is the only path should they do not accept it?

---
The Yang and Kim families were once rival gangs with construction company fronts that spilled blood over a smidgen of gold. But a new company has entered the picture, and now both their stakes are at risk. Reluctantly, they form an alliance… sealed with an arranged marriage between their children, Hyejin and Moogahng! However, Hyejin’s past traumas keep her heart guarded, and Moogahng shrouds himself in mystery. It doesn’t seem like any amount of blood, tears, or gold will make their marriage better. But can love make this troubled pair work?

---

title: I Raised a Nine Tailed Fox Wrongly
alt_title: 구미호를 잘못 키웠다, i Raised the Gumiho Wrong, Malcrié a un zorro de nueve colas
description:
One day, I met a spirit. And it wasn't just anyone, but a gumiho puppy. As I worried about the little one's fate, I met a priestess from the eastern continent, who told me to raise him until he reached maturity and then send him back home. Raising a little fox...

How could a cursed human welcome and care for a young life? It was strange and scary, but I couldn't refuse.

The fox, Ran, was just adorable. So, with much love and care, I raised him... But when he grew up, he became as seductive as I've heard of his kind, and he refused to be independent. All the training he had given seemed to have been in vain, with that lewd look.

"You can’t run away."
"Keep being good and help me, Scyllia. By my side."

Forever...

title: Kami no Fune de Nemuru
alt_title: Sleeping on the Paper Ship, 紙の舟で眠る, Sleeping on Paper Boats
description: Kitahara Kei is a screenwriter whose prodigious talent is taking the world by storm, but the people on whom he models his protagonists invariably end up dead. Dismayed by the misfortunes piling up in his wake, he abandons the pen and falls into dissipation, spending his days drinking in underground bars. One night when Kei is drunk and collapsed in the street, he is approached by a young amateur photographer named Youichi. Kei finds himself irresistibly drawn to Youichi’s ever-changing expressions, his radiantly pure smile, and sometimes sultry gaze… Being with Youichi, Kei finds the words spilling out of him once more, and yet he knows that he will only bring misfortune to Youichi…

Enamoured by Eden's cute and unguarded natural, Luke, who has lived a prosperous and carefree life so far, can't stop himself from falling for him. Eden is also attracted to Luke, who has grown up to be serious and cool, unlike when his young self, but the rumours about him being a Casanova leave him uneasy.

Cheryl, the beloved lady of Neus Castle.
One night, her uncle rebels, killing her older brother. She, too, was in danger of being killed. Just as she was about to give up in her last moments, someone comes to save her.

That is until one day, when the wealthy merchant Raymond comes for a portrait and his interest in Ian is piqued… Can Raymond help him to see the beauty in the world again? Or will Ian's true talent forever remain unseen?

alt_title: 週に一度クラスメイトを買う話～ふたりの時間、言い訳の五千円, A Story About Buying a Classmate Once a Week ~ 5,000 Yen for an Excuse to Spend Time Together, 일주일에 한 번 클래스메이트를 사는 이야기 ~두 사람의 시간, 변명의 오천 엔~
description:
Once a week, Miyagi pays 5,000 yen to her classmate Sendai. The 5,000 yen is to buy three hours of Sendai’s time, which gives the right for Miyagi to give her orders. 

Miyagi is at the bottom of the school caste while Sendai is at the top. The two, who never crossed paths at school, spend time together after school under such a contract. Miyagi’s orders are determined by her mood of the day, and Sendai cannot disobey. One day after school… 

Miyagi calls Sendai to her room and gives her an order that she usually does not give.

description:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

description: Orphaned at a young age, Layla Llewellyn feels like the luckiest girl in the world after she moves in with her uncle Bill, a gardener who lives on the scenic Arvis estate in the Berg Empire. To Layla, Arvis seems like paradise; she loves to explore the vast forest, always bringing her notebook to record the wildlife she encounters. She especially loves the birds, watching them with awe as they hatch and grow from fluffy chicks into beautiful birds. Duke Herhardt, the young, handsome lord of Arvis, is also interested in birds-and in Layla. But the difference is, he’s interested in birds because he likes to hunt them… and he’s interested in Layla because he likes to make her cry. If a lovely bird is trapped in a golden cage, which will she choose: a life of luxury, or freedom? (Source: kaiscans.com)

alt_title: 악녀는 패밀리의 숭배를 받고, Agnyeoneun Familyeui Sungbaereul Badgo, Angnyeoneun Family Sungbaereul Batgo, All Hail Lady Blanche!, The Villainess Is Worshipped by the Mafia?, The Villainess Is Worshipped by the Family, Семья поклоняется Злодейке, 恶女靠系统收割崇拜, 超狂惡女玩霸黑社會, 惡女受到家族的崇拜, 悪女はマフィアを手玉に取って

To Blanche, everything seemed hopeless. Until she realized it was all a game. One she made, to be exact. Now she has a goal: Become the villain's right-hand man! But wait. Why is she the one saving him...?

Blanche, who is timid and kind but is despised by her family, cannot overcome her family's contempt and attempts suicide.

After that, when I opened my eyes, this world was the game world I made!!

To survive in this world, I must have the villain Ricardo to my side. But Ricardo's condition is strange?!

title: Ogami Tsumiki to Kinichijou.
alt_title: 尾守つみきと奇日常。, Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life., Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana., Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь, 尾守月美希和奇日常。
description:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

alt_title: 용사 동생은 아카데미 고인물, Yongsa Dongsaengeun Academy Goinmul, 勇者の弟はアカデミーガチ勢, Mi Hermano Pequeño Es El Mejor De La Academia
description:
Ruud Denatos' life of living in the shadow of his talented older brother Aesir, a genius dragon slayer, ends when Aesir is killed in a brutal battle. But after the fight, a hidden dragon lord appears and sends Ruud to a past where Aesir doesn't exist!

In order to find answers and his older brother, Ruud takes Aesir's place and wows the school with his skills and knowledge. But will Ruud continue to impress the academy, or will the lackluster skills of his past catch up to him?
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Bae Hanul

title: The Window of Orpheus
alt_title: オルフェウスの窓, 奥尔佛士之窗
description:
The story begins in Europe, during the first years of the XX century. On a background of intrigues, machinations and a Europe that is going strait toward World War I, three kids meet at a strict conservatory in Germany. Julius met Isaac at the famous Orpheus' Window and later in another event met Klaus there. The legend told that two lovers met at Orpheus' Window would end in unhappiness. But Julius met two different persons, and they didn't know Julius' secret. In fact, Julius is a woman who's forced to dress up and pretend to be a guy. But she isn't the only one who has secrets. Klaus, for example, is Russian. Is he a communist spy? Then the whirlwind of fate began.

Note: Has a gaiden known as Collage. Additional gaiden were written by Ikeda, but illustrated by her longtime assistant Erika Miyamoto.
genre: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Crossdressing, Drama, Tragedy
author: Ikeda Riyoko

title: A Divorced Evil Lady Bakes Cakes
alt_title: 이혼한 악녀는 케이크를 굽는다, Ihonhan Angnyeoneun Cake-reul Gumneunda, LA VILLANA DIVORCIADA HORNEA PASTELES
description: I had been working hard as the Duchess for nine years, supporting my quiet and indifferent husband, but all I was left with was contempt, indifference, and accusal of having a love affair. So when he finally asked for a divorce to marry his long-time lover... “There’s a limit to what I can endure for this marriage. No matter how much you cry or plead to the Emperor, I can’t stand it anymore.” “Can I sign here?” “So if you pretend to be poor like last time, this time… what? I waved divorce papers on an indifferent day. “I’m done. Can I go now?” “Oh, since we both had lovers, of course, I won’t be receiving alimony, but you’ll surely return my dowry, right?” “What are you gonna do with that little money?”, asked my husband, who had not cared what he had done for the past nine years. I laughed confidently and answered: “I’m going to open a dessert cafe.”
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Cooking, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dandelion Wine

title: The Rising of the Shield Hero
alt_title: Восхождение Героя Щита, 盾の勇者の成り上がり, 盾之勇者成名录, 盾之勇者成名錄, 방패 용사 성공담 (방패 용자의 성공기)
description:
Naofumi Iwatani, an uncharismatic Otaku who spends his days on games and manga, suddenly finds himself summoned to a parallel universe! He discovers he is one of four heroes equipped with legendary weapons and tasked with saving the world from its prophesied destruction.  
As the Shield Hero, the weakest of the heroes, all is not as it seems. Naofumi is soon alone, penniless, and betrayed. With no one to turn to, and nowhere to run, he is left with only his shield. Now, Naofumi must rise to become the legendary Shield Hero and save the world!

title: Perfect Marriage Revenge
alt_title: 완벽한 결혼의 정석, The Perfect Way to Get Married, Perfect Marriage, The Essence of a Perfect Marriage, La venganza del matrimonio perfecto
description:
My husband is in love with my younger sister. And of all things, I found out about it on my birthday, which is also the day I died. But… I somehow traveled back to one year ago?

The day I came back from the dead, I decided. This time, I have a year to seduce my younger sister’s man and marry him. Until then, I’ll get my revenge.

But this guy… Why is he so perfect? He’s a second generation conglomerate heir, and during this contractual relationship, his eyes… his lips… I keep getting mesmerized.

‘What should I do…?’

He soon becomes the top of the food chain, savoring his new title as the toughest guy at school. But he meets his match when Suho Kang, the Champion of the PVP games, single-handedly takes down him and his crew. To earn back his honor, Yeongha decides to join the PVP games. Will he finally get the satisfaction of beating Suho up? Or will he gain something more?

alt_title: Unbeatable Level 1, Unbeatable Lv.1, 최강 레벨 1, Непобедимый первый уровень, Сильнейший первый уровень
description:
The raid failed. 

In a desperate situation due to the impending suicide bombing of the dungeon boss, Lee Gon-woo was betrayed by his teammates, and abandoned in the boss’s room. Just when he thought it was all over, a dagger suddenly fell into his hands. And from that moment his life changed dramatically.

His life was saved, but all the levels he gained with such difficulty have reset, making him level 1.

[You have caught a "mosquito". Your level has increased.]

"My level should have gone up, but why is nothing happening?!"

title: Kotodama Kanaete! Tokie-sensei
alt_title: Kotodama Kanaete! Tokiesensei, Through the Power of Words, Grant Me My Wishes, Tokie-sensei
description: In a normal, everyday run-of-the-mill school, a new teacher arrives but there's something peculiar about her... She is a teacher with a dark aura but with the power of words she can transform into whatever is asked of her. From dressing like a cat to wearing a bikini,  she's at the mercy of her students. Enjoy this comedic story filled with very amusing moments between a teacher who thrives on obeying words and some very mischievous students.

title: Gachiakuta
alt_title: Гачиакута, ガチアクタ, Real Trash
description:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (U.S. Only)

title: Nichijou
alt_title: My Ordinary Life, Мелочи Жизни, 日常, 일상
description:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)

title: The Maid Wants to Quit Within the Reverse Harem Game
alt_title: 역하렘 게임 속 메이드는 퇴사하고 싶습니다, La sirvienta en el juego de harem inverso quiere renunciar
description:
The main character, who transmigrates into an exhausting reverse harem game as an extra, has seen it to the end six times, but yet she's  still unable to return to reality?

No matter how true she stays to her role as an extra, she keeps getting swept along with the characters' tragic ending. Now, she's determined to leave everything behind and live her own life.

"It's my resignation letter. I would like to leave this estate."

I'm sure the main leads will be fine without me, after all.

However.

"On who's account are you leaving this estate for? Did you not say you were my person, Iren?"
"Irenea, I don't intend to connect with anyone else but you. It'll only be you."
"Don't go, Lea. Stay by my side, alright?"
"I would like for you to be happy, Miss Irenea."

Every character in the game has started to notice me.
genre: Reincarnation, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Mafia, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Eun Hae-Yoon

title: Kingdom
alt_title: Reino, Царство, キングダム, 王者天下
description:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

title: The Reason She Is Avoiding Her Childhood Friend
alt_title: 그 영애가 소꿉친구를 피하는 이유, The Reason Why That Young Lady Avoids Her Childhood Friend, The Reason I Keep Avoiding My Childhood Friend, La razón por la cual sigo evitando a mi amigo de la infancia
description:
Arendine is a reincarnator who died miserably in her past life.

“I’ll live a full life this time around!” I vowed. However, an eight-year-old Grand Duke won’t stop disturbing my peaceful life.

Unable to deal with that jerk any longer, I was forced to take drastic measures by slapping him. At first, he was absolutely livid, ordering me to be whipped. But after that whole incident blew over, his reaction was… A little strange.

“I’ll let you hit me from now on. You can hit me as much as you want.”

Why is he blushing and talking nonsense?

I seem to have awakened his secret taste! Gotta get rid of this guy ASAP!

title: Obsidian Bride
alt_title: 흑요석의 신부, Bride of Obsidian, La prometida obsidiana
description:
A miserable life where even dreams of love were out of reach. 
The night I tried to end my life from the exhaustion of my joyless marriage, a special invitation arrived unexpectedly.

[ You are an existence that gleams like the jewels.
The Jewel Box, where existences who shine like you gather... 
Would you like to enter the Jewel Box? YES? or NO? ]

[ The Empire's Jewel Box ] is a luxurious party attended by only the most outstanding people. A place where they can meet a marriage partner solely based on "true love" while concealing their face and status.
"If you were granted the opportunity to become a shining Jewel, like those who were specially selected..."

My choice from that night changed everything.

The bullying escalates, and Souichi’s childhood friend, Azusa, who was the only one who trusted him, is defiled by them. In front of Souichi, who was in the depths of despair, the succubus, Asmode, appeared. Souichi makes a contract with a succubus who possesses a mysterious ability, and decides to make the bully’s loved ones suffer the same pain as himself by “cuckolding” them. title: The Princess in the Attic
alt_title: 다락방 황녀님, Daragbang Hwangnyeonim, Attic Princess, The Princess of the Attic, Принцесса с чердака, 屋根裏部屋の皇女様, 阁楼里的公主, 閣樓裡的皇女, 閣樓公主, 閣樓裡的公主, 閣樓間皇女, La Princesa del Ático
description:
I've lived in this little hell ever since I was born for being the daughter of a gypsy who carries misfortune. The Trump Empire killed my innocent mother. The emperor, the temple, and the whole empire locked me up, abused me, resented me, and abandon me. Their abandonment is an opportunity, Here in the kingdom of Jardine, I will begin my revenge. The Trump Empire, may it dry up a little more. The dryness will soon be a precious stream for me. …I will start my revenge.

---
Branded as a cursed child, Princess Osiria spent most of her life locked in an attic. In actuality, Osiria is the divinely chosen, the one who could’ve saved the empire of Trionfo. Instead, she was sold to a neighboring kingdom and left in the care of Sir Fedelius, a handsome young knight. Although her heart beats faster when Fedelius is around, she doesn’t plan on staying for long. She wants only one thing… to get revenge on those who abused her and killed her mother. Will her heart soften with love or will she seek vengeance to the very end?

---

title: Spacedrum
description:
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.

All beings in the firmament live locked in this infinite cycle. Or so it was until the day they came down from the heavens.

Humanity ceased to be human. Death is no longer the end. Enlightenment came to save her children and defeat the most powerful feeling that consciousness had been able to create.

___

SpaceDrum shows us a society that has evolved to a state of full well-being, freed from wars and conflicts, in search of Nirvana, thanks to the spiritual guidance of an alien race.
The aryas are an elite group charged with the external security of the planet and the protection of the high priestess.

They are chosen because, thanks to their control over their Virya, they are able to control mysterious fragments, the shards. Reda is a student at one of the most distinctive military academies, but he has difficulty controlling his special shard due to constant visions of a strange young woman. And this will not be the biggest of your problems...
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens
author: Eric Cuaresma

title: The Ravages of Time
alt_title: Огненный феникс опаляет равнины, 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原, 火鳳燎原, 火凤燎原, 火鳳燎原
description:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!
genre: Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Drama, Mystery
author: Chen Mou

title: Male Lead, Don't Follow Me!
alt_title: Don’t Chase Me, Namjoon!, 쫓아오지 마세요, 남주님!
description:
One day, I realized that I had been reincarnated as the friend of the female protagonist who dies trying to save the heroine of a decaying fiction novel.

I really wanted to tell the female lead about this, but for some reason, my words were muted, as if to prevent spoilers. Frustrated, I ended up going into the forbidden forest and shouting out the secret at the top of my lungs, even cursing the male lead: "The male lead is a bastard!"

But since no one was around to hear it, rumors later spread that the male lead, Archduke Wischwaltz, was actually gay. And now he's even investigating to find the source of this unfounded rumor...? "...My voice really struck a chord, didn't it?"

Looks like I've ruined my life.

title: A Sleepless Maid's Night
alt_title: 잠 못 드는 시녀의 밤, 侍女艾芙的不眠之夜, Sleepless Nights of a Maid, 眠れないメイドの夜, Jam Mot Deuneun Sinyeoui Bam, Sleepless Maid's Night, The Sleepless Night of the Maid, La noche de insomnio de la doncella
description:
After the ruin of an aristocratic family in England, Eva Macy has been living a difficult life as a maid at an acquaintance’s house, where she happens to meet her ex-fiancé Prince Edward.

Despite being a strong and cold-hearted person, he is affectionate towards her. After he leaves, Eva realizes that he’s her first love. However, she decides to give up on her current feelings, believing it to be in her best interest to do so.

After overcoming such a difficult time, Eva's feelings for Edward calmed down, but one day, Edward suddenly appeared before her as if to stir up Eva’s heart again.

Eva becomes a chambermaid for her ex-fiancé Edward, where he constantly tries to seduce Eva.

The relationship she thought had ended a long time ago continues again in his chambers...
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Studio Jemi

title: To Your Eternity
alt_title: 不滅のあなたへ, A ti, el inmortal, Для тебя, Бессмертный, 致不灭的你, 致不滅的你, 불멸의 그대에게, To You, the Immortal
description:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

title: Uterus of the Blackgoat
alt_title: 黒山羊の仔袋, Uterus of the Blackgoat 黒山羊の仔袋
description:
In 1948, during the Berlin Blockade incident, there was a hidden conflict between the Eastern and Western spy agencies over the discoveries of a Nazi Germany occult research organization known as Ahnenerbe.

The CIA and the Soviet State Security Ministry were engaged in a fierce battle to obtain Nazi experimental records, which involved offering priestesses as sacrifices to the ancient god Shub-Niggurath to open gates to other dimensions.

At the heart of this struggle was a mysterious witch named Lady MacLeod, whose objective was to thwart the progress of both organizations and bury the forbidden knowledge in darkness. Lady MacLeod possessed a power called the "Black Goat's Satchel," which allowed her to command eldritch creatures from other realms. Known by the codename "H-21," she was a legendary female spy and, in truth, the enigmatic figure behind the infamous Mata Hari.
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Police, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Haruki

title: Plastic Memories: Say to good-bye
alt_title: Пластиковые воспоминания: Скажи «прощай», プラスティック・メモリーズ Say to good-bye
description:
A prequel manga to the TV anime "Plastic Memories", written from Michiru's perspective. Naturally, also featuring her partner, Zack!  
  
A future world in which Giftia, androids capable of feeling emotion, exist. However, Giftia have a predetermined service life of about nine years, and must be 'retrieved' when that time is up. Michiru has just joined Terminal Service, the department at SAI Corp. in charge of executing these retrievals, which can be said to mean ripping apart the relationship between Giftia and owner.
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Yuuyuu

title: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu
alt_title: 猫の手だって役に立つ, Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful, 貓手也堪一用
description:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color
author: NOBEL

title: Isekai de Haishin Katsudou wo Shitara Tairyou no Yandere Shinja wo Umidashite Shimatta Ken
alt_title: 異世界で配信活動をしたら大量のヤンデレ信者を生み出してしまった件, When I started streaming in another world, I ended up creating a large number of Yandere followers.
description:
Living in Ataraxia, a world of swords and magic, a reincarnated individual decided to make a living out of streaming.

Living in a world where such a thing did not exist despite the many forms of entertainment, he quickly made a name for himself.

This is not the tale of just a streamer… but of a boy who becomes a legend as a haishinsha.
genre: Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Myon

title: Void: No. Nine - 9-banme no Utsuro
alt_title: Void: No. Nine-9番目のウツロ-
description:
300 years ago, God destroyed the old world and killed humans, leaving only the "emissaries".

But underground humans live in the tunnel-filled Reform City. They search for relics, while living in fear from the threat of being hunted by the "emissaries".

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)
genre: Sci-Fi, Mystery
author: Shima Shinya

title: Go! Ina Junior High Ping-Pong Club
alt_title: 去吧，稻中乒团, 行け！稲中卓球部
description:
There are six members of the boy's ping pong club. Two are relatively normal; however, the other four consist of an aspiring sexual deviant, two perverts, and a guy with lethal B.O. Add in a cantakerous girl as a manager, and you have the entire crew.  
  
This series pushes the boundaries of good taste beyond anything the western world has experienced, yet somehow manages to remain vaguely charming. The antics of the ping pong club includes one member's trademark "Protruding Pecker Serve," molesting cross-dressing members, and the infamous "Turtle Sequence," which is much too horrifying to describe.  
  
In 1996, this manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga.
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, School Life
author: Furuya Minoru

title: Shinozaki-kun no Mente Jijou
alt_title: The Everyday Maintenance of Shinozaki-kun, 篠崎くんのメンテ事情
description:
Shinozaki – an everyday, ordinary salaryman whose head has been coming off too easily lately – finds his otherwise-typical life suddenly interrupted by a young woman named Yuuyake. 

According to her, Yuuyake’s magician grandmother modified Shinozaki’s body to an extreme degree in the past- and he’s chock-full of machinery! 

…All of which require maintenance that Yuuyake will apparently now be performing regularly. 

With that, the slightly off-color daily life of an utterly ordinary salaryman, a magician, and a strange black creature named Grey begins!
genre: Comedy, Office Workers, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Burio Michiru

title: Mankitsu Shitai Jouren-san
alt_title: まんきつしたい常連さん, Una clienta habitual quiere divertirse, Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy, The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe, 想盡情享受的常客小姐, 想尽情享受的常客小姐
description:
Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Shinmi Rin

title: Max Talent Player
alt_title: Talent Management Player, A Talented Player, 재능만렙 플레이어, Jaeneungmallep Peulleieo
description:
I accepted the test results.

[Talentless]

Today, the word “talentless” came to mind. It's my fault, my lack of effort, my lack of talent, or both, or neither. Is it my fault for living like this, or is it society's?

A day passed. I don't know why, but I went back 10 years.

...This is very easy. Is it really true that I had no talent?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Hyomak

title: Monster Princess of the Snowy Mountain
alt_title: 설산의 괴물 황녀, Snow Mountain Monster Princess, La princesa monstruosa de las montañas nevadas
description: Valerie Beloff, a princess in exile, decides to take her own life on her 19th birthday. Abused by her own mother and exiled for her mother’s crimes, she had to live in the freezing Makleroad palace by herself, and she somehow acquired the powers of an ancient monster - the power to freeze things. Hopeless, she seeks an escape in death… only to find herself before her cruel mother, yelling at her once again. Is she dead? Is she reliving a memory? When her mother strikes her, the throbbing pain lets her know that this is neither a dream nor a memory!
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: seewater (물보라)

title: Isekai Yakkyoku
alt_title: Parallel World Pharmacy, Аптека в ином мире, 異世界薬局, 이세계 약국, 異世界藥局, Isekai Pharmacy, Pharmacy in Another World, Other World Pharmacy
description:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Takayama Liz

title: The Dangers in My Heart
alt_title: Угрозы в моём сердце, 僕の心のヤバイやつ, 僕ヤバ, 我心裡危險的東西, 我心里危险的东西, 내 마음의 위험한 놈, Los peligros en mi corazón
description:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Sakurai Norio

title: The S-Class Baby Princess Is So Strong
alt_title: S급 아기 황녀님이 너무 강해, The S-Class Little Princess Is Too Strong, La Princesa Bebé Clase S Es Muy Fuerte
description:
I was an S-class hunter, but I reincarnated as a princess?
***
‘I did it, I killed the demon!’
However, the world was not saved. It was still in chaos, and I was already on the verge of dying.
‘Am I going to die like this…?’
My eyes were getting blurry.
But then,
‘A reward at this time? You damn system!’
[The reward is…]
‘What?’
What came out of my mouth when I tried to scream was a babble instead.
“Eubu.”
[Consciousness has successfully been loaded!] [You have been reincarnated! Congratulations!]
“Agatata!” (Reincarnation, great!)
However, I wasn’t alone this time, because I had a family now.
‘My father and brothers, why are they so strange?’
“I have separation anxiety.”
“I don’t need anything but Risha!”
Also, the enemy of my past life suddenly appeared.
“My savior and benefactor, Princess Anatrisha.”
I only saved him. Why was he like this?
‘Will I be able to be happy this time?’
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color
author: M (II)

title: The Tyrant's Only Perfumer
alt_title: 폭군의 유일한 조향사가 되었습니다, Poggun-eui Yuilhan Johyangsaga Doeeossseubnida, I Became the Tyrant's Only Perfumer, I Became the Sole Perfumer of a Tyrant, 暴君のたった一人の調香師, 成为他唯一的调香师, 我成为了暴君的唯一调香师, 暴君專屬調香師, LA PERFUMISTA DEL TIRANO
description:
A young woman sick with an incurable illness closes her eyes for the last time, only to wake up as Ariel Winston, an antagonist of the novel she had loved reading before her death. Knowing that death lies before her if she continues down the path the real Ariel has been going towards, she quickly breaks up with Duke Cedric Evans, who is not only the protagonist of the novel but a man who is cursed with a condition that causes him to become bloodthirsty when he does not smell a specific scent constantly. However, Cedric, who had been forced to date Ariel due to her status as his personal perfumer, suddenly seems reluctant to distance himself from her. Just what is wrong with this man, and how will this change the events of the novel? Will Ariel be able to live the life she wants?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8F%AD%EA%B5%B0%EC%9D%98-%EC%9C%A0%EC%9D%BC%ED%95%9C-%EC%A1%B0%ED%96%A5%EC%82%AC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2725), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57333037)

author: Fairy Dragon

title: Home (Ep)
alt_title: 홈
description:
Lee Yoonsung and Park Dokyung grew up together in the countryside since they were young. Yoonsung became an actor by chance, but whenever he has time, he travels back and forth between Seoul and his hometown to see Dokyung, his first and unrequited love.

Dokyung cared for Yoonsung, who had cried a lot since he was young.
Yoonsung finds himself developing stronger feelings for Dokyung, and his body's responses are becoming more noticeable.
Fearing that his feelings would be exposed, Yoonsung tries not to show and resolves to remain at least a friend... -Madeleine Scans-
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yep

title: The Duke's 99th Bride
alt_title: 공작가의 99번째 신부, 公爵家の99番目の花嫁, 公爵家的第99位新娘, La Novia Número 99 del duque
description:
Grace lost her mother and became an orphan, she lived on the streets and was waiting for the day of her death, but she was taken in by an angelic girl, Penelope Erdonia. One day, a marriage proposal came for Penelope from the Duke of Pelton, who was none other than the head of the most powerful family at the time. However, there is a rumour that all the women who went to the Pelton estate to marry him either disappear or return with a strange mind. In order to protect the innocent Penelope, Grace decides to marry the Duke instead.

---
When the daughter of the Erdona barony is forced to marry the infamous Duke Noel Felton, her loyal servant Grace McClean saves the day… by posing as the duke’s 99th bride-to-be! She’s doing her best to impress her fiancé by making him treats, rescuing a child, and even befriending the imperial princess! All seems well, until one day, Grace stumbles upon the duke’s journal and learns about his master plan... Will Grace survive her marriage? And what does the duke have in store for the empire?

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58474719)
