author: Choi Nokki (최노끼)

title: Kono Ura Aka, Sensei desho?
alt_title: この裏アカ、先生でしょ？
description:
Rinko, a high school teacher in her late twenties, is not seen as herself because of her sister, a popular actress, both at work and in her private life, and out of frustration, she starts a "behind-the-scenes account" on social media to post pictures of her body.
One day, while she is fulfilling her need for approval and secretly enjoying herself, a male student, who is a bit of a pain in the ass, comes into her life...

This is the start of a love suspense with a rather distorted age difference.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Mystery
author: NAGASHI Mayumi

title: Let's Do It Already!
alt_title: はやくしたいふたり, 想要更近一步的兩人
description:
Yuuri and Keiichirou fell in love as they shared the same route to neighboring high schools every day. But it turns out Keiichirou comes from a prestigious family where his father and grandfather were both prime ministers. The family rules strictly forbids him from having any inappropriate relations with a woman until he turns 18. Can he resist Yuuri's flirting?  


---
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Gyaru
author: Kusaka Aki

title: One Piece (Official Colored)
alt_title: One Piece - Digital Colored Comics, One Piece, Ван Пис, 海贼王, 원피스, ONE PIECE カラー版
description:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.
genre: Sci-Fi, Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Oda Eiichiro

title: Kigurumi
alt_title: KIG⊃R∩MI, KIG⊃R∩MI―キグルミ―
description: The story focuses around Makoto, a student who talent is making stuffed toys. He starts researching the mysterious disease going around called 'Sudden Death Syndrome' after finding out that his latest creation looks like the mysterious stuffed rabbit rumored to be causing it.
genre: Action, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Kurokata Kei

title: Love & Courage
alt_title: 이런, 용기, Love and Courage
genre: Oneshot, Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Youngmo (영모)

title: My Home As a Filming Location!
alt_title: 내 집이 촬영장이 되어버렸다!
description:
After returning from walking around my neighborhood, I was met with an entire film crew in my front yard?!
Yeonwoo, a beekeeper who lived in a secluded village, signed a contract that stated that his house would be used for filming with a PD who directed <Countryside Occupations> while he was drunk.
Later on, he found out that he would be filming his life with Kang Dojoon, a famous Korean actor.
Begrudgingly, he started to prepare for filming.
Contrary to what he thought before, he changed his mind after seeing Kang Dojoon in person.

*If I have to live with a handsome guy like that for 10 days... that wouldn't be so bad.*

Will Dojoon successfully complete filming for <Countryside Occupations>?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic
author: Chalbap

title: Kaii to Otome to Kamikakushi
alt_title: 怪異と乙女と神隠し, 괴이와 소녀와 행방불명, 怪异×少女×神隐, Тайны, девы и мистические происшествия, Mysterious Disappearances, Mysteries, Maidens, and Mysterious Disappearances, Apparitions, Maidens, & Mysterious Disappearances
description: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
genre: Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Nujima

title: It's Time for "Interrogation," Princess!
alt_title: 'Tis Time for "Torture," Princess, It's Time for "Interrogation", Princess!, Пришло время "допроса", принцесса!, 公主大人，接下來是“拷問”時間, 公主大人，接下来是“拷问”时间, 姫様“拷問”の時間です
description: The princess who's been held captive by the Demon Lord's army is scheduled to be executed by the Demon Lord's relentless torture!
genre: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Haruhara Robinson

title: Long-Awaited Feelings
alt_title: 余情可待, 餘情可待, My Feelings Can Wait
description:
During the wedding of the famous actress, Jing Xiu, Weibo was flooded instead by the shocking headline "New Hit Actress Ji Youyan Dies of Alcohol Poisoning". The headlines were soon changed when the wedding was called off... for reasons unknown.

Ji Youyan suddenly wakes up three years back in time, two years after she broke up with Jing Xiu. This time, she swears to never lose her again...
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Lily Club (橘姬社)

title: Weather Forecast Killer
alt_title: 일기예보 살인마
description:
Lee Saehyun fell into a deeply depressed state after losing his parents when he was still a child. Coincidentally, he meets a mysterious little boy named Yoonwo, who brings him peace of mind.

For years straight, the little boy would visit Saehyun's house once every week, which helped Saehyun pass time peacefully and comfortably.
However, suddenly after Saehyun began to meet other girls or go on dates, it would always rain, and there was no process in his romantic relationships.

But are these constant unfortunate and coincidental scenarios simply just coincidental? Or is this the work of someone up in the sky?
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Bori

title: Zannen Jokanbu Black General-san
alt_title: Precarious Female Executive Miss Black General, Precarious Woman Executive Miss Black General, 残念女幹部ブラックジェネラルさん, La Precaria Mujer Ejecutiva Señorita General Black
description: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Military, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: jin

title: Brother Trap
alt_title: ブラザー・トラップ, 兄弟陷阱
description:
The boy I fell in love with… is my ex-boyfriend's younger brother. 

Akari met Izumi, a younger man of few words, at a college party. Akari hasn't been able to get over her ex-boyfriend and find a new love, but she and Izumi gradually became friends... Things seemed to be going well for the two of them, until...! A heart-pounding love-triangle romance!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Hinata Kyou

title: The Admiral's Monstrous Wife
alt_title: 제독의 괴물아내, Jedog-eui Goemul-anae, The Admiral's Monster Wife, Жена адмирала - монстр, 提督の怪物妻, La monstruosa esposa del almirante
description:
Lydia Planang is called a monster because of her scales. She was treated like a minor and forced to marry by the order of the emperor. Her fiancé is a wild and fierce sailor. He is the admiral of Chillia, who is rumored to be very sadistic. But when he first met her, he was incredibly nice to her…?

"My husband just grabbed his wife's hand and he was already screaming."

Lydia learns little by little about Chillia's secret in the admiral's intense love. Dragons, giant octopuses, sea snakes, fairies and mermaids… A destined love after marriage on the splendid ocean!

**

"I know a plant that can help my husband increase his stamina."

Alexander leaned over and whispered in her ear, "If you weren't satisfied last night, I'll try to find it."

"…Oh no!" Last night! Lydia literally blushed as she recalled her secrets that she couldn’t tell anyone.

---
They call her a monster... but to this admiral, she's a sacred descendant of the sea! Rudia Flang has been mistreated her whole life, so when the emperor arranges her marriage to Alexander Cilia, war hero and the youngest admiral in history, she cowers in fear at the thought of marrying a violent seaman. As this ocean voyage treks on, she's met with benevolence from the Sercilian Island people who, unbeknownst to her, find the scales glistening on her body far from the marking of a monster...

---

alt_title: 顔に出ない柏田さんと顔に出る太田君, Expressionless Kashiwada-san and Emotional Oota-kun, Expressionless-Face Girl and Emotional-Face Boy, 얼굴에 드러나지 않는 카시와다 양과 얼굴에 드러나는 오오타 군, Inexpressive Kashiwada and Expressive Oota
description:
Meet Kashiwada-san, a female middle-school student, who remains emotionless regardless of how she is meddled with.  
And Oota-kun, unable to control his facial expressions, is the complete opposite of Kashiwada-san–but he keeps messing with her, against his better judgment?!  
Though the two of them are the exact opposite, will a mutual love eventually develop between them…?

title: Nega-kun and Posi-chan
alt_title: ネガくんとポジちゃん, 消極君和積極醬
description: Nega Shouya and Hoshi Sayaka are high school classmates. Nega is tremendously pessimistic, while Hoshi is optimistic, both to a fault. They also happen to be deeply in love with each other, but they completely misread each other's cues, him erring by defect, and her erring by excess. The fundamental law of magnetism states that opposites attract, and these two starkly different young lovers are not the exception!

title: The Devil Raises a Lady
alt_title: 악마는 레이디를 키운다
description:
The downfall of a noble family. And a girl who risks her life seeking revenge.

“Lady Ayana.”

There was a knight who had been by her side for thirteen years. The person who came to her mind before her own family was going to be annihilated. He risked his life for her, suffered wounds, hunger, and gave her everything. Now, he is looking at her while she’s waiting for her execution with a joyful smile.

“Please show me another enjoyable story this time, my lady.”

The devil smiled and extended his hand, and the girl took it.

“I hope you get the ending you desire in the next story, my lady.”

(Source: Kakao, translated)
genre: Time Travel, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yir

Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even…‽

title: The Grand Duchess of the North Was Secretly a Villainess
alt_title: 북부 대공의 정체가 흑막 악녀라 곤란하다, Bukbu Daegongui Jeongchega Heungmak Angnyeora Gollanhada, Bugbu Daegong-eui Jeongchega Heugmag Agnyeora Gonranhada, Великая герцогиня Севера тайно была злодейкой, 大公の正体が悪女で黒幕でした, 恶女公爵的真面目, 北部大公竟然是幕後黑手, 惡女公爵的真面目, 大公的真實身份是黑幕惡女
description:
Eloise Wayana, the grand duchess of the North, is executed by Emperor Caien Helisis after it is revealed that she was secretly a villainess all along. This marks the end of season two of the latest trending web novel, *The Crown of Blood*. As one of its avid readers, Kim Dakyung is eagerly waiting for the next season when she is suddenly hit by a truck on her way home! But once she reawakens, she finds that she is in the body of the grand duchess herself and has been teleported back to the novel’s beginning. Already knowing what road Eloise will go down, Dakyung is desperate to change her fate and survive until season three. Lucky for her, a younger version of Caien falls right into her hands, and she is going to do whatever it takes to keep him on her side.

alt_title: がばい -佐賀のがばいばあちゃん-, がばい佐賀のがばいばあちゃん, 佐贺的超级阿嬷, The Story of my Wonderful [Gabai] Grandmother
description: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…

title: Chiisana Kimi to, Koe wo Tooku ni
alt_title: ちいさな君と、こえを遠くに
description:
Manga adaptation of the "10th place Next Light Novel Award 2023!(Paperback category)" winner novel with the same name, written by Tsukasa author of "Unlimited Fafnir" illustrated by Shiratama.

Sota former vocalist of a popular band, having lost his former voice, he moves to a new high school where there is no one he knows to try to live quietly as Kanata Fujinami.
However, when he meets Sora, an elementary school girl who wants to become a voice actor, Kanata's dormant heart is moved and the story of Sora's journey toward her dream begins.

title: Hajimete no Satsujin
alt_title: ハジメテノサツジン, The First Murder
description: "We are murderers, you know."  Mayu is your average high school girl who goes to a prestigious school for young ladies. Her school life there feels fulfilling thanks to her close friends, Oto and Yuu.  However, one day, Mayu and Yuu witnessed Oto pushing their class teacher who then fell and lost consciousness. Oto tries to explain that the latter has only passed out but...!?
genre: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Kanmi

title: Vinland Saga
alt_title: Сага о Винланде, ヴィンランド・サガ, 海盜戰記, 海盗战记
description:
As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---

title: Reporting for Duty, Duchess!
alt_title: 长官！本次战场是这里吗？, 대위님! 이번 전쟁터는 이곳인가요?, Captain! Where is the battlefield?, Captain! Is This Battlefield Here?
description:
As a successful captain in the military, Lee Yoon-ah is an icon of success and power.  But after an accident on the battlefield, she finds herself trapped in a romantic fantasy novel!

Stuck in a supporting role as the best friend to the main protagonist, Yoon-ah is determined to overturn the plotline and change Rosalie’s fate. Will she be able to change Rosalie’s fate and find happiness in the new world? 

Will she return to where she was originally from?
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Military, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

title: The Great Mage of the Hero’s Party Reincarnates
alt_title: 용사파티 대마법사의 환생, The Rebirth of the Hero's Party's Archmage, El renacimiento del archimago del grupo del héroe
description:
At age 13, the genius wizard Rin embarked on a journey with Lista and the hero party to defeat the great evil known as “the Abyss,” which sought to plunge the world into chaos. But as the battle grew more intense, Rin’s body succumbed to the dark poison of the Abyss, putting his life in grave danger.

With the words “I’ll come back,” Rin’s soul entered a forced dormancy, only to reawaken 300 years later as a noble boy. Starting his second life in a peaceful world, Rin discovers that on one side of the world, the destined forces of darkness are beginning to stir once more.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

title: Tears on a Withered Flowers
alt_title: 시든 꽃에 눈물을
description: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Mafia, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

title: A Most Virtuous Villain
alt_title: 악당의 미학, Agdang-eui Mihag, The Villain's Aesthetics, A Villain's Aesthetic, Aesthetics of the Villain, 反派美学, 悪党の美学, La estética de un villano
description:
One day, while eating chicken, Sehyeon was transported into the novel she had written in the spur of a moment. She immediately became the idiotic princess, Ione. What else would happen today that would influence the fate of Ione's life and death? In order to survive, she had to make sure the Emperor wasn't killed! As she dashed away to prevent the incident, she ran straight into a man. A man loosely gripping a sword dripping with blood. Nickname: King Regent Kimchi Real name: Aenard Ibn Bonaparte. "You're an author?" She was screwed. The first thing she had to encounter just happened to be a villain who knew how to read her mind! "I'm the only person who knows that I can read minds." Sehyun's breathing quickened. "So, who are you?" A tight-knit fantasy romance with a menacing villain!

---
Becoming a princess in a fantasy world might be the dream of many, but not for Sehyun Ji, who just enjoys writing her dark and depraved novel. That is, until one day she suddenly wakes up inside the world of her creation! She becomes Princess Ione, the emperor’s daughter destined to die a tragic death. Determined to change her fate, she tries to stop Aenard Bonaparte, the main villain of her novel, from murdering the emperor... and fails. But what’s worse, he can read her mind! Will Sehyun—now Princess Ione—manage to survive?

---

title: Silver Tree
alt_title: 실버 트리
description: During the reign of Philip IV of France, Acre is in the midst of a war between the invading Mamluks and the Knights Templar trying to protect the Holy Land. On the day when Lea's family decided to leave by boat to escape the threat of war, Lea is forced to go into the middle of the war to return the sword entrusted to her by the leader of the Knights Templar. However, when she arrives trembling with the sword firmly strapped to her back, she witnesses the leader's death, and in a moment of danger, she meets Balta, the beautiful knight she had dreamed of since childhood. But this was not the time for her to indulge in such sentiments. The sword had lost its owner, and the atmosphere in the Knights Templar is somewhat strange. “It’s dangerous to go alone, I will take you there.” --Written by the same author as The Golden Forest--

title: Boku no Diamond Star
alt_title: 僕のダイヤモンド・スター, My Diamond Star
description:
Takuma is an ordinary first-year high school boy from the countryside who happens to be a (male) idol otaku. He spends all his free time working part-time in hopes of one day seeing his favorite idol live in concert. However, one day, his favorite idol Kei suddenly suspends all public appearances due to "health problems." Takuma is devastated by the news, until one day when Kei himself moves into the house next door…

“I want to help. If there’s anything I can do, please let me know.”

“There’s nothing you can do.”
genre: Drama, Slice of Life
author: Setsuo

title: Baby Tyrant
alt_title: Born a Princess, 베이비 폭군, Эта малышка — тиран, Baby Pokgun
description:
‘Less than a month old… I became the great empire’s treasured princess…!’
In all my life, I wanted love. Love from my family, But the family I had, failed me in the end. Abandoned… abused… I don’t want this so-called family. It’s a waste of time.
I came to a new world after a miserable ending…
‘The empire’s treasured princess… that’s me… but why is father, the emperor, so strange?’
“Mabel, I will give you the Ponce Castle.”
“My sweet child, the most fertile land is yours.”
“No, wait, this whole country will be yours for the plucking.”
‘Father, he’s strange… is this what family love is like?
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Lee Huin (이흰)

title: Higurashi When They Cry Reiwa: Demon Lighting Arc
alt_title: ひぐらしのなく頃に令 鬼熾し編, Когда Плачут Цикады: Приказ — Глава о Сожжении Демонов
description: The Shouwa Era has given way to the Heisei Era, and then to the Reiwa Era, and in the depopulated town of Hinamizawa, the curtain rises once again on a tragic story. This year, on the night of the Cotton Drifting Festival, one person is killed and another disappears...

title: Ryu's Road
alt_title: The Road of Ryu, The Way of Ryu, リュウの道
description:
Ryu stows away on a space vessel, only to be found by the crew when it's far to late to return to earth. So they stick him in a spare sleep capsule instead. Things take a turn for the unexpected, however, when Ryu wakes up to find himself the sole survivor of the expedition, the spaceship having crash landed on a grossly mutated and wholly unfamiliar Earth. Joining forces with fellow survivors from a different crash, Ryu and his comrades fight to survive on this new and deadly Earth as they search for any humans that might've made it through the mysterious apocalypse.

The Second part of the Ryu Trilogy
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

Kazama Kenji likes to believe he is something of a delinquent. Moreover, others seem to like to agree that he is. Of course, Kenji's gang finds their way to a group of four not-so-normal girls - Chitose, Sakura, Minami and Roka - and all at once, whatever reputation he may have, is nothing compared to the outrageous behavior of the girls. Shanghaied into joining their club, what will happen to his everyday life from that point on?

alt_title: ナルト, -ナルト-, NARUTO -ナルト-, Наруто, 火影忍者, 狐忍, 나루토
description:
Before Naruto's birth, a great demon fox had attacked the Hidden Leaf Village. The 4th Hokage from the leaf village sealed the demon inside the newly born Naruto, causing him to unknowingly grow up detested by his fellow villagers. Despite his lack of talent in many areas of ninjutsu, Naruto strives for only one goal: to gain the title of Hokage, the strongest ninja in his village. Desiring the respect he never received, Naruto works toward his dream with fellow friends Sasuke and Sakura and mentor Kakashi as they go through many trials and battles that come with being a ninja.

Manga about a girl who was looking for a job and ended up in a corporation of magical girls fighting monsters.

Are you looking for something new? Something challenging? Something very highly paid? Exterminating monsters is an exciting, fast-paced field that will get you out from behind a desk and into the action. With over 500 magical girl companies now in operation, you’re sure to find a position—and a uniform—that fits. Start your career as a magical girl today!

title: I Killed the Player of the Academy
alt_title: 아카데미 플레이어를 죽였다, I Killed an Academy Player, Academy Player-reul Jugyeotda, Yo maté al jugador de la Academia
description:
One day, I was reincarnated the world of a game of Heroic Legend of Arhan as Corin Loch, a minor NPC, and joined hands with the game's protagonist, Park Si-ho, to save the world. 

However, as the story shifted, I accidentally found out his true nature - a murderous pervert who only wanted to accumulate experience points by hook or by crook! In order to save world peace, I killed him... and became the main character instead of him! 

What should I do in the future to bring the game to a perfect ending?

title: Revelation of Youth
alt_title: 청춘계시록, Cheongchungyesilog, Cheongchun Gyesirok, Apocalypse of Youth
description: Lim Chungah is a highschool student whose household got swindled by her own trusted uncle. With her parents leaving in pursuit of finding her uncle, she is temporarily left alone to live in her uncle's empty house. HOWEVER, what if Chungah's family weren't the only ones duped by her uncle's con? Enter Millenium Adventist Church, the biggest cult in their community and one of her uncle's scam victims. Lim Chungah finds herself cohabitating with Kim Yohan, the cult leader's one and only son. Oh God, will their living situation be okay?!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic
author: Hanseo

title: The Villainess Empress's Attendant
alt_title: 악녀 황후의 전속 시녀, The Empress's Exclusive Handmaid, 悪女皇后の専属侍女, 恶女皇后的专属侍女, Exclusive Maid of the Evil Empress, La Doncella Exclusiva De La Malvada Emperatriz
description:
I, Paresa Menzel, a money-grubbing handmaiden to the infamous Empress. I thought she was the ultimate villainess, but she's nothing more than a prickly cat?! But then I realized that there was a lot more to her than meets the eyes, so I wanted to help her.
"If you are a spy disguised as a maid, I have no choice but to dispose of you."
But I never expected to be noticed by the crown prince. It's bad enough that my heart flutters every time I see the face of the most beautiful one in the empire...! I know I seem suspicious, but my loyalty to the Empress is genuine!
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Haeyeon

title: The Next Seat Devil Keeps Depraving Me
description: Mia is a half-succubus, but she bitterly hates the devil part of her genetics. "I'm not lewd!", she said. "All men are monkey", she said. Yet, karma often comes sooner than expected.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Office Workers, Drama, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Crystal Blitz

title: Kusunoki-san wa Koukou Debut ni Shippai shite Iru
alt_title: 楠木さんは高校デビューに失敗している, 楠木同学高中出道失败了, Kusunoki-san Failed to Debut in High School, She Is (Not) a Cool Girl (in High School), Kusunoki-san Failed Her High School Debut, Кусуноки-сан не смогла измениться к старшей школе
description: After his traumatic years in junior high school, the ultra-introvert Shizuki Keisuke decides to turn his life around, and gives himself a complete make-over for his high school "debut." His new high school life seems promising, as no one is aware of his hidden past...except for one person: Kusunoki Shizuka, who also changed herself in pursuit of a more successful high school life! As their fates intertwine, will Keisuke ultimately be able live a peaceful life in high school...?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mii Mitsuki

title: The Lady Needs a Break
alt_title: 쉬고 싶은 레이디, Swigo Sip-eun Lady, Swigo sip-eun leidi, The Lady Wants to Rest, Дама хочет отдохнуть, Леди хочет отдохнуть, La dama quiere descansar
description:
King, magician, musician, prosecutor, wealthy person, beggar, saintess, witch… She lived for a thousand years, many times over. Sometimes she was the noblest person in the world, sometimes she was the humblest. Among them, her 53rd life was one of the most wretched and painful of them all.

Once she reached her 54th life, she was worn out.

"Everything is so troublesome. I'd like to have some rest now."

This time, even though she had already made up her mind to live a life of a lazy sloth, no matter what it takes…

"Why do you keep bothering me… Sis, let's get some rest."

Her story of wanting to rest!  

---
It is my cursed destiny to be reborn endlessly. A king, an archmage, a slave, a saint, a witch... I've done it all in my thousand years of life, and frankly, I need a break! My goal now is simple: to live like an absolute sloth. Unfortunately, I am Rubia, the daughter of a grand duke with a demanding family and a fiancé to boot. To live my dream sloth life, I'm running away from it all... except no matter where I go, nobody will leave me be! I just want to nap, but being lazy is hard work!
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yuin

title: Asobinin wa Kenja ni Tenshoku Dekiru tte Shittemashita? ~ Yuusha Party o Tsuihou Sareta Lv 99
alt_title: Did You Know That a Playboy Can Change His Job to a Sage? ~The Level 99 Jester Expelled from the Heroes' Party Will Become a 'Great Sage'~, Знаете ли вы, что бездельник может стать мудрецом? — Шут 99-го уровня, исключенный из отряда героев, достиг звания «Великого мудреца», 遊び人は賢者に転職できるって知ってました？　～勇者パーティを追放されたLV99道化師、【大賢者】になる～, 광대는 현자로 전직할 수 있다는 걸 알고 계셨나요?, 知道遊人可以轉職成賢者嗎？ ～被勇者隊伍放逐的LV99道化師將會成為【大賢者 】～
description:
The Jester ―― More commonly known as the ‘Playboy’ Dylan, was fired from the party of the Heroes. The self-centred Heroes didn’t understand Dylan’s importance to the group.  
  
They were just a group of one-man teams. Not interested in cooperation at all. Any failures are blamed on the jester. Dylan, who was disgusted with such companions and was sick of playing as their comedic foil, happily accepted being kicked out.  
  
The Heroes didn’t know. After saving them many times over with his magic tricks, the level 99 jester can change his job title to that of a ‘Great Sage’.  
  
“Life, how about a rewrite?”  
  
He’s done being the clown. From here on out, he’s going to take the leading role.
genre: Action, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Senoo Shippo

title: Makyou Seikatsu: Gakeppuchi Boukensha ga Hikikomoru ni wa Hirosugiru
alt_title: Life in the Demon Land, 魔境生活 〜崖っぷち冒険者が引きこもるには広すぎる〜
description:
After being expelled from his family home, our main character tries his hand at becoming an adventurer, only to find out that things aren't quite as they seem. Determined to change his fate, and with the money he's saved up, he heads out to purchase a plot of land in the remote, unexplored wilderness, with the intent of forging his perfect new life. Little does he know, this expanse is infamous as the 'Demonic Realm,' a treacherous territory brimming with savage plants and creatures!

But navigating the daily trials of this life-threatening wilderness may prove be a challenge. In his journey of growth, an array of inhabitants, each driven by their motives, decide to follow him, bringing vibrancy back into his life. However, unseen powers resolute in preventing the Demonic Realm from being conquered begin to surface... Will he be able to endure, triumph, and make this land his new home?
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy
author: Hanabokuro

title: Boukyaku Battery
alt_title: 忘却バッテリー
description: Geniuses who made a name for themselves in middle school baseball but have been away from baseball accidentally come together at an obscure metropolitan high school. Haruka Kiyomine is a pitcher with an unbeatable arm. His partner, the shrewd catcher, Kei Kaname, is now an amateur due to amnesia!. And then there are the two of them. And those who were defeated and scattered by the two in the past… The story of their high school baseball game is about to begin again!
genre: Sports, Slice of Life
author: Mikawa Eko

title: Harapeko Oyako to Motokare Yanushi
alt_title: はらぺこ母娘と元カレ家主, A Hungry Mother and Daughter And Her Ex-Boyfriend Landlord
description: 36-year-old Takaharu lives alone. After graduating from Art College, he has been living a quiet life while painting pictures. One day, his ex-girlfriend Kyou, whom he broke up with 17 years ago, comes to him with her daughter Minori and asks him to let them stay at his place. As in their college days, Kyou is attracted by the delicious food, and so the three of them begin to live together.
genre: Romance, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Riori

alt_title: Over Drive Girls, 超可動ガールズ
description:
Translated from Amazon.com.jp using google translate.

The latest work in the "Super Movable Girl" series, in which a moving beautiful girl figure rushes in and becomes a wife. A romantic comedy in which tiny cute [super movable girls] such as the girl-type planet explorer Nona, the RPG hero Bernoa, and the 2D fighting game character Subaru are involved in the otaku boy Haruto. If there is love, what is the size difference!?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: OYSTER

title: Lady Baby
alt_title: Leidi Beibi, Леди-малышка, 重生为女婴, 레이디 베이비
description:
Young lady Calliope has suffered through nature's law and many accidents. Her family was decimated by ruin and an ongoing war, but upon listening to her melancholic singing upon the family's graveyard, a mysterious womanly figure tells her that she'll reward her for the beautiful song, and shrouds Calliope in darkness. Upon awakening, Calliope finds that she traveled back in time to when she was born! While Calliope slowly grows, will she be able to figure out who killed her family and stop them in time?  


---
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

title: CØDE:BREAKER
alt_title: Ｃ０ＤＥ：ＢＲＥＡＫＥＲ, コード：ブレイカー, Код: Крушитель, 法外制裁者, Code:Breaker
description: Sakurakouji Sakura is a girl who appears modest and graceful but in reality is skilled in martial arts. After witnessing a boy burning people with his blue flame, she is startled to see that the same boy is a transfer student, Oogami Rei. Oogami is a Code Breaker, one who "does not exist". He is a seemingly cold-blooded killer who follows the principle of "an eye for an eye", to "use evil against evil". Convinced that killing is not right, Sakurakouji sets out to stop him and penetrate his icy heart.
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Kamijyo Akimine

title: The Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle
alt_title: 겨울성의 아기 죄수님, Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle, La bebé prisionera del castillo de invierno
description:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

“We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.” 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.” 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing… 

“Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.” 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

It’s a new life in the North! 
But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: RYU HEON

title: Onii-chan Is Done For!
alt_title: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!, ONIMAI: I'm Now Your Sister!, Мой братик теперь не братик!, 别当欧尼酱了！, 不当哥哥了！
description:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga

title: The Alpha's Story
alt_title: 그 알파의 사정, The Alpha Agenda, La Agenda del Alfa
description:
Alpha Lim Jaehee has been in a relationship with Beta Lee Yeowoon since their senior year of high school, which has lasted for over two years. He believes that his love for Yeowoon is genuine and unaffected by pheromones. However, while he was returning back home from his date, Jaehee encounters an Omega on the bus who unexpectedly goes into a heat cycle. 

As a true Alpha of this time, Jaehee simply wanted to help the Omega...

"Hello, my name is Lim Jaehee. I'm an Alpha residing in this era, and to be frank, it is quite disheartening."
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Full Color

title: Fate/Grand Order -mortalis:stella-
alt_title: Судьба/Великий приказ: Смертоносная Стелла, Fate/Grand Order -mortalis:stella- 剎那星辰, Fate/Grand Order mortalis stella, フェイト／グランド オーダー－モルターリス：ステラ－
description: The official adaptation of the TYPE-MOON phenomenon that has become one of the most popular mobile games in the world! The year is 2016, and glitches found in humanity’s past threaten the sustainability of its future. The Chaldea Security Organization - tasked with preserving human history for as long and as strongly as possible - has developed a new method of time travel to repair these events, stabilizing humanity’s future. But when an unknown threat pushes mankind to the brink of extinction, young recruits Mash Kyrielight and Ritsuka Fujimaru find themselves at the helm of the rescue mission: Obtain the Holy Grail in a face off against fate itself …
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Loli, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Zombies, Samurai, Magical Girls, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

title: The Blond Yankee and The Punishment Game
alt_title: 金髪ヤンキーと罰ゲーム
description:
As part of her punishment game, the transfer student, Shindou Eruko, must talk to the coolest delinquent in the school, which turns out to be Hoshi Natsuki, the blonde delinquent in the class next door. However, she soon found out that Hoshi-kun might not be as scary as he looks...

This manga is Konogi Yoshiru's fantasy take on  [Shingeki no Eroko-san](https://mangadex.org/title/bdfc7777-f1ee-4131-82cb-2fb5861d32e1/shingeki-no-eroko-san-hen-na-oneesan-wa-danshikousei-to-nakayoku-naritai), depicting a setting with Eruko being in the same age as Hoshi-kun. It was later adapted in the main title as Eruko's dream sequence.

title: Robot Keiji
alt_title: Robot Detective, ロボット刑事, Robot Cop
description:
Robot detective "K" belongs to the newly established "Special Investigation Unit" of the Metropolitan Police Department.
He is a fighting machine with an expressionless mask, a blue-black steel body, and powerful weapons, but he is more gentle than a human being.
He teams up with Shiba, a stubborn old detective who hates mechs and despises "K," and daringly challenges the mysterious organization "R.R.K.K. (BAD)" to solve a number of mysterious cases!
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Mecha, Crime, Adventure, Drama, Police, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Ishinomori Shotaro

title: I Can See Your Death
alt_title: 너의 죽음이 보여, I See Your Death, Neoui Jugeumi Boyeo, He visto tu muerte
description:
After Eshana Arth got into an accident at a young age, she could see people’s life expectancy and cause of death.

What if a person she bumped into by chance was destined to die the next day?

It was Eshana Arth who had mainly decided to ignore such cases, but because destinies in black were ones that could be changed, she would save the village people from danger from time to time.

However, if they were destinies that couldn’t be changed, they would be seen in red.

Imperial Calendar Year 422, on the afternoon of a peaceful day.

A bloody man had collapsed on their front garden, and his destiny was one even more distinct than blood. 

[Year 427/Cause of death: Eshana Arth]

“I’m ‘Eshana Arth’.” 

The person who is the reason why—

You will die 5 years later.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dan Hae-neul (단해늘)

title: Urareta Henkyou Haku Reijou wa Ringoku no Outaishi ni Dekiai Sareru
alt_title: 売られた辺境伯令嬢は隣国の王太子に溺愛される, The Young Lady of a District Count Is Sold and Forced to Dote on the Crown Prince of the Neighbouring Country, The Young Lady of a District Count Is Sold and Forced to Dote on the Crown Prince of the Neighboring Country, 被卖掉的的边境伯爵大小姐却被邻国王太子所溺爱, 被賣掉的的邊境伯爵大小姐卻被鄰國王太子所溺愛
description:
"What a boring world this is."

A noble society where it is common sense for women to marry a nobleman from a good family and dote on their husband for the rest of their lives. Anna, the young daughter of the Harmich family, has grown tired of such a world. Rather than having fantasies of marriage, Anna, who is obsessed with the art of war, dreamt of appearing on the battlefield alongside her father. However, after being invaded by their neighbouring country, Albion, Anna's father departed for the battlefield for his last and final time. On top of that, the eldest son was taken as a war prisoner. In dire straits, the Harmich family decides to offer their second daughter, Anna, to the neighbouring country!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Ogura An

alt_title: ゴールデンマン
description: The city of freedom, Neo York, is targeted by villains day and night, but it's also home to the strongest hero, Golden Man!!! But one night, during a rescue operation at a fire at an abandoned factory, Golden Man suddenly disappears. Left in his place, a single amnesiac young man with the Golden Man suit in his hands… Who on Earth is he? A new original hero story by the strongest tag team of Petos of *Demi-chans Want To Tell* and Kouji Megumi of *ACMA:GAME* and *BLOODY MONDAY*!
genre: Action, Romance, Superhero, Mystery

title: Before the Real Heroine Steps In
alt_title: 진짜가 나타나기 전까지만, 脇役悪女なので愛さないでください, Until the Real One Shows Up, Until the Real Heroines Shows Up, Until the Real One Steps In, Hasta Que Aparezca La Autentica
description: Once bitten, twice shy. That is Anastasia's motto when she awakes with a second chance in life as the Empress in her favorite novel. After realizing that even true love cannot change destiny, Anastasia attempts to help her husband, the Emperor, find his happy ending with the female protagonist--the true heroine of the story. However, it seems that the Emperor has other thoughts. She pushes him away so they can both live, but the Emperor is unsure if he wants to live without his queen.
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Musouduki

title: Star Player Supporter
alt_title: 하드캐리 서포터, Hard Carry Support
description:
Lee Seohyun is the #1-ranked player in the long-forgotten game Asura Online. As he wonders why no one plays anymore, he stumbles upon the hottest new game, Asrian Online.

Based on the world of Asura, with similar maps and characters, becoming the best in Asrian should be a piece of cake. But after he picks his hidden class, he learns he has become a puny supporting character!

Though Seohyun has his sights set on becoming a star again, the only way to the top this time will be as a supporter!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Nelpi

title: Isekai kara Elf-san ga Ochite Kita no desu ga!?
alt_title: 異世界からエルフさんが落ちてきたのですが!?, A Different World Elf Fell From the Sky!?
description:
Akio, a compassionate and empathetic individual, comes to the aid of Mel, an enchanting elf who unexpectedly finds herself in another world while on her journey home. Initially, Mel sees Akio as her savior and offers to serve him, but instead, Akio decides to share his life with her for a while. This unexpected encounter profoundly alters Akio's life, which was previously fraught with challenges. And so begins an exciting romantic comedy as they embark on a thrilling journey of cohabitation with the beautiful elf!


----
**Notes:**
- It's a reverse isekai manga.
genre: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

title: The Beginning After the End
alt_title: TBATE, 三岁开始做王者, 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？, 끝이 아닌 시작, Начало после конца
description:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.

Torn between a childhood friend and her first love whom she has reunited with, Haeju finds herself unable to figure out her feelings. Her childhood friend, Eunseok, suggests they pretend to date to hide his own feelings and avoid Jay.

title: I Awoke as an Imprisoned Villainess
alt_title: 目が覚めたら投獄された悪女だった
description:
Sophia Alcott, the daughter of Earl Alcott, lives a lonely life as a maligned and infamous shut in, with nothing to do but to work on her skills as a budding apothecary in the dusty storeroom she's forced to call home. That is until she suddenly wakes up one day and finds herself in the body of an even more infamous villainess (one who actually earned her reputation) locked up in a tower. But although the only clue she has about how this happened is a cryptic note, instead of despairing about her new situation, she's in awe at just how luxurious the treatment she's receiving in this 'prison' is compared to how she had to live before.

Meanwhile, back at Earl Alcott's mansion, all hell is about to break loose. That's because...

title: Sasaki-san wa Chotto dake Sugoi
alt_title: 佐々木さんはちょっとだけすごい, Sasaki-san Is Just a Little Bit Amazing.
description: When I confessed my love to Sasaki-san... she's floating!? And only by 1 cm! From the novel posting site "monogatary.com," a mysterious youthful romantic comedy about Sasaki-san, who can use a little bit of amazing magic, and me! (From Comic-action)

title: Listen to My Voice!!
alt_title: 請聽我的聲音!!, 僕の声を聞いてほしい!!, Please Listen to My Voice!!, Услышь мой голос!!
description:
Ye QiaoWen, an older sister-childhood-neighbor of our protagonist whom he has always admired has just recently moved back.

But Deng XianHe, the protagonist, has just recently learned that she already has someone else in her heart — a fact that suffers Deng XianHe greatly.

Suddenly seeing his usually bright and capable older sister turn into someone who is always hesitant and confused, Deng XianHe chose to suppress his years-long feelings of love, anguish, and longing.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yang Jizheng

title: Bungou Stray Dogs
alt_title: 文豪ストレイドッグス, Великий из бродячих псов, 문호 스트레이 독스, Stray Dogs of the Literary Masters, 文豪野犬, Проза бродячих псов
description: Nakajima Atsushi was kicked out of his orphanage, and now he has no place to go and no food. While he is standing by a river, on the brink of starvation, he rescues a man whimsically attempting suicide. That man is Dazai Osamu, and he and his partner Kunikida are members of a very special detective agency. They have supernatural powers, and deal with cases that are too dangerous for the police or the military. They're tracking down a tiger that has appeared in the area recently, around the time Atsushi came to the area. The tiger seems to have a connection to Atsushi, and by the time the case is solved, it is clear that Atsushi's future will involve much more of Dazai and the rest of the detectives!
genre: Action, Crime, Mafia, Military, Drama, Vampires, Police, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Asagiri Kafka

alt_title: The strongest in history, Сильнейший в истории, 사상최강
description: The ‘Ten Masters’ had kept each other in check and maintained the balance of power and order of the world beyond human limits, until Baek Dohyun showed up with the strongest power ever!

alt_title: 怒りっぽいギャルをデートに誘ってみた, I Tried Asking a Hot-Tempered Gal Out on a Date
description: I asked an angry gal out on a date.

title: Ranker's Return
alt_title: 랭커의 귀환 (2021), Ranker's Return (Remake), ランカーの帰還, Возвращение ранкера, 榜上玩家的归还, Ranker's Return (2021)
description:
During the early years of the hottest MMORPG called Arena, the world’s top ranker Meleegod vanished after setting every possible record in the virtual world.

In the real world, this deathly melee damage dealer was the happy-go-lucky Kang Hyeonu, who simply deleted his character and quit his hobby to finish mandatory military service and inherit his father’s company.

This rosy future dissolves within two years when a business rival makes his father go bankrupt. Hyeonu struggles to make ends meet with a string of part-time jobs, but his best friend has a better idea. He urges Hyeonu to conquer the Arena once again and earn a cushy living as a gaming celebrity.

Vowing to strike it rich and avenge his father, the former Meleegod returns to the Arena as a newbie. Only this time, he’s out for blood!

---

title: Konjiki no Word Master - Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat
alt_title: Golden Wordmaster, The Golden Word Master - The Four Heroes and the Innocent Bystander with the Unique Cheat, Мастер золотых слов: Четыре героя и Наблюдатель с Уникальным читом, 金色の文字使い-勇者四人に巻き込まれたユニークチート-, 금색의 문자술사: 워드 마스터 유니크 치트, 금색의 문자술사, 金色的文字使
description:
In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination, the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students, with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal, will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea.  
  
However, this isn't their story.  
  
Out of the five students, four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura, an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin, seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them, and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure.  
  
Soon, Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more, he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books, level up, and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon, Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Tomoto Sui

title: Collapsing Future
alt_title: Folding the Future, 折叠未来
description:
Lu Renjia, an intern teacher, joins Onion Academy.

On the day of her employment, her childhood friend and elder brother, Wu Qi, suddenly goes missing.

While searching for Wu Qi, she gradually discovers another soul residing in her body...

Who are they? And who am I? As she unravels the mystery of herself, she is fortunate to have companions from the academy fighting alongside her, confronting conspiracies, and revealing cruel hidden truths.
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: 洋葱学园

title: Helmut
alt_title: Helmut (Kim Nan Sae), Helmut (Honyo), 헬무트, Helmut: The Forsaken Child, Helmut: El Niño Abandonado
description:
Helmut was a child who had been abandoned in the Demonic Beast Forest at birth.
Raised by Demonic Beasts, the first human that he met was the Sword Saint Darien.
Little did Helmut know that the chance encounter would soon shake the foundation of his fate…

“Grow stronger If you want to get out of here.”

The boy who’d lived like a beast was thrown into the human world!
He possessed overwhelming swordsmanship, outstanding looks and sharp intelligence, but there was one thing he lacked: humanity.

I am no longer a prey. I am now a predator!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kim Nan-Sae

title: Alkaloid no Hanayome
alt_title: アルカロイドの花嫁, Alkaloid Bride
description: Romelia, a lonely girl, and Kutli, a young high-ranking soldier, are solemnly married in the presence of God. What they share, however, is not "conjugal love," but the "unbearable fate" they have mutually borne.
genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy
author: Oikawa Nijimi

title: I Am the Fated Villain
alt_title: Villain Is Here, 我！天命大反派, Me, the Heavenly Destined Villain, The Villain Of Destiny, My Fate As a Villain, Моя судьба злодея
description:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: 天命反派

title: Sohee Stealing
alt_title: 소희 훔치기
description:
Are you saying you're going to steal me because you're such a bastard?
Kim Ye-seul, who transfers to a new school, is admired by Iljin Jin So-hee from the first day. But Ye-seul doesn’t care about this. Rather, she takes off her thick glasses and puts on heavy makeup, revealing a face that looks just like So-hee. Ye-seul provokes So-hee. She begins to ‘take her place’.
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 2L (이리터)

title: Kikaku Hazure no Eiyuu ni Sodate Rareta, Joushiki Hazure no Mahou Kenshi
alt_title: 規格外れの英雄に育てられた、常識外れの魔法剣士, An Out of the Ordinary Magic Swordsman Brought up by a Nonstandard Hero
description: A young man who died in an accident while protecting a girl reincarnated in another world and was picked up by an old man. However, the old man wasn't just a person. Far from being just anybody, he was a "hero" who didn't understand common sense at all !! This is the story of a reincarnated person, Rain, who, fortunately or unfortunately, was raised by an unscrupulous hero and has acquired tremendous power. --Soon the boy grows up and makes a harem !?
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kt60

title: Gachi Koi Maou-sama
alt_title: ガチ恋魔王様, Горячая любовь владыки демонов
description: A hero undertakes the task of defeating the Demon Lord for the sake of world peace. When he arrives at the Demon Lord's castle, he is greeted by the Demon Lord with a marriage certificate in her hand! The hero is bewildered by the Demon Lord's strong appeal to marry him, but...? A love comedy about a die-hard-fan Demon Lord and an overly prickly hero whose world is in danger of extinction!
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Moriya Haru

title: Lord El-Melloi II-sei no Jikenbo
alt_title: Lord El-Melloi II Case Files, ロード・エルメロイⅡ世の事件簿, Досье лорда Эль-Меллоя II
description:
When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.  
  
Based on the light novel of the same name.
genre: Historical, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Sanda Makoto

title: Bad Girl
alt_title: ばっどがーる
description:
The daily life of a (self-proclaimed) high school delinquent, fangirling and kohyuuing over the head prefect!?
(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)
Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. 
But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?
A totally not "bad" delinquent girl's 4-koma school life manga!
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Nikumaru

alt_title: メメント・イン九龍
description: A supernatural action jiangshi oneshot from Reiya Machida!
genre: Oneshot, Thriller, Action, Gore, Horror
author: Reiya Machida

title: Mizuno Shinobu no Risou no Renai
alt_title: 水野忍の理想の恋愛
description: Mizuno is a thirty-something office worker who is not good at real love and loves shojo manga. While he is tormented by regret after spending the night with Meguro, a subordinate he has a crush on, under the influence of alcohol, Meguro casually proposes to them that they go out together...!?
genre: Comedy, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Suzaka Shina

title: My Second Life Is a Healing Life?
alt_title: 두 번째 삶은 힐링라이프?, The Second Life Is a Healing Life?, Перерождение в поиске исцеления
description: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Long Strip, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Tangto

title: Raising the Princess After Her Death
alt_title: A Princess Is Raised After Death, Desperately Making Her a Princess, The Princess Is Raised After She Dies, 正規エンディングまで異世界ループ転生, 공주는 죽어서 키운다, Raising the Princess to Overcome Death
description:
Long-term public service exam candidate Minseo finds himself trapped in the game, "Raising Lena", as he tries to escape his grim reality. 

In the game, Minseo becomes a character named Leo, and he must navigate through a world with three different scenarios to accomplish his mission of turning the game's protagonist, Lena, into a princess. However, "Raising Lena" boasts an overwhelming level of difficulty due to enemies who are set to thwart Minseo with their immense power and influence.

Will Minseo be able to complete the game by making Lena a princess and return to reality?
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Gupanyi

title: The Young Lord of House Finlanz
alt_title: フィンランツ家の幼い領主
description:
My name is Lizbeth, and I am a 7-year-old who will use the knowledge from my previous life to develop my territory!

Lizbeth was born as the daughter of Margrave Finlanz. She was married off in a political marriage to Crown Prince Reinhardt as his 10th concubine. To distract herself from her loneliness, she exchanged letters with friends from other countries. However, she was falsely accused of a crime and imprisoned in an underground prison.

With no one listening to her pleas, she drew her last breath alone, but...
"I've returned to the past---?"
When she came to, she found herself in her warm bed, back to being her happy 7-year-old self!

The remote territory lady's coming-of-age fantasy starts with a loop!
Hip Hip Hooray~!
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Punichan

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - Moscow Calling (Doujinshi)
alt_title: JJBA: Moscow Calling, Moscow Calling
description:
Moscow Calling takes place in Russia in 2000. This story is about Georgiy Lastochkin, an 18-year old Russian student with mysterious stand. Living in Vladivostok, he studies at a local university, and happens to have a crush on one of his classmates. On one end he has to deal with his everyday life as a student - on the other, he needs to deal with the mysteries of his Stand.  
  
One day he begins travelling throughout Russia, all the way from Vladivostok to Moscow! There are sure to be faithful friends and clever enemies, comedy and drama, and of course - Stand battles. Learn what it means to be a Russian Stand user in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Moscow Calling!  
  
Italian summary:  
||Moscow Calling è ambientato nella Russia del 2000. Il protagonista di questa storia è Georgiy Lastochkin, uno studente diciottenne russo con uno stand misterioso. Visto che vive a Vladivostok, studia all'università locale, e si prende una cotta per una delle sue compagne di corso. Da una parte deve affrontare la sua vita da studente - dall'altra, deve avere a che fare con i misteri del suo stand.  
  
Un giorno inizia a viaggiare per tutta la Russia, da Vladivostok a Mosca! Incontrerà dei fedeli amici e dei nemici intelligenti, una drammatica commedia, e ovviamente - battaglie con stand. Impara cosa significa essere un portatore di stand russo in Le bizzarre avventure di Jojo: la chiamata di Mosca!||
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Viktor Akusov

title: Gatabutata
alt_title: Get to the point instead of beating around the bush, 가타부타타, 恋愛エトセトラ, 再次遇见你, Rumor has it
description:
Just when Chu Hyejin, a freshman in college, is about to start her independent college life, she encounters a crisis. Her first love, Cha Haejun lives right next to her?! And on top of that, she is the one who dumped him when they dated in middle-school!  
  
A 15-year old's clumsy and awkward first love soon came to an end but will things be different this time when they're 20?  
  
(Note: Gatabutata is a Korean saying that means "Get to the point instead of beating around the bush".)

---

title: A Game That “Lets People Undo Moments They Regret”
alt_title: 「後悔をやり直せる」ゲーム, 後悔をやり直せるゲーム

title: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta
alt_title: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった, I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class
description:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn’t make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl.

Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her ‘The class’ second cutest girl’ behind her back.

On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, ‘the cutest girl in class’ invitation just to hang out in my house with me.

Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Takata

title: Aisaseteyo Sensei
alt_title: Let Me Love You, Sensei, 愛させてよ 先生
description:
"I can’t just pretend like it’s nothing. I’ve fallen in love with you, Sensei." University Professor, Hatano Hotaru made a mistake last night- He slept with a student, a straight one at that. “In the end he’ll get tired of me. I don’t want to fall in love with a straight guy.” Or so he thought, but this younger boy won’t let him go…?
A BL about sweet, cute, and passionate love!
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kameno

title: Loving Summer Sky
alt_title: 사랑하는 여름 하늘, Salanghaneun Yeoleum Haneul, Dear Summer Sky
description: Baek Gihu, who loves the sky more than people, takes pictures of the sky with his camera. One summer day, a girl named "Haneul"—her name means "Sky"—transfers to his class and sits in the seat next to him.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Sojang

title: I Wanna Spoil Yoroizuka-san!
alt_title: 鎧塚さんをバブらせたい
description: Kurumi is a shy and easily embarrassed high school girl with a strong imagination. Her girlfriend is a cool, iron-faced office worker, Ms. Yoroizuka, who doesn't show much emotion. In order to get the older woman to indulge in her, Kurumi tries all sorts of things to spoil Ms. Yoroizuka, but...?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love
author: Aoto Hibiki

title: Dainana Maouji Zilbagias no Maou Keikokuki
alt_title: 第七魔王子ジルバギアスの魔王傾国記, Zilbagias the Demon Prince: How the Seventh Prince Brought Down the Kingdom, Seventh Demon Prince Jilbagias' Chronicle of Overthrowing the Demon Kingdom, 7th Demon Prince Jilbagias, the Demon Kingdom Destroyer
description:
The hero Alexander and his comrades unleash a daring raid on the Demon King’s castle, intent on assassinating him and bringing an end to the war against the darkness in one fell swoop. However, the raid goes awry when his party is effortlessly decimated by the Demon King’s overwhelming power.

But death is not the end of the road for Alexander, as he is reincarnated two years later as that very same Demon King’s son. With the memories of his past life still intact, he vows to use his miraculous second chance to continue fighting—this time destroying the demonic kingdom from within as the Demon Prince Zilbagias.

It doesn’t take long for his mettle to be tested either, as passing as a young demon prince without blowing his cover proves to be quite a bit more challenging than he initially anticipated.

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/zilbagias-the-demon-prince-how-the-seventh-prince-brought-down-the-kingdom)

title: Harukanaru Ring
alt_title: 遥かなるリング, 格闘少女伝説遥かなるリング
description:
(from [wikipedia.ja](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%81%99%E3%81%8B%E3%81%AA%E3%82%8B%E3%83%AA%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0)):

Yu Takamine was fascinated by the female pro-wrestlers she saw as a child, and overcoming her parents' opposition, she auditioned for and passed the Tokyo Women's Pro Wrestling Association Match to become a pro-wrestler. 

However, this was only the first step to becoming a wrestler. 

This is the story of Yu, an amateur wrestler who is not particularly strong, and her growth as an apprentice, rookie, heel, idol, and senior wrestler as she explores various fighting styles.

title: Rebirth 1998
description: Li Xiulai fell back into poverty in middle age and was tragically killed by a crane during a demolition. However, he was fortunate enough to be reborn in 1998

author: 桔子很橘

title: Duel Masters LOST: Crystal of Remembrance
alt_title: Duel Masters LOST ～追憶の水晶～
description: A new “Duel Masters” story begins! Kirifuda Win, who has lost all memories of his past, is now living alone in Tokyo. In the midst of his ordinary daily life, the footsteps of the world’s end gradually begin to draw near. The secret of Win’s hidden past is…?
genre: Traditional Games, Action, Demons, Gore, Drama, Horror, Web Comic
author: Shigenobu Matsumoto

title: Mercenary Enrollment
alt_title: 입학용병, Ipagyongbyeong, Teenage Mercenary, 入学傭兵, 少年佣兵, 入學傭兵
description:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Adventure, Military, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color
author: YC

title: Dragon Ball - Episode of Bardock
alt_title: ドラゴンボール エピソード オフ バーダック
description: Dragon Ball: Episode of Bardock is a three chapter manga created by Ooishi Naho and based on the video game Dragon Ball Heroes. It features a spin-off scenario taking place after the events of the TV special Dragon Ball Z: Bardock - The Father of Goku, in which Bardock survives after his confrontation against Frieza and turns into a Super Saiyan.

title: I Am the Shadow Reverend
alt_title: 全民转职：我牧师，都什么阴间技能
description:
Traveling through a parallel world, the game merges with the real world, where ferocious beasts are rampant, alien races are raging, and there are a large number of dungeons and secret realms in the wild.
Humans can awaken into various professions and work hard to kill monsters and upgrade.
On the day of his profession awakening, Lin Luo awakened the priest profession, which is the most popular but has no damage ability.
Just when he was struggling, he discovered that his skills had mutated!
The blood recovery technique mutates into the bleeding technique?
Blessing mutates into curse?
But I am really a healing priest!

alt_title: 악녀교실, Evil Girl Classroom
description:
Heo Jeong-woo, a high school student who is bullied by a girl in his class for his weakness.
 
Han Bo-ra, a transfer student, comes to Jeong-woo's class, where he was spending his miserable days.

Jeong-woo feels a strong sense of déjà vu when he sees the child with straight black hair and stains on his legs. Sure enough, Han Bo-ra, who has subdued the arguing classmates, asks them.

"'Have you ever seen a child similar to me?

Jeong-woo decides to approach Bo-ra, who might be able to correct what is wrong...

title: Iron Ladies
alt_title: Metal Goddess Soldier, Tie Ji Gang Bing, Железные леди, 铁姬钢兵, Angels of War, Battle Angels
description:
**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.

title: Little Mushroom
alt_title: 小蘑菇
description:
“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jinjiang Literature City (晋江文学城)

title: Screw the Noble Life, I’m Going Home
alt_title: 공녀고 나발이고 집에 간다고, Noble Lady or Whatever, I'm Going Home, Dama noble o lo que sea, yo me voy a casa
description:
After confirming that I had won the lottery, I tried to quit my job! However, as soon as I opened the door, I found myself transmigrated into the body of a noble lady. I have one year to claim the prize money, so I have to return home at all costs. Please wait for me, my 1.7 million won! Mum will be there soon, but... What's wrong with this family?!

"I love you." But I'm not your daughter!

"Sister, you might get hurt so I'll hold you." Did he mean he would lift me? What is this guy, a giant brown bear?

"If you mess with our sister one more time, I'll make you disappear without a trace." He's got a pretty face, but he has a sharp tongue.

"Don't fall ill." Don't worry about me. Why are there so many of them?! I'm not a noble lady! Leave me alone, I wanna go home!
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

One day, Misuzu finds Kitahara, an honor student in a special class, getting involved with some delinquents and helps him out. Kitahara then tries to get involved with Misuzu. Misuzu tries to push him away, saying, "If you get involved with me, the people around you will leave you," but his feelings are wavering...?

title: Silver Plan to Redo From JK
alt_title: JKからやり直すシルバープラン, Spoiled and Retired
description:
Her grandfather is a politician, and her father is a real estate owner.  
Ninomiya Sayuri is an arrogant young lady whose power and wealth peaked during the 90's bubble period.  
However, it all came down together with the collapse of the bubble. Now aged 46, she's a homeless person eking out a living.  
  
One day, a group of delinquents attacked her while eating scraps at a public park and knocked her unconscious.  
Just when Sayuri thought she had died while clinging to her past happiness, she somehow time leaped almost 30 years before to the days of her high school period…!?  
  
To save her family from the tragic future that awaits them and gaining hold of true happiness by not relying on money, she comes up with a "Silver Plan" by putting all her effort to make friends, save money, be healthy and more. Sayuri's second life begins now!
genre: Time Travel, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

Yanagi, a second-year high school student, has a faint crush on Mizuki, the younger sister of her childhood friend Momo.

This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!

Shocked, Efinia overhears the emperor's heartless words, "It's outrageous that someone who looks like a child is my mate." In that case, fine! I don't desire the love of an arrogant emperor! Undeterred by the harassment from other concubines, Efinia thoroughly enjoys her life in the harem. She eventually befriends a small dragon that wanders into the harem, but it seems this dragon has a secret...

That older brother has beautiful peachy eyes and casually calls her a "kid". That spark of surprise when they first met made Sang Zhi want to slowly get closer to him, but the 7-year age difference felt like an insurmountable gap that she couldn't cross over. Not knowing when it started, the crush buried at the bottom of her heart sprouted, and slowly, it spread into his heart too...

Tsukushi always thought they would be normal childhood friends forever… That is until Tsukushi saw Hinoka rejected her confession in a dream. The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.

title: Rise From the Rubble
alt_title: 从末世崛起, Cong Moshi Jueqi
description:
Eight years ago, Zuo Fan's Warrior father was arrested for deserting his post when a huge monster tide swept through S City. Zuo Fan is determined to clear his father's name and save him from his death sentence, but that's easier said than done when he's a low-level Warrior hated for being a traitor's son.

However, things take a surprising turn when he's betrayed by his party and left to die in a monster lair. Thanks to the sudden activation of a mysterious warrior system, Zuo Fan's lethal wounds are healed and his fighting skills are boosted. Not long after he escapes danger, he also learns that the truth behind what happened at S City is hidden within a dangerous restricted area teeming with high-level monsters.

It's up to Zuo Fan to tango with fish lizards and level up so he can get to the bottom of the truth once and for all!

description: Kurokawa Lisa is an ordinary office worker, who has practiced lots of cooking while living alone. One day, she wakes up in another world, with a concerned little spirit hovering over her! She has apparently been transported to a magical, spirit-filled realm by the will of the goddess, and there is no known way for her to go back. She is taken in by a wealthy couple, and they and her new spirit helper treat her with nothing but kindness. There is one problem, however–the food in this magical world is gross! Lisa insists on helping the household cooking staff prepare a traditional meal from her world, and it is a big hit with her hosts. Soon Lisa knows what she should do in this new world; she should open a café and treat everyone to delicious food!

The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.
