title: Ochikobore Kenshi, Tsuihousareta no de Majutsushi ni Tenkou suru - Kenshi no Toki wa Gomi Skill datta "Zettai Kioku" wa Majutsushi ni Totte wa Kami Skill deshita
alt_title: 落ちこぼれ剣士、追放されたので魔術師に転向する ～剣士のときはゴミスキルだった『絶対記憶』は魔術師にとっては神スキルでした～, The Exiled Failed Swordsman Becomes a Sorcerer ~ [Absolute Memory], Which Was a Garbage Skill for a Swordsman, Is a God Skill for a Sorcerer!
description:
In a world where swordsmanship and magic clash, Durandal is born into one of the world’s most prestigious swordsman families. However, his innate skill is [Absolute Memory].

A skill that allows him to never forget anything he has seen or heard, but it was completely useless in swordsmanship where power is everything. Eventually, the banished Durandal encounters ‘magic’, and starts to change the life he had once given up on!!
genre: Action, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Satou Kenyou

title: Love Letter Lyrics
alt_title: 러브 레터 리릭스
description:
Novice lyricist Baek Jiseok enters A&R Co. through a recommendation from his college senior and is assigned to compose the lyrics of a new song for renowned singer Cha Doyoon. However, his lyrics are stolen, and he finds himself on the brink of a lawsuit. 
The person who extends a helping hand in this situation to the desperate Jiseok is none other than Cha Doyoon?!
"Why are you helping me?"
Will Jiseok be able to pen his lyrics successfully even as he cohabitates with the unfathomable Doyoon?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Mpuu

title: Minamoto-kun Monogatari
alt_title: La historia de Minamoto, История Минамото-куна, Minamoto's Story, 源君物語, 미나모토군 이야기, Minamoto-kun's Story
description: Minamoto-kun has a face pretty enough to make people think he's a girl. Because of his face, he was bullied by the girls in middle school who were jealous of his face. He developed a fear of women due to the trauma and ended up attending a high school for boys. Just as he enters college and makes a promise to himself to overcome the trauma of his past, his father remarries and asks him to move out of the house. His father arranges him to live with his aunt (Minamoto-kun's father's younger sister) for the time being. She is an extremely beautiful woman who is also a non-tenured professor at his college. When he arrives at her apartment, she shows him her breasts and tells him that he will be her "guinea pig" in her reverse Hikaru Genji project.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Inaba Minori

title: RaW Hero
alt_title: Герой RaW, ロウヒーロー
description:
The unemployed Chiaki is the eldest of three brothers.  
With no parents, he starts job hunting to support his two younger brothers.  
Chiaki witnesses a young woman being sexually assaulted and tries to help, 
without knowing that this behavior would change his destiny.  


---
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Superhero, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Drama, Police, Supernatural
author: Hiramoto Akira

title: Origin
alt_title: Орижин, オリジン
description: The year is AD 2048. Japan is connected to the Eurasian continent by a transcontinental railroad. The capital, Tokyo, has become a crucible of criminals and terrorists. And so, in the metropolitan darkness a mysterious presence attacks and slaughters people, unnoticed, night after night… Just what are these "things that are not human" living in hiding in the human world? And just who is this "Origin" person who faces them?
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Action, Drama, Fantasy
author: Boichi

title: Nezumi no Hatsukoi
alt_title: ねずみの初恋, Nezumi's First Love
description:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
genre: Romance, Crime, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama
author: Oseto Riku

title: Shikanoko Nokonoko Koshitantan
alt_title: しかのこのこのここしたんたん, My Deer Friend Nokotan, Моя подруга-олениха, Нокотан
description:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
genre: Comedy, School Life
author: Oshioshio

title: Apocalypse no Toride
alt_title: Fort of Apocalypse, Крепость Апокалипсиса, アポカリプスの砦, 默示录之城, 默示錄之城, 아포칼립스의 요새
description:
What can you do when you're mistakenly accused for murder? Nothing. You just go to prison. Lucky you; your inmates are some of the biggest cutthroats in the prison. Seriously, you are lucky. Especially when zombies attack.  
  
  
 [Official Thai](https://www.vibulkijshop.com/category/103/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%99-action/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%AA%E0%B9%8C-%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81)   
 [Official Korean](http://book.interpark.com/amway/product/BookDisplay.do?_method=detail&sc.shopNo=0000400000&sc.prdNo=255646966)
genre: Action, Psychological, Survival, Zombies, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Kuraishi Yuu

title: Bad Proposal
alt_title: 나쁜 제안, Bad Suggestion, A Bad Proposal, Una Mala Propuesta
description:
"...How did you know?"

"I didn't think I'd ever find you and leave you alone until now."

Hee-soo was working at a cafe by day and a bar by night, drowning in her uncle's debt. Then, Seok-hyun, her boyfriend of seven years, shows up in front of her.
Hee-soo is always in need of money, and Seok-hyun makes her an offer she can't refuse.

"That money, I'll probably never be able to pay you back."

"So. You'll give me your body to make up for it?"

"If that's okay with you."

The moment I held his hand, even though I knew I couldn't. Seven years of bad blood was about to repeat itself.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Full Color
author: Hwang Han-young

title: Midnight Training Hour
alt_title: ミッドナイト・トレーニング・アワー
description: Mao is a new host struggling to climb the ranks. Confident in his looks, he still finds himself frustrated by the lack of requests. His complaints are overheard by Kanamori Hiyori, a staff member from another club, who sharply criticizes him. Indignant, Mao is taken aback when his boss reveals that Kanamori was once the top host and insists Mao take "special lessons" from him. Reluctantly, Mao agrees and starts to find a sense of accomplishment with each lesson. Gradually, he also becomes intrigued by Kanamori himself. Just as things start to improve, the man responsible for Kanamori quitting reappears...

description: In the Kingdom of Strandeon, one man from each noble family is required to serve in the Order of the Royal Vine, and Aristité is chosen to fulfill this duty for House Theseus. One day, while the order is carrying out a mission, a witch places a curse on Aristité, saying that he’ll lose something important. Everyone in the order thinks that this curse is what transforms Aristité into a woman, but little do they know that Aristité, whose real name is Ariel, was a woman from the start. All the curse did was take away her special medicine that changes her voice. With the help of her friends and cousin, Ariel struggles to protect her secret, but someone in the order seems determined to expose her and land her in trouble...

description:
Hildea Hillington, the daughter of duke Hillington, always knew that she was a mere supporting role in the story. She also knew that her destiny was to watch her younger sister, Roserielle, get married to young and ambitious duke Gabriel Velkius.

description:
I reincarnated in a novel, where my favorite character is living and breathing, into the Empire's princess who's called by various names, Agnes Saint!

I like that I'm a wealthy noblewoman of the Imperial family, but...
The problem is, the detestable trash who defiled my favorite character is 'me'!

Still, as things have already turned out this way...
By all means, no matter what, I will prevent my fav character's death and lay a flowery path before him!

I never want to startle Kylo, my little kitten.
That's why I have to hide my heartbroken feelings.

Besides, nothing good will come from revealing my fangirling. Thus, starting from now, I will perfectly...

Pretend not to be a fan!

title: The Baengri Clan's Unwanted Granddaughter
alt_title: 무림세가 천대받는 손녀딸이 되었다, Murimsega Cheondaebanneun Sonnyeo Ttari Doeeotda, I Became the Despised Granddaughter of the Powerful Martial Arts Family, I Became the Despised Granddaughter of the Powerful Murim Family, I Became the Despised Granddaughter of the Murim Family, I Became the Despised Granddaughter of the Murim Clan, Презираемая внучка великого рода эпохи Мурим, 名門一族の嫌われ娘になりました, 成了武林世家受歧视的孙女
description:
Yeon was just an orphan on the streets when a man claiming to be her father brought her to his family home. But the Baengri estate was a den of vipers that swallowed her whole, and it's only when she's standing at the funeral of the father she never truly understood that she realizes how familiar this story is. When she wakes up six years old again, Yeon knows she can't waste her second chance. This time, she's going to save her father. This time, she's going to live without regrets.

---
Here, inside this martial arts novel, there is a true teacher who teaches the arrogant male lead and awakens him through death. Handsome, good-natured, righteous, strong, and… Anyway, there was one big flaw in the male lead's damn fine teacher. It was his foolish only daughter who was filled with greed. A tenacious villainous extra, who always comes back to haunt the male lead in every way, but cannot be abandoned because she is his teacher's daughter. Throughout reading the novel, I cursed at that daughter. Saying that if it were me, I wouldn't live like that.

'But that didn't mean that I wanted to be her!'

What was worse, Father has already died, and my reputation was the worst. Inevitably, I ran away, but… I died. However, when I opened my eyes, Father was alive?!

'If so, in this life, I will definitely save Father!'

However…

"To think they’re aiming for my granddaughter?! I'll kill them all!"

Why do I see Grandfather, who doesn't even appear many times throughout the novel, so often like this?

"Marriage? No. Yeonie said that she would live by my side for the rest of her life."

Even Father, somehow became weird. Moreover:

"Why do you keep avoiding me? Is this also my mistake?"

Isn't the main character suddenly becoming obsessed with me?

"Originally, I was destined to die. Until you came here."

I saved the time-limited bastard, but isn’t it that no good deed goes unpunished?

"At least when I'm in front of you… I don't think I’m trash."

The villain who blew off my neck is suddenly trying to repent.

Is it really okay if it's like this?

---

To those who brought me to my death, I will give back all that I have received.

---
When Letitia Winchester faces death at the hands of her husband’s mistress, fate intervenes. She’s fished out of the river by Prince Sion, the first “Sol” born in a holy empire in 300 years. Using his divine powers, he changes Letitia’s appearance and gives her the new identity of Countess Anarose Victoire. Armed with divine powers and a thirst for revenge, the two form an unlikely alliance. Prince Sion seeks justice for a fallen friend, while Letitia plots retribution against those who wronged her.

Together, they embark on a journey of vengeance and redemption.

description:
Clear all the dungeons! There are 666 of them and 10 years to do it. If not, the only thing that awaits...is total annihilation. As countries begin taking measures in response to the dungeons appearing all over the world, Ezoe seeks out companions together with whom he establishes Dungeon Busters Inc., a company dedicated to clearing all the dungeons in the world! The curtains rise on this dungeon-delving epic with overwhelming realism!

On the other hand, Geon-jun, who has been with his girlfriend for 100 days, meets her with half worry and anticipation, but breaks up for the same reason.
Feeling sorry for his situation, Geon-jun has a drunken one-night stand, and is sober from the unfamiliar pain he feels for the first time.

title: Who Stole the Empress?
alt_title: 황후를 훔친 이는 누구인가, Hwanghureul Humchin Ineun Nuguinga, 是誰偷走了皇后, 是谁劫走了皇后, ¿Quien se robó a la emperatriz?
description:
"All my people are dead... I just wanted to try my best. I just wanted to be a kind Empress. Why..."

Her injuries made her look so worn out… After torturing her for days and killing everyone she ever loved, the Emperor abandoned the Empress in the snowy mountains. In this heavy snowfall, the former Empress Roselyn had resigned herself and was ready to accept death. Her family, her friends, all her hard work for the people of the empire... There was no reason left for her to continue living. So she laid down on this pure white blanket, her body almost frozen, and watched the white snow be dyed in black. At first, the cold was painful, but the pain quickly subsided and so she thought that freezing to death just might not be all that bad.

“Being persecuted to death, lying alone as if you're ruling this snowy field...”

That man.

“If you don't need your life anymore... then pardon me, I’ll take it.”

He's the enemy general, Tamon Krasis.

“You’re mine now, Empress.”

She was abandoned by them, but he stole her and took her away. Who kidnapped the Empress?

description:
I've reincarnated as Firentia Lombardy, the illegitimate daughter of the wealthiest and most influential family in the Empire. I thought I was all set to have a comfortable and luxurious life… but it wasn't long before my beloved father died, my relatives kicked me out, and our family went bankrupt!!

To add insult to injury, I was hit by a carriage one day when I drank (a bit too much) booze to drown my sorrows… but my despair was only temporary. When I opened my eyes, I found that I'd traveled back in time to when I was 7 years old!

I was surprised to see my father again in the flesh. But as if that wasn't already shocking enough, the 2nd prince, our family's once sworn enemy, was now following me around like a dog!

Now that I've been given a second chance at life, I'll take things into my own hands and claim both the 2nd prince and my family for myself!

Instead, just stay with me for one night.” “Only once.” And, the promised night.. she has arrived Will the devotees be able to set a strong country? Maybe it's the huge design of the devotees who want to realize the rule of law, such as the effect of one night? Can I catch the strongest country, the '10-year unrequited girl' I want to be a devotee rather than courtship, and the 'strongest tsundere man'?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Onlyon

title: I Shall Kill That Sweet Devil
alt_title: 다정한 개새끼의 목을 비틀겠습니다, 拧断那个温柔家伙的脖颈, I'm Going to Twist His Neck, I'll Twist the Neck of a Sweet Dog, I Will Twist the Neck of a Friendly Little Bastard, Torceré el cuello de un perro amistoso
description:
Chloe Garnache is an alluring trap for the emperor. 

After living a life full of abuse at the hands of her family, Chloe is finally freed from her torture by the grand duke, Kairos Ludwig. 

However, her days of getting taken advantage of are far from over. The only reason Kairos took her in is because of her beauty, which he plans to use in order to lure and kill the emperor. Chloe willingly follows Kairos’ orders, having fallen for his kind and gentle gestures. Unfortunately, her feelings are never returned, and she is met with a pitiful death once her task is fulfilled. 

But just when things seem to be over, Chloe awakens to find herself back before her life came spiraling down. And this time, she won’t be swayed by the sweet words of the devilish grand duke…
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Y230

title: Baby Empress
alt_title: 아기 황후님, Our Little Empress, 幼い皇后様, ¡Emperatriz bebé!
description:
The child of a prophecy is born to save the world.
"I need to get married to save people...? I'll do the marriage!"
The emperor is a young and innocent boy. But...
"I can't give you my daughter! She will not be becoming empress."
My father interfered with my marriage!
"Is my sister just a toy to you?"
And my brother too!
Will I be able to save the world?

---

title: Koko wa Ore ni Makasete Saki ni Ike to Itte kara 10-nen ga Tattara Densetsu ni Natte Ita.
alt_title: I Became a Legend After My 10 Year-Long Last Stand, 여기는 나한테 맡기고 먼저 가라고 말하고 10년이 지나 전설이 되었다, I Became a Legend a Decade Later After Telling my Comrades to Leave Everything to Me and Retreat First, ここは俺に任せて先に行けと言ってから10年がたったら伝説になっていた。
description:
“I guess I thought if I ever made it back here, we could go on adventures, just like we used to. But it's been ten years. We've all changed, in more ways than one. From this moment on, this is the first step in the life of rookie adventurer Lock!”

With no other options, Luck makes the choice to hold the line against the unending demonic hordes alone, to make sure his comrades can escape with their lives. However, through a combination of fortune, skill, and ingenuity, he holds that line for ten straight years, eventually coming out on top single-handedly. Now he has to tackle the dilemma of how to occupy himself in a world where he holds a myriad of roles: that of a legend, that of a veteran, and that of a brand new face.
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation

title: Gokusen
alt_title: The Yakuza Teacher, ごくせん, 極道先生, Гокусэн
description:
Fresh out of college, Kumiko "Yankumi" Yamaguchi becomes a math teacher at an all-boys high school. 
Unfortunately for her, she's assigned by the school board as the homeroom teacher for 3-D, a class of delinquent students. 
When the class attempts to make a living hell out of Yankumi's career, they fail as her persistence and aggression gain her respect. 
However, little does anyone in the school know that Yankumi is actually heir to the Kuroda Ikka—one of Tokyo's most powerful yakuza clans.  
  
(Source: ANN)  
  


---
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Mafia, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

alt_title: 올 힘 마법사, ¡El Mago Cuerpo a Cuerpo Más Poderoso!
description:
The academy holds a chilling legend. 

"Neglect practice, become like ‘Luin Ardell."

Luin, the academy’s outcast, cursed with Mana Discharge Disability. But -

"You’re the chosen one, Draka’s harbinger of destruction."

After enduring ridicule for six years, finally, a new opportunity arises.

Now that she meets them again for the first time in a long time, they've all become first rate criminals!! Moreover, a device makes Yui experience intense arousal at regular intervals, and if they don't make her come she will die. And there are further secrets on that Island: continuous arousal crime suspense!!

title: I Was Planning to Become a Loyal Sword
alt_title: 충직한 검이 되려 했는데, Chungjikan Geomi Doeryeo Haenneunde, Cassmire: The Loyal Sword, I Tried to Be a Loyal Sword, Я всего лишь хотела стать верным мечом, 忠実な剣になろうとしただけなのに, 我只想成为忠诚之剑, 本想成为忠诚的剑, 妹妹的守護劍, 我只想成為忠誠之劍, 本想成為忠誠的劍
description:
Kashimir grew up working as a mercenary to buy medicine for her precious younger half-sister, Aria.

On her way home, after completing a mission as usual, she tripped and hit her head, causing her to remember her past life; thus she realized she had been reborn in the world of the novel *The Night of the Fairy*. Her sister was the main character of this reverse-harem romance while she was one of the villains causing Aria to suffer hardships. 

Since there is no way Kashumir would let her precious sister suffer, she vowed to protect Aria until her adoption into the count's family, just like in the novel. 

But things turned out differently, and even the male lead candidates, who should've been fish in Aria's pond, all ended up becoming obsessed with Kashumir instead, when all she wanted was to protect her lovely sister.

---
To save her younger sister Aria from her illness, Cassmire Crisis became a mercenary, wielding a sword and shedding blood to pay for her medicine. But when Cassmire suffers a fall one day, memories of her past life as Aria’s wicked stepsister come flooding back. Rather than take up the role of villainess again, Cassmire vows to protect Aria this time. But with Aria doomed by the story to face only hardships, Cassmire must pick up her weapon once more to become her sister’s loyal sword!

---

title: The Max Level Hero Strikes Back
alt_title: 만렙 영웅님께서 귀환하신다!, The MAX leveled hero will return!, Max Level Hero is Making a Comeback!, 顶级英雄归来, 最終レベル英雄のご帰還, Возвращение героя максимального уровня, The Max Level Hero Has Returned!
description:
Struck by an enemy’s arrow, the powerless Prince Davey O’Rowane falls into a coma. His soul travels to a place where the greatest of the great gather — the honorable Hall of Heroes.

There, a thousand years pass as Davey undergoes excruciating training under their watchful eyes to become a hero too strong for his own good. Now back to his timeline and his kingdom, he’s wide awake and the enemies hiding in the king’s court better be prepared - the prince they had dismissed is now their biggest threat!

title: The Predatory Marriage Between the King and the Paladin
alt_title: The Predatory Marriage Between the King and the Holy Knight, 국왕과 성기사의 약탈혼, 国王と聖騎士の略奪婚, 国王和圣骑士的掠夺婚, The King and the Paladin
description:
"Yes, I'll become a king. I'm going to take everything I want."  
  
Bloody Calliope, a warlord who usurped the throne and began her quest to take control of neighboring countries.  
  
Ezekiel, a famous, noble paladin, heads to Alpensia to stop the war.  
  
His mission was to execute the King's command in order to stop the war, but…  
  
What awaited him when he arrived at the Royal Palace was not his King, but the frightening Calliope.  
  
Calliope, the warlord, and Ezekiel, the paladin, can the relationship between those two, started by force, develop into love?

title: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All
alt_title: 気になってる人が男じゃなかった, Парень, которым она увлечена, на самом деле не парень, 我在意的人不是异性, 我在意的人不是異性
description:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music, Gyaru

title: The Secret Bedroom of the Forsaken Princess
alt_title: 버림받은 왕녀의 은밀한 침실, Beorimbadeun Wangnyeoui Eunmilhan Chimsil, The Secret Bedroom of a Dejected Royal Daughter, The Abandoned Princess' Secret Room, Тайные покои покинутой принцессы, 捨てられた王女の秘密の寝室, 被弃公主的秘密房间, 落魄王女的隱密閨房, The Secret Bedroom of the Abandoned Princess
description:
Princess Llewelyn, who was once an outstanding princess but was now miserably abandoned. An ugly curse has been placed upon her with no one to protect her. It is a curse that makes her lust for men. In order to stop her curse, Llewelyn opens her bedroom... Four men are entangled with the abandoned princess. Will the truth of the curse be revealed? And who will be the man who will end up with her?

---

title: Ashi-Girl
alt_title: Пехотинец, アシガール, 跑女战国行, 跑女戰國行, 아시가루
description:
From the author of Gokusen and Koudaike no Hitobito comes the story of Yui Hayakawa:
an ordinary, uninspired high school girl who's only good at one thing - running! 
But because of her genius younger brother Takeru and his latest experiment, a time machine, 
she accidentally gets sent back to the Sengoku Era missing her beloved dinner steak! 
Will young Yui finally find that 'something' where her entire potential was hiding? 
And will she ever be able to eat that delicious steak her mother made for her?
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life
author: Morimoto Kozueko

title: Shintan Kairou
alt_title: 深潭回廊, Hallway to the Abyss
description:
He was a teacher who knew his student was gay and still desired his body.
After running away from everything, he became a wanderer and took the name Mos-san.

Yanagida struggled with the pain of being in love with the same sex. 
He committed attempted rape on a student when he was a teacher, and ran away from there. 
Before he knew it he had become Mos, a pitiful demon who had thrown his past away, but had no choice but to keep on living. 
He thought he'd lost everything but a single boy reached out his hand to him.

Seven years have passed since the painful but passionate story of 'Smells Like Green Spirit.'
genre: Psychological, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life
author: Nagai Saburou

title: Joou no Hana
alt_title: The Queen's Flower, 女王の花, 女王之花, 여왕의 꽃, Yeowangui Kkot
description:
Long ago, there existed a land divided into four countries: Sou, Kou, Do, and Ah. The King of Ah took on a wife from Kou and soon thereafter one from Do, creating a shaky alliance between the three nations. When the Second Queen gave birth to a son, the King cast aside the sickly First Queen and her daughter Aki into the depths of the Palace. But as Fate would have it, Princess Aki encounters a slave named Hakusei, who has peculiar golden hair and sky blue eyes. He promises his life to her and helps her train in the Six Arts under the guidance of the enigmatic merchant Seitetsu. However, when Aki outshines the Prince during a hunt in an attempt to gain her father's acknowledgement, she inadvertently sparks a war by besmirching Do's honor and drives the Second Queen to poison her mother. With nothing left but her faithful Hakusei, Aki is banished to the small country of Kou with a vow to return to Ah one day for revenge. But in the face of the mighty allied nations of Do and Ah, will the two survive long enough to carry out Aki’s vow?  
  
*Winner of the 60th Shogakukan Manga Awards for Best Shoujo.*
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Tragedy
author: Izumi Kaneyoshi

title: Real Man
alt_title: A Man's Man, 상남자, Настоящий Мужчина
description:
Yuhyeon becomes the youngest CEO of Hansung, a successful electronics company built on toxic work culture, but nobody he cares about is there to celebrate with him. After a night of drinking and wondering if he could change the past, he wakes up the next morning, 20 years younger at the beginning of his career.Armed with the experience and insights that made him CEO, Yuhyeon begins to revisit broken relationships and battle the enablers of Hansung’s cut-throat work environment. But he does not yet know how changing the past will affect his future...  (Source: Webtoons)

title: My Favorite Idol
alt_title: 사생돌, Sasaengdol
description:
The bodies of the top idol and a school outcast are switched?! A school outcast who is always bullied everyday, Hong Jooa. A top idol who is loved by the whole nation, Go Yohan. Jooa, who envies the life of her beloved idol, and Yohan, who envies the simple and free life of an ordinary person. While they yearned for each other’s lives, their bodies were switched one day!? A spectacular body-switch romance, My Favorite Idol!
Blackout-Phantom
genre: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Ryoung (령)

title: I'm Being Raised by Villains
alt_title: 악당들에게 키워지는 중입니다, Akdangdeurege Kiwojineun Jungimnida, Raised by Villains, 悪党たちに育てられてます！, 被恶棍们抚养中
description:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
genre: Monsters, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ja Eunhyang (자은향)

title: Go Forward With the Rebels
alt_title: 与叛逆者同行
description: In a world where energy is exhausted and resources are scarce, most of the world's resources are occupied by a few people. Slowly, an upper-level supernatural world called "Mirage" is established.
genre: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama
author: 花神先生

title: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary
alt_title: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記, Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary, Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури
description: Kikuri Hiroi (25 years old). She is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK", and she loves alcohol. She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment of the live house, so she seems to be short of money. She lives in a 52-year-old apartment without a bath, and sometimes borrows showers from her friends and acquaintances. She is regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, which she counters with a "happiness spiral" with the help of alcohol. What is her daily life like...?!
genre: Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music
author: Kumichou

title: Yu-Gi-Oh OCG STORIES
alt_title: Yu☆Gi☆Oh OCG Stories, 遊☆戯☆王OCGストーリーズ
description: In the distant past, the prosperous nation of Karma waged war against the nation of Spectra, resulting in the creation of an AI that wiped out all humans. Centuries later, Raye, the last surviving human, lives amongst an android society on the outskirts of Karma. On the night of her 13th birthday, her peaceful life is upended when Spectra attacks, destroying her home and forcing her friends to the front lines. Desperate to save everything she loves, Raye calls upon humanity's last bastion: "Sky Striker", the Karma-developed secret technology made to turn humans into the ultimate living weapons.… Unexpected, right? In this newest adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh, the focus of the plot is not on the card game, but instead the many storylines featured in the cards. The first arc surrounds the Sky Striker series, with more to come in the future.
genre: Action, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yoshida Shin

title: Kagurabachi
alt_title: カグラバチ, Кагурабати, Kagura Bowl
description: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Samurai, Mafia, Magic, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

alt_title: 동화 속 악역의 완벽한 엔딩 플랜, Donghwa Sog Ag-yeog-eui Wanbyeoghan Ending Plan, Donghwa Sok Agyeogui Wanbyeokan Ending Plan, A Perfect Ending Plan of the Villain in a Fairy Tale, Perfect Ending Plan of a Fairy Tale Villainess, Fairy Tale Villain's Perfect Ending Plan, The Perfect Ending Plan for a Villain, 悪役の完璧なエンディングプラン, 童话里反派的完美结局, 童話裡反派的完美結局, 反派角色的完美結局, The Perfect Ending for the Villainess of a Fairy Tale, Un plan final perfecto de la villana en un cuento de hadas
description:
[There was a pitiful girl who cried tears of diamond and lived while being abused by her family. But a prince appeared and killed off the entirety of the evil family. And so, the girl lived happily ever after with the prince.]

...is the fairy tale, but I reincarnated as the evil sister, 'Marcia Blick'?!

This damned household! I have to escape from this house now, at least! But if I run away, what about my sister who will be left behind? I've made my decision! We're going to run away together!

'Larisa. Let's go find that prince who will make you happy!'

But: "Please marry me."

Prince, why are you proposing to me? Your partner isn't me, but my sister! This sister of yours will make you a 'perfect ending plan'!

title: Saving My Sweetheart
alt_title: 다정한 그대를 지키는 방법, Dajeonghan Geudaereul Jikineun Bangbeop, A Way to Protect the Lovable You, A Way to Protect You, Sweetheart, How to Keep Your Sweetheart, Способ защитить тебя, любимого, 優しいあなたを守る方法, 如何守护温柔的你, 将温柔的你守护的方法, 只想守護溫柔的你
description:
Finally, it was their first night.

Leticia whispered, leaning her forehead against his chest, "As expected, is it too far? Should I get closer?"

Dietrian barely swallowed a groan. His hand grasping Leticia's shoulder was shaking with a sweet faze, but she didn't notice.

"I know that you're uncomfortable. But please bear with me until my mother comes."

Dietrian hated Leticia. It was natural as Leticia's mother killed his family. She had never doubted the fact. So she didn't know, how badly his face was distorted by her words.

"You just have to put up with me for half a year. Then, I will divorce you as you wish."

At the word 'divorce,' he grit his teeth.

---
Despite being the daughter of the Holy Empire’s most revered divine leader, Leticia is rumored to be a ruthless, bloodthirsty tyrant. The thing is… none of the rumors are true! After years of living as her vindictive mother’s scapegoat, Leticia is ultimately cursed to die if she doesn’t kill her beloved husband, King Ditrian, with her own two hands. But when the clock miraculously resets to mere days before their wedding, she gets a second chance to save not only Ditrian, but his entire kingdom. This time, will the world recognize the real Leticia before it’s too late, or is history doomed to repeat itself?

---

alt_title: I Ended Up Raising the Children of the Female Lead and Male Lead, I Ended Up Raising the Children of the Female Lead and the Male Lead, I Ended Up Raising the Children of the Leads, I Ended Up Raising the Children of the Protagonists, 夫の好きな人の子供を育てることになりました, 여주와 남주의 아이들을 키우게 되었습니다, Terminé criando a los hijos de los protagonistas
description:
'Ye-hee', who lost her precious younger siblings, one day becomes possessed as 'Märchen', an ill-fated minor character in the novel <One Greater Happiness>.

'Märchen' is a miserable woman who ends up raising the children of the woman her husband once loved even before the pain of her miscarriage subsides. 'Ye-hee', who is possessed by such a fairy, unexpectedly realizes at once that these children are her deceased younger siblings.

Although it is a harsh reality for Marchen, 'Yehee', who carries the memories of her past life, cherishes and loves her children, who are the reincarnations of her younger siblings, and protects her children with her life from beings that target them...

As shown in the novel <One Greater Happiness>, the ancient dragon 'Eskaya' who protected the country left behind three treasures in the empire. Under threat from speculation that her children may have one of the treasures, will Yehee be able to protect her children with her husband and discover the secret of their possession in this world?

Dragon Ball follows the adventures of Goku from his childhood through adulthood as he trains in martial arts and explores the world in search of the seven mystical orbs known as the Dragon Balls, which can summon a wish-granting dragon when gathered. Along his journey, Goku makes several friends and battles a wide variety of villains, many of whom also seek the Dragon Balls for their own desires. Along the way becoming the strongest warrior in the universe.

Part II (the post-time skip portion) of Dragon Ball is also known as 'Dragon Ball Z' in North America.

As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.

title: Karada, Kasanete, Kasanatte
alt_title: 身影、交织、重叠, 身影、交織、重疊, カラダ、重ねて、重なって, Our Bodies, Entwining, Entwined
description:
Sex is intimate, and for some, it takes everything to bare it all... so when Misuzu was told that sex with her was "boring," she gave it up all together... and dating, too. So when, years later, she's asked out by her colleague, Mikage-san, she screws up her courage and gives it a shot. But it turns out Misuzu isn't the only one with baggage around sex. Can the two of them work together to overcome their hurdles, and enjoy each other as the couple they wish to be...?

---
Five years ago, her boyfriend dumped her saying, "Sex with you is really boring." Since then, Misuzu has kept her distance from love and sex, and before she knew it, she's already turned 29.

Mikage is a new colleague of hers and though she finds herself getting attracted to him, she just can't seem to take the next step forward since she believes that "dating equals eventually having sex."

Then one day, Mikage confesses to her that he likes her, and when the two begin to have sex as lovers, things suddenly came to a halt. It turns out that Mikage also has a problem: "When I try to have sex, I get too nervous and become unable to get it up." After learning about each other's problems with sex, they vow to find a way to "satisfy each other through sex" together because they love each other so much! 

Men, women, and sex. They overlap both their hearts and bodies as they yearn for each other, worry, and get each other's heart racing. This is the story of two awkward adults as they fumble about in their romance.
genre: Romance, Office Workers, Drama
author: iko

title: Forget My Husband, I'll Go Make Money
alt_title: 남편은 됐고, 돈이나 벌렵니다, Nampyeoneun Doaessgo, Donina Beollyeomnida, Forget About My Husband, I'd Rather Go Make Money, 要什么老公，我只想搞钱, Forget About My Husband, I'd Rather Go Make Money, Terminé con mi esposo, ahora iré a hacer dinero
description:
I became the wife of a husband who has a girlfriend.
Hmm, I shouldn’t bother them, right?

“Then, you sleep on the floor.”
“What?”

It seems that he doesn’t like the idea of it.
Well, the floor is hard after all.
I guess I don’t have any other choice.

“We’ll just sleep while holding hands then. You trust me, right?”

But how did we end up breaking the bed on our first night…?

I am Aristine, an exiled princess who has fallen out of favor with the Emperor.
The truth is, she has the <Monarch’s Eyes>, an ability that allows you to see the past, future, and present.
Sacrificed for a contract marriage, she is bound together with a monstrous barbarian…

“I have to present my wife with the most precious things.”

The future husband who is rumored to be a monster is incredibly normal.

But this cake belongs to someone else.

“I’ll just go and make money.”

It’s long been said that imagining gold as your own will help you manifest wealth.

<Forget My Husband, I’ll Go Make Money>
Will she be able to achieve her dreams of living in freedom while sitting on her piles of money?
Or will she be able to catch both rabbits at the same time?
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ju Hyeon

title: Lady Chef Royale
alt_title: 로열 셰프 영애님, Royal Chef Yeong-ae-nim, The Young Lady Is a Royal Chef, Royal Chef Young Lady, Royal Chef, お嬢様はロイヤル・シェフ, 千金料理师, 皇室御厨英爱
description:
Sena’s been tossed into another world, as the despised daughter of a noble family. Her little restaurant was her refuge in her last life, so she’s got some tricks up her sleeve—cooking skills! 

As Senianna, she’ll put her brains and fine-tuned taste buds (Korean fried chicken, anyone?) to the test so she can take back the kitchen and gain this society’s esteemed title of Chef Royale. Will her cuisine reign supreme over the empire and bring her the sweet and salty balance of power and affection?

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:

As a chef at a small knight's restaurant, I became the nuisance youngest daughter of a powerful man who was afraid of the emperor. I tried to run away with all my travel expenses…

It’s strange.

“If you say you're sorry, are you that shameless?”
“That’s because I’m your brother.”
“Why don't you take Grandmother on a stroll?”

Why is everyone so nice to me all of a sudden?

“Why do you want to take out someone's eyeballs when they see me?"

People who had caught me trying to escape. I'm just cooking. What's wrong with you?

title: I Tried to Run Away After Eating the Male Lead
alt_title: 먹고 튀려 했습니다만, Trate de huir despues de comerme al protagonista masculino
description:
I was starving, begging at the temple for food, when suddenly, the temple began to collapse.

In a hurry, I snuck into the storage room to steal some bread when I found a shiny, sweet smelling piece of candy.

I put it in my mouth, looked up and saw the man called the demon without blood or tears in front of me.

“If you ate it, you should take responsibility, right?” Oh god, I have to give the candy back somehow before this crazy guy cuts my belly.

“The most effective way of exchanging strong power between humans is through physical contact, preferably by sleep… … to-?”

My voice faded to a wisper out of embaressment. With a slow smile, he stretches out his hand, and I became flustered.

“This is true. I can’t help it.”

“What? What?””

“You read it yourself. The solution to our little problem...”

“…Yes?”

“Step by step, shall we try?”

Enchanted by his beautiful face and deep eyes, I couldn’t even ask what he means by trying step by step. Are you… are you a villain who destroys the world with your beauty?

Original Novel
Original Webtoon Less...
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

When a dominant guild gangs up on Rokan to humiliate him and destroy his hard-earned achievements in the world's most realistic fantasy VR game, he becomes desperate for revenge. But just when Rokan thinks he's lost it all, a twist in space-time sends him back to right before the game is even launched.

Now, this former SSS-class ranker sees the perfect opportunity to return to glory!

Then Roxanne, a war hero appeared. A love triangle romance filled with the scent of two wolves competing for Sephia!

author: Honey Bambi (꿀밤비)

title: Tomb Raider King
alt_title: 도굴왕, TRK, 盗掘王, King of Excavation, 我独自盗墓, 盜墓王, Расхититель гробниц, Grave Robber - King
description:
The God’s Tombs started to appear around the world. Due to the relics within these tombs, many were able to wield these legendary power for themselves, while others became enslaved to these users. However, a Tomb Raider appears with the purpose of robbing these relics. The Tomb Raider King. “God damn it! Did that bastard already loot this place as well?!” What you own belongs to me. What I own definitely belongs to me. This is the story of a revived Tomb Raider who will do whatever he can to claim all the tombs and relics for himself!

alt_title: 血族BLOODLINE, 血族BLOODLINE：聖魔虛像篇, Bloodline: The Illusory Noble Demon, 血族Bloodline：圣魔虚像篇

As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years… This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.
genre: Thriller, Loli, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

title: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan
alt_title: ダメドルと世界に1人だけのファン, The Useless Idol and Her Only Fan in the World, A Useless Idol and the Only Fan in the World, Una Idol inútil y su único fan en el mundo, Damedol and the Only Fan in the World
description:
"Urumin" is an idol, but she can't sing or dance well, and she's got a dishonest character. Kimiya is the only fan in the world who likes her. The relationship between the two of them is a little different from the usual relationships between idols and fans! 

This is a "precious" love comedy that depicts the daily life of a bad idol and the man who keeps on promoting her, and the way he loves her!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Music
author: Kishirimo

title: Swing, Sing
description:
The hustle and bustle of the big city. Sumire Yaotome, a student at a music school in a major metropolis, decided one day that she just had to get away from it all, and vowed to transfer to a school outside the city. She made her way to Nagano Prefecture, finding herself amongst the resorts and vacation homes that lined the picturesque streets, and by chance, found herself at Cafe Primrose. She could hear the faint sounds of instruments being played, and could smell just a hint of coffee in the air.But this pleasant little cafe and its relaxed atmosphere held a little secret. It was about to go bankrupt.

"Sumire, please, help me save our cafe!"

The little voice that called out to Sumire for help was Momo Momose, the diligent young girl who ran the cafe. Here begins our youthful story, of friends working to breathe new life into their beloved cafe, through music.
genre: School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music
author: Aki Isumi

title: Hilde Takes House Arpeggio
alt_title: 오늘부터 공작가는 내가 접수한다, I'll be Taking Over this Duchy, I'll Take the Dukedom From Today, Tomaré el Ducado a Partir de Hoy
description:
"I was a noble this whole time?!"

Hilde, a commoner who works at a restaurant in the village, is suddenly notified by a handsome man named Logan that she is a family member of one of the empire's four duchies and hears that her mother 'Lucia Arpeggio' was a powerful mage in the past.

Duke Arpeggio offers to make her an official member of the family if she can prove that she has strong magical powers, and Hilde accepts in order to escape from her oppressed commoner livelihood and enjoy a comfortable life.

However, her excitement doesn't last long… Culture, magic, history, literature, etc. The number of things nobles needed to learn were endless! In addition, forget about welcoming Hilde, her family members only sent her cold looks and even put her life in danger…

"You've left me with no choice. I, a former commoner, will be taking over this duchy!"
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yumin

title: Doku Doku Mori Mori
alt_title: どく・どく・もり・もり, Poison Poison Forest Forest
description: In the deep, deep forest. a Tamagotake mushroom fairy who has been left alone in the world after her parents were killed is chasing after the culprit, a Tsukiyotake, to take revenge on him. In the Sea of Trees, where life and death intersect, can the young Tamago take revenge on the hated Tsukiyo? An unprecedented mushroom suspense begins.
genre: Thriller, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Segawa Noboru

title: Choppiri Ecchi na Sanshimai demo, Oyomesan ni Shitekuremasuka?
alt_title: ちょっぴりえっちな三姉妹でも、お嫁さんにしてくれますか？, 就算是稍微有点H的三姐妹，也能成为新娘吗?, 就算是稍微有點H的三姐妹，也能成為新娘嗎?, Could You Turn Three Perverted Sisters Into Fine Brides?
description: Our young protagonist faces the greatest challenge of his time… babysitting and rehabilitating three massive pervert sisters. Their rich father has given him the arduous task of turning them into three young, refined ladies.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Shika Momiji

title: Records of the Mystic Gardens
alt_title: Trick Garden, 诡园录
description: Gardens, isolated from the world, home to the mystical. What resides within their walls? Gods and deities? Charming vixen spirits? Ghouls and apparitions? An amalgamation of fiends, demons, beasts, and spectres, the Mystic Gardens descend and stir the world into chaos. Amidst countless creations and endless dangers, can the millions struggling to survive within the Gardens construct a safe haven for themselves?
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: 惊面兔 (Startled Rabbit)

title: Last on Earth
alt_title: 나 빼고 다 귀환자, 地球搬家忘了我, 俺以外全員帰還者な件, Everyone Else is A Returnee, Na Ppaego Da Gwihwanja, Todos Los Demás Son Retornados
description:
Average college student Yoo Ilhan has always gone through life without being noticed by anyone, even God!

So when monsters were about to invade Earth and God sent all humans to other dimensions to train with mana... he forgot Ilhan and left him on Earth for 1,000 years!

Realizing his mistake, God sends the straggler two angels to assist him as he takes on the monsters, eventually turning him into an unstoppable force.

Now that people have returned to Earth, will Ilhan finally be seen?
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Toy Car (토이카)

title: The Tainted Half
alt_title: 반쪽
description:
Two brothers. One concubine.
Seolha’s face was disfigured by her mother, who sought to deny the emperor his prize: the most beautiful concubine in the world. Now forced to endure a lifetime of abuse, Seolha can only pin her hopes on Muon, the emperor’s twin brother. But is he really someone she can trust?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Full Color
author: Chyomchyom

title: Unnamed World
alt_title: Nameless World, No Name World, Wei mingming de shijie, World 000, Wèi mìngmíng de shìjiè, 世界 000, 名前のない世界, 无名世界, 无名世界 (No Name World), 未命名世界, 이름 없는 세계

title: Hantsu x Trash
alt_title: Sexy and Stupid Water Polo Comedy, ハンツー×トラッシュ
description: Hamaji Youhei, a freshman in high school, lives his life aimlessly, lazing around all day. He can't keep up with his studies, no good at sports and won't stick with anything for long. Besides that he's a pervert who's continuously rejected by girls. A sophomore convinces him into joining a club where he could lunge at girls, fondling and touching all he wanted. Thus he joined the Water Polo Club. Can Youhei, who never sticks with anything for long, find his place in this club?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Harem, Drama, School Life
author: Kobayashi Hiyoko

title: The Second Coming of Gluttony
alt_title: 탐식의 재림, Tamsigui Jaerim, Второе пришествие обжорства, Tamsig-ui Jaelim, The Second Coming of Avarice
description:
At the brink of death on an otherworldly battlefield, Jihoo Seol is granted the chance to relive his life. But all magic has its limits, and Seol only retains a few fragments of the man he will become. Memories of a future he has yet to live manifest in sporadic dreams and magic grants him unearned luck. When his magic fails, Seol's life takes a turn for the worse. Desperate and alone, he's approached by a mysterious woman with an offer that will change his life forever.

Will his dreams be enough to save him from the horrors that lie ahead?
genre: Thriller, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy
author: 김종일

title: Yankee-kun to Kagaku Gohan
alt_title: ヤンキー君と科学ごはん
description: Ran, a chemistry teacher, is assigned to give a one-on-one remedial class to Chiaki, a problem child in his homeroom class, in order to avoid his retention. To get Chiaki, who has no interest in science, to take the remedial class, Ran proposes "cooking"...?
genre: Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Kanato Oka

title: Double Play
alt_title: だぶるぷれい, 雙人遊戲
description:
Having forgotten his keys, Tamao Hiroi a high-school student, returns home using the back entrance and is surprised to find a stranger in his bed… Soon he realizes this is no stranger but Ran Homura, one year younger, softball ace and one of the most beautiful girls at school! Hiroi watches her masturbating on his bed and instinctively does the same peeking through the glass door. He is soon found out though and a strange 'master/slave' relationship begins!


---
genre: Romance, Sports, Harem, Drama, School Life
author: Murata Kouji

title: The One Within the Villainess
alt_title: 悪役令嬢の中の人, 悪役令嬢の中の人〜断罪された転生者のため嘘つきヒロインに復讐いたします〜, 恶役千金的真面目, 恶役千金的真面目～为被定罪的转生者向骗子女主报复～, 惡役千金的真面目, 惡役千金的真面目～為被定罪的轉生者向騙子女主報復～, 악역 영애 안의 사람, Akuyaku Reijou no Naka no Hito
description:
In order to clear the name of ‘Emi’, a girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess's revenge to begin!
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Makiburo

title: Kesa Mo Yuraretemasu
alt_title: 今朝も揺られてます, They Are Still Being Shaken This Morning
description: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Masuda Eiji

title: Kimi wa Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi o!
alt_title: 君は喧し閉じてよ口を！, You're Too Noisy, So Just Shut It Already!, You Talk Too Much, So Just Shut It Already!, 吵闹的你不肯住口, Закрой свой рот!, Ты слишком много говоришь, так что заткнись уже!
description: Hīragi Tsukino was born deaf. When she transfers to a new school, she meets a talkative boy named Enomoto Taiyō. Tsukino is slightly taken aback by Taiyō, who talks to her without regard to the fact that she can't hear.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Morita Shunpei

title: The Days of Diamond
alt_title: ダイヤモンドの功罪
description: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.
genre: Sports, Drama
author: Hirai Oohashi

title: Kono Koi wo Hoshi ni wa Negawanai
alt_title: この恋を星には願わない, There Is No Love Wishing Upon a Star
description:
Eri-chan is my childhood friend whom I've always spent time with since we were little. Somewhere along the way, my affection for her shifted from being just friends to romantic feelings, but I doubt I'll ever confess these feelings to her. Because I want to stay by her side forever.

And so begins a delicate and beautiful love story where each person's 'love' intertwines.
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama
author: Shinoa

title: BOX - Something's in the Box
alt_title: BOX～箱の中に何かいる～
description:
Seven people received a "puzzle" and ticket from an unknown sender, and followed the ticket to a strange square house. A mysterious woman who came "out of curiosity" joined them, and what awaited those people in the house was a girl as beautiful as a doll and maze beyond imagination. They cannot leave unless they solve the puzzle. When it's solved, part of your body will disappear! Can they escape? And, just who invited them there?

From [Anilist](https://anilist.co/manga/113065/Box-Hako-no-Naka-ni-Nanika-Iru/)
genre: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Morohoshi Daijirou

title: Gossip
alt_title: 花花公子与绯闻秘书, 가십
description:
Casanova, Bliss Ackland is the second son of the Ackland family, a U.S real estate famous conglomerate, top analyst who conquered the show business and also constantly having rumours with Hollywood female celebrities.  
  
 During his college days, he came out with "one meter male access ban" which led him to be attacked by various human rights association. But no one would have thought that Bliss Ackland who was a true hetero suddenly coming out as gay!  
  
 The media is constantly talking about the hot issue that's happening in the U.S., but in reality, it was just a play made by Bliss using his old friend Jin Cayman, who grew up like a family to avoid the confession of the underage daughter of a mafia boss whom he met at a social party.   
  
It's a gossip that will eventually calm down in a few days , but for Jin, who secretly have feelings for Bliss for 7 years is not happy with the situation but actually Bliss had been constantly courting Jin for the past 10 years…?!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kie (키에)

title: MMB
alt_title: マナミキとビーチ, Mana Miki to Beach, Mana, Miki and Beach
description:
Under the piercing rays of the Sun, these young girls soar vigorously across the beach. A short story about beach volleyball that'll take your breath away with its fierce yet beautiful offense & defense. Enjoy this pair's perfect teamwork and mutual-trust relationship, in addition to lots of swimsuits and toned bellies!

(Source: Aokishi)
genre: Oneshot, Sports, School Life
author: Ootsuki Ichika

title: The Blood Princess and the Knight
alt_title: 血の姫と騎士, 血姬与骑士, Vampires and Knight, Вампиры и рыцарь, Рыцарь и Королева Крови, 서큐버스가 되어버린 기사님
description:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   
"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   
The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…

description:
[Woojin, who has lost his memories x Hamin, who has had an unrequited love for 13 years] 

An accident occurs where Woojin forgets 13 years worth of memories with Hamin. This causes a lot of panic for Hamin, as he has harbored unrequited feelings for him for those 13 years. Seeing this reaction, a misunderstanding occurs where Woojin believes that they are dating…
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Do Kyung (도경)

title: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai
alt_title: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You, 君と悪いことがしたい, 想和你一起做壞事
description: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Kanashi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Yutaka (由田果)

title: I Tried Confessing My Love to a Serious Girl
alt_title: カタブツ系女子に告白してみた, I Tried Confessing My Love to a Serious Girl
description: Although she's pretty, she's widely rumoured to be the school's number one straight-laced girl. So when I gathered up my courage to confess to her…‽
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic
author: Kobayashi Shoujo

title: Dragon and Chameleon
alt_title: 龍とカメレオン
description:
Garyou Hanagami is a veteran mangaka. Best known for the behemoth of a series that is Dragon Land, Hanagami-sensei has years of experience under his belt and is always thinking up new manga ideas. 

Shinobu Miyama is not. An amateur working for Hanagami-sensei as an assistant, Miyama is nicknamed “The Chameleon” for his ability to copy the artstyles of those he works under. However, his true dream is to escape the faceless crowds and become someone. 

So what happens when a work accident causes them to swap bodies?
genre: Action, Drama, Supernatural
author: Ishiyama Ryou

title: Isshou Hatarakitakunai Ore ga Classmate no Daininki Idol ni Natsukaretara
alt_title: 一生働きたくない俺が、クラスメイトの大人気アイドルに懐かれたら, A Very Popular Idol Classmate Has Taken a Liking to Me, A Person Who Doesn’t Want to Work for my Whole Life, 班里的人气偶像黏上了一辈子不想工作的我
description: Rintaro Shido, a high school student who aspires to become a full-time househusband, is in the class with a very popular idol, Rei Otosaki. The two have no connection other than being classmates, but their relationship changes drastically when Rintaro serves Rei a home-cooked meal after she nearly collapses from hunger! The food was so delicious that Rei said, "Can I come here every day to eat?"...?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation
author: Kishimoto Kazuha

title: Onikirimaru
alt_title: Oni Slayer, 鬼切丸, 귀절도, gwijeoldo
description:
There was once an oni mother who gave birth to a human-looking child. Instead of an oni's horn, this child was born with a sword in hand called the "Onigirimaru" or Oni Slayer. He has no name and is only referred to by the name of his sword. Though he appears human, he is pure oni.  
  
Believing that he will become human once all of his kind vanished from the world of humans, he sets out on his destiny to slay all of his kind. Even now, in the mother world of Japan, he is still out there slaying oni.
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

description: The dragon girl met her dragon hunter when her hometown was consumed by flames. The hunter protected her by forming the Partner Alliance-a sacred contract bonding the destined two together-and dragged her out of the sea of fire. Together, they set out seeking revenge. Little did they know that…by taming her, he was also tamed by her.

author: Ileguo

title: Girl and Science
alt_title: 妹子与科学, Girls and Science
description: They were childhood friends, and she had always been more powerful than him. But when they accidentally traveled (summoned?) to another world, it was finally time for him to become the knight in shining armor! He had to find her first though, since they were separated… Come and witness his fight to be better in a crazy world where monsters roamed and technology was so advanced your amputated limbs could be restored to perfection…
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: 诈术师德德

title: Ougon no Keikenchi
alt_title: 黄金の経験値, The Golden Experience Point
description:
The conquest story of the final boss protagonist begins here!

"Boot Hour, Shoot Curse" is a VRMMORPG that has no concept of levels or professions. Instead, players must farm experience points to gain new skills and increase their status.
Rare, a girl who participated in the closed beta test, has acquired the hidden skill "Subordinate", which allows her to turn NPCs into her subordinates. The skill also transfers the experience points gained by the subordinates to Rare.

She used the skill to gradually add new NPCs she encountered to her party. As a result of the unprecedented amount of experience gained from her minions, she was able to evolve into a Demon Lord.
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Harajun

title: Monster
alt_title: Монстр, 몬스터, モンスター
description:
Monster weaves the riveting story of brilliant Dr. Kenzo Tenma, a famous surgeon with a promising career at a leading hospital. Tenma risks his reputation and promising career to save the life of a critically wounded young boy. Unbeknownst to him, this child is destined for a terrible fate.  
  
A string of strange and mysterious murders begin to occur soon afterward, ones that professionally benefit Dr. Tenma, and he emerges as the primary suspect. Conspiracies, serial murders, and a scathing depiction of the underbelly of hospital politics are all masterfully woven together in this compelling manga thriller.

---
- **Won the 46th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga**
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Medical, School Life, Horror, Police, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy

Kakyu, a former Japanese who was reincarnated as a low-level demon in hell, has acquired unparalleled strength over two thousand years. However, unexpectedly, he is exiled to another “different world,” liberated from the harsh underworld.

Kakyu, who was enjoying his dream slow life, witnesses the village he owes everything to being attacked. Despite rushing to the scene, the village is annihilated.

Picking up the only surviving baby, Alus, Kakyu resolves to raise Alus to become the happiest person in the world to repay the debt…!?

alt_title: ポーの一族, 波族傳奇, 포의 일족
description:
(from ebookjapan):

Around 1880, the Baron de Portsnell and his family visited a seaside town. They had come from London, and they soon became well known in the city. The baron and his wife and their children, Edgar and Marybelle, exuded an elegance that was out of place in a country town.

The sight of them was like looking at a perfect painting. In fact, their beauty was a magical beauty out of time. They were the "Poe's Clan", vampirnellas who consume human blood. The family rented a house on the outskirts of the city and began to search for someone to welcome into the clan, pretending to be human. 

Edgar was intrigued by Alan Twilight, the son of the city's foremost trader....

description:
Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.  
  
A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.  
  
Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.

Enemy creatures that must be defeated are "Emotional Deviants,'' also known as "craters.'' In addition, the disasters caused by these are called "Storms.'' Nagi a lonely high school boy has started to feel that something is off recently, unknown memories began seeping into his mind. And then there is this strange girl he encountered. Everything culminates when his landlady turns into a monster in front of him and a strange power awakes in him. Is he a human or a Craters himself?  
A new era of psychic battle action where “emotions” shake the world!!

title: Haite Kudasai, Takamine-san
alt_title: 履いてください、鷹峰さん, Por favor ponte esto, Takamine-san, Пожалуйста, оденьтесь, Такамине-сан, 입어주세요, 타카미네 양, Please Put Them On, Takamine-san, Please Put These On, Takamine-san
description:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

“Become my closet!”

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___

Xing Mu, who endured the humiliation and disguised himself as an Omega, was on a mission of revenge and restoration of his homeland. However, his biggest obstacle was the helpless second prince of the enemy nation — a beautiful omega who was marked by him in an accident. Therefore, the love and hate between the two, accompanied by the dark surge of revenge, tightly entangled together...

title: Dou ka Ore wo Houtte Oitekure
alt_title: Please Leave Me Alone: For Some Reason, She Wants to Change a Lone Wolf's Helpless High School Life, どうか俺を放っておいてくれ なぜかぼっちの終わった高校生活を彼女が変えようとしてくる, ぼちかの
description:
Love, friendship, and the sparkling joys of youth. The high school life that I’ve looked forward to—still ended with me being alone. Then, just a day before the graduation ceremony...

*“Don’t die! Nanamura-kun!”*

Sora Hanamitsuji, she’s a beautiful girl that even models can’t compare to. My life ended after getting hit by a truck to protect her. That should’ve been the case.

However, with this accident, Hanamitsuji-san and I returned to the day of our high school’s entrance ceremony. The second high school life is no longer as charming and youthful. I was going to spend it modestly and alone. But, she said that won’t do.

*“Well, I’ll help you make friends.”*

This is a story about my second high school life. It’s the worst and best teenage rom-com ever.
genre: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

While visiting a friend at the Eunseong College of Engineering, Hansol falls in love with Minjun at first sight. Minjun is a professor of architecture at the university, and is infamous for being a huge brat...
I, Lee Hansol, won't back down so easily. Baek Minjun, I will make you mine!

title: I Became a Tyrant’s Maid
alt_title: 폭군의 침방 시녀가 되었다, I Became The Tyrant's Chambermaid
description:
Youour Highness- That is absurd!!

"Youour Highness, did you just cough-!!!"

"It's doomed! I've been transmigrated to another world! As an extra chambermaid from a 19+ imperovished novel from the early 2000s!"

For now, I'm trying my best not to upset the male lead's temper so I can survive and return home...

"Youour Highness! Please have mercy!"
"Youour Highness! That is such an absurd thing to say!"
"Could you please stop with that damn antiquated language?!"
Seems like the etiquette here is a bit different from what I know...

Anyway, after defeating an assassin and taking an arrow for him, I feel like I've become somewhat closer to the male lead.

The ominous journal that seems to understand my words, and the male lead, who orders me around, seems a bit fishy too.

"Can I survive here and return home?"
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Joo Yeryeong

In return, Seon Ha invites Eun Geon to the maid cafe where he works, but Eun Geon refuses. Li Erdan only wants to be a bastard, but he always does "good things" by accident and is repeatedly reported as a hero by the media. However, and just as when he was about to turn from evil to good and work hard, fate decided to play a joke on him...

Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)

title: Projection
alt_title: 프로젝션
description:
Cheon Seju, had no choice but to join an organization to avenge his dead sister. After losing all hope in life, he meets a boy who reminds him of his sister and offers him a small act of kindness. 

If I had known that my light heart would become so heavy, I wouldn't have brought you with me.



"I told you, you'll always come first......." 

His gaze usually fierce gaze was different today. 
Cheon Seju's gaze was gentle, sweet and persistent.

"So take responsibility".

Cheon Seju was my first everything. He was the first person to ever reach out a hand to me, and gaze upon me. Sejin only accepted the man's hand because he offered it first and he only ever gazed upon him because he gazed upon him first. And that is how he fell in love with this sweet and affectionate man.

Sejin realized that he no longer wanted to be separated from Cheon Seju.
Where ever he goes, I'll go. 

"You are all I have left now......."
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Wabi

title: Dead Dead Demon's Dededede Destruction
alt_title: DDDD, Dededede, デッドデッドデーモンズデデデデデストラクション, 恶魔的破坏, 惡魔的破壞, 灭世Demolition
description:
A series about the lives of two high school girls living in Tokyo after aliens have invaded. Dead Dead Demon's Dededededestruction is a self-styled dystopian slice-of-life that reflects on modern societal and political issues in Japan while still maintaining a sense of humor and frivolity.

Large mysterious alien ships have been looming above Japanese towns for three years, filling the sky. Everything changed three years ago. And yet, nothing has changed.

No weapon used against the invaders' ships had any success, beyond destroying part of Japan and leaving its economy in shambles. JSDF is fighting a guerrilla battle against the aliens all over Japan. America is joining the 'war' effort with more aggressive tactics, dividing Japan over the pacifist principle laid out in Article 9 of the Japanese constitution. But this may just be the mundane story of young high schoolers.

"No matter what happens, I won't back down. At least not until this world filled with lies and deceit crumbles away. The real threat to humankind is not invaders, but me."

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga** 
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2022**

title: Revenge of the Baskerville Bloodhound
alt_title: 철혈검가 사냥개의 회귀, Cheolhyeolgeomga Sanyanggaeui Hoegwi, Revenge of the Sword Clan's Hound, 回帰した鉄血の猟犬, 铁血剑家猎犬的回归, Revenge of the Iron-Blooded Sword Hound, La Venganza del Sabueso de Sangre de Hierro
description:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

title: One Day, Suddenly, Seoul Is
alt_title: 어느날 갑자기 서울은, Eoneunal Gapjagi Seoul-eun
description:
'You’re its prey the moment you touch it.' One day, suddenly, a terrible virus variant attacks Seoul! 

Yeon-woo is on a school trip to Seoul, and is excited thinking that he can finally get along with his one classmate, So-yeon, whom he has a crush on.

However, during this time, unidentified cells appeared in front of Yeon-woo’s class, who were sightseeing in Seoul. The mutant cells manifestation quickly turns Yeon-woo and his classmates’ school trip into hell as anyone who comes into contact with the cells will become a hideous monster that wants to consume anything with flesh...! 

Will Yeon-woo be able to leave Seoul safely?

The latest work from the author of "The Diary of a Commuting Student". It's a silly and endless story about how some kids kill time by repeating the 7th of July every day. A time-loop love story of two high school students trapped in "Eternal Youth"!

(Source: Young Magazine)

alt_title: 僕は君たちを支配する, Я буду контролировать тебя, 我將要支配你們的一切, I Will Rule You All, Las Dominaré a Todas
description:
Seven women, one man, a suspenseful harem story!

During a class reunion, the school became an enclosed dimension without warning. Yelling and screaming brought no response. 26-year old unemployed Haruka Sato has to survive by cooperating with seven of his former classmates. Soon, the extreme conditions began to eat away at their sanity, and Haruka's hidden desires began to take hold.
