title: Kiss Shicha Damenano?
alt_title: Don't Kiss Me?, キスしちゃダメなの？
description:
Tarou, an ultra-pure virgin who has a complex with red hair and freckles, he feels a sense of closeness to Rui, a transfer student who, like himself, is "half but not good at English", and becomes friends with him.

However, the physical contact from Rui is so excessive and sweet that it surpasses Tarou's idea of ​​"friends", and it keeps making his heart beat faster every day...!

Friends, is it okay to kiss...!? Is this love!?
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Furomae Ari

title: Hyouka
alt_title: Хёка: Тебе не уйти, 氷菓, Ice Cream
description:
Oreki Houtarou is an "energy-saver" kind of guy, who expends as little energy as possible to do only things he has to. When he starts high school, his older sister sends him a letter asking him to join the Classics Club. The club meant a lot to her, and its number of members has been reduced to zero.  
  
Houtarou reluctantly signs up for the club, only to find that someone else has joined, too! She's Chitanda Eru, a cute, big-eyed girl with an overwhelming sense of curiosity. A mystery crops up that catches Eru's interest, and also draws in Houtarou's friend, Fukube Satoshi. They continue solving mundane mysteries together, and soon they draw in Satoshi and Houtarou's friend, Ibara Mayaka, as well. Mayaka has had a blatant crush on Satoshi since middle school, but he always fends off her advances. Together, they search for the truth in a mystery that involves the history of the Classics Club.
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Yonezawa Honobu

title: Kachou Fuugetsu
alt_title: Beauties Of Nature, 花鳥風月
description:
Itokawa is moving out to his deceased grandfather's house in the remote countryside. Although he was told that the house had been kept up after his grandfather passed away, he is in for a rude awakening when he gets there. He meets a bunch of interesting people who live in the small town…  
  
After Sawato's grandmother passes away, he succeeds her as the chairman of a small, remote town. Constantly aware that he is not yet capable of the task and troubled by his inexperience, he seeks out solitude and comfort in the open air hot spring. However, Daiki, a potter from the city, relentlessly intrudes on Sawato's territory. Daiki is frivolous, shameless, and infuriating, yet Sawato can't quite bring himself to hate him…
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Shimizu Yuki

title: Yondome wa Iya na Shizokusei Majutsushi
alt_title: Death Attribute Magician, The Death Mage Who Doesn't Want a Fourth Time, Маг смерти, не желающий четвёртой реинкарнации, 四度目は嫌な死属性魔術師, 讨厌第四次的死属性魔术师, Shi-dome wa Iyana Shi Zokusei Majutsu-shi, 討厭第四次的死屬性魔術師, 네 번째는 싫은 죽음속성 마술사, El Nigromante que No Quiere una Cuarta Vez, Mago de Atributo de Muerte, El Mago del Atributo de Muerte que No Quiere una Cuarta Vez
description: Amamiya Hiroto is unlucky. His life consisted of misfortune after misfortune, culminating in an unlucky death during an incident on a school boat trip, trying to save a girl he barely knew. After death, he met a god of reincarnation who requested that the hundred or so dead passengers - one of them being the girl he tried in vain to save - be reincarnated into another world. Yet a series of unfortunate events forced Hiroto to reincarnate with even less luck than before, starting with nothing but a tremendous amount of Mana. His second life, far worse than his first, came to a cruel end. However, upon meeting the god a second time, he was informed that there would be yet another reincarnation, one that had already been set in motion and could not be stopped. Not wanting Hiroto to endure a third life filled with suffering, the god cursed him before he was reborn in the hopes that he would either die quickly or commit suicide. Hiroto was reborn once more as a half-vampire, half-dark elf. A dhampir. Not wanting a fourth life, he is determined to live this third life with the only things remaining from his previous lives - Death Magic and his enormous Mana pool.
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Comedy, Zombies, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Shota, Adaptation

Or so it seems when his perky guardian angel shows up on his doorstep one day and heals his limp. title: They Say There's a Ghost in the Club Room
alt_title: 동아리방에 귀신 나온대
description:
I met a friend who disappeared a few years ago, and it turns out he's now an exorcist?!

Jisang often speaks nonsense or acts dangerously out of nowhere, and sometimes experiences memory lapses. His friend and underclassman, Taeju, shares a concern that he has: When the club members enter the club room, they fall victim to strange phenomena.

Believing it to be the work of a ghost, Taeju calls an occult specialist to resolve the situation. Unexpectedly, the specialist turns out to be Jisang's childhood friend, Ham Leerae.

Jisang then learns that his symptoms weren't due to an illness, but were caused by spiritual possession. Determined to keep Leerae around, Jisang offers his body to assist with exorcism requests.

"That's how I can make you stay. So you can't escape now."

And the solution to free him from possession is...kissing?!
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love

Now with his new appearance and his great Idol knowledge, he will attempt to become the number one idol.

When the king is killed by a mysterious assassin, Sabina must face the poisonous circle of other candidates in a battle for the royal seat. Can she attract the loyalty and affection of the men and women she needs on her side to survive?

When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. When he woke up, Ji Ran, the son of a rich second generation, found himself lying beside his arch-nemesis from his school days. Qin Man! 

Despite reluctantly agreeing to a sponsorship agreement with the green tea black belly enemy, Ji Ran finds his lonely and stubborn heart gradually melting by the occasional tenderness displayed by Qin Man. 

[Scheming and gentle green tea x Sharp tongue but soft-hearted and charming person]

Behing the facade of a sponsorship agreement lies a decade-long unrequited love.

description: Yue Zhishi and Song Yu are not blood related brothers, Yue Zhishi, who was fostered by the Song family since childhood, loves to cling to his older brother, Song Yu, who is three years older than him. However, Song Yu always deliberately maintains a distance. Song Yu, the brother who pretends to be indifferent, and Yue Zhishi, the brother who is a clingy little puppy. But what others don't know is that he understands his own heart, he choose to exercise self-control and maintain a distance because… Yue Zhishi is Song-Yu’s only allergen.

description: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title: Unique Scent
alt_title: Distinctive Scent, Unique Fragrance, 고유의 향
description: Goyu possesses a unique ability: when he smells a scent associated with a memory, he can see past memories vividly. The problem is, whenever he catches a whiff of such a scent, his consciousness is pulled into the past, leaving his physical body frozen in place, dazed and unresponsive. One day, this ability almost leads to a disaster when Goyu is nearly hit by a car. Fortunately, Yoohan jumps in and saves him just in time. Goyu then discovers that when he is near Yoohan, the scents manifest as visible forms, allowing him to avoid getting lost in his memories.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

title: Royal Marriage
alt_title: 국혼, Guo Hun, National Marriage
description:
'Lovers in peril amongst troubled times, and a grand wheel of fate that awaits them'

You told me, my little Princess,

That a sworn promise must be carved into the heart, not a rock.

"Swear it in front of the Gods of Heaven and Earth, that Eunri and Gyeol are now wed. Carve our names onto here."

The young obedient groom, Se Gyeol, took out a pocket knife and carved their names side by side like the little bride had asked.

"As our names have been carved into this rock, it has now become an oath set in stone."

"Hmph. A sworn promise should be carved into the heart, not a rock, you know."

The Crown Prince of Sayuta, Lee Hun Se Geyol, 13 years old

The Crown Princess of the Je Empire, Dam Eunri, 8 years old

A sworn promise made at youth blossoms entrancingly amidst an impure world stained with betrayals and conspiracies.
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Jihwan Lee (이지환)

alt_title: Master of Monsters, Monster Tamer, モンスターのご主人様
description:
Everyone in a high school is suddenly transported to another world. As they are attacked by monsters they find that some of the students now have superpowers. They organize themselves into two groups. Those without powers are called the Stay Home Group and those with them are called the Exploration Group. On a day where most of the Exploration Group is out, the remaining ones that stay behind start the slaughtering and raping of the Stay Home Group.  
  
Here we meet our protagonist, an average guy with no abilities who had just barely escaped death at the hands of his schoolmates. He ends up far away in a cave on the verge of death, exhausted and wounded when a slime enters the cave and starts eating away at his hand. All he can do is utter, “…please… someone out there… help me….”
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

description:
The crown prince announced that her engagement was broken off and she was exiled. All my efforts as her attendant to avoid such a scenario were all in vain, unable to avoid the condemnation flag, my villainess suggested that she wanted to be my sex slave?!

_"Please break my hymen! I'm Kaito's sex slave after all. Please let out a lot in my baby room."_

She was once called the ice princess but now that has been warped, she's now begging for me to cum inside her. As the princess, she's as good as dead. She didn't show a single hint of regret or remorse during her first experience.

_"AHH! I'm cumming! Fine, I'll make you my sex slave as you wish!!"_

Together with Kaito who reincarnated and had known of her ruin, Chris became his sex slave happily.

As such, Yuuto is soon brought to a demonic academy in order to improve his devilish skills and earn the title of demon lord. And, you know, get a harem along the way.

Well, when the rival empire's ruler sets his sights on winning her heart and freedom, she might have a chance to reclaim more than just her reputation. What could be waiting for her just beyond the Great Barrier?

The Demon Lord’s return to Earth marks the beginning of the ultimate battle!

description: Transported back to her first academy days, Nerys Truydd revisits a life marred by betrayal and torment. Exploited and poisoned by her own family and husband, her demise was met with a vow to curse those who wronged her. Now granted a second chance, Nerys vows to rewrite her fate. As she navigates her past, memories of those who hurt her flood back. Determined and fueled by retribution, she seeks to reclaim all she lost. Can she overturn her tragic past and emerge victorious from the shadows of her betrayal?

title: Return of a Crazy Genius Composer
alt_title: 망나니 천재 작곡가 회귀하다, Return of the Genius Composer
description:
Success, fame, family… In an instant, the genius composer, Min Hyunseung, lost it all. On the brink of death… he wanted to live a different life, one where all those continuous misfortunes couldn’t just be claimed as karma.

“How did this happen…?”

He was given another chance to live.

author: Haesol (정해솔)

title: What's Our Hero Doing?
alt_title: 우리 용사는 뭐함?, Uli Yongsaneun Mwoham?
description:
Our protagonist, who cleared the extremely difficult of Vanta Black Ring a thousand times, awoke in the body of Ordinary Villager A (Hans) in Aram Village, in the tutorial area. 

Monsters were attacking the village! In the midst of life and death, he couldn't help but think of the hero named Cadis and how he'd show up and defeat the monsters - until that very hero died with a single attack. Just when he thought everything was over, he absorbed the hero's abilities!

What happened to the protagonist who wanted to survive comfortably beside the hero, exactly?

author: Kim Danpung

title: Kill The Dragon
alt_title: 킬 더 드래곤, Asesino de Dragones, Maten al dragon
description:
The human race plunged into a war against dragons, who have invaded the earth. At the same time, among the humans arose people with supernatural powers, called psykers.

Through the countless sacrifices of psykers, the war seemed to be coming to an end with the human race as the victors. But when a psyker with the ability to see the future foretold that the dragons will be returning in 15 years, the people established Ark, a facility to train children born with psychic abilities to prepare for the last war of the human race.

There are only three years remaining until the prophesized war. What will happen next?!

---

Baek Woojin is the youngest son of a renowned swordsman family who has neither talent in swordsmanship nor an impressive Aura.

His only goal is the destruction of his own family.

description: Gyeongbok Lee possesses a gift that grants him a sixth sense and supernatural foresight -- however, this ability comes at a steep price, debilitating him each time it is used. But when Gyeongbok tries virtual reality gaming for the first time, he makes a startling discovery: not only could he leverage his psychic ability to gain a significant advantage in the virtual world, but he was also entirely free from its afflictions. Seizing this opportunity, Gyeongbok sets out to become a legendary video game streamer, turning his curse into his greatest asset.

title: When the Strange Gods Cause Chaos, I Turn My Hand and Slay Them
alt_title: 道诡异神作乱，我反手就屠神
description: Young Lu Yu traverses to a different world and acquires the "No Rush, Take Your Time Lottery System." In this new world, peculiar gods, buddhas, and demons are worshipped everywhere, giving rise to various sects. The followers fervently desire their deities to descend and either rule or destroy the world. Consequently, the imperial court establishes the "Demon Suppression Command," a special agency dedicated to investigating such events...
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 红中妙哉

title: I Became the Descendant of the Heavenly Demon
alt_title: 천마의 후손이 되었다, The Heavenly Demon's Descendant, I Became a Descendant of the Heavenly Demon, El descendiente del demonio celestial
description:
Jin Suho lost his mother as a child and decided to become a hunter as he sought revenge for her.
He gave his life to training himself and finally became a B-rank hunter.

Then one day, Suho meets a mysterious man at a Red Gate, which appeared by chance.
The mysterious man who introduced himself as the Heavenly Demon revealed to Jin Suho that Suho was his descendant and that he requires Suho’s body to deal with his rival, the Blood Demon.
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Jung SeonYul (정선율)

title: I Raised My Husband Wrong
alt_title: 남편을 잘못 키워 버렸다, He Malcriado A Mi Esposo
description:
The Bloody, Murderous Ghoul, the Mad Dog of the Battlefield…
The countless nicknames of Libertisha, who was driven into war from a young age.

After the war ended, she received an offer to marry a duke, and her partner was...

"Who the hell are you? Get lost."

Little did she know it would be a child!

They were eventually wed after many trials and tribulations. However, during a mission she became trapped in an unknown space. Once she finally made it out, ten years had passed outside.

But now...

"Stay with me, Leti."

Where did my little kitten-like husband go? Now my all-grown-up husband is obsessed with me?!
genre: Long Strip, Fantasy, Full Color
author: 다라빛

title: Capeta
alt_title: カペタ, 极速方程式
description:
Taira Capeta was a 4th grader boy. He had lost his mother when he had been very little. Although he pretended to be tough in front of his father, actually he felt lonely. One day, his father brought junk parts home from his workplace and made a racing kart. Soon, they went to a circuit to drive the kart. However, Capeta found that its frame was bent and it could hardly run straight. But, with his technique he managed the kart. Furthermore, he followed soon after the fast kart and he could nearly leave it behind. The driver in the kart was Minamoto Naomi, the champion of the East Japan Junior Kart. Looking at their chase, Naomi’s mother, Minamoto Nanako, advised Capeta to take part in the official race.  
  
This manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for shōnen in 2005.
genre: Award Winning, Comedy, Sports, Drama
author: Soda Masahito

title: NES Rocky
alt_title: ファミコンロッキー
description:
(from wikipedia.ja):

The main character, Yuki Todoroki, uses a variety of game techniques that he has developed himself to compete against the best players on the NES. Various tournaments are held, ranging from a neighborhood association-level tournament to a match against a secret society plotting a global conspiracy.

In the "Shogakugakusei Gosei" serialization, Yuki Todoroki plays against numerous opponents on the NES, but his opponents are different from those in the "CoroCoro Comics" serialization, and the games used in the matches are also different from those in the "CoroCoro Comics" version. Some games, such as "Super Mario Bros." In "Bessatsu Koro Koro Comic" a joint production with Kaoru Obayashi's "Radio Controlled Boy" which was also serialized in the same magazine, proved the popularity of the NES and radio controller, two major hobbies of the time. This chapter was included in Tentomushi Comics' "Hero Special".
genre: Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Motoyuki Asai

title: The Villainess Can't Take Revenge on Her Reaper Father
alt_title: 悪役令嬢は死神パパに復讐がしたいのに！ ～人生2周目、パパの心の声が可愛すぎてまさかの愛され物語！？～, Even Though the Villainess Wants to Take Revenge on Her Reaper Dad ~This Is My Second Life, but I Can Hear What Papa’s Heart Is Saying and It’s Too Cute! An Unlikely Story about Getting Loved!?~
description: The villainess wants to take revenge on her reaper father! Capella Axicon, the daughter of two great dukes, faces a dire situation after being accused of murdering her fiancé, Prince Oberon. Seeking help from her only remaining family, her father, the Reaper Duke, she's met with his ruthless demeanor. "I want revenge on my father!" Her earnest wish is fulfilled after her execution as she's granted a new beginning as a baby. Surprisingly, she can now hear her father's heart which has turned too cute to be a beloved tale...? "Where in the world is that ruthless Reaper Duke? What's going to happen to my revenge?"
genre: Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Full Color
author: Yui Regina

title: Shinkon no Iroha-san
alt_title: Newly Wed Miss Iroha, 新婚のいろはさん, 新婚的彩葉小姐
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
author: OYSTER

title: Oshinobi Dousei
alt_title: お忍び同棲, Тайное сожительство, Living With a Kunoichi
description: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
genre: Demons, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Web Comic
author: Ponto Gotanda

title: Matcha Made in Heaven
alt_title: この恋、茶番につき!?, This Love, Is a Farce!?, This Love Is a Traves-tea?!, Matcha Made in Heaven
description:
Chako Hananoki thought she'd found happiness in a handsome fiancé, but when she realized a marriage to him would mean a total erasure of herself, she broke it off and moved back into her childhood home in the country—only to find a strange man and young woman living there? She finds a way to coexist with them, but when her stalker fiancé follows her home, she declares to him (and accidentally to the whole village as well) that this new man in her life is her husband?! A dramatic fake-marriage, found-family story for the ages. 

(Source: Kodansha)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Yamanaka Umebachi

title: My S-Class Hunters
alt_title: 내가 키운 S급들, S-ранги, которых я вырастил, The S-Ranks That I Raised, My S-Class Hunters, Naega Kiun S-Geupdeul
description:
Yoojin is an F-ranker overshadowed by his little brother, an S-ranker. All he does is get in his brother’s way, causing trouble wherever he goes. 

When a seemingly routine dungeon raid goes wrong and costs Yoojin his brother’s life, Yoojin decides to use the wish granted by clearing the dungeon to reset his timeline. The plan was to lead a quiet life from now on… but now it turns out he can help other people become S-rankers?! 

Maybe this is Yoojin’s chance at building his own entourage of powerful metahumans… but it may be easier said than done.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iAg_R96Cnko)
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Seri (세리)

title: Otaku ni Yasashii Gal wa Inai!?
alt_title: オタクに優しいギャルはいない!?, Gal Can’t Be Kind to Otaku!?, 没有辣妹会对阿宅温柔!?, Gals Can't Be Kind To A Geek!?
description: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku... It's about a school romantic comedy where the otaku meets the gal he likes!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Norishiro-Chan

title: Unfilial Child
alt_title: 불효자, Son's Retribution
description: Kang Pildu, a cold-blooded psychopathic prosecutor, receives the news of his mother's death. He finds out that the "Seonhwa Group" led by his father and older brothers was involved in her death. Thus begins his desperate revenge plot to bring down the Seonhwa Group.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Jeong Chan

title: Even Though I Transmigrated as a Villainess, I’d Rather Raise a Cat
alt_title: 악역에 빙의했지만, 고양이나 키울래요, I Reincarnated as a Villainess, But Why Did I Become a Cat Butler Instead?, Even Though I Was Possessed as a Villain, I Still Want to Raise a Cat
description:
I transmigrated as Rowaine, the villainess who was executed for abusing a werebeast. In order to escape death, I decided to replace my sister Linier in her arranged marriage.

The problem is that Duke Blois, the groom, is a cat werebeast who is known as a bloodthirsty battlefield monster…

“My dear, I heard your hobbies include abusing werebeasts like myself.”

“I haven’t heard of such a condition stating that women who abused werebeasts could not be Your Grace’s wife, though.”

His emerald eyes flashed dangerously at me, I quickly kept speaking before he could say anything.

“If my hobby is a problem, then I promise that I will never abuse you, Your Grace.”

“Ha– what?”

This is the story of a ten-year contractual marriage between a cat lover and a prickly cat werebeast.
genre: Reincarnation, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Chanyeon

title: Hardcore Leveling Warrior: Earth Game
description:
"I’m... back!"

After a comet collides on Earth, a gaming world filled with monsters and dungeons becomes a reality. Amidst the chaos, Gong Won-Ho wakes up as Hardcore Leveling Warrior, an almighty game character with exceptional luck and power.

Once again, he will embark on a journey to become the strongest... but this time, on Earth!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kim Sehoon (김세훈)

title: My Daughter Is the Final Boss
alt_title: 내 딸은 최종 보스, Nae Ddar'eun Cheojong Boss, 我的女兒是最終頭目, 灭世女神今年5岁, Nae Ttareun Choejong Boss, Моя дочь — Финальный Босс, 俺の娘はラスボス, 灭世女神今年5岁, 我的女儿是最终的老板, 我的女兒是最終的老闆, Mi Hija es el Jefe Final
description:
Lee Seo-jun could only watch as his daughter, the witch Lee Seol-ah, turned into the wicked final boss who destroyed the world and brought upon his death. 

Though never a good dad, as he loses consciousness, Seo-jun gets a new quest.

[Change the future.] 

Upon awakening, he sees a 5-year-old Seol-ah standing before him. Now, Seo-jun must raise Seol-ah to avoid the misfortunes that originally turned her wicked and become the caring father she never had.

The price of failure? Only the end of the world.


---

title: After Rebirth: Upgrading through Consumption
alt_title: 重生不当舔王，我独自氪金升级, I Regressed to Level Up Instead of Being a Simp, Rebirth Without Being the Licking King, I Use Cash to Level Up
description: After failing the college entrance examination and being cheated on, Han Li, who achieved nothing after graduation, made a wish to heaven: "I wish... to go back in time..." Thus the Consumer System appeared and Han Li regressed to the age of eighteen! Not enough skills? Upgrade them with points! Looks too ordinary? Fix that mug with some points! The rich classmate who always looked for trouble taught him a lesson, and captured the hearts of the goddesses... With this regression, let's witness how Han Li counterattacks and rises to the heavens!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: 绘世TONY

title: Furitsumore Kodoku na Shi yo
alt_title: 降り積もれ孤独な死よ, A Suffocatingly Lonely Death
description:
The latest work from the "My Dearest Self With Malice Aforethought" duo, a blockbuster crime suspense series that has sold over 1 million copies!

Detective Saeki Jin of the Tomizayama South Police Station receives a report of a burglary and heads for a mansion that stands tall on a mountain. However, as he proceeds with his investigation, he discovers a shocking fact. A shiver runs through the investigators...! A noir suspense of passion and lamentation, depicting a detective confronting a bloody madness, is about to begin!
genre: Thriller, Crime, Police, Mystery
author: Inoryuu Hajime

title: My Inventory Is Abnormal
alt_title: 내 인벤토리가 이상하다
description: The game has turned into reality and a “Great Migration” has occurred all over the Earth. As a top-tier ranker thanks to massive in-game purchases, along with the special privileges from the game administrator “Nel,” I got a new lease on life. I even inherited the inventory of my max-level game character as it was prior to the game shutting down. From cash items that no one else can acquire, to special items of legendary grade that everyone desires! Now, everything that everyone wants unfolds infinitely within my inventory. Please, let it be known to only you! My inventory is… abnormal.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Sigyeyeol

title: Kikanshita S-Kyuu Boukensha no Quest Seikatsu
alt_title: 帰還したS級冒険者のクエスト生活, The Regressed S-Class Adventurer's Quest Life
description:
Dungeons began to suddenly appear throughout the world
Kyomi Aki became an S-Class adventurer assassin with his tremendous speed.
Unfortunately, assassins were considered as a failure class.
His class was becoming harder and harder to master the more he advanced.
The class itself had a low attack power and mana, so he needed to always rely on someone else.
One day, Aki encountered a dangerous monster that could wipe out the entirety of humanity.
He somewhat managed to subjugate the monster, but lost his life in the process.
Suddenly, he awoke and found himself having regressed 20 years into the past.
He also received an additional “Bonus Quest” as a reward for solo killing the monster.
With his knowledge from his previous lifetime and this “quest,” Aki resolved himself to redo everything to become the strongest adventurer.
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Full Color
author: CK

title: Watashi no Koi no Hajimekata
alt_title: わたしの恋のはじめかた, This Is My Love Story
description:
I want to see the look on Senpai's face when she falls in love.'' 
Chisaki, a reality dating show geek, has formed many couples in her daily life and because of this, everyone calls her Machiapu Senpai (MatchApp-senpai). She had given up on her love life, but Reo-kun, her popular and good-looking kouhai, somehow became emotionally attached to her! While supporting Reo-kun’s friend's love journey, she decides to rehabilitate her own love life with Reo-kun too?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Komari Morisawa

title: +99 Reinforced Wooden Stick
alt_title: 99강화나무몽둥이, 99ganghwanamumongdungi, 99 Reinforced Wood Stick, +99 Wooden Stick, 99强化木棍, 99強化木棒
description: Welcome to “Chrono Life,” a virtual reality game where only the strongest survive. Ji-u logs in to “Chrono Life,” only to be ignored and ridiculed by the other players for his lack of experience, crappy items, and being an overall noob. But when he upgrades his wooden stick to the max reinforcement level of +99, Ji-u realizes he has the power to split continents and slay armies of thousands in just one swing. “It’s time to teach the rest of you a lesson, you f*ckers.”
genre: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hong-Sil (홍실)

title: A Witch's Life in Mongol
alt_title: 天幕のジャードゥーガル
description: In the 13th century, Fatima, a captive of the Mongol Empire, the most powerful empire on earth, was taken prisoner and assigned to serve in the imperial palace. With knowledge from Iran, the era's foremost experts on medicine and science, Fatima seeks a world in which she can display her talents. She meets Töregene, the sixth wife of the second emperor, Ögedei, who has mixed feelings about the Mongol Empire....
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Military, Drama
author: Tomato Soup

title: Yume ka Utsutsu ka
alt_title: ユメかウツツか
description: SeishunScans: Youth romance between a girl who has a hard time talking to people and her supportive senpai, a boy no one knows.
genre: Romance, School Life
author: Sakisaka Io

title: Movies Are Real
alt_title: 영화는 리얼이다, Фильм - это реальность, Yeonghwaneun Real-ida
description:
While working as a small supporting actor in a movie, Ki Man Sung has nothing else going for him.  
However, that was when ,through mysterious circumstance, the movie set had become reality during filming.  
With the sound of the director’s cut, during that short take, he’s not an actor but actually thrown into the events occurring, showing the pain and emotions he faces in that moment.  
He can only come back if he creates that perfect take…!  
Can he grow to become the greatest actor?
genre: Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Toon Plus (주)툰플러스

title: Seishun Heavy Rotation
alt_title: The springtime of my life, 青春ヘビーローテーション, 청춘 헤비 로테이션, Youth Heavy Rotation, La primavera de mi vida
description:
Nao falls in love at first sight with the hottie prince Haruna-kun, who helps her overcome anxiety during the high school entrance examination. She safely gets into high school and feels that she’s fated to the guy sitting next to her. However, Haruna-kun is very popular and has a habit of saying “I hate girls who tell me they like me.”. Even so, Haruna-kun still messes with Nao.
Nao gradually falls in love with him as she gets to know him better. Haruna-kun may look mean, but he’s actually very kind.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Minase Ai

title: Apocalyptic Chef Awakening
alt_title: 멸망한 세계의 취사병, Myeolmanghan Segyeui Chwisabyeong
description: Shin Young-jun, a sergeant chef, was greeted by the apocalypse just days before vacation. The battalion turned into chaos in an instant, and the communication network was cut off. Then something appeared before his eyes! [Congratulations on your awakening!] [Job: Novice Chef Lv.1] If I had been a warrior or an assassin, I would have tried to stand alone... What was assigned to him was chef, which is obviously a support job. There's nothing to be done if it's like this. "From here on, I will feed you."
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Cooking, Full Color
author: 마일드커피

title: Koi ni Mudaguchi
alt_title: Chatter About Love, 恋に無駄口
description: The romantic comedy centers on a high school boy who is wasting his youth.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Fukuyama Ryoko

title: Special Civil Servant
alt_title: 별정직 공무원
description: After failing the Grade Nine civil service exam four times and many twists and turns, Han Maru finally succeeded in becoming a special civil servant under the Ministry of Environment. Goodbye, gosiwon! Goodbye, convenience store lunchboxes! But the joy of passing was short-lived. It turned out to be a life-threatening national secret job?! Along with the yellow dust came the demons, creatures that kill and eat humans. The Grade 9 special civil servant job involved waging war against these demons! Han Maru’s life-threatening civil service career begins.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Seo Jaewon

title: White Rabbit in Wonderland
alt_title: 이상한 나라의 흰 토끼
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Myeong-yoon

title: Houtai Gokko
alt_title: 包帯ごっこ, Bandage Play
description: Hirose Itsuki is a high school girl who is afraid of getting hurt. One day, Hino, a celebrity at school who quit basketball because of an injury, asks her, "Do you know any good ways to pass the time?" Hino asks her if she knows of any good ways to pass the time, and they end up studying together. Itsuki then gradually becomes aware of Hino. A pure love story of a medical student begins!
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yamagata Aona

title: The Holy Power of Modern Medicine
alt_title: 성자는 개뿔, 현대의학의 힘이다, Святые – сила современной медицины, To Hell With Being a Saint, I'm a Doctor
description:
Jin Yoosung was a gifted surgeon said to be able to bring the dead back to life. However, not even this genius doctor had the ability to revive himself. Following a fatal car crash, Yoosung closed his eyes for what he'd thought was the last time… only to wake up and find that he's been reborn in a fantasy world!

A doctor through and through, Yoosung — now Ray — resolves to become a healer again. Unfortunately, it seems his new magical abilities may not be the most fitting for his dream career…
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Lorenzo (로렌조)

alt_title: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 5: The City of Water and the Hero's Poem, Re:ZERO - Starting Life in Another World-, Arco 5: La Capital del Agua y El Poema del Héroe., Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活　第五章　水の都と英雄の詩, Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть пятая: Звёзды, что творят историю

alt_title: Pulse (Ratana Satis), パルス〜鼓動が聞こえ始める〜, 펄스 Pulse
description:
Mel, a renowned heart surgeon, lives a carefree life with sex being a tool for joy rather than a show of affection. Then she meets someone that turns her view of love and life upside down. This story is about two people that meet with minimal expectations but soon become enthralled in a relationship that changes everything about themselves.

[Official English 2](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/pulse/)
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Medical
author: Ratana Satis

title: Bocchi the Rock!
alt_title: Bocchi the Rock!, ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！, 愛好·扎·搖滾！, 爱好·扎·摇滚！, Одинокий Рокер!
description:
Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, 
but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. 
However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Music
author: Hamaji Aki

title: Leveling Beyond the Max
alt_title: 만렙부터 레벨업, Maxed Out Leveling, Поднятие уровня начиная с максимального возможного, Level Up from Max Level, Exceeding Max Level
description:
Max-level internal arts, max-level external arts.

Jianghu, Murim’s famous and strongest, Cha Shin Hyeon.

I came back to Earth after reaching the peak of martial arts, but why has everything changed so much?

A world where monsters are coming out of dungeons, and hunters are leveling up via their status windows.

‘Start again from level one? That doesn’t phase me at all, since my martial arts are already at the max level.’
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Studio M (스튜디오M)

title: The Worn and Torn Newbie
alt_title: 닳고 닳은 뉴비, 元ガチ勢、初心者に生まれ変わる, Изрядно поношенный нуб, 全裸菜鸟在异世界被摩擦, Dalko Dareun Newbie
description:
After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare, Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes, Eojin starts anew as the hotshot, Stagnant Water. 

He’s conquering monsters, getting sweet gear, and making enough dough to set himself up for life!

 Loved by fans and hated by foes, both old and new, will Eojin break the game and triumph, or will the game break him once again?
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Step on a LEGO (레고밟았어)

title: Your Kiss Scene!
alt_title: 너의 키스씬!
description:
Entertainment writer Lee Seul, heard the news of her favorite idol, Block Shoot's Seung-Chan, on her new entertainment program.
Expectations of meeting her favorite for more than 10 years are brief, and she accidentally sees her favorite idol kissing someone else in secret at the broadcasting station.
In addition, the entertainment program she was in charge of is a love variety program that’s full of dating amongst the cast...
She has to watch her favorite idol flirting and dating someone else even if he's her favorite.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Full Color
author: Jonnie

title: Maou Gun Saikyou no Majutsushi wa Ningen datta
alt_title: The Maou Army's Strongest Magician Was a Human, Самый сильный волшебник армии Мао оказался человеком, 魔王軍最強の魔術師は人間だった, 마왕군 최강의 마술사는 인간이었다, 魔王軍最強的魔術師是人類, The Strongest Magician in the Demon Lord's Army Was a Human
description: “Maou Army’s strongest magician” I’m called. Ike, a demon capable of capturing a fort alone. Clearing away enemies with immense magic, he is without a doubt a monster held in awe by friend and foe. However he has a secret he can’t tell other demons. “I, actually am a human you know.” Using modern knowledge to keep his secret, he became treated as a great commander and the driving force of the Maou’s army.
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hata Ryousuke

title: The Slumbering Ranker
alt_title: 잠만 자도 랭커, Ranker, Even if I Sleep, Even if I Sleep, I Rank, Даже если я сплю, я оцениваю, Sleeping Ranker, Ranker Just By Sleeping, Ranker Durmiente
description:
“We’re only taking a break for about 30 seconds? I’m not imagining things, right?”
 “…Yes.” 

After 15 hours of hunting, Hyunsung asked to rest for a while, and after 30 seconds, he had to get up again and started hunting.
Actually, Hyunsung has a special skill.

[Thananos’ narcolepsy skill is activated.]
[You’re being forced into a sleep state.]

After sleeping for a while and waking up, I got an item? 
Pay close attention to the story of the God-Rank Class, the descendant of Thananos, the unstoppable Hyunsung.
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Woleog (워럭)

title: Ore no [Kantei] Skill ga Cheat Sugite ~Densetsu no Yuusha wo Yomi "Tori" Saikyou e~
alt_title: 俺の『鑑定』スキルがチートすぎて ～伝説の勇者を読み“盗り”最強へ～, My [Appraisal] Skill Is Too Overpowered ~Reading and Stealing the Legendary Hero’s Skills to Become the Strongest~
description:
When Mel Rairoot, an orphaned boy, turned 15, he was given the unique skill of [Appraisal], which allows him to read information about people and objects. Moreover, it was an extraordinary skill that should not exist, surpassing even the legendary rank S... rank EX! 

However, since [Appraisal] can also read information about people, there is a risk that it will be targeted by criminals who want to hide their identities. Mel's life is immediately targeted, and although he somehow manages to fight back, he is now being pursued! 

Mel is forced to live on the run with Silphy, the princess of the elf country who has lost her memory, and Clara, a tiger girl. However, he makes full use of his cheat ability to brilliantly overcome many difficulties! With the "Eye of God" in his hands, the boy reads and steals the power of the legendary hero, and rises to the top!



[Webnovel link](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7932dt/)
genre: Action, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Sumimori Sai

title: SSS-Rank Dungeon de Knife Ippon Tewatasare Tsuihou Sareta Shiro Madoushi: Yggdrasil no Noroi ni yori Jakuten de aru Maryoku Fusoku wo Kokufuku-shi Sekai Saikyou e to Itaru
alt_title: SSSランクダンジョンでナイフ一本手渡され追放された白魔導師 ユグドラシルの呪いにより弱点である魔力不足を克服し世界最強へと至る, A White Mage Who Was Exiled After Being Handed a Knife in an SSS-Rank Dungeon ~ Due to the Curse of Yggdrasil, He Overcame His Weak Point, Lack of Magical Power, and Became the Strongest in the World
description:
Rei, a white mage who belongs to an A-rank adventurer party, is expelled from the party as a useless person who cannot move after using Heal once. Only one dagger was handed over.

Left alone in the SSS rank dungeon, Labyrinth of Yggdrasil, he prepares for death… "You're the first human to reach this far." As if being guided by something, Rei meets Norn, a mysterious girl who lives in the lowest level of the dungeon, World Tree!

Rei, who obtained infinite magical power, was trained by Norn to survive in this harsh dungen. "Norn, I…" There was something left unfinished. The boy who has become the strongest returns to earth with only one knife in his hand. The strongest high fantasy begins here!
genre: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kamitoichi

title: Disney Twisted Wonderland - The Comic - ~Episode of Octavinelle~
alt_title: ディズニー ツイステッドワンダーランド THE COMIC ～EPISODE of OCTAVINELLE～
genre: Magic, School Life, Adaptation
author: Toboso Yana

title: Kojiin Tamer
alt_title: The Orphanage's Tamer, 孤児院テイマー, 고아원 테이머, Укротитель из приюта, 孤兒院馴獸師, 孤儿院驯兽师
description:
Shu, who died of old age, reincarnated as a baby in a different world where he was picked up by a poor orphanage. He quickly grows up under the watchful eye of the gentle director and staff. With skills received from God, he starts to exert talent…
He now lives at his own pace, adventuring with cute monsters and good friends ♪

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5081ed/) (jp)
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Adaptation
author: Andou Masaki (安藤正樹)

title: Your Majesty, Please Stop Now
alt_title: 폐하 이제 그만, Su majestad, pare por favor
description:
Sharan is a pagan slave in the Valdek Empire.
Every night in her dreams, she sees visions of a man wandering around, unable to sleep.

The man is none other than Julian, Emperor of the Valdek Empire. He is suffering from severe insomnia caused by someone's black magic, and Sharan wants to cure him of his insomnia in exchange for freedom from slavery.

But Julian won't let go of Sharan, who is the only thing that can save him, whether she's a lowly pagan slave or the love of his life...

Julian, the sleepless emperor. and the only one who can put him to sleep, Sharan, a pagan slave and the emperor's shaman.
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Aenteula

title: Owari no Seraph
alt_title: Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign, Последний Серафим, 終わりのセラフ, 终结的炽天使
description: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Kagami Takaya

title: God-Slaying Copycat
alt_title: 神殺しの模倣使い, Godslayer's Imitator
description:
"If it’s to protect someone close to me… then I’d even kill a god."

Half a century ago, Dungeons, Monsters, as well as people who had received special abilities commonly referred to as [Skills] appeared. Those people were referred to as Adventurers and challenged dungeons in search of dreams and riches.

Kisaragi Tsukasa is one of these adventurers. However, he has received an inferior skill and was often treated as trash. One day, he was tricked by his peers and was thrown into a dangerous dungeon.

What awaited him at the other end was the Mythical monster, the God-Eater Fenrir. In despair over the overwhelming power difference, Tsukasa was prepared to die. That was when the master of the dungeon, Loki, appeared before him.

“Welcome to my castle.”

Thanks to Loki, Tsukasa’s skill evolved to become [Copycat]... A unique boy-meets-girl story woven into a modern battle fantasy is about to begin!
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Amane Megumi

title: When My Organs Awakened, I Suddenly Became Invincible
alt_title: My Organs Awakened and I Suddenly Became Invincible, 器官觉醒，我突然无敌了
description: After transmigrating, Ye Qing discovered that his organs could cultivate themselves under certain conditions, and sometimes they even had their own thoughts. With the help of these overly independent organs, Ye Qing advanced rapidly on his cultivation journey. While others were busy cultivating, comprehending, and breaking through, his organs had already paved the way for him. However, because his organs had too many of their own ideas, Ye Qing frequently encountered some 'small' troubles.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts
author: 三界动画

title: Genesis of the Battle God
alt_title: 日本語
description: In an era where mythology and reality have fused together, the powers of gods and heroes from ancient myths like those of Greece, Rome, Judea, and Egypt have descended upon the modern world of the 21st century. Ken Yanagimoto, an “Awakened One” with physical abilities and senses far superior to those of ordinary people, has returned after five years of working as a mercenary overseas. Upon his return, he discovers that his parents have been killed and his sister has gone missing at the hands of the powerful organization “Seven Star Society,” which controls the political, financial, and media worlds. Enraged by the death of his parents and the disappearance of his sister, Ken vows revenge against the “Seven Star Society” and confronts various secret forces and injustices around the globe. Amid the grim reality of the dawn of a new era of human evolution, the story of one man who engages in mythical battles against the world begins.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: にほんご

title: Koroshi Ai
alt_title: Love of Kill, 殺し愛, 相愛相殺
description: One day, Chateau, a bounty hunter belonging to an assassin organization, encounters the mysterious bounty hunter Ryang-ha. After being shown the overwhelming difference in their abilities and thinking that this is going to be her end, Ryang-ha's only demand from her is to exchange their contact information. And thus started a game of cat and mouse, in which the hands of the participants are fully covered in blood...
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Crime, Drama
author: Fe

title: Yoru no Kurage wa Oyogenai
alt_title: Jellyfish Can't Swim in the Night, 夜のクラゲは泳げない
description: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.
genre: Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: JELEE

title: The Descent of the Demonic Master
alt_title: Majon Hyeonse Ganglimgi, Нисхождение демонического мастера, 마존현세강림기
description:
The first life: After a tragic accident losing his family and legs, he ends his own life.

The second life: He earned fame as the Red Demonic Master in Zhongyuan, but was betrayed by the man he trusted the most.

And now comes his third life. In his life back in the modern world, Gang Jinho decides to live a normal life. However, he was too used to the Zhongyuan life to become a normal person!

"I wanted to live peacefully. But you are the ones who started it. I hope you're prepared for this."

In front of the threats of his new life, can Gang Jinho shake off his impulses as the Red Demonic Master and obtain the 'normal life' he desires? The adaptation story of a legendary martial artist in the 21st century!
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Wolbaek

title: I've Probably Made a Mistake in Getting Married
alt_title: 아무래도 결혼을 잘못한 것 같다, I Think My Marriage Was a Mistake, I Guess I Got Married Wrong, Tal vez me casé con la persona equivocada
description:
I've reincarnated in the world of fiction, where characters are decapitated at the hands of villains.

I read the famous gothic novels to cure my timidity and build my courage! Before the real story can begin, I have to get away from the dreaded capital society. So I married a poor baron in the countryside...

"Don't make me pay your bills. Do you understand?"

This man, who shows up at the wedding covered in blood, must be the dreaded villain who kills everyone! Did I, in an attempt to avoid being a villain, marry a man who would be a villain? I'm definitely screwed. I must have married the wrong person!
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Kim Daham

title: Maria no Danzai
alt_title: 聖母の断罪, Maria's Judgement, La Condena de María, Возмездие Девы Марии
description: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life, Tragedy
author: Kazuki (カズキ)

title: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau
alt_title: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう, クセ強彼女はとこにいざなう, クセ強彼女は床(とこ)にいざなう, A Quirky Girl Is Inviting Me to Bed
description:
***I'm suddenly living together with the older girl I used to have a crush on!? Even more, I'm starting to suspect that she's a slut!?***

Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on.

The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?

This is the start of his exciting new life surrounded by slutty(?) older girls!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Suga Atsushi

title: You Are My Desire
alt_title: 白日梦我
description:
The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Qi Jian (栖見)

title: Battle Angel Alita: Last Order
alt_title: GUNNM: Last Order, Боевой ангел Алита: Последний приказ, 銃夢 Last Order
description:
Master mangaka Yukito Kishiro returns, accompanied by his most celebrated character, cyborg sweetheart Battle Angel Alita. Meet Kishiro's latest bevy of bizarre and tormented characters and catch up with your favorite and foes!

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/battle-angel-alita-last-order-omnibus/)
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Vampires, Tragedy
author: Kishiro Yukito

title: I'm a Supporting Role in a Horror Game, Don't Kill Me
alt_title: 공포게임 조연인데요, 죽이지 마세요, Soy un personaje secundario en este juego de terror, ¡así que no me mates!
description:
In the horror mystery game "Night of the Murderers,"
I inhabited the character destined to be the tenth victim,
the tutor 'Arviche Green'.

The prime suspect is her employer, Duke Rearmend Laycus!

"…A, a murderer."

"Miss Green, you seem convinced that I'm the criminal.
Is that right?"

She lost her life after her last conversation with Laycus.
The remaining life count is two hearts.

'If I use up all my hearts, I really don't know what will happen.
So I need to steer clear of the main plotline of this game as much as possible.'

Arviche's efforts to distance herself from Laycus, the prime suspect,
perversely catches his interest...

"Do you remember when I said you were interesting, Miss Green?
I must retract that statement."

It was a relief to hear that.
The interest of a murderer is nothing but horrifying.

"Perhaps saying you're interesting might not be enough."

[Laycus Rearmend's favorability has increased.]

'...Wait, what? This isn't what I intended.'
A misstep.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Bamui (바믜)

title: Real Kiss
alt_title: Real Kiss~真心的吻~, リアル キス
description:
Collection of short stories:  
  
1) Real Kiss  
The player, Fujikawa Mitsuki, likes to tease Haruna. One day their cell phones get switched. What will happen next?  
(Also published in Koibana)  
  
2) Real Love  
  
3) Real Kiss - Heavenly Eyes  
  
4) Real Kiss - Side Fujikawa
genre: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, School Life
author: Miyasaka Kaho

title: This Life Starts as a Child Actor
alt_title: 이번 생은 아역부터, Acting the Child Role at the Start of This Life, Beginning as the Child Actor in This Life, I'm Going to Be the Child Actor in This Life, This Life Starts as Child Actor, This Life Starts From a Child Role
description:
Was this life a failure? On the contrary, I like it! Kang Su-hyun, who has failed in everything he has done in life for four years. He finally found his calling as an actor and thought he was seeing the light, but he collided with a truck coming from the opposite side and despaired as death approached...

“Wait a minute, didn’t I die?”

When he regained consciousness, was his appearance reflected in the mirror the cutest version of himself from when he was 5 years old? Yes, in this life I start as a child actor!

Kang Su-hyun's acting career begins.
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Mental Garumon

title: MF Ghost
alt_title: MFゴースト, MF幽靈
description: In the year 202X, when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous, the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British, half-Japanese racing driver, Kanata Rivington. Who graduated at the top of his class in racing school and was invited into the series thanks to his teacher's connections.
genre: Action, Sports, Slice of Life
author: Shigeno Shuuichi

title: The Invincible Man
alt_title: 無籍者, 무적자, Moojokja, A Better Tomorrow (Cyungchan Noh)
description: Im Hwapyung. A man who wants to live a normal life like his name. Everything he had in his mundane life was destroyed. [Your love has become my loathing.] You shouldn’t have messed with me in the first place. You should have just let me live a quiet life. And now he has began his move that none of his nemesis will survive his wrath.
genre: Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Mafia, Drama
author: Cyungchan Noh

title: I've Become a True Villainess
alt_title: 합법적 악역의 사정, Hapbeopjeong Agyeogui Sajeong, The Tragedy of a Villainess, Tragedy of the Villainess, The Case of the Legal Villain, 合法反派的诉求, Las circunstancias de una verdadera villana, Las circunstancias de Selia y Lesche, The Circumstances of a True Villain
description:
I have to survive, no matter what! I've died and been reincarnated as the villain of a romance novel! In order to avoid the hideous fate that awaits me, I've righted her wrongs and even gotten engaged. I should be home free, but strange things have started happening ever since the heroine appeared. Why won't her fiancé leave me alone?

Note: The English will release on 30th Nov 2022, and the Korean release will release sometime after.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Honey Flow (꿀이흐르는)

title: 4 Cut Hero
alt_title: 4-Cut Hero, 4-keos Yongsa, 4-Panel Hero, 4コマ勇者, 4컷용사, Cartoon Hero, Four-Cut Hero, Четыре рыцаря
description:
The Hero has defeated the Demon King! But the Princess he meant to save turned out to be a Prince. NEETdom, here he comes, but a life of relaxation surrounded by animes is a pretty sweet deal.  
  
Unfortunately, he gets caught up in millennia old legends, curses, and a twisted plot involving multiple Kingdoms and many dragons. Through and through, though, he'll follow a path of whimsy, even if that involves him palling it up with "villains".
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Gojira-kun

title: Absolute Obedience
alt_title: Absolute Submission, Bully Conquest, 绝对服从, 절대복종
description: Jin Daim, who was being bullied by delinquents, encounters a game on his old phone that changes his life. A fraudulent strategic RPG game where you can boss around the delinquents and recruit benevolent helpers to grow stronger! The ultimate goal of this RPG game is to eliminate school violence from the world.
genre: Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hon (혼)

title: Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tenseiki ~Geboku no Youkaidomo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowaisugirundaga~
alt_title: The Reincarnation of the Strongest Exorcist in Another World, 最強陰陽師の異世界転生記 ～下僕の妖怪どもに比べてモンスターが弱すぎるんだが～, 最強陰陽師的異世界轉生記 ～怪物比我的下僕妖怪弱太多了～, 最强阴阳师的异世界转生记, The Reincarnation of the Strongest Onmyoji ~ These Monsters Are Too Weak Compared to My Youkai~
description:
Haruyoshi Kuga’s power as the strongest exorcist is all for naught when he is betrayed by his closest ally. With his dying breath, he casts the secret Spell of Reincarnation — when he next opens his eyes, he finds himself in a different world altogether, reincarnated as Seika Lamprogue, the son of a family of magic scholars!

He quickly learns that the magic in this new world is quite unlike the sorcery he learned in his past life and that he can’t use it. Fortunately for him, with his mastery of curses and the hordes of youkai at his disposal, he doesn’t need to. 

Haruyoshi (now Seika) is determined not to repeat his past mistakes in his second life by smartly laying low and avoiding flaunting his power. Yet accomplishing his goals and without drawing attention to himself proves to be easier said than done — will his powers be enough to live a happy life?! 

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-reincarnation-of-the-strongest-exorcist-in-another-world)

alt_title: 14 Rating, For Us Who Begin to Love, Fourteen Rating, 给刚开始恋爱的我们, 給剛開始戀愛的我們, Рейтинг 14
description:
A volume of 5 oneshots.  
  
1) 14R  
Kawamura Tamaki, 14 years old.  
Seen as a very serious class rep by everyone around. But, what does it mean to be serious? She too falls in love, and…!? A blinding underworld unraveled here!!  
  
2) Mahiru ni Kakedasu  
  
3) Watakushi-sama  
  
4) Koi wo Hajimeru Bokutachi ni (For Us Who Begin to Love)  
A girl, Kawai Oto, and a guy… Will they fall in love?  
  
5) Daily News  
Two twins support each other through everything, but can a guy tear them apart?

author: Maki Youko

title: The Challenger
alt_title: 더 챌린저, 最强王者, Претендент, ザ・チャレンジャー
description:
Noah's classmates can't even be bothered by him in real life, but inside the Interverse, he's the celebrated number one player.

He may be applauded as a genius in-game, but the real world remains a cruel place for Noah... that is until he beats the school bully in an Interverse tournament.

His talents are recognized by a mysterious professor who recruits him into an elite academy.

As reality and the game world blur together, will Noah be able to make a stand for himself and challenge all expectations?

title: Sekigae Game
alt_title: 席替えゲーム, 換座位的戀曲
description:
Tamami is shy, clumsy and slow at everything. Everybody around her and Tamami herself think that she is good for nothing. That’s why Tamami can’t believe that Mitsui-kun, cool and good-looking guy from her class, likes her. It must be some kind of misunderstanding. Or is it not?  
  
1. Sekigae Game  
Tamami is shy, clumsy and slow at everything. Everybody around her and Tamami herself think that she is good for nothing. That’s why Tamami can’t believe that Mitsui-kun, cool and good-looking guy from her class, likes her. It must be some kind of misunderstanding. Or is it not?  
  
2. Goshujin-sama no Inu  
  
3. Hazukashigariya na Kare no Koto  
Mami was confessed to by a delinquent, Masamune. At first she thought he was a scary guy but found his reactions quite cute. How can she get this bad boy to become more lovey-dovey?? (From Intercross)  
  
4. Yasahii Akuma  
  
5. Hana, Hiraku.

title: Koori no Kiss de Toroketai
alt_title: I Want to Melt with a Gelid Kiss, I Want to Melt with a Ice Kiss, Red Lips' Trap, Super Prince, 氷のキスでとろけたい, 热吻圆舞曲
description:
Sugimura Nozomi made a pact with her childhood friend Hyoudo Rei who both have a passion for ice-skating that when they grow up, they will both pair up to get into the Olympics. But then Rei moves away.  
  
Years later, Nozomi transfers to a school famous for its students' emphasis on ice skating. There she unexpectantly meets up with Rei only to find him indifferent to ice skating. But Nozomi will not give up on her dream even if Rei has and she's determined to make it to the school ice-skating club and bring Rei with her as her partner.  
  
Includes two oneshots, Red Lips' Trap and Super Prince.
genre: Romance, Sports, Drama, School Life
author: Asami Miyabi

title: The Blade of Evolution Walking Alone In The Dungeon
alt_title: Swordsman Healer, The Blade of Evolution, Walking Alone in the Dungeon, Эволюция клинка: Одиночка в подземелье, 进化之刃——独自踏向地下城的进阶之路
description: A man awakened his healing ability but this ability is trash. During a mission in an underground dungeon with his team, all the members of his team except him were killed. This was due to the angry “last priest” who was released because of them. in this dungeon he got a sword and upgraded his powers with that sword…. What would that man do alone against all that?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: 小刀

title: Dealing With Demons
alt_title: Even if Disillusionment Swallows You, Even if Despair Consumes You, 환멸이 그대를 삼킬지라도
description:
Staying alive is a new form of entertainment.
When Dokyung, disillusioned by the harshness of life, finally resolves to call it quits, a bored demon, Hwamyung, appears before her with a particular offer. Will Dokyung, having entered into a contract with the Demon of Disillusionment, be able to flip her disastrous life upside down?
genre: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Surreuk Comics (스르륵코믹스)

title: I'm a Villainess, but I'm Good at Cooking
alt_title: 악녀인데 요리를 너무 잘해, This Villainess is Good at Cooking, Soy La Villana Odiada De Esta Historia, Pero Cocino Muy Bien
description:
She became the villain of a novel. And not just any villain, but one who committed several crimes and was expelled from her family! Having no other choice, she started selling food on the streets to survive... But, suddenly, she was kidnapped by the prince of the empire and the villain of the novel. “I want you to be my personal cook,” he said.

But why is he interested in me? After many twists and turns, she became the emperor's exclusive cook and followed a quiet but dull path... Until she discovered that her food had a special effect on people. A genius alchemist, a rival chef, a mysterious fox... Everyone fell in love with her food and with her. And, above all, the emperor, who was the supposed villain, was very kind and protective of her. But, she just wanted to cook in peace!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Somko

title: Scarlet Star
description:
In New Pantheon City, monstrous "Voids" have plagued the people for over 500 years. 

However, they are not without their protectors - Immortal Magical guardians are also there to fight back against them.

Living in New Pantheon City is Mars Hino - a troubled outcast. Because of his reputation, vulgar personality, and lack of social finesse, he has found himself entering high school alone.

That is before he meets the hero of the Blunbell district, the magical girl Scarlet Star - who chooses him for a higher duty
genre: Genderswap, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Magical Girls, Self-Published, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kimjdav

title: Marii to Santa
alt_title: Mari and Santa, マリーとサンタ
description: Santa crashes into a tree and spends an evening with a practical but sweet little girl.
genre: Oneshot, Comedy, Drama
author: Nigushi Keiko

title: Osage-chan 4koma
alt_title: ぬくぬく四コマめし
description: A series of 4koma comics featuring Osage-chan by Nukunuku Nigirimeshi (@NKNK_NGRMS).
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Nukunuku Nigirimeshi

title: The Last Adventurer
alt_title: 최후의 모험가, Последний искатель приключений, Choehu-ui Moheomga, 메이플스토리: 최후의 모험가, Maplestory: The Last Adventurer, El último aventurero
description:
In the Era of Adventure kickstarted by the spawning of Gates, marked by absolute hopelessness, destitute, desperation, and despair, everyone had given up their hope and lost their courage to continue fighting - except one adventurer that refused to go down until his last breath.

"You are the only one left, Last Adventurer Elpam."

As the history of adventurers was forced to come to an end, the Last Adventurer returned to where this story all began.
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dedart (디다트)

title: Love Lab
alt_title: Rabu Rabo, Renai Lab, ラブラボ, 恋愛ラボ
description:
Love Lab is set in Fujisaki Girls Academy, which is known for their school body being composed of very prim and proper middle school students. The most prominent one of them is Natsuo Maki, the student council president who is admired by her classmates for her calm and polite demeanor, and her profound beauty. On the other hand, Riko Kurahashi is also admired, but due to her having a very forward and boyish personality.   
  
One day, Riko accidentally walks into Maki when she is kissing a body pillow with a picture of a guy for practice, and learns that she is not as collected as everyone thinks she is. Riko is forced into keeping Maki's secret and joins her in practicing romance activities such as holding hands and more, and in the middle of all that mess, somehow smoothly running a student council regardless!
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Miyahara Ruri

title: The Obsessed Emperor's Competent Pharmacist
alt_title: 집착 황제의 유능한 약사입니다, I Am a Competent Pharmacist of the Obsessive Emperor, I Am the Obsessive Emperor's Talented Pharmacist, 凄腕薬師ですが、 皇帝に執着されています, La talentosa médica del emperador obsesivo
description: ¡En cuanto poseí este cuerpo, llamé la atención de un apuesto emperador y me ofreció un puesto como su farmacéutico exclusivo...! ¡El salario y los beneficios son de primera! En ese caso, ganemos rápido y hagamos una escapada. Entonces, ¡podré disfrutar de una vida joven y rica! Pero espera, ¿qué? "¡¿Un contrato de por vida?! ¡Esto es ridículo!" No puedo convertirme en esclavo del palacio de por vida sólo porque haya estampado un sello por descuido. ¡Así que decidí escapar del emperador! "Hailey, prueba esto también." Me sirve postres dulces, "Hailey, eres una persona preciosa para mí". Me dice que soy especial, "La renuncia será difícil. Deberías haber tenido más cuidado con el contrato". ¡¿Por qué de repente este hombre está tan obsesionado conmigo?! ¿Podré renunciar a esta esclavitud sin problemas...?
genre: Official Colored, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy
author: Solgit

title: After School Lessons for Unripe Apples
alt_title: A 90's Cram School for the Unripened, 세기말 풋사과 보습학원, 20th Century Green Apple School, 90's Cram School for Unripe Apples
description:
That asshole is back as an entirely new level of asshole!   
  
In her final year of middle school, Hwang Miae is stuck with Kim Cheol, a boy she met briefly years ago - he's her classmate… and her neighbor. Now the other kids keep calling them a couple! In a flurry of uneasiness, Cheol starts to avoid Miae like the plague.   
  
You bastard! Do you think you're the only one going through this?   
  
But it doesn't stop there. Destiny won't leave them alone as Kim Cheol and Hwang Miae keep seeing each other everywhere… causing even more trouble. As strange friends intrude on their relationship, Miae experiences puberty the right way…   
  
A new project of <Cheese In The Trap> author Soonkki!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Soon-Ki

title: Hoshiiro no Okurimono
alt_title: Antique Wish, Star Colored Gift, The Star-Color Present, 星夜的礼物, 星色のおくりもの
description:
- Hoshiiro no Okurimono (Star Colored Gift)  
I have always believed that this meeting was fate. I thought that your smile, everyone’s laughter, and the happy times were going to continue. We wish upon a shooting star, hoping that we would be together always. Thinking that the wish would come true…  
  
- Antique Wish e Youkoso (Antique Wish)  
Nishina has always been in love with Haijima Kaname since the day she saw him cry. One day, she follows him to Antique Wish. What's gonna happen next? Will her wish be granted?  
  
- Sleeping Beauty wa Nemurenai (Suriipingu Biyuutei wa Nemurenai)  
Chiharu's sleeping face was so beautiful that Minori kissed him. But because of that, Minoru teaches Chiharu a lesson in…?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life
author: Toma Rei

title: I Am the Nanny of the Villain
alt_title: I'm the Villainous Male Lead's Terminally Ill Aunt, I am the Terminally Ill Nanny of the Dark Male Lead., 흑막 남주의 시한부 유모입니다, Soy la niñera por tiempo limitado del villano
description:
She became the nanny of Claude, the blackened male protagonist who would destroy the world. If this continues, she will be killed by the cursed power possessed by the blackened male protagonist. So, she decided to pour out her love for the blackened male protagonist to prevent the blackening.

She also raised the child’s self-esteem, and made the Duke act like a proper father, as fatherly love was essential for the male protagonist’s self-esteem.

She thought the child was gradually recovering his bright face, and the Duke was now learning how to gradually give love to the child.

But she doesn’t know if it’s because she worked too hard….?

“It has always been a problem. You have hundreds of reasons to abandon me, but I don’t have a single one.”

“Nanny will always be by my side, right? That’s why you can’t go. Never, never.”

Two men started obsessing over me.
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Lee Seorae

title: Koi wa Hito no Hoka
alt_title: Love Is for Other People, Love Is for Others, Loving a Non-human, Spring Rain, Любовь для других людей, 恋は人の外
description: Tsukumo Sayo made a promise with a child demon when she was 5 years old. Now, 10 years later, that demon is tired of waiting for her, and suddenly he appears in front of Sayo to fulfill that promise. "I'll definitely make you fall in love with me." Well now, which side will fall first?
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Minami Maki

title: Mr. Baek
alt_title: 백XX, Baek XX
description:
Federal Informant ‘Baek Yisu’ and a criminal gang’s boss, ‘Baek Dogyeong’ are twin brothers.

With the same faces the two twin brothers have lived different lives until now. Yisu, who’s been betrayed by the gang, throws away his identity to become his brother. This federal agent is soon to become the gang’s boss…!
genre: Long Strip, Crime, Mafia, Police, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Haetae

title: Uwasa no Midori-kun!!
alt_title: Boy x Cinderella, Prince Eleven, The rumoured Midori-kun!!, うわさの翠くん!!, 传说中的翠君, 好逑少女
description: Midori Yamate is a 15 year-old girl and is very much a tomboy. When she was young, Midori meets a boy called Tsukasa Hino, who came to the island she lives on for a holiday. He teaches her to play soccer and she falls in love with the sport. Midori is inspired by Tsukasa and continues to play soccer in hopes that they would meet again someday. When they do meet again Tsukasa does something unforgivable. Determined to defeat Tsukasa on the soccer field Midori enrolls in an all boy high school
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life
author: Ikeyamada Go

title: YuruYuri
alt_title: YRYR, Yuru Yuri, ゆるゆり, 摇曳百合, 輕鬆百合, Лилии на ветру
description: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Namori

title: Kougekiryoku Zero Kara Hajimeru Kenseitan
alt_title: 攻撃力ゼロから始める剣聖譚, The Master Swordman's Story Starts with the Zero Ability to Attack, Tale of the Sword Saint Beginning with Zero Attack Power
description: Although Eugene was blessed with an extraordinary talent for defensive magic, he had no talent for offensive magic. He is ridiculed as incompetent by those around him and enrolls in a magic academy to escape. However, his "useless" defensive magic came in handy there, and as expected, he was assigned to take care of the beautiful Demon King Erinyes, who once ruled the world...!?
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Oosaki Airu

title: Child of the Sheath
alt_title: 칼집의 아이, Child of the Sheath, Kenshou no Ko, Дитя дома клинков, 剣鞘の子〜けんしょうのこ〜, Child of the House of Blades, 剣鞘の子, 刀鞘的孩子, 刀鞘之子, Sword Sheath's Child
description:
Bira is a kid who loves fishing, living and wandering in the wilderness with his dwarf grandfather. One day, his grandfather tells Bira to wait for him at the Northern part of the forest and disappears. Bira waits for many years living in forest while befriending a family of bears and staying away from humans, just as his grandfather had warned him to do. By chance he meets and saves Tanyu's life and later becomes friends with him. Upon hearing his friend going on a dangerous mission, Bira leaves the forest for the world outside to save his Tanyu.

title: Cycle Biyori
alt_title: さいくるびより, Psych House, ПСИХОнутые деньки
description: Psych House--a special home set up for those with supernatural powers. One day, Nemuru, a boy with a Psych that allows him to change size, invites Kotone, a girl with a teleportation Psych, to live at Psych House. The mysterious but normal days of those with psychic powers now begins!
genre: Comedy, Supernatural
author: Kobayashi Omusuke

title: Your Majesty, Please Spare Me This Time
alt_title: 폐하, 또죽이진 말아주세요, 폐하, 또 죽이진 말아주세요, Pyeha, Ttojugijin Marajuseyo, Pyeha, Ddojug-ijin Mal-ajuseyo, Pyeha, tto jug ijin mal-ajuseyo, Your Majesty, Please Don't Kill Me Again!, Ваше величество, пожалуйста, не убивайте меня снова, 陛下、今度は殺さないでください, 漂亮陛下别杀我, 陛下這次請饒我一命, Su majestad, por favor, no me vuelva a matar
description:
Following the emperor's unjust massacre of her family and her own miserable death, Laliette Bellua wakes up to find that she is in the body of her 12-year-old self. She immediately sets her sights on a single goal: suck up to Emperor Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum and save her family. Laliette's plan is foolproof, except for one tiny detail... In her present timeline, the future emperor is still masquerading as a princess named Rapertte! With only a single suitcase and some change in her pocket, she sets out for the capital to become the princess' closest and most beloved attendant. Can Laliette prove her ability to keep a secret? And more importantly, will she be able to win the favor of the cruel and sadistic Rapertte?

---
It was the end of a sunny summer day. In the hands of the tyrant, father, mother, brother and my neck went under the guillotine. And when I opened my eyes, it was my 12th birthday. Before the 13-year-old young Emperor became a brutal tyrant, I had to somehow become a god next to the man.

"I'm your maid of honor, so I'll follow you."

"I don't have much. And I don't own you."

To live and to save my family, I have to be in the eyes of that tyrant who didn't believe in humanity. Only then I can live. But that horrible monster is starting to change.

"I save what I lose in my hands. So don't hurt yourself without my permission."

---
