title: Momoiro Meloik
alt_title: Peach Colored, 不良妹控的桃色日常, 桃色メロイック
description: Yamato loves his little sister. His sister is the cutest and sweetest girl in the world, and he won't settle for second best. Unfortunately, everyday life and the rest of the world intrude on his idyllic plans, and he finds it's not as simple as he imagines it should be. Follow along with tough Yamato and cute Masaki as they deal with the problems of an otherwise normal family life.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Incest, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Fukuda Shinichi

title: The Villain's Favorite Is Me
alt_title: 악당들의 최애는 나, Soy La Favorita Del Villano
description:
Lumina lost her parents and was left only both alone with her step-younger sibling.

After only being taken advantage of by her relatives who were aiming for her family’s fortune, she met a horrific death, but…

When she opened her eyes, she was back to 12 years old when her parents died!

‘My relatives are doing well? I can’t bear to see it.’

As she vowed revenge on her relatives, she visited the Hart family, the most transcendental family in the Empire and the villain family, and confidently asked for support.

“You said you can heal my son?”

“Yes, I will heal the Young Lord!”

How is it possible, you ask?

It’s because I’m a healer, and the one and only medicine of the transcendents!

However, the regressing situation is a bit strange?

“Why are you so kind to Older Sister?”

My younger brother, who felt awkward, had a massive misunderstanding without knowing that I was plotting behind him,

“As expected, it will be nice for you to celebrate a wedding with my son.”

I have won the villain’s heart more than necessary.

To the extent that I become the daughter-in-law of the villain family!

***

“Since the contracted period has expired and it was a forcibly pushed marriage, now for the divorce…”

“You know that I can’t live without you, don’t you. But a divorce?”

“…”

“Do you want to see me going crazy?”

What’s even worse, after saving my husband, who was originally destined to die, he is obsessed with me.

I said that my goal after revenge is to live a minimalist life!
genre: Long Strip, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Park Sanha (박산하)

title: The Story Between a Dumb Prefect and a High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length
alt_title: Story of the Useless Prefect and the High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length, ポンコツ風紀委員とスカート丈が不適切なJKの話, 根筋的風紀委員與裙長不當的JK
description:
Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thus far been disobedient.

And so this is a story of the two interacting with one another.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Gyaru
author: Yokota Takuma

title: Rosen Garten Saga
alt_title: Сага о Розенгартене, Сага о Саде роз, ローゼンガーテン・サーガ, 薔薇園傳奇
description: Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!
genre: Genderswap, Loli, Historical, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Sakimori Fuji

title: A Galaxy Next Door
alt_title: おとなりに銀河, Галактика по соседству, The Galaxy Next Door, 邻人似银河, 내 옆에 은하
description:
After the death of his father, Kuga Ichirou, a shoujo mangaka fresh out of high school, has to take care of his two little siblings, Machi and Fumio, all by himself. Struggling to meet a deadline after his previous assistants get their manga debuts, he hires a new assistant through his editor. However, his life takes an unexpected turn after this new assistant is revealed to be a beautiful and mysterious girl…

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/a-galaxy-next-door/)
genre: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Slice of Life, Aliens, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Amagakure Gido

title: Only I Can Speak the Ancient Language of Magic
alt_title: 빙의했는데 고대 언어가 한국어였습니다, Sólo yo puedo hablar el antiguo lenguaje de la magia
description: Waking up in a fantasy novel set in an ancient magical world was confusing enough for Sisha. But on top of that, she happens to be the only person who could read and understand the old texts recovered from the secret library kept hidden for thousands of years... Furthermore, to Sisha's surprise, the ancient language of forbidden magic turned out to be none other than modern English! With the emperor now praising her ability to decipher the words of Alphabet, Sisha steps up from a mere sidekick to an incredible main lead--in a world where whatever she speaks in her mother tongue is a key to unlock the powerful magic.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Gamja

title: Vigilante
alt_title: Vigilante (CRG), 非法正義, 비질란테
description:
The law is flawed and I'll be the one who will make it perfect. Blame the law that released you.  
  
Art done by the creator of [HIVE](https://www.webtoons.com/en/thriller/hive/list?title_no=65).

 [Official Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/vigilante/list?title_no=1488&page=1)

title: Skill Master Levels Up
alt_title: 스킬빨로 레벨업, Leveling Up With Skills, Seukilbballo Lebeloep, Ascension Through Skills, Level Up With Skills, Subiendo de nivel con las mejores habilidades
description:
In the year 2020, humanity faces a crisis as Earth is attacked by unidentified monsters. Players prepare for the attack by challenging the Labyrinth that appeared. They can choose four options:

Easy Mode, where anyone can survive; Normal Mode, where you must work to survive; Hard Mode, where only 1% could survive; and Solo Mode, the harshest difficulty.

Kang TaeSan, the strongest Easy Mode player cleared the Labyrinth using an unconventional approach and acquired skills others could not: [ Addition, Multiplication, Attack Nullification, Ultimate Judgement...].

But because he chose Easy Mode, his power was lacking. Unable to prevent the extinction of humanity, he lay dying. A miraculous chance appears.

"This time I'll definitely become stronger."

Challenging the Labyrinth again, this is Skill-based Player Kang TaeSan's Solo Mode Attack Record!
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Palan Yeong

title: Oomuro-ke
alt_title: OMRK, Oomuro Family, Oomuro House, 大室家
description:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Namori

title: Juvenile Law
alt_title: 소년법칙
description:
Dead Mansion, a Russian private orphanage, trains children to become agents.

The legend of Dead Mansion, codename Sean, which was thought to have been lost due to a "shipping error", has appeared in Korea...?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Haetae

title: Innocent Rouge
alt_title: イノサン Rouge ルージュ, Безвинный: Помада, 纯真之人 Rouge, 이노센트 루즈
description:
The eve of the French revolution, 1772:  
The eldest brother of the Sanson family, Charles-Henri, has grown as an executioner, while his sister Marie-Joseph has been living freely in Versailles. But then Marie-Joseph's first love, a man named Alain, is killed by aristocrats. The histories of innocents plunges into the arc of the crimson revolution, Rouge.

---
* **Won the 24th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2021**
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

title: I Was Just Having Fun With the Time Limit
alt_title: 시한부를 즐겼을 뿐이었는데, I Was Just Enjoying the Deadline, Sólo me estaba divirtiendo con el tiempo límite
description: In a previous life I was seriously ill and now I also have an ill character. Perhaps it was my destiny to have a limited lifespan. Nevertheless, I am quite happy. ‘Now I have hair, I'm beautiful, I'm healthy, and I'm a princess, and by the way I can eat lots of delicious food! Life is like a gift. I've decided to make the most of the 21 years that have been given to me.... Until.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: dana

title: Syrinx, the Villain Healer
alt_title: 악당만 취급합니다, I Only Treat Villains, Solo los villanos son tratados
description:
‘I’m not a healer!’

2 years ago.
After treating a patient who collapsed in front of my house, patients piled up one after another.
Syrinx, an illegal jewelry craftsman, finds a patient sprawled out in front of her door again…Is this man…the greatest villain in the novel?
Syrinx, who was reincarnated into a novel she had read in her previous life, and Heimdal Wespergo, the villain and final boss in the novel, who came to her house as a patient.

Syrinx never wanted to get involved with the original characters, but she keeps getting involved with Heimdal…
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dilam

title: King of the Arena
alt_title: El rey de la violencia, 폭력의 왕, King of Violence
description: First-year Gilsu Lee transfers schools to run from the bullying and violence. And the new place seems almost perfect. Everyone in his class is friendly and kind, and no one is bullying anybody. Violence? No, we don’t do anything like that in this school. That’s what the “Arena” is for. Don’t forget, Gilsu. What happens in the ring stays in the ring!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

title: Umineko WHEN THEY CRY Episode 7: Requiem of the Golden Witch

description: The time for logical debate and magical feints has come to an end; the revelation of the truth about Beatrice the Golden Witch is at hand. To facilitate this, game master Bernkastel has chosen Will Wright the Mage-Hunter to step onto her board and answer a single question: Who killed Beatrice? Joining him in the game is Lion Ushiromiya, Krauss's firstborn and heir, whose role is a mystery in its own right. Will's line of questioning draws together the stray strands from all the previous games, twisting them into a thread of truth, revisiting Kinzou's first encounter with the young Beatrice and working through the legends that have since sprung up around her... Here comes Lu Shu, 'The Great Demon King'~

description: In a world where eye color determines one’s magical prowess, there existed a mage of unparalleled might, Abel. Feared even by allies, he transfers his soul to the distant future in search of an ideal realm. Yet, in this new era, his once-celebrated eyes are dubbed “Inferior Eyes” and he becomes the butt of ridicule. Harassed by high-borne nobles and unjustly discriminated against, Abel discovers that while magic has diminished in this technologically advanced future, his Amber Eyes conceal a power beyond human comprehension. This hero from the past is set to revolutionize the magic of the future!

description: I reincarnated into the body of a fake saintess who will die when the real saintess appears five years later.If I were to gather the monthly allowance given to the saintess I can at the very least buy a building!But while I was carefully setting up a plan to run away after playing the role of the saintess..."Choose me, or else...""I prepared a prison just for you. My goddess—""..."The male leads reacted differently than I expected. [The bored divine beings have started to gain interest after watching you.]I, Ariel, unexpectedly gained the interest of the gods.On top of that, the final boss who is planning on destroying the world isn't killing me, but helping me...? I have no interest in gaining the interest of the gods or destroying the world! So please just let me become a landlord like I wanted—!

title: Kurasu ≪Mushoku≫ no Eiyuu-tan ～Koushaku-ka o Tsuihou Sareta ga, Jitsu wa Nagutta Dake de Sukiru o Kakutoku Dekiru to Wakari, Tairiku Ichi no Eiyuu ni Noboritsumeru～
alt_title: クラス≪無職≫の英雄譚～公爵家を追放されたが、実は殴っただけでスキルを獲得できるとわかり、大陸一の英雄に上り詰める～, Class <<Unemployed>> Heroic Tale: Exiled from the Duke's House, but i found out that i can acquire skills just by punching and now i am climbing to the top of the continent ~, Chronicles of the Jobless Hero~Ousted From the Duke’s Manor, but With Skills Gained Through Punches, I Emerge as the Continent’s Ultimate Hero~
description:
In a world where Classes are bestowed by the gods upon everyone when they reach eighteen, the existence of Skills within these Classes tends to overshadow any hard work, setting one’s life path. Within this imbalanced system, Lythe, who trained in hopes of becoming a Holy Knight, was heartlessly classified as Jobless during the Class assignment, resulting in his expulsion from the town by his father, the Duke. As he scraped by as a luggage boy, there came a day when the merchant caravan he was with got attacked by bandits. Lythe, attempting to save the child, engaged in a battle with the skillful attackers, accepting his impending death. Yet, a mysterious voice echoed in his head when he punched a bandit in his last act of defiance…

title: I'm the Heiress of a Villainous Household
alt_title: 악당 가문의 상속녀입니다, I Am the Heiress of the Villain Family, Soy La Heredera De La Familia Villana
description:
Ten years after being reincarnated as an extra in a novel. The day my grandfather, the owner of the house where I grew up, died, of the infamous ducal family of Blasco.

"His Excellency the Grand Duke bequeathed all his assets to the girl Katisha."
"His Highness the Grand Duke."

So my grandfather is the Duke of Blasco? I am struck by the enormity of the inheritance, but it is impossible for "the" Duke of Blasko to leave me alone, even because we are related!

"No, thanks..."
"Cash, excluding inheritance tax and personal deposits at the central bank. You can keep everything else in Blasco's name."
"I want!!!"

description:
World’s first SSS-ranked genius hunter, Kim Jun-woo.

He regresses ten years into the past after being ambushed by unknowns one day. With all his hunter skills now locked, he must fulfill his career as a dungeon cleaner to unlock them.

But this cleaner… is extraordinary!

The once renowned hunter, Kim Jun-woo, takes over the cleaning duty with vigorous determination.

When he woke up, he had possessed the body of his son, Nam Gungcheon, who had committed suicide three days ago.
Nam Gungcheon, who had been deeply despised because he was the son of the "World's Greatest Killer".

"This time, I will become the "First Heavenly Dragon" in my son's name and take revenge on the world."

title: Demoniac Two Heroes
alt_title: The Twin Swords of the Sima Clan, 사마쌍협, 邪魔雙俠
description:
"The head of our family is foolish person," thought Cha Wun-Yeop, the servant of the respected sage.

A foolish master, who plays around by his mistress, Chang Sanmi and an upright man, Beom Seosoo, stand in stark contrast as the prince.

“Beom Seosoo, with his upright character, is the most formidable person I've ever known!”

Caught stealing, he faced severe scolding and disgrace, but Cha Wun-Yeop ends up aiding Beom Seosoo against Chang Sanmi's plot.

"But as the eldest son of the Kamseuk Clan, I can’t just stand by and watch."

"I will grow stronger than I am now and deal with of them all."

Determined to seek revenge on Chang Sanmi, Beom Seosoo sets out to gain strength, while Cha Wun-Yeop leaves the Seol family to follow his own path.

"Living life once, I’ll no longer be an orphan or a servant, but live as a transcendent being."

"Freely and with pride, I will roam this vast world."

Practicing his unique martial arts through mystical methods, Cha Wun-Yeop becomes a master, getting closer to the mastermind behind the plot at Seol Kam-Seuk's House.

One day, Cha Wun-Yeop and Beom Seosoo reunite. Cha Wun-Yeop is astonished to see if Beom Seosoo's martial arts.

“As the eldest son of a prestigious family, you use this kind of swordsmanship!”

The man who once criticized him was now walking the same path of martial arts as him!
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

title: I Lost the Leash of the Yandere Male Lead
alt_title: I Lost the Leash of the Blackened Male Lead, 흑막의 목줄을 놓쳐버렸다, Perdí la correa del protagonista masculino yandere
description:
I transmigrated into a novel and became the villainess, Serina who comes from the noble Ducal Melford family.  
  
As a well-to-do character, I tried to mind my own business, but the story had other ideas. A self-proclaimed mother brought back a boy – the duke’s heir and a genius wizard -intent on brainwashing and blackening him.  
  
The contents of brainwashing are two things:  
1. Obey our family.  
2. And fall in love with Serina.  
  
Thanks to that, the brainwashed twisted yandere is obsessed with me… I can’t do this. I have to undo the twisted character’s brainwashing! By the way, what’s this situation?  
  
“Now that the brainwashing is gone, I’ll do as I please. So Serina, please, let’s do our best.”  
  
I’ve solved his brainwashing… but why does he seem even crazier than before— Did I make a mistake?

From elves, fairies, slimes, gift items, devils and more, countless and thousands of reincarnations have led to a new life. I, Lee Seo Jun, have been reborn as a human child!

In the library of my life, where memories of my previous lives remain like fairy tales, I happen to see a past life with the dream life I desperately wanted. On top of that, I’ve been given abilities that grabs people’s attention!

With my hansome face doing all the hard work! My insane acting skills! This time, at long last, I will achieve my dream and become a superstar!

Wet’s dow it! (Baby Accent)

title: The Villainess Is Retiring
alt_title: Geunyang Agyeogeuro Salgetseumnida, 그냥 악역으로 살겠습니다, I'll Just Live as a Villain, I'll Just Live on as a Villainess, Я просто буду жить, как злодейка, 作为坏女人活下去, 作为恶女活下去, 作为恶女生活, 我與惡魔的終身契約, 悪役として生きていきます
description:
I reincarnated as the villainess in a book!  
The one who dared to commit attempted murder on the heroine is the owner of this body?  
  
Let’s just live in a quiet place where we have fun and eat! That’s what I thought for a while.  
It was so, so, so cold here in the north, where I was kicked out as a punishment.  
Before I froze to death, I called the Great Demon of Fire and set fire to the fireplace but…  
  
Why isn’t he going back? If you’ve done the job, shouldn’t you go back?!  
I was flustered to find out that I had signed a life contract with a demon just to start a fire but to think that I’d be responsible for relieving his desires!  
  
The bickering romance between a big puppy demon and a small villainess lady!  


---

alt_title: Kangho Apocalypse, 강호 아포칼립스
description:
Shigure has appeared in Kangho!
And destroyed Kangho!
This is the story of the people who survived the disaster.

Cheongsu, a disciple of the Volcano sect, who had been hiding his abilities.
For some reason, he was sentenced to three years of solitary confinement in the mountains.

Three years later... 
When Cheongsu leaves the confession hall, he sees Kang Ho, who has been erased.

To find his missing siblings, who might still be alive somewhere.
He wanders through the ruins of Kangho.

title: Living as the Villain's Stepmother
alt_title: 계모인데, 죽음을 피하는 게 너무 쉽다, As A Stepmother, It Is Too Easy To Avoid Death, It's So Easy to Avoid Death by Being a Stepmother, She's A Stepmother, But It's Too Easy To Avoid Death, Stepmother, It's So Easy to Avoid Death, The Evil Stepmother Lives On, Seré La Madrastra En Esta Historia, Pero Evitare Mi Muerte Destinada
description:
The oven exploded while I was baking bread, and I faced death along with my abusive father, who had come seeking me. Then I woke up in a novel I was reading. “I’m sorry, Mo..ther. I’m not hurt.”

In the body of the villainous stepmother “Leila”, who abused the male protagonist “Hirua” when he was young, but was eventually executed by Hirua when he returned as the emperor! In order to help Hirua leave the stepmother’s wraith and live happily, I encounter the Marquis “Lacias Huppert”, who played a crucial role in the original, and proposed a contractual marriage. “Can we have a real marriage instead of a contractual one?”

“Oh, can I sleep with Mother too?” Contrary to the plan to leave only the two of them after a year, it seems that both the Marquis and Hirua have unexpectedly started to become attached to me.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

title: You've Got the Wrong Girl
alt_title: 병약한 남주를 꼬셔버렸다, Byeongyakan Namjureul Kkosyeobeoryeotda, 不本意ながら、病弱主人公を誘惑しちゃった!!, I Was Seduced by the Sick Male Lead, I Seduced the Sickly Male Lead, 勾引了病弱男主, 不小心吸引到病弱男主角, 不本意ながら、病弱主人公を誘惑しちゃった!!
description:
When I opened my eyes, I was in the world of a novel. In order to avoid the fate of a cannon fodder villainess who would end up disappearing early on, I became close friends with the female lead and guided her towards romance with the male lead. But...

Female lead: Evelyn's going to be with me today.

Male lead: What? I can't let that happen.

Excuse me... Why are you two fighting over me?

The sickly male lead, who came to our house in order to recuperate, has no plans of leaving.

'You have to become healthy so you can return to the capital.'

'There's no rush.'

I wanted to act as the bridge between the two before exiting comfortably, but something's clearly gone wrong.

---
Evelyn Monstera knows two things. First, she's been reborn as a mean girl in a fantasy novel, and second, if nothing changes, her cruelty to the main characters will be her undoing. So when the male lead of the novel, Casis Urquio, comes to stay at her manor, all she has to do is stay out of his way. Unfortunately, Evelyn not only causes a fight between the protagonists, but also wins the affection of the male lead too! Can Evelyn set the story straight and get the happily ever after she wants?

---

While an island half-disappearing from the face of the earth, a mysterious organization is sending out invitations for a tournament to every skilled fighter in the world. If you win you can have ANYTHING you want.

title: Genius Idol's Celebrity Strategy
alt_title: 천재 아이돌의 연예계 공략법, Genius Idol’s Strategy to Conquer the Entertainment Industry, A Genius Idol’s Manual to Taking on Showbiz, Genius Idol's Celebrity Strategy to Stardom
description:
On Haje, a face genius seen only once every thousand years!

After turning down a sponsorship offer and losing the chance to debut, He vowed never to set foot in the entertainment industry again.

So why was he chosen by an idol-nurturing game system???

No money, no house, no knowledge.

Haje’s experienced nothing but toil and moil in this new life of his. From finding hidden talents and growing to be a respectable idol, to playing mental tug of war against the callous system and even Investigating the past of the possessed character. Haje was busy running around doing this and that!

“This is no good, I’m having fun.”

Que sera sera.

Haje decides to just charge ahead, overcome every challenge, and attack the show business head-on.

This is the genius idol’s strategy to conquer the entertainment industry!

#Did_We_Seriously_Call_Him_A_Decorative_Vase

#The_Skilled_Hunk_Is_Actually_A_Genius

title: Solo Leveling
alt_title: 나 혼자만 레벨업, Only I Level up, Na Honjaman Lebel-eob, I level up alone, Поднятие уровня в одиночку, 俺だけレベルアップな件, 我独自升级, I am the only the one who levels up, 我獨自升級, Na Honjaman Level-Up, I Alone Level-Up, 俺だけレベルアップな件〜外伝〜
description:
10 years ago, after “the Gate” that connected the real world with the monster world opened, some of the ordinary, everyday people received the power to hunt monsters within the Gate. They are known as “Hunters”. However, not all Hunters are powerful. My name is Sung Jin-Woo, an E-rank Hunter. I’m someone who has to risk his life in the lowliest of dungeons, the “World’s Weakest”. Having no skills whatsoever to display, I barely earned the required money by fighting in low-leveled dungeons… at least until I found a hidden dungeon with the hardest difficulty within the D-rank dungeons! In the end, as I was accepting death, I suddenly received a strange power, a quest log that only I could see, a secret to leveling up that only I know about! If I trained in accordance with my quests and hunted monsters, my level would rise. Changing from the weakest Hunter to the strongest S-rank Hunter!

title: I Became the Contract Daughter of the soon-to-be-ruined Family
alt_title: 곧 망할 가문의 계약직 딸이 되었다
description:
I thought I had regressed from this ragged life, but why has my time-limited life remained the same?
I'm ruined... is this how I should live my life...?

"This time, I'll get adopted by a normal family, and live in comfort for the rest of my life!"

Step by step, I'm going to take revenge against the one behind my death, and I'll protect what's left of my small and precious life!

However, did I put in too much effort?

"Anisha, you're perfect."

"I'm going to make this child a future professor."

All I wanted was to survive...

"Well, somehow, you’ve passed. I'll have to adopt this brat."

I ended up with a tycoon I didn't expect.
One whose household will be massacred in a few years!

How do I know that?
Me too! I didn't want to! Know that!

But what can I do? The milk has already been spilt.
I'll just live in bliss while acting as the real daughter during my 5 years contract, then I'll leave!

However...

"...I happened to pick this up on the way home."
"Father, you're the best!"
"I know."

...Something's wrong.

"I checked this out 'myself', and inspected it 'in person'. There's nothing to be grateful for."
"Father, you're a genius!"
"I know this too."

No, well, something's REALLY wrong.

**

I became fond of this unique and strange family, but...

"The five years contract we signed,"
"Let's nullify it."

While looking straight into my eyes, dad announced the termination.

"I can help you, but you'll still die anyway."

Not only that,
But death came under my nose too.

Will I be able to survive?
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: SETE

title: Blue Orchestra
alt_title: Синий оркестр, 青のオーケストラ, 푸른 오케스트라
description:
Aono Hajime was a prodigy violinist until he grew jaded with playing the violin due to personal reasons. 
Now in his third year of middle school, he struggles to decide his academic path. 
One day in school, he meets Akine Ritsuko, a hotheaded novice violinist who wants to enroll in a high school with a distinguished orchestra club. 
When he finds himself getting closer to Ritsuko and being brought back to the world of violinists, time starts moving again for him.  
  
This is the beginning of a youthful drama where sounds and hearts alike resound in harmony.

---
- **Won the 68th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2023, which it shared alongside Call of the Night**
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music
author: Akui Makoto

title: Apparently, I'm the Villainess?
alt_title: They Say I'm the Villainous Young Miss, 据说我是反派大小姐
description: I worked as a manhua artist, then died from pulling an all-nighter. I woke up as the villainess "Emi Morwen" from my webcomic! Emi was an alluring yet cruel character who departed from the story by ending her own life. However, I’m not the real Emi!
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Full Color
author: 白纸困

title: Might Through Death
alt_title: 死ぬほど強くなれ, Becoming Stronger With Each Resurrection, Become Stronger as You Die, Deadly Strong, 죽는 만큼 강해져라, 致死至强
description:
Fifty years ago, countless Kaiki seeds flew in from space. The world established defensive lines to counter the monstrous Kaiki, and humanity barely managed to survive.

Time passed, and now, Shinohami Ai, having completed two years of basic training with the United Human Forces, was heading to the front lines with her comrades when they were attacked by Kaiki. In this attack, her entire unit was annihilated.

Abandoned by her allies and with no rescue team in sight, she was left alone at the far end of the front line, in enemy territory. There, she discovered someone on the verge of death from a Kaiki attack and risked her own life to save them. 

However, the one she saved, at the cost of suffering a fatal injury herself, was Nosferatu, the king of the monstrous Kaiki. To survive, Nosferatu merged with Ai's body. 

Thus, a new soldier was born with the power of immortality, destined to become a hero - reviving stronger each time they die.
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Full Color
author: Senoo Shippo

title: SaYe
alt_title: 撒野, Act Wildly, Run Freely
description:
“I wish to have you by my left shoulder, with a smile by my right– I wish to run freely in your eyes– I wish for one look to last a lifetime.”   
  
Jiang Cheng, an accomplished student, was "exiled" to the steel mill where his biological father worked. This strange, foreign environment, coupled with his rather vulgar biological father, caused Jiang Cheng to feel quite depressed… that is, until one day, he met Gu Fei, the "Delinquent of the Steel Mill", by chance. Thus begins the story of Jiang Cheng and Gu Fei, a story of salvation and hope…

(by Jupiter Scanlations)
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

title: Frostbite
alt_title: 冻疮, Frostbite
description:
In 1984, my mom left with a suitcase.

It was very cold that day. I remember that snot got all over my hands, and blood seeped out from frozen cracks in my skin. I had frostbite.
genre: Psychological, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Zhang Yuan

title: I Ran Away and Got Married
alt_title: 도망쳤더니 결혼을 하게 됐습니다
description:
“You’re mine.”

When Raphia met her demise after having been used and thrown away by her benefactor, Yuri, she went back nine years in the past.

‘I’m not going to relive that hell!’

Running away from her benefactor, she went to Kasein Soleia, Yuri’s archnemesis, and signed a new sponsorship contract with him.

“I shall kill every single person you despise, Milord.”

“The necessary role happens to be open, and you might just be the right person for it.”

Young Duke. This is a sponsorship contract, right? But why . . . why are we getting married?

===

“Throughout the time I won’t be by your side . . . I will think of nothing but your small, cute head.”

That low voice sent shivers down her spine.

“I can’t believe you’re leaving. I’ll just . . .”

Kasein looked at her sharply as if he was daring her to continue making up excuses.

“You have to answer well, brat. Depending on what you say, all the wagon and shoe craftsmen of the Empire might lose their livelihood.”

Despite his harsh words, Kasein’s touch was gentle. He couldn’t take his eyes off of Raphia, who strangely grew more beautiful by the day.

---

title: Charming the Duke of the North
alt_title: 북부 공작님을 유혹하겠습니다, Bukbu Gongjangnimeul Yuhokagetseumnida, Bugbu Gongjagnim-eul Yuhoghagessseubnida, I Seduced the Northern Duke, Я соблазню северного герцога, 北部公爵を誘惑します, 诱惑北部公爵, 攻略北部公爵大人, 我要诱惑北部公爵！, 魅惑北方公爵, 我要誘惑北部公爵！
description:
"Pretend to be my lover and join the social circle."

Selena, the top star that had the entire world's attention, was suddenly warped to Northern Duke's land during an accident while filming. Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… 

"Why in the world can't you do this!?"

 "Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?"

There was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!

"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead."

And thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?

---
Rinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.

---

title: Golden Light Gratia, The Child Loved By God
alt_title: 신의 사랑을 받는 아이, 황금빛 그라티아
description:
Gratia, a girl considered useless and despised by her family, has a revealing dream where a mysterious man predicts a great future for her. She soon discovers that she is the lost daughter of the influential Luciffero family. In a surprising event, after being attacked, a golden light erupts from Gratia, forcing everyone around her to close their eyes.

When the light dissipates, young Gratia disappears and in her place an adult version of herself appears, with distinct features of Luciffero. With an imposing stature and undeniable beauty, she comes across Nea, her mother, and realizes that the transformation expected for the future happened that day.

This was the moment when ten-year-old Gratia and twenty-year-old Gratia switched bodies for the first time.
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Mystery

alt_title: 성기사의 첫날밤을 가진 악녀가 되었다, 聖騎士の初夜を奪った悪女
description:
I was hit by a truck and transported to the world of a novel I had read. Unfortunately, I was possessed by Elenia Alfin, the evil woman from the novel, and the story begins with me sleeping in the same bed as the most loyal holy knight, Sir Rolento, if you know what I mean…

I remembered from the novel, “If a holy knight has a relationship with a woman, he is stripped of his status as a holy knight,” so I decided to try to avoid it and pretend that nothing had happened between the two of us.

Then, Rolento said something shocking: “Please, take responsibility for stealing my virginity.

alt_title: 해골병사는 던전을 지키지 못했다, Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon, Skeleton Soldier, Воин-скелет не смог удержать подземелье, 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった, 骷髅骑士没能守住副本, 骷髏士兵卷土重來
description:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.

title: Say the spell, Rose!
alt_title: 주문을 말해, 로즈!, Rose, ¡Di el hechizo!
description:
Even if you roll in a dog poop field, you're better off moving.
A Joseon slave named 'Kangbun' became a compatriot while climbing the mountain to live under the command of the Great Gamma. 

"Sa, save me!" Is anyone there?" "Like this... I don't want to die in vain like this!!" 

The moment she thought she was dead, she opened her eyes to a luxurious mansion.

 Archmage Cassia, the owner of the mansion, and her disciple Noah appear in front of Kangbun and ask her to return...

 "A week. After that, I will send you back to the original world." “…I’m… a slave.” 

"...I don't want to go back to that kind of life where if I don't catch fish in the snowy mountains in the middle of winter, I'll be beaten until I faint!" "I want to live!" "Please accept me as a student!" I will never be defeated this time. 

The growth period of Kangbun, a weed-like child who stands up no matter how much she got steps on.

title: Yeon Lok Heun
alt_title: Yeon Lokheun, 연록흔, His Majesty's Secret Heroine, 蓮禄昕～宿命の華～, 尹樂香, La heroína oculta de su Majestad
description:
Yeon Lokheun is a girl who grows up living as a boy learning martial and spiritual arts. She heads for the palace in order to clear the name of her father, a wanted criminal, where she meets the young Emperor Garyun. He promises to save her father's life in exchange for her lifelong services. After gaining Garyun's trust, she travels the world solving supernatural-like problems that arise in place of the Emperor. But how long can she continue this life without the others finding out that she is actually a woman?

---
Lokheun’s name means "happy morning," but her life takes a tragic turn when her mother is murdered and her father becomes a fugitive after exacting revenge. To save him, Lokheun devotes her life to Garyun, the dashing emperor who’s committed to right the wrongs of his father. Believing Lokheun to be a boy, Garyun is determined to mold her into an unsurpassed martial artist, even if it means sending her to hell. Their strained relationship turns into something more as Lokheun searches for the one thing she’s never had: a life befitting her name.

---

title: Stat Up
alt_title: 스탯 업, ステータスアップ〜落ちこぼれの覚醒〜
description:
"It had been 300 years. There was no way the best knight wouldn't show up." 

The ancient characters in the crystal mirror swirled chaotically. 

"If we're lucky, maybe an A-class knight will be born." 
"Please..." 
"Confirmed!" 

The chief engineer's voice was full of excitement. But no matter how long they waited, there was no follow-up report. Confused, Hakken opened his eyes. The crystal mirror showed the name and rank of the newborn knight in large letters.

**Name:** Seed
**Rank:** F

Seed, the flawed product that shattered the kingdom's expectations. He endured all kinds of scorn and neglect, but in the face of death, he awakened his abilities. The stormy growth of Seed, the unique knight with boundless potential. 

[Level up! Would you like to distribute your stats?]
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Guyu

title: Deokure Tamer no Sonohigurashi
alt_title: 出遅れテイマーのその日暮らし, A Late-Start Tamer's Laid-Back Life, The Life and Times of a Late Bloomer Tamer
description: The Law of Justice Online, also known as LJO, is the hottest new VRMMORPG of the season, and office worker Yuta Sasaki is one of the lucky few granted access to the official launch. After some careful research, Yuta is chomping at the bit to start his virtual life as a Tamer, a class that harnesses the powers of wild monsters. Luckily, upon building his character, Yuta manages to land not only his chosen class, but a heap of bonuses to boot! He soon finds, however, that his abilities are not all they're cracked up to be, and that the talents of the rare first monster he is granted lie not in combat...but gardening! Already well behind the other adventurers, and facing a long and slow progression path ahead of him, Yuta is left with two choices—start over from scratch, or make the best of what he has been given. For Yuta the choice is obvious: When life gives you manure...start up a farm!
genre: Monsters, Animals, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Tanaka Yuu

title: Cupid ni Rakurai
alt_title: A Thunderbolt From Cupid, キューピッドに落雷, キューピッドに落雷 追撃
description:
Nagata Shingo plays cupid in school by investigating the target of affection. He finds out what their ideal type is, their favorite food, gives advice when needed and receives food as a reward.  
  
One day, a group of girls who are attracted to "ice princes" ask him to find out the cause of the huge scar in the forehead of the cold Ao.
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Suzumaru Minta

title: Renge to Naruto!
alt_title: れんげとなると！, Renge and Naruto!
description: It's been a few months since the neighborhood Chinese restaurant closed down, and when I stopped by for the first time in a while, I found that it had been transformed into a flashy, mysterious restaurant with its old signboard still intact. When I went inside, there was a gal there... This is a story about a Chinatown restaurant where gals are hospitable.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Gyaru
author: Nicolai

title: EVOL
alt_title: イーヴォー
description:
Work, sleep, work, sleep... what a dull existence
Why even live?!
No hopes, no dreams
Everything’s predictable...
Suicide is salvation
But when you wake up in purgatory...
...and it's the same world you left?

One option left
Let's turn this fuckin' world upside down


The story of "Evol" begins in a village occupied by an armed group when a young girl, driven by despair, attempts suicide. She survives and wakes up, but when a man tries to drive her into a corner, a strange phenomenon occurs. The place changes, and something also happens to the boy who wakes up in the hospital after committing suicide.
genre: Action, Crime, Superhero, Fantasy
author: Atsushi Kaneko

title: Secretly More Powerful than the Hero
alt_title: 용사보다 너무 강해서 힘을 숨김, I Was More Overpowered Than the Hero, so I Hid My Power!, Yongsaboda Neomu Ganghaeseo Himeul Sumgim, Era más fuerte que el héroe así que oculté mi poder, 隱藏力量的邊緣英雄, 隐藏实力的幕后高手
description:
From a young age, I've always dreamed of being that “unassuming hero,” appearing ordinary but possessing unmatched strength. But one day, fate took a turn when I was hit by an eight-ton truck, and suddenly, reincarnation was on the table! 

"What would you like to be in your next life?" asked the goddess of reincarnation. Eagerly, I replied, "I wish to become a wimp, but secretly OP!”

She granted my wish, but with an unexpected twist: if anyone ever uncovers my true abilities, my heart will explode! 

This isn't quite the “secretly-OP-wimp-life” I had in mind…
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: HHAANN

title: Inaka no Home Center Otoko no Jiyuu na Isekai Seikatsu
alt_title: The Home Improvement Store Employee Building An Agricultural Village In Another World, 农村家居男建设异世界新农村, 田舎のホームセンター男の自由な異世界生活
description:
Masaru is an ordinary middle-aged guy who does construction work on convenience stores and home centers.   
  
Reincarnated in a young body, bunch of low-quality skills but are good for his own profession, decides to do construction again, girls with rabbit ears, slow life.  
  
  
[Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4823do/) (Raw)
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Usapyon

title: Touch My Little Brother and You're Dead
alt_title: 내 동생 건들면 너희는 다 죽은 목숨이다, Nae Dongsaeng Geondeulmyeon Neohuineun Da Jugeun Moksumida, If You Lay a Hand on My Brother, You're All Dead, If You Touch My Little Brother, You're All Dead, Только троньте моего братика – всем вам конец, 私の弟に手出したら殺す, 敢动我弟弟的话，你们就死定了, 敢動我弟弟就死定了, Si tocas a mi hermano, estas muerto, 내동생 건들면 너희는다 죽은목숨이다
description:
One day, she woke up from bed and opened her eyes to realise she has transmigrated into the BL novel *Asterion's Starry Blue Night*. The protagonist of a crazy story who killed himself on the verge of death. I've become that protagonist's older sister... Rosalite! The issue is that if and when my brother, Asterion, dies, the system will automatically revert me back to the sixteen-year-old Rosalite! That is why I must protect my brother from a plethora of other assholes in order to avert infinite regression! Whether it's from a son of wealthy household, a prince of the country, or even the imperial prince from across the sea, no matter whoever it is.

---
One day, I woke up as Rosalite, the older sister of Asterion in the novel, *Asterion of the Twilight*. I may not be the main character, but it's not so bad. Rosalite's little brother, though, is fated to die in the story at 18 and that just seems really unfair after all the drama he's been through (did I mention his story is a BL?). Now that I'm Rosalite, I decide to save him. But no matter how hard I try, he just keeps dying and every time he dies, I turn back into 16-year-old Rosalite. Ten or so deaths later, I'm more determined than ever to save him. Rich, royal, or sexy foreigner: whoever touches my little brother will die!

---

title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
alt_title: Король игр, 遊☆戯☆王, 遊戯王, 유희왕, The King of Games, Ю:-ги-о:, 遊戲王, 遊戲王, yuhuiwang
description: Sitting by himself in the back of the class, 10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle, an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years, the King of Games possesses Yugi, recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games, where the stakes are high, and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!
genre: Thriller, Traditional Games, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Takahashi Kazuki

title: Patalliro!
alt_title: パタリロ!, 巴得利奥
description:
Patalliro is the story of the young boy king Patalliro and his many misadventures as he avoids being assassinated 
by various beautiful boys thanks to the skills of his bodyguard, Major Jack Bancoran from England's Information Bureau. 
Later they're joined by the hot-blooded Maraich, and a beautiful love-and-hate relationship blossoms between him and Bancoran.
genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Military, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Maya Mineo

title: Sigrid
alt_title: 시그리드, Sigrid, Sigeurideu
description:
She always lived by the rules. She thought her life had been honourable. She was loyal to the emperor, even at the cost of her life. But the only thing she got in return was the blade of the guillotine.

"Why? Why is it like this?" she kept asking before her death.

However, when she opened her eyes, she had returned to five years before she died.

"Was the way I lived wrong?" she kept thinking.

Sigrid decided to change her way of life. What to eat, what to wear, what to buy, everything. The way she changed led her to be the centre of everything. Although, everything eventually started to go back to the way it was. And so, Sigrid came face-to-face with her old rival and enemy, Veramud.

"It begins by making friends."

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/48526879)

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/content/60907554)
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Siya

alt_title: Monthly in the Garden with My Landlord, 毎月庭つき大家つき, 月付房租带院子带房东, Monthly With Garden With Ooya
description: Asako moves to a new house to get over her recent breakup. She finds a great little place a bit removed from the city with a lovely garden, but there’s a catch—the house also comes with a live-in landlord!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life
author: Yodokawa

title: Sierra
alt_title: 시에라, Cierra, シエラ～運命を変える鍵～, 冬青树下的誓约, Сиерра
description:
Cierra Elburke and Claude LeSpencer, both sharing backgrounds of illegitimacy, find refuge from the scorn of their family and society in each other’s arms. But when Cierra is forced to marry someone other than her beloved, she begs for another chance at life with a happier ending. Through the power of the “key” to the throne that is gifted by Claude, Cierra is given a chance to start over. Yet this time, she chooses to leave everything behind, including Claude, with hope for a better life. Has she made the right choice, or will this second chance prove more disastrous than her original fate?

---
The price for a love which should not be was paid with terrible ruin. Sierra prays that she has lost everything she treasured. 'Please, let me make a different choice this time.' Time rewound like that, and Sierra was once again faced with a choice. The time she returned to was the one night she spent with the one she loved. In her womb, there was a child she had coldly erased in the past before her return. She couldn't be with him because the relationship with him in the past was full of despair. But the child who was the fruit of their love, she wanted to save this time. 'I want to leave only one trace that he left behind.' So, eight years after Sierra disappeared from the capital. The love she had to leave has returned once again.

---

description: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games. A new modern exorcist saga now begins!

title: Usogui
alt_title: The Lie Eater, 嘘喰い, 噬谎者, 도박마-거짓말 사냥꾼 바쿠, Devorador de Mentiras, Пожиратель лжи
description:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

title: Mangaka-san and his Assistants
alt_title: The Comic Artist And His Assistants, Мангака и его ассистентка, マンガ家さんとアシスタントさんと
description:
A Life Description about the Mangaka Aito Yuuki and his Assistant Ashisu Sahoto.  
Aito-san doesn't understand the feelings of the characters on his stories. So He asks Ashisu to help him. Ashisu would do everything for the work. She would even let him touch her breast so he will know how it feels like?!  
  
The Habit?! The Pervert?! Can we understand them? That's the Comedy of a Mangaka Life.

The mangaka alternates between the standard style and the 4koma.  

---

**Links:**

title: Shota Oni
alt_title: ショタおに
description: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.
genre: Comedy, Boys' Love, Shota, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Nakayama Miyuki

title: APOSIMZ
alt_title: Country of Dolls, Страна кукол: Апосимз, 人形の国, 人形之国, 人形之國, 인형의 나라, Un pais de marionetas
description:
The 200,000 KM diameter artificial celestial body of APOSIMZ. Most of its volume is its core space, which is covered by a superstructural shell. Fifty centuries ago, the people who lost a war against the core lost their right to reside legitimately in APOSIMZ, and were left behind on the extremely cold surface. They face the spreading Frame disease and aggressive automatons which appear frequently on the ruins level. Yet even so, somehow people survive.  


---
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Adventure
author: Nihei Tsutomu

title: Immortal Fight
alt_title: 불멸의 투귀
description:
It is the era where demons from the Hell of Extreme Cold have crossed over to the world and have begun feeding on humans.

The highest deity of the heavens, Sakra ("Emperor Who Releases the Heavens"), and the Four Heavenly Kings under him protect the world from the demons of hell.

However, Sakra believes the female younger sister of the female protagonist Nasua is the reincarnation of his precious one and was trying to take her away. Nasua tried to grab on to the deity's clothes to stop him but due to her insolence, Sakra sliced off both of Nasua's arms.

Nasua now holds a grudge against the heavens. And she has come into contact with the Hell of Scorching Heat which is in complete opposition to the Hell of Extreme Cold. Somehow she has come to possess the arms of the scorching heat demons but...

Nasua is neither human nor demon. In order to save and retrieve her younger sister, she will stand and fight against both heaven and hell.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ok Handol

title: 24 Hours Resurrection of the Villainess
alt_title: 악녀 부활 24시, Resurrección de 24 horas de la villana
description:
The mission window in front of me flashed.

A villainess possessed the body of a lady named Banpoon. A survival-type epic romance where people hide their identities and fall in love!

And the end of the secret relationship.
Who will ultimately win her heart and complete the mission?
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Full Color
author: Lisabel

title: Chika Idol wo Kage de Sasaeru Ore
alt_title: 地下アイドルを影で支える俺, Underground Idol & I, Supporting an Underground Idol from the Shadows
description:
Kageyama, an unremarkable boy, secretly receives a message from gal classmate Natsukawa , saying, “Meet me at the usual karaoke place after school.” 

He goes to karaoke with her alone. There, Kageyama reveals something he had been asked by Natsukawa to show her.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Matsuo Aki

title: Shounin Yuusha wa Isekai wo Gyuujiru!
alt_title: The Merchant Hero takes Control of Another World! ~The Cultivation Skill will increase anything!~, 商人勇者は異世界を牛耳る! ～栽培スキルでなんでも増やしちゃいます～, 상인용사는 이세계를 좌지우지한다! ~재배스킬로 무엇이든 늘려버립니다~, Торговец из иного мира ~Я открою свой бизнес в другом мире~
description: A hero with a production skill?? Akina Shoji, a salary slave, had a dream to open his own business. However, When he almost made his dream come true, He’s been summoned into another world with a “Cultivation” skill…
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Juuichiya Sui

title: Burnout Shock
alt_title: 번아웃쇼크, Пламя жизни
description:
Due to unknown flammable control matter spreading worldwide, weapons, infrastructure and human built civilization has gone to ruins.

Young Rai, who lost his mother to ‘Sakan’ of Topzone, takes experiment pills and loses memory after going berserk.

10 years later, working as a soldier protecting civilians from the mafias, Rai, suffering from the side effects of the experiment, discovers that in order to find the cure, he needs to find ‘Woman of Fire’.

Rai’s story in order to survive with the Woman of Fire ‘Seungha’ going to Topzone… no, in order to get his revenge, his journey with her begins.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Fantasy, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

alt_title: 炮灰闺女的生存方式, The Survival Strategies of the Cannon Fodder Girl, Surviving as a Tyrant's Daughter, Renací como la hija del emperador tirano
description:
Ye Qiqi transmigrated and became the five years old disliked daughter of the tyrannical emperor.

To survive, she did everything she could to stay away from him. Yet, fate pushed her to the tyrannical emperor time after time.

She even became his treasure accidentally? But the palace fights and the battle over the position as successor had just begun...

title: ShenHao's Heavenly fall System
alt_title: Divine Hero's Skyfall system
description: After three years as a son-in-law, Xiao Ge suffered countless glares and insults. But the kindness and beauty of his wife made it hard for him to give up. Finally, once the Shenhao system was awakened, life began to hang on from then then on he became unpredictable
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Fantasy

title: Reasons to Protect the Witch's Son
alt_title: 마녀의 아들을 지키는 이유, Manyeoui Adeureul Jikineun Iyu, Protecting the Witch's Son, 魔女の子を守る理由, 守护魔女儿子的理由
description:
I'd give my life to protect you.

To others, she was a witch to be feared. But to Elaine, Bella was her savior. After a night of tragedy destroys the life she knows, Elaine wakes to find Bella's heart now beating in her chest. Startled, she sets out to find Rhys, Bella's son, only to discover he is no longer as he once was...
genre: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yeon Yeolha

title: The Night Without Shadows
alt_title: 그림자 없는 밤, Geurimja Eomneun Bam, A Night Without Shadow, Night Without Shadows, Бесстеневая ночь, Ночь без теней, 影のない夜, 无影之夜, Shadowless Night
description:
*Beware, for the shadow speaks.*

When junior knight Roselyn is rescued from the bottom of a cliff after an ambush by an enemy kingdom, her brother Calix is relieved – that is, until he learns that she's lost her memory. Now, she behaves like a child, eats like a horse, and wields unbelievable strength. But something's not quite right...

---
When you enter the deep forest, you will be devoured by the shadow. The shadow in the forest moves when no one is looking. In the deep forest, there is a shadow that mimics humans. The shadow speaks.

Rosalin of the White Night Chivalric Order went missing after suffering from an unexpected enemy attack during a hunting competition. They were able to find her unconscious and heavily wounded under a cliff, but when she woke up a few days later, she was rendered incapable of even simple speech due to acute amensia.

She roamed around the house, barefoot in her pyjamas, and spoke without honorifics. She would even eat food off the floor!

She’s bizarre, no matter how you look at it. Is this truly Rosalin?

---

title: Strongest Fighter
alt_title: 도사강호
description:
Woken up from a date, he’s suddenly in a movie set? Wait, he’s been reborn as a baby martial artist!  
  
In Jongnam Clan, which was once one of the 9 strongest clans, he receives the name “Gunchung” and uses the knowledge of his past life to learn the true meaning of martial arts.  
  
When your perspective is different, your martial arts changes. Armed with knowledge, Gunchung brings about a new age of martial arts!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

Against all odds, Ma Hyeon escapes the demonic realm he was trapped in and returns to his family. They’re shocked and overjoyed to find the son they thought dead is alive. They’re even more shocked to discover that his ordeals have transformed him into a martial arts master of incredible skill and power! 

But Ma Hyeon soon learns that surviving demons and monsters may not be as challenging as adjusting back to a normal life after a decade away, especially as a shadowy organization targets his family...

title: Doctor’s Rebirth
alt_title: 의원, 다시 살다, 医員、蘇る, Вторая жизнь хирурга, The Doctor Lives Again
description:
Jin Cheon-Hee was accidentally assigned to volunteer as a doctor in a civil war zone.
One day, his patient was shot at by the rebels, causing him to intervene and get shot in the end.

While he was resigned to his life and was about to die, Jin Cheon-Hee opened his eyes to find himself in the body of a child. Not only that, he was also wearing ancient clothing!

Shortly after opening his eyes, he had to use the skills he had learned to treat the injured people. And one of them was a warrior from the 'Cloud Dragon Express Horse' school.

Then, Lin Jae-Gal, one of the three great doctors of the world, appeared!

He then found out that he had been transported into a martial arts novel called 'Heavenly Demon Lord' that he had read in the world he had left.

Since he didn't know how to return home, Jin Cheon-Hee has to use the medical skills he had learned and the advantage of being a hardcore fan of the novel to survive in this martial arts world!

title: Tensei Youjo. Kamikemono to Ouji to, Saikyou no Ojisan Youhei-dan no Naka de Ikiru.
alt_title: 転生幼女。神獣と王子と、最強のおじさん傭兵団の中で生きる。, Reincarnated Girl; Living With a Beast, a Prince, and The Strongest Mercenary Group
description:
Lise found herself alone in a strange meadow as a young girl. Also, there is a big dog in front of her. There wasn't a dog like that in the neighborhood, and that's when Lise was convinced. 

"I see... This is what they call reincarnation in another world!"

 Then, a group of muscular mercenaries appears in front of Lise. It seems that they have come to defeat this dog. But to her surprise, this dog is a divine beast! Ranagh, the divine beast, has grown fond of Lise, who is the only one who can understand him. So, the leader of the mercenary group, Arlagia, offers to protect Lise and Ranagh with his mercenary group...? 

A young girl, a divine beast, and the strongest group of mercenaries - a wacky otherworldly fantasy with a cast of unorthodox characters!
genre: Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation

alt_title: 诸界末日在线, World's Apocalypse Online, 게임이라는 이 세계에 구원을

title: Dimensional Mercenary
alt_title: 이차원 용병, Other World Warrior, Two-Dimensional Mercenary, Воин из иного мира, Ichawon Yongbyeong, 異次元傭兵, 次元雇佣兵
description:
Would you like to find a job? Even at the cost of your soul? If so, then you’ve found the right place. Our job hunting advice website, SoSe, is a site geared towards those willing to even sell their souls for employment; that’s right, people like you. Are you dealing with angels or demons?  
  
30-year old freeloader Chul Ho Kang made a deal through this shady site, even selling his soul for the chance at what else? Money! An invitation to the other world for the weak and downtrodden of society for a chance to change their lot in life! That is the mission given to Chul Ho Kang!
genre: Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy

title: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister
alt_title: Брачные узы с семьёй Амагами, 甘神さんちの縁結び, 甘神家的連理枝, El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami, Matchmaking of the Amagami Household, Emparejamiento del Hogar Amagami
description: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Naito Marcey

title: Emilone's Temptation Labyrinth
alt_title: 에밀로네의 유혹 미궁
description:
Emilone was a well-known actress before she got transported to another world and became a saint.  
She got a plausible name of 'the Holy Lady Who Moved Dimensions', but she didn't receive any attention. This happened because all the Empire's attention was on Princess Ronella.  
As a result, Emilone, who was devoted to her work as a saint, accidentally discovered the secret of Princess Ronella. The innocent and kind facades of the princess were all acting!  
This can be pretty fun. Wouldn't I be able to break my boring routine when I got closer to Princess Ronella?  
Emilone made a dangerous decision for fun.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Idera

title: Beyond the Mirror
alt_title: 鏡の向こう
description:
A new one-shot by the talented Tomio Ogata!  
  
This is a story about a young girl working in a manor, and a demon who lives within a mirror.

title: Necromancer, the Ultimate Scourge!
alt_title: 死灵法师！我即是天灾, Necromancer! I Am a Disaster, Necromancer: King of The Scourge, Disastrous Necromancer, Catastrophic Necromancer
description:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Full Color

title: Major
alt_title: Major – Dramatic Baseball Comic, メジャー, 棒球大联盟
description:
Shigeharu Honda is a Japanese League batter on the rise. His son Goro is a Little League pitcher who one day hopes to follow in his father's footsteps. Momoko Hoshino, Goro's schoolteacher, is the first woman Shigeharu has been interested in since the death of Goro's mother. The destinies of these three individuals will become intertwined as father and son experience both heartbreak and triumph on the baseball diamond. But when an unspeakable tragedy visits the family, it will take everything they have to pick up the pieces and reclaim their dreams.  
  
Won the 41st Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life
author: Mitsuda Takuya

title: Seducing the Monster Duke
alt_title: 용사의 어머니가 되겠습니다, Yongsaui Eomeoniga Doegetseumnida, I Will Become the Hero's Mother, I'll Become the Warrior's Mother, I Became the Mother of the Warrior, Seré La Madre Del Guerrero
description:
"You may be my wife but, I won't lay a single finger on you."

"Really? Then can I touch you?"

"...What?"

About 20 years later, the world will be in ruins because of the invasion of the beasts. There's only one way to stop the destruction. To marry the duke who is called a monster, and have his child who will become the hero in the future!

Elena who saw a glimpse of the future succeeded in marrying him but...

"Are we going to continue to not do anything?"

I wanted to get it quickly out of the way, but my husband's impregnable fortress is stronger than I could have imagined!

"Take it off! Why aren't you taking it off?! Are your clothes part of your skin?"

Will Elena be able to safely give birth to the hero and save the world?
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ellianyang (엘리아냥)

title: Dangerous Fiancée
alt_title: 위험한 피앙세, Wiheomhan Piangse, Fiancée in Crisis, Dangerous Fiancee, Fiance in Crisis, 危険なフィアンセ～皇帝と秘密の取引～, 再见，危险未婚夫, Prometida Peligrosa
description:
A beautiful castle, a loving husband and a peaceful time. Marianne was having a beautiful life… Until she was killed by her own husband. Born as the daughter of a duke, she has lost everything at the age of twenty-three at the hands of Marquis Chester. But the world is mysterious and she gains a second chance at life. She wakes up from the pain and it is two days before her twenty-first birthday. Marianne meets her father who had left the world in her previous life. She cries as she steels herself to never repeat the mistakes of the past again.

"I have come to report of a *coup*"

But the King, Ekarter, does not believe her and forces her to become his fiancée and work as a spy.

"So, you want to make me your queen? Just so I can be your prisoner?"

---
Marianne Pon Cling, a beloved daughter of house Cling and the wife of Marquess Chester, was betrayed and murdered by her husband one gloomy night because she knew about the marquess's plot against the emperor. 

When she was brought back to life, she decides to pay a visit to the emperor to report her husband's future *coup*, the emperor makes the offer that she can't refuse. 

"Be my fiancée and spy on the marquess."

---

Living in a world infested with monsters is hard enough, but doing it without powers? That’s Hanyeol’s life in a nutshell.

Fearsome beasts roam the earth and kill everyone in their path. Elite members of society called the Awakened mobilize to protect humanity with their supernatural abilities. Amidst it all, Hanyeol is just a poor porter, tasked as sideline support.

But when a benevolent being gifts him with special abilities, he’s ready to harvest all the loot and take it to the next level!

title: Because His Majesty Is a Beast
alt_title: 폐하가 하필 짐승이라서, Pyehaga Hapil Jimseungiraseo, Pyehaga Hapil Jimseung'iraseo, The Beast Emperor and I, Because Your Majesty Is a Beast, Your Majesty Is a Beast, Because Your Majesty Must Be a Beast, His Majesty Is a Beast of All of a Sudden, よりによって陛下が獣なんて, Porque su Majestad Debe Ser una Bestia
description:
When Princess Bellia Piolette is ordered by her father to marry Kastor's cruel crown prince who's known for killing his wives, she flees in the night. On the way, Bellia encounters a dying man named Khan and heals him before she's caught and imprisoned in the palace. There, she's miraculously reunited with Khan, who asks her to run away with him. But their time together is cut short when Bellia's forcibly sent to Kastor, where she discovers that her beloved Khan is not who she thought he was...

---
Bella, the woman who saved the dying beast. At that time, she didn't know that he would change her life like this…

Khan, a man who contacted Bella, who was about to leave the country and run away. Unlike her untamed energy, her movements were sweet. His whisper that he will change her shabby life was also sweet. 

"Let me heal you." 

"Follow me." 

If you take one more step, you can hold his hand... Misunderstandings accumulate before even holding his hand. Meeting again, he was no longer an animal, but an emperor. 

"Are you going to be the crown prince?" 

"Khan, I just..." 

His question that I dare not answer. And... 

"That night. You shouldn't have saved me. You should have let me die." 

It had been a long time since the appearance of a relentlessly sweet man to repay his kindness had disappeared. 

“You saved a dying kitten. You never know how the beast will bite you.”

---

The S.C President, Washimiya Hikari, has been entrusted with the task of cracking the code while all council members gather clues for her - however, due to her weak constitution, she is unable to leave her room and must solve cases remotely. Not only that, she is also good-for-nothing without her uniform, so the vice president, Kise Souta, has been entrusted with a secret mission shared between them: To help Hikari change her clothes whenever she needs to solve a case...

alt_title: The Demon Sword Master of Excalibur Academy, Demon's Sword Master of Excalibur School, 聖剣学院の魔剣使い, 圣剑学院的魔剑使, 圣劍學院的魔劍使, Мастер демонического клинка из академии «Святого Меча»
description: In the fantasy story, the demon king Leonis sealed himself away for 1,000 years in order to prepare for the final battle, but when he woke up, he found himself in the body of a 10-year-old boy. A beautiful young woman named Lisellia from the Holy Sword Academy then says to him, "Why were you locked up in such a place? It's OK now, this big sister will take care of you!" Under Lisellia's care, Leonis is shocked to see that the world has completely changed. Bewildered and confused, Leonis finds himself enrolling at the Holy Sword Academy.

title: Second Life on the Red Carpet
alt_title: 2회차는 레드카펫으로, 2-hoechaneun Red Carpeteuro, Straight to the Red Carpet, Segunda vida en la alfombra, 第二次走向红毯, 這一次要不留遺憾, 2度目の人生はレッドカーペットで
description:
Bedisth, who transmigrated into the novel *Twilight Princess*, finally reached the end of the novel. After it was completed, she wonders how her life would be in the future, and when she opened her eyes the next morning, she returned back to the day when she first transmigrated, together with Princess Rossenne! Confused, Bedisth tries to make a regret-free ending upon hearing Rossenne's words that it was her second chance!

---
The first time Vedis transmigrated into the novel *Princess of Eventide*, she followed the original plot exactly for seven straight years-and lost almost everyone she loved along the way. Lucky for her, she's been sent back to the start again along with her close friend Rosanne, the princess of Moselberg. Together, they will do everything in their power to prevent the violent rebellion and save the people they love. But when they start making different choices, what else will change? And will they discover the traitors in time?

---

title: Kyoufu: Fear
alt_title: Terror, 恐怖
description:
Following the life of the student newspaper reporter Emiko, these are scary stories of experiences from Miyako High School :  
- Ubawareta Shinzou (Stolen Heart) – The school's mystery club sees the dangerous consequences of an innocent promise concerning heart donation after death between two friends.   
- Kyuuketsu Men (Bloodsucking Mask) – A girl who wears a demon mask from a shrine for a bad-luck-banishing drama club party ends up unable to remove it.   
- Dokuga (Poison Moth) – The science club leader creates a serum to preserve dead bodies perfectly, but it may have other unpredicted side effects.   
- Henshitsu – A couple take shelter from a storm in a strange house with a secret that might prove to be deadly.   
– These stories and many more are found in the two volumes of Kyoufu. [tethysdust]

title: Kanojo ga Onii-chan ni Nattara Shitai 10 no Koto
alt_title: 彼女がお兄ちゃんになったらしたい10のこと, 10 Things I’d Want to Do if She Becomes My Big Brother
description: As a result of entering high school, Nanase moves into a sharehome. Only, there is a special rule that states "all the residents must be assigned a family role"!! What will happen of Nanase's life as she starts living with her pretend family...!?
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Akakoko

title: Otogi Matsuri
alt_title: Otogi Matsuri: Dark Offering, Темное Подношение, おとぎ奉り, 灵幻使者, 주작의 활
description:
The manga starts off with a very odd killing. Then, it jumps to a few days later where Yousuke ends up breaking a small shrine. It later gives him the guardian Suzaku - just in time too, for he must face the murderer that opened the manga.

Note: Retail links are for the New Edition which has 8 volumes instead of 12.
genre: Action, Romance, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Inoue Junya

title: Please Leave Emily Alone
alt_title: 제발 에밀리 영애는 내버려 두세요, Por favor dejen en paz a Lady Emily
description: Emily Addisio, with her acceptance letter in hand, enters the academe, featuring of a happy academy life, but she suddenly gets into an accident. Ethan Valenti, who accidentally helped her, gradationally becomes attracted to Emily, and Emily also feels shocked by his aggressive style. Before Emily could feel a strange sense of relief, he seized the window hedge with his right hand, which reached up to his midriff, and fluently jumped inside the structure. ” What?” In a moment, a dark shadow fell on Emily, who was amazed by the unforeseen narrow distance. That was because Lord Valenti, who is higher than her, was looking at her with his reverse leaning against the window. And as the shadow girdled her, Emily artificially tried to step back. But before she could move, Valenti reached out to snare the handkerchief she was holding.” Thank you, Emily. That was kind of you, but you did not have to return it.” The beautiful romantic story of Emily, which is ordinary but always girdled by extraordinary situations, and Ethan, who gave her his first and last love.
genre: Long Strip, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Sarasoo

title: practiced liar
description:
"This world is full of noise."  
  
Due to his innate ability to "read minds", Miura is completely distrustful of people because he is constantly exposed to their true feelings. One day, he meets Abe, his junior at a university club, who is twice as quiet and expressionless as anyone else. But it turns out, Abe is a person who will talk non-stop like a machine-gun about his pure love for Miura (*only in his mind)!
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Medamayaki

title: For The Queendom
alt_title: Por el reino, 포 더 퀸덤
description:
In the infernal depths of hell, Abel, a devil longing to return to Heaven with his brother Cain, forges sinister contracts with mortals. But his world is shattered when Abel is murdered by Yeonli, his own contractee. To make things worse, Yeonli then shoots Abel with a cursed "golden bullet of love," igniting an agonizing battle within him. Despite his seething hatred, he's entrapped by uncontrollable love and lust for her. Now, Abel must navigate a treacherous path, seeking revenge on his brother's murderer while suppressing his intense desire.

Will Abel conquer the bullet's spell before Yeonli reaps his soul too?
genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Roseong (로즈옹)

title: Nozomanu Fushi no Boukensha
alt_title: Нежеланно бессмертный авантюрист, The Unwanted Undead Adventurer, 事與願違的不死冒險者, 바라지 않는 불사의 모험자, 望まぬ不死の冒険者
description:
It's been ten years since Rentt Faina, a down-on-his luck Bronze-class adventurer, set his eyes on becoming Mithril-class. Unfortunately, Rentt finds himself helpless when confronted by a legendary Dragon in the Labyrinth of the Moon's Reflection...and is summarily eaten.

But Rentt has miraculously reawakened... as a skeleton?
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Okano Yuu

title: Ore no Kurasu ni Wakagaetta Moto Yome ga Iru
alt_title: My Ex-Wife Is Young Again And She's In My Class, 俺のクラスに若返った元嫁がいる, Помолодевшая бывшая жена в моём классе
description:
On the way home after filing for divorce, Kohei Kurose is hit by a car and is transported back in time to his high school days!

Determined to enjoy his new life, he heads back to his high school, only to find his ex-wife, Yuzuka, there...?
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Nekomata Nuko

Girls who really want to show off their underwear.

title: Sasinsonyeon
alt_title: The Boy of Death, Sasinsonyeon, 死神少年, 사신소년, Жнец смерти, Reaper Boy, Hero Ticket, El Niño de la Muerte
description:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
