title: Sora Yori Takaku
alt_title: 天より高く, Higher Than the Sky
description: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…
genre: Thriller, Time Travel, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Office Workers, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Miyashita Akira

title: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo
alt_title: Record of Ragnarok: Jack the Ripper Case Files, 終末のワルキューレ奇譚 ジャック・ザ・リッパーの事件簿, Повесть о Конце Света: Досье по делам Джека Потрошителя, Повесть о Конце Света: Досье Джека-потрошителя
description: In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!
genre: Historical, Action, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Iizuka Keita

title: The Dragon And The Prince
alt_title: Prince's companion, 륜의 반려, Ryun's Companion
description:
Seolru, a novice hunter who lives alone in the deep mountains with her elderly father, because the weather around her changes constantly depending on her emotions. One day, she goes on a night hunt to catch a badger instead of her father and accidentally shoots a person...

«Father, what should I do now? I think I killed a man!»

Ryun, the crown prince of Cloud Dragon, went hunting with his servants, but was caught up in the empress' scheme and wandered the hunting grounds alone. To make matters worse, he collapses after being hit by an arrow shot by Seolru. Gathering all the remaining strength, he tried to kill the killer who approached him, but even that failed...

«Why did you keep me alive? Did they tell you to let me live, because they will come and cut my throat?»

But the killer who's the size of a rat in front of him is not a killer! Besides, he wasn't even a boy, he was a girl in disguise? Seolru, carrying her own sin of hurting the body of the national treasure by shooting an arrow and her father who thrust a dagger unaware of his identity, eventually becomes a trophy of war and follows Ryun into the imperial palace.. The land of dragons hidden by clouds. ‘Seolru’, a young dragon who knows how to command the sky, and ‘Ryun’, the Crown Prince of Unryong, who greedily keeps her by his side.

Can the love between the two, which has just blossomed from the wrong desires surrounding the legends and oracles that have been handed down since the beginning of time, be preserved until eternity?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Kim Hanna

title: Tokyo Girls Destruction
alt_title: TOKYO★GIRLS★DESTRUCTION, トーキョー・ガールズ・デストラクション
description: In the 2020's the Japanese female culture was extremely corrupted in the eyes of the first woman prime minister. To bring back the beauty of Japanese femininity, she created the Amazon Academy, a girls-only school, on an artificial island isolated in the middle of the Pacific Ocean. Amesu Kumi just transferred into Amazon Academy to investigate the death of her older sister, Towa, who also attended the school until she died in a shroud of mystery. The only clue she has is the name Burai Sachiko left in Towa's cell phone. How could Kumi have known that the school literally turns into a battlefield when classes are over; where petite girls beat each other senseless in order to survive.
genre: Action, Drama, School Life
author: Betten Court

title: Our Field of Dreams
alt_title: 俺たちのフィールド, 我们的足球场, 足球好小子
description: A soccer loving boy Takasugi Kazuya dreams of playing soccer with his Japan League star father at the National Yoyogi Stadium. The story follows Kazuya's life as he travels to Argentina, plays for Yamaki, and goes to the 1998 World Cup in France.
genre: Sports, Drama
author: Muraeda Kenichi

title: Lady Baby Is a Revenge Maker
alt_title: 아기 마님은 복수 메이커, 幼い奥様は復讐メーカー, La pequeña señora es una vengadora
description:
One day, Sephiel, who returned to five years old, decides to get rid of the family that abused her.

The first thing to do is to enter the family of a powerful person who will protect you safely! By chance, the dragon family's bride selection ball, full of sinister rumors, opens, and she manages to take the place of the crown prince's wife.

“Why do you run away. Didn’t you say you wanted to marry me?”
“How does this little thing know so much about my son?”
“You’re pretty sassy for a girl… and quite cute.”

From her little husband to her father-in-law to her grandfather, she attracted a lot of attention from the dragons in the royal family. I must have made the dragons on my side now that this has happened... Should I take revenge on the evil humans?
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Lisabel

title: Shadows House (Official Colored)
alt_title: Shadows House - Digital Colored Comics, Дом теней, Мрачный дом, シャドーハウス, 影宅, シャドーハウス カラー版
description:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
genre: Official Colored, Monsters, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Soumatou

title: The Gray and Golden
alt_title: 灰色金鱼的尾骨
description:
Indolent beauty x loyal yandere dog x requited love redeemer 
An Ziqing, who has always been a bohemian, wanders among the flowers, not touching a single leaf. He is longing for a crazy and unique love to fill his empty heart. One day, according to rumors, Yu Zhen, the son of a famous painter, visits him and invites him to be a model for his new work. This young man with a gloomy and timid appearance falls in love with him at first sight, and the paranoia hidden under the appearance of a loyal dog slowly emerges...
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love
author: Gong Yu

title: The Villainess' Blind Date Is Too Perfect
alt_title: 악녀의 맞선남이 너무 완벽하다, The Villainess' Boyfriend Is So Perfect, The Villainess' Date Is Perfect, The Villain's Match Is Too Perfect, The Devil's Match Is Too Perfect, 恶女的相亲对象太完美了, The Villainess' Match Is Too Perfect
description:
Possessed by the rumored evil woman ‘Yvonne Argenthoz’! In her original work, she was a villain who met a tragic end because she was jealous of the female lead with her male lead, but after being possessed by her, Yvonne resolves to enjoy the life of a diamond spoon in peace.

But the novel and development are different?!

“If it’s Yvonne's… fishery, I think it’ll be fine.”

From the perfect match going straight to Yvonne out of the blue, and the unexpected dark side of the story. Will Yvonne be able to live a peaceful diamond spoon life as planned?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

title: I Found a Husband When I Picked Up the Male Lead
alt_title: 남주를 주웠더니 남편이 생겨버렸다, Namjureul Juwotdeoni Nampyeoni Saenggyeobeoryeotda, The Rewards of Marriage, When I Picked up the Male Lead, I Got a Husband, Я нашла мужа, когда подобрала главного героя, 主人公を拾ったら、夫ができました, 主人公を拾ったら夫ができました, 捡到男主，多了个老公, 捡到了男主，多了个老公, 撿到一樁契約婚姻, 撿到了男主，多了個老公
description:
Her family used all their money for her extravagance and luxuries and brought a crisis of bankruptcy. While trying to figure out how to pay off their debts, she found a leaflet from the duke looking for a lost child. The reward is so much money that she could play and eat even after she payed off her debts! Following the memories of reading this book, right away, Lizelle picked up the boy who was caught in a trash dump in a poor village. She took the lost Lapel and went to the duke.

"This is the child the Duke is looking for."

Duke Chester said, looking at me with a doubtful glaze, "I need confirmation, so you should stay with my nephew in this house for the time being."

The strange cohabitation of the three people started like that. However, Lapel keeps thinking of her as a mother and won't let her leave.

"Let's get married."

Lizelle was startled by the unexpected words, "Are you insane? Did you drink?"

"One year. If you perform a contract marriage for one year, I will pay you ten times the amount of the rewards you were given."

"Can I call you 'honey'?"

And the contract marriage and marital life began. But why are his eyes constantly changing? Why do you keep coming every night!

---
Notorious for her extravagant spending, Wilhazelle Fossier drove her house to complete financial ruin. To pay her family's debt, she resolves to collect a bounty from the wealthy Duke Heillos by finding his missing nephew. Although her search is successful, until the skeptical duke can confirm the young boy's identity, Wilhazelle must spend one month living at the Heillos manor. But when one month turns into one year and a contract marriage, she starts to wonder if the money is worth it!

---

Even in his wildest dreams, all Namwoo wants is to have enough money to survive each month. Si-eon, on the other hand, has everything he could ever want except happiness. description: A masterpiece of over 3,000 volumes, I was incarnated into “Dawn of Repentance.” Moreover, as the successor to the duke’s family, facing a grim fate, I became my cherished character, “Mitchell Nephtis.” But upon opening the status window, the countdown to death was D-3. With the thought that I couldn’t die like this, I somehow managed to survive, and each time I changed the development, experience points were granted?! If that’s the case, I’ll change the original storyline drastically to reap the benefits. Leaving the deceased “Michell Nephtys” aside, I lived as the nanny’s daughter, “Evan Laeff,” doing as told, but missions kept pouring in on the status window, and failure meant death. Now that it’s like this, whether the storyline changes or not doesn’t matter. I will definitely survive and prevail

Su Yichen is the kept substitute lover of the Big Boss, Gu Hanzhou, taking the place of the Boss' White Moonlight, Pei Suyue. Everyone thought that Su Yichen's love was selfless and humble, unaware that it was all due to his superb acting skills and that the Boss was merely just his ATM. 

In an unexpected turn of events, the White Moonlight returned to the country earlier than expected and even stayed at the Big Boss' house.

title: Beloved by the Male Lead's Nephew
alt_title: 남주의 조카가 나를 너무 좋아한다, Namjuui Jokaga Nareul Neomu Joahanda, The Male Lead's Nephew Loves Me So Much, The Main Male Character's Nephew Really Likes Me, 大公殿下の甥っ子に懐かれてしまいました, 男主角的姪子超黏我, El Sobrino Del Protagonista Masculino Me Quiere Mucho
description:
One day, my life suddenly come to an end, but I reincarnated as a the villainess of a romantic novel who is obsessed with and stalks the male lead, ultimately getting sentenced to death for trying to kill the female lead. I decided to try to avoid that by leaving the capital and living peacefully in the countryside, however, my dad requested that I come back to the capital because there was a huge mess going: it was reported that the royal heir who was believed to have died 7 years ago is actually alive! The little prince also just so happens to be the nephew of the male lead, who is now looking for him!! I didn’t want to get involved with that but unfortunately on my way to the capital, I rescued a little beggar child who turned out to be the lost royal heir and who is now extremely attached to me. In the original story, the female lead was supposed to find him so she could have the opportunity to meet the male lead, but what will happen to my peaceful life now that the original flow of the story seems to be changing?!!

---
After being reborn as a stalker villainess destined to die for trying to kill Archduke Calix Elluiden's lover, Charlize Lienta fled from the capital to stay away from the archduke at all costs. But her plan goes awry when she returns a year later and rescues a poor boy on the streets... because he turns out to be Sasha, Calix's long-lost nephew! Given her infamous reputation as Calix's stalker, will Charlize succeed in returning Sasha without raising the archduke's suspicions?

---

alt_title: 뮈엘라의 수사관, Mwiellaui Susagwan, ミュエラの捜査官, 心动搜查官, 慕艾拉的调查官, 穆艾拉的調查官
description:
Kate Smith enjoys her quiet life as a maid and has no interest in getting married. Her resolve only deepens as she watches her peers swoon over the moody manservant, Ian. Whether it's fate or bad luck, Kate quickly finds herself in a series of compromising encounters with him. One day another maid goes missing and the mystical happenings that follow only intensify her suspicions about Ian. As the expert detective Jade Killian comes into town, can he help her uncover the truth?

---
Kate is a maid at the Baron's estate in Muiella, a country where warlocks and witches are shunned. One day, the new servant Ian arrives… but he's much too proper and handsome for his lowly rank. As they keep running into each other, Kate's suspicion of Ian's disarming demeanor only grows when strange incidents crop up in the manor. Sleuthing for the truth, the wellbeing of the estate and its residents may be at stake! Where's a good detective when you need one?!

title: A Transmigrator's Privilege
alt_title: 빙의자를 위한 특혜, Binguijareul Wihan Teukye, The Perks of Being an S-Class Heroine, A Spirit's Special Treatment, Preference for the Possessor, Preferential Treatment for the Possessed Person, 憑依者の特典, 穿越者的幸运礼, 为附身者的特惠, 穿越者的專屬特權, 為附身者的特惠, 穿越者的特權
description:
※ Be prepared for a world after death!

I  received a strange spam text message right before I died. I thought I was dead but when I opened my eyes I was at the transmigrated examination bureau.

There really is a world after death? I'll transmigrate to a book?!

"Do you have a particular genre you like?"

I, who mastered a variety of genres in my previous life, In my next life, I hoped for a child-rearing novel where I can become a cute, dainty girl and acquire infinite love. 

ㅡ The book I'll transmigrate to isㅡ

Survival Difficulty S-class, an book full of regression instances *Regressing Until the World Is Saved*.

ㅡ And the character I will possess thereㅡ

is the daughter of a servant who serves the ruthless aristocrat familyㅡwho abused the main character?!

However, thanks to "the Life Insurance Full Package," which I signed up for just before I died, I got special privileges...

This is a story about surviving an S-class survival difficulty book with the help of new skills, insurance privileges, and God's favoritism and affection that I've gained!

---
On the outside, Ailette Rodeline is an adorable child prodigy. Cooking, brewing tea, alchemy; you name it, she can do it. But this little girl has a big secret: Ailette is a transmigrator! After dying prematurely in her past life, she becomes a character whose world is destined for destruction. With all odds stacked against her, Ailette must figure out how to survive before her life is ripped from her again. Fortunately for her, she finds her salvation in… an insurance package?

---

alt_title: 나를 잡아먹지 말아줘, Nareul Jabameogji Malajwo, Don't Eat Me, Пожалуйста, не ешь меня, Прошу, не ешь меня, Не ешь меня, 私を食べないで, 拜託別吃我
description:
"A bargain for 5 billion marukas."

"Sure enough, it's a bargain."

'Ertha', who is destined to be eaten alive by the male protagonist bargained marriage with him to change fate! I was reincarnated into a rated 19+ male-oriented fantasy novel. As the original story goes, Ertha was eaten alive by the protagonist Zahid, but I can't die like that because I have my little siblings. I offered a deal to the main character who'd eat me up. I'm the target of the proposal, 5 billion Marukas! All I have to do now is run away before the main character gets a chance to eat me. Can I, Ertha, escape from the hands of Zahid, the greatest wizard in the kingdom?

---
Ertha Arlez is an impoverished purifier looking to provide for her family. Duke Zahid El Callenor is a wealthy and powerful magician looking to cleanse his evil energy. The two seem like a perfect match… except that Zahid is fated to eat Ertha alive! Ertha must keep the duke at arm’s length for her own protection, but the intimate purification process combined with Zahid’s nonstop flirting make that nearly impossible. Can she stave him off and stay alive, or will she be consumed by passion?

The time is the Taisho era.

The orphan Meiko, who suffers from weak eyesight, lives a modest but peaceful life at a temple orphanage. One day, a suspicious person visits the temple and suddenly attacks Meiko.

When she wakes up, she finds that time had rewound several months back. To avoid death, Meiko follows a guide. There she meets her long-lost twin sister, Kanako, the daughter of a marquis... After her parents tell her the story of her birth, Meiko is to marry Matsuwaka Akashi, a military man feared as the "Demon Akashi," as Kanako's substitute-

While attempting to do good deeds, she seemed to have entered the prince's doting route!

Louise, the count's daughter, for some unknown reason, can see letters above people's heads. Written above her own head are the words, "Villainess (doomed)." To change that, Louise aims to be a good-natured noblewoman. However, when she is pressed by Sylvile and tells him truthfully that his descriptor reads, "Love interest: Second Prince (Easy)" his interest is piqued and they become betrothed. Furthermore, he offers her a promise, "To make you feel at ease, I'll show you that I can change my descriptor."

title: TS Eiseihei-san no Senjou Nikki
alt_title: TS衛生兵さんの戦場日記, Genderswapped Medic's Battlefield Diary, TS Medic's Battlefield Diary
description:
An ex-pro gamer of the FPS genre (♂) reincarnated in a fantasy world filled with magic... Only to learn that what greeted him was not a scene from one's dreams, but a muddy battlefield full of bullets flying to and fro! Moreover, he's now an orphan girl named Touri Noel?!

After her aptitude for healing magic was discovered, she decided to volunteer in the army as a second-class medic, all to raise money for the orphanage where she was born and raised. However, without even getting magic training, she was attached to an assault squad, repeatedly fighting on the most cruel battlefields of the "Western Front."
The mission given to her was to become the personal medic of the frontline's ace, Garback, and not let him die at any cost. But he turned out to be the worst commander, who will try to get results whatever the cost, even if it means the death of his subordinates!

On the battlefield, mired in unreasonable orders and violence, Touri's fierce battle for survival continues...

description:
The valuable treasure, the “Encore” which was left by the legendary Elline the Brave Hero, has the recording of the end of the world and the reincarnation of the world. The countries and brigades (parties) all over the world are searching for its whereabouts; the age to fight for the Encore. The boy called Ren who wants to become a knight has no talent in wielding swords despite looking exactly like the Elline the Brave Hero, he has been having a lifestyle where people taunts him as the “Fake Brave Hero”. The one that appears in front of him is the legendary Dragon Princess Krische, who had woken up from her seal. She mistakes Ren for Elline, though she gets disappointed since he simply looks like him, but she later finds out a hidden potential in him. And she invites him to the journey to find the Encore together with the Archangel Phia and the Demon-Lord Elise that saved the world before. “Do you want to come with us?”. This is the prelude of wild excitement played by the heroes. The boy known as the fake Brave Hero cross paths with the legend now!

title: Shin Lupin III
alt_title: Lupin III - World's Most Wanted, New Lupin III, 新ルパン三世
description:
Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later!  
  
Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear!   
  
What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next in…Shin Lupin III!

As an awkward atmosphere prevails at the site, a young man, Mitsuo, suddenly appears and says, “I'd like to be your assistant.” Inspired by his free-spirited and carefree personality, Tobino gradually became more comfortable around him. But just when things are starting to go well at work, he discovers Mitsuo's secret...?

“Do you love photography?”

Even though they don’t want it, and even though they hate it, they still keep clicking the shutter in search of an answer.

title: Fate/Apocrypha
alt_title: Судьба/Апокриф, フェイト／アポクリファ
description:
The setting of Fate/Apocrypha is a parallel world to Fate/stay night where the Greater Grail was removed from Fuyuki after the Third Holy Grail War and disappeared for many years. Around the 2000s, around the same time as the Fifth Holy Grail War would have happened, the group that plundered the Grail, Yggdmillennia, openly declares their secession from the Mage's Association and that they are in possession of the Grail. The Association dispatches fifty magi to retrieve it, but all but one are instantly slaughtered by Lancer of Black. The one remaining manages to activate the reserve system of the Greater Grail, allowing for the summoning of fourteen Servants in total.  
  
This marks the start of the Great Holy Grail War in Trifas, featuring two different factions, the Black Faction, whose members are part of Yggdramillennia, and the Red Faction, whose members were sent by the Mage's Association with the exception of one from the Church. The Grail itself also summons Ruler to act as a mediator of the Holy Grail War.
genre: Thriller, Genderswap, Historical, Monsters, Action, Survival, Zombies, Martial Arts, Crossdressing, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

alt_title: Дневник 40-летнего мудреца в другом мире, アラフォー賢者の異世界生活日記, The Diary Of A Sage Around 40 Living In Another World, The Diary of a Middle-Aged Teacher's Carefree Life in Another World
description: Satoshi Osako, a 40-year-old man, had become addicted to a virtual reality role-playing game and rose to become a top player. Tragically, a fatal accident during a login session abruptly ended his life. But this was not the real end for him, as he found himself reborn in a world brimming with swords, magic, and monsters! To his surprise, he retained the skills and abilities from his previous life's gaming experience. His life takes an unexpected turn when he is tasked with tutoring a young girl. Delve into the diary of a sage residing in this fantastical realm, where his guiding principle is "Peace and tranquility every day."
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

Due to an unfortunate incident, Raise ended up rubbing Kamika’s breast, which in turn led to her suspicion of him being a molester. Starting from their worst encounter, the tale unfolds as they were flown into a mystical world.

title: Sachiiro no One Room
alt_title: 幸色のワンルーム, One Room of Happiness, A Little Room for Hope, Цвета счастья в одной комнате, 행복한 색의 원룸, 幸福的小房间, 幸色的一居室, 幸福的小房間
description:
One day, a fourteen year-old girl was kidnapped… or so the police have been lead to believe. Actually, she tried to run away from her abusive parents and was helped by her stalker who then shelters her in his apartment. Although he considers his actions as kidnapping, the girl is happy about the situation and proposes to him, with the condition that if they are caught, they will commit suicide.

---
One day, a girl was kidnapped. However, that girl started to desire a life living with her captor, and swears that she will marry him. In return, her captor provides her with happiness that she had always longed for. How could a story between a girl and her captor be so heart warming?
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Hakuri

title: Seichou Cheat de Nandemo Dekiru you ni Natta ga, Mushoku dake wa Yamerarenai you desu
alt_title: I've Become Able to Do Anything with My Growth Cheat, but I Can't Seem to Get out of Being Jobless, 成長チートでなんでもできるようになったが、無職だけは辞められないようです, 只有无职是不会辞去的, 只有無職是不會辭去的, 성장 치트로 뭐든 할 수 있게 되었지만, 무직만큼은 그만둘 수가 없습니다
description:
I, Ichinosuke, failed to get a job 100 times in a row. In fact, my lifelong unemployment streak remains unbroken.

On my way to yet another job interview, I was involved in an accident with a truck and tragically passed away. Suddenly, a goddess bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal… and another goddess, making a mistake, bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal, before sending me to a game-like other world.

Wait, 20 times 20…. 400 times faster than normal?!

However, knowing that I would not become stronger even if I continued growing while being jobless, I aimed to get a job… but I discovered that remaining Jobless was a cheat in and of itself, provided you can stomach the slow leveling process. … Which I do at 400 times faster than normal.

As my Growth Cheat and Jobless Cheat existed side-by-side in this other world, the story of my adventure, no doubt certified by the job-placement agency as harmful material, begins here.
genre: Loli, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Tokino Yousuke

title: I Am the Master in This Life
alt_title: 이번 생은 내가 주인입니다, Ibeon Saengeun Naega Juinimnida, Ibeon Saeng'eun Naega Juin'ibnida, Helena: Master of the Guardian Stone, I'm the Master of This Life, Я хозяйка этой жизни, В этой жизни я буду властвовать, 今生我做主, 这辈子我是主人, 這輩子，我要當主人, 這輩子是主人, 今世我為主宰, 今度の人生は私が主人公です, Seré la dueña de esta vida
description:
The guardian stone of the family appeared to me. To me, the illegitimate child, not my half-sister who is my enemy. Since then, my treatment changed. It really felt like I was part of the family. However, as I died, I realized that it was all an illusion at the hands of my fiancé. That everything he did for me was a scheme by my half-sister to take the guardian stone.

[Don't you want to take revenge on those who thoroughly deceived and killed you?]

I decided to accept the devilishly sweet offer. This time, I will definitely get the guardian stone and become the head of the household. I will give you back as much or more than what I suffered. Until then, I will believe no one. But-

“From now on, no matter what happens, you must never stop and run.”

The image of him trying to save me, his eyes running in despair, couldn't be erased from my mind. The fiancé I loved was looking at me as I died, but why were you running to me with those eyes. You, who I thought was my sister's person... I want to know where your sincerity lies.

---
Helena Croisen, bastard child of the family, thought she would finally be acknowledged when the power of the guardian stone manifested in her. Little did she know, a conspiracy was going on behind her back — one that would end with her beloved fiancé stabbing her in the heart. As Helena draws her final breath, a mysterious voice speaks to her. “Do you wish for vengeance?” Next thing she knows, she’s gone back two years in time! Will Helena be able to avoid the same tragic fate this time around?

---

title: Paper Braver
alt_title: ペーパーブレイバー
description:
An RPG-style high school comedy set in present-day Japan, centering around Shiromado Hijiri, a very serious White Mage, and Michibikari Yuuto, a motivationless Hero.

Watch as they futilely struggle to raise the level of the hopeless Hero, day in and day out, in order to one day defeat the Demon Lord.
genre: Comedy, Fantasy
author: Fujichika Koume

title: Death Note
alt_title: Тетрадь смерти, 死亡笔记, 데스 노트, DEATH NOTE, デスノート, DEATH NOTE
description:
A shinigami, as a god of death, can kill any person—provided they see their victim's face and write their victim's name in a notebook called a Death Note. One day, Ryuk, bored by the shinigami lifestyle and interested in seeing how a human would use a Death Note, drops one into the human realm.  
  
High school student and prodigy Light Yagami stumbles upon the Death Note and—since he deplores the state of the world—tests the deadly notebook by writing a criminal's name in it. When the criminal dies immediately following his experiment with the Death Note, Light is greatly surprised and quickly recognizes how devastating the power that has fallen into his hands could be.  
  
With this divine capability, Light decides to extinguish all criminals in order to build a new world where crime does not exist and people worship him as a god. Police, however, quickly discover that a serial killer is targeting criminals and, consequently, try to apprehend the culprit. To do this, the Japanese investigators count on the assistance of the best detective in the world: a young and eccentric man known only by the name of L.
genre: Thriller, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Crime, Survival, Office Workers, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Ohba Tsugumi

title: Sawaranaide Kotesashi-kun
alt_title: さわらないで小手指くん, Don't Touch, Kotesashi-kun, Не трогай меня, Котесаши-кун, 不要碰我小手指君
description:
Kotesashi Kouyou is an outstanding masseur, and aspiring sports doctor. Aiming to obtain a scholarship for medical school, he begins attending Seiwa High School, a sports powerhouse, this spring. As his family is poor he has to work as the hostels' manager, where he is also allowed to stay, to pay for his school expenses. Here he meets high school girl athletes, each with their own individual quirks. As the hostels' new manager, Kotesashi must now take care of their physical and mental needs!

Sports club high school girls and massages! The massage love comedy begins!
genre: Traditional Games, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Harem, Medical, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Shinjou Takuya

title: Macguffin
alt_title: 맥거핀
description:
"What kind of person do you think I am?”
"……a stranger."

Lee Soo-ha, who has been locked up in an unidentified facility for a long time, is dragged by strangers and meets a man one day.

 Lee Soo-ha, then lives with that man, he found out that he is an Omega who was sold to him, an Alpha.
 He is concerned about his situation where he has no heat cycle and is unable to conceive due to his abnormal physical condition, but that man doesn't care even though Lee Soo-ha is not doing his job as omega.

It's just confusing to learn what a man's inside is, the hatred towards him and  the often feelings of deja vu, and it's just confusing as unknown things continue to happen...
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Incest, Web Comic, Full Color
author: MaRO

title: Sparkling Baby
alt_title: 스파클링 베이비
description:
"Excuse me, are you Korean?"

Due to a recent heartbreak, Hanjoon arrives at New York.

Not only is he delighted to meet a Korean in an unfamiliar city,
he has a one-night stand with him.

"I should've asked for his name."

However, these two end up meeting again in an unusual place.

Where will their one-night stand in the artist's city of New York lead them to?
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic
author: Zec (제크)

title: Honey Coated S Class Guide
alt_title: 꿀 발린 S급 가이드
description:
S-class guide Jin Hyo-seop joins the C-class guild 'Noapi' under the condition that he will only perform contact guiding.

He provides guidance to the C-class guild members, but something feels lacking, and the guild members keep getting injured somewhere.

Meanwhile, the guild master Andante, who is kind but sly, prioritizes and takes care of Hyo-seop more than anyone else. Gradually, Hyo-seop starts to open his heart to him.

"Why don't you want to do contact guiding? Oh, did you put something sweet there or something?"
"W-What are you talking about..."
"Can't you show me?"
genre: Action, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: 달피, 수아

title: Gengaku Shijuu Soudan
alt_title: 衒学始終相談, Pedantic Quartet
description:
A space-time that gets weirder as you keep reading.
The tense dialogue between a professor and her assistant in a laboratory brimming with fishy knowledge.
What will the "Plan of the Renaissance of the Human Mind" bring forth?
genre: Psychological, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Mishima Yoshiharu

title: Beyblade X
alt_title: ベイブレードエックス
description: Beyblade pros from around the world gather to compete in the Pro League held inside the X Tower!
genre: Action, Sports, Adventure
author: Kawamoto Homura

title: My Goddess Spurs Me On
alt_title: 私の女神が今日も推せる, 私の女神が今日も推せる ~これからも、いつまでも~
description: This is a yuri omnibus currently being serialized in the web manga magazine comicGAGA. The theme is "goddess-like woman x troubled protagonist" and it's a fun manga that you can easily read. Both the magazine and the single issue version are distributed on the first Saturday of every month. (Each episode 20 pages)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Girls' Love
author: Kawauchi

title: Rakudai Kenja no Gakuin Musou: Nidome no Tensei, S-Rank Cheat Majutsushi Boukenroku
alt_title: 落第賢者の学院無双, 落第賢者の学院無双 ～二度目の転生、Ｓランクチート魔術師冒険録～, From Overshadowed to Overpowered: Second Reincarnation of a Talentless Sage, The Unsuccessful yet Academically Unparalleled Sage: A Cheating S-Rank Sorcerer's Post-Rebirth Adventurer Log, Необыкновенный неудачник, Необыкновенный неудачник - Дневник переродившегося колдуна S-ранга, 墮落的賢者學院無雙的學院, 墮落的賢者學院無雙的學院-在400年後的世界中兩次重生無雙劍的最堅強的賢者
description:
After reincarnating in a different world, the great sage Ephthal spent all of his life researching magic. However, he who had aimed to reach the summit of magic, knew of the limits of his talents and fell into despair, thus closing the curtain to his lifetime.

400 years later, he reincarnated for the second time and enrolled in a magic academy using the sorcery and knowledge he acquired from his previous life. As if to sneer at the state of magic that had been in decline for the past 400 years, he easily invokes legendary class magic! 

With overwhelming power, the entire world will kneel before him.
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Shiraishi Arata

title: My Ex-Girlfriend Became My Boss
alt_title: 前女友成了我的顶头上司, My Immediate Supervisor
genre: Long Strip, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Full Color
author: 茯苓

title: Utsushicha Dame-na Kao
alt_title: 映しちゃダメな顔, A Face You Shouldn't Show
description:
Misa is a cabaret girl who frequents a lesbian bar used for one night stands. She meets a shy girl by the name of "Ai" one night and finds herself attracted to her, and discovers later that she is actually a famous actress... 

Serialized in Yuri Hime beginning in the July 2023 issue.
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life
author: FLOWERCHILD

title: Kami no Shizuku
alt_title: The Drops of God, 神の雫, 神之水滴, 신의 물방울, Слёзы Бога
description:
The main character of the manga, a young man called Shizuku Kanzaki, discovers the beauty of wine after his father, a famous wine critic, dies and leaves an unusual will: a description of 12 wines he considers to be the best in the world, comparing them to Jesus Christ’s disciples.  
  
The first person to find these “disciples” will inherit the father’s wine collection, a contest that pits Shizuku against his adoptive brother, Issey Tomine, who works as a wine critic.
genre: Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Agi Tadashi

title: Pop Team Epic
alt_title: Poptepipic, ポプテピピック, Попсовый эпос
description:
Pop Team Epic turns absurdist comedy up to eleven with its pop culture references and surreal hilarity. With two bonafide high school girl protagonists—the short and exceptionally quick to anger Popuko, and the tall and unshakably calm Pipimi—they throw genres against the wall and don't wait to see what sticks.

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/pop-team-epic/)

---

- [Season 1 Raw](http://mangalifewin.takeshobo.co.jp/rensai/popute/), [Season 2 Raw](http://mangalifewin.takeshobo.co.jp/rensai/popute2/), [Season 3&4 Raw](http://mangalifewin.takeshobo.co.jp/rensai/popute3/), [Season 5 Raw](http://mangalifewin.takeshobo.co.jp/rensai/popute5/), [Season 6 Raw](http://mangalifewin.takeshobo.co.jp/rensai/popute6/)

title: Classroom of the Elite - 2nd Year Arc
alt_title: ようこそ実力至上主義の教室へ 2年生編, Добро пожаловать в класс превосходства - Второй год, Classroom of the Elite: Year 2
description: The second spring at the Advanced Nurturing High School is welcoming Ayanokoji and Class D. The special exams aren't only what awaits them, but the unique freshmen as well. Kazuomi Hōsen and Ryūen. The two who shared the bad reputation between themselves during Ryuen's middle school days. Takuya Yagami, who proclaims to come from the same middle school as Kushida, is approaching her. And the capricious Ichika Amasawa who is pulling Ayanokoji left and right.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
author: Kinugasa Shougo

title: Reborn as the Heavenly Martial Demon
alt_title: After I Die, I Transform Into a Martial Arts Demon, I, In My Posthumous Form, Transform Into The Martial Dao Demon, Reborn as the Heavenly Martial Demon, 我死后，化身武道天魔
description:
Humanity lost the war. Businessmen who sold out their fellow compatriots, hunters who turned to the monsters, stepping on countless human corpses, all in order to earn profit. The otherworldly monsters that entered our world seized it bit by bit like a raging fire. That was until Zuo Chi arrived. 
"Back then you all were gladly invading our world, so why are you weeping now?"
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Full Color
author: 风起漫优

title: Infinite Devouring: From Zero to Hero
alt_title: Endless Devourer, 无尽吞噬, Inexhaustible Engulfing, Devouring Infinite, 武魂覚醒、俺こそ偉大な天道師だ！
description: Yang Chen, who keeps failing his performance assessments in an immortal cultivation academy, accidentally discovers that he has the Ancient Dragon Soul. In a world where such souls are rare, he quickly becomes an almighty Heaven Master and is ready to venture into the unknown world with his newfound talent.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 火星动漫

title: I Rely on My Invincibility to Deal Tons of Damage Passively!
alt_title: 我靠无敌被动打出成吨伤害！, My Passive Skills Are Invincible
description: In his previous life, Cheng Qianmo attained the prestigious title of ‘God’ across all professions in the game ‘Genesis,’ poised to ascend to the pinnacle of the gaming world. However, just when he stood on the cusp of becoming the game’s top player, he suffered a regrettable defeat. Yet, fate granted Cheng Qianmo a second chance as he unexpectedly traversed into a world with a setting eerily identical to ‘Genesis,’ a world where everyone could switch professions freely. Armed with the god-tier title across all professions, he resolves to rectify his past regrets, embarking on a path no one has ever tread before.
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Isekai, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 蜂漫社

title: The Suffering of Suiren Kannonji
alt_title: 観音寺睡蓮の苦悩
description:
Kannonji Suiren, she is the star of the school, a perfect person with talent and beauty. However, she is actually a hardcore lover of Yuri and spends her days in agony, desperately chewing on her favorite yuri couple, Fuchu Ajisai and Nakameguro Tsubaki, in her brain so that the people around her don't know about her secret interest!  
  
[Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaeru_dx)
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: KAERUDX

title: Waves Upon Waves
alt_title: 일파만파, Wave of Waves
description:
there's an old legend in Sereong's family: their flute 'Manpa' will turn into a person if you care for it with enough love! But Sereong doesn't believe in this legend and plans to sell Manpa.... But it was then when Manpa turns into a human and tells Sereong he can grant her wish.

A romance between one who grants miracles and one who doesn't believe in miracles.
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: 꿍베

title: Kenseijo Adel no Yarinaoshi
alt_title: 剣聖女アデルのやり直し, Sword Saint Adel’s Second Chance
description:
Hailed as the hero for leading his country to victory from a great war, the blind Sword Saint Adel is now in despair. Unfortunately, he failed to protect his benefactor, Princess Euphinea, whom he dedicated his entire life to. 

"I want to meet the princess once again," he muttered, wishing deeply that his prayers would be answered. A mysterious being, having heard his plea, granted his prayers, and he was sent back to the past, to a time when the princess is still alive. 

Unexpectedly, the Sword Saint (♂) has been transformed into a super-duper cute Sword Saintess (♀), and her heroic tale of unrivaled power will once again take place.
genre: Time Travel, Genderswap, Action, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hayaken

title: Kurai Anoko to Shitai koto
alt_title: くらいあの子としたいこと, What I’d Like to Do with That Gloomy Girl, 想与阴暗的她一起做的事
description: That gloomy girl is so beautiful! Let's aim for it! A school romance comedy together with that reserved, cute girl as we try to stop being loners!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic
author: Ikari Manatsu

title: Hanninmae no Koibito
alt_title: 半人前の恋人, Blooming Love, Цветущая любовь, Неопытные возлюбленные, Недостаточно опытные возлюбленные, Half Serving Lover
description: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kawada Daichi

title: It’s Time to Change the Genre
alt_title: 장르를 바꿔보도록 하겠습니다, The Villainess Flips the Script!, I Will Change the Genre, ジャンル、変えさせて頂きます！, I Will Make an Effort to Change the Genre, Jangreureul Bakkwobodorok Hagessseupnida
description:
I reincarnated into my favorite genre for novels.

I became the villainous aunt who mistreats the young protagonist. I felt sorry for my nephew who would grow up as the protagonist in a revengeful plot, so I’ll try my best to take care of my nephew until his uncle shows up and takes him as per the original plot.

But then…

“M-Mom!”

I’ve become his mother all of a sudden?

“I don’t know your circumstances, but how could I bear to separate a mother from her son? Lady, come with us to Winterwald.”

Hey, Kim Luca! How are you going to fix this misunderstanding?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9E%A5%EB%A5%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EB%B0%94%EA%BF%94%EB%B3%B4%EB%8F%84%EB%A1%9D-%ED%95%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2494)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/I-Will-Change-the-Genre/3487)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74301)
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: KEN

title: The Demon King Levels Up
alt_title: Demon Lord's Martial Arts Ascension, The Demon Lord Levels Up With Martial Arts, 무공으로 레벨업하는 마왕님
description:
Now that the demonic realm and the heavenly realm have called a truce, the human world has returned to an era of peace.

Jeon Minchul lives the life of an ordinary college student until the day he comes across an artifact from the war and remembers — in his past life, he was the demon king who brought the world to its knees.

Upon recalling these memories, Minchul awakens his old powers, along with some new ones. But can this demon king harness the powers of both good and evil to protect the peace?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Tya

title: The Concierge at Hokkyoku Department Store
alt_title: 北極百貨店のコンシェルジュさん, 北极百货店的接待员
description:
The inner workings of a department store where all the customers are animals!

Our protagonist, Akino (a human woman), begins her new job as a concierge, where she will be tasked to serve “extinct species”.

A couple of rich laughing owls, where the husband wants nothing more than to make his wife happy. A sea mink looking for a present for their father after many years of being apart. A young Japanese wolf that quails at the idea of proposing to his beautiful girlfriend.

All with the help of her elusive floor manager that pops out from the wildest places, and her coworkers who watch over her with care, ready to always go into action when a client needs them; every one of them comes with a unique personality.

This is a manga about our hardworking and witty protagonist doing her best to help all the cute troubled animal clients.
genre: Animals, Comedy, Office Workers, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Nishimura Tsuchika

title: Guild no Uketsukejou Desu ga, Zangyou wa Iya Nanode Boss wo Solo Toubatsu Shiyou to Omoimasu
alt_title: ギルドの受付嬢ですが、残業は嫌なのでボスをソロ討伐しようと思います, I May Be a Guild Receptionist, but I’ll Solo Any Boss to Clock Out on Time, I'm the guild receptionist, but since I don't want to work overtime, I think I'll just solo the boss, 虽然是公会柜台小姐，但是因为讨厌加班所以要去单挑BOSS, I'm a Guild Receptionist, but I Hate Overtime So I'm Going to Slay the Boss Solo
description:
“It’s safe because it’s a desk job, super stable because it’s public work!” 

Alina Clover thought being a receptionist for the Adventurers Guild would be her ticket to the good life… but her dream gig turns into an overtime nightmare whenever adventurers get stuck clearing a dungeon. 

To save herself from paperwork, Alina turns to the simplest solution at hand — beating down the monsters herself! A mysterious adventurer showing up out of nowhere, soloing the boss, then disappearing without taking credit is bound to create rumors, and Alina’s treasured job forbids side hustles. 

So there might be trouble when the leader of the Silver Sword party discovers her secret…!
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kousaka Mato

title: Farmer of Spirits
alt_title: 정령 농사꾼, Дух Фермера, Spirit Farmer, 精霊の農夫
description: After training for 11 years to reach superhuman status, I gave up on my dream and returned to the family farm. But suddenly, Hawa appeared! She’s a powerful farming spirit who can make anything grow—even produce that enhances people’s powers. Now I’ve got my superhuman ID card, more spirits-friends, mouthwatering Grade A+ crops, and quests! Will Hawa and her friends lead us all to fame and fortune and change our lives forever?
genre: Monsters, Animals, Long Strip, Magical Girls, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Susaek Yeongjang

title: Blue Archive - The Adventure of Game Development Department!
alt_title: ブルーアーカイブゲーム開発部だいぼうけん！, Blue Archive: Грандиозное приключение отдела разработки игр!
description: From the hit game Blue Archive, comes a spin-off manga featuring the Game Development Department! Where Momoi, Midori, Yuzu and Aris share their days of youth, friendship, and clumsy moments. A heartwarming, cute and funny youth-comedy crafted by the master of comedy, Asato Mizu!
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Web Comic
author: Mizu Asato

title: Shen Yin Wang Zuo
alt_title: Sealed Divine Throne, Трон, отмеченный Богом, 神印王座, 신인왕좌, Throne of Seal
description: While the demons were rising, mankind was about to become extinct. Six temples rose, and protected the last of mankind. A young boy joins the temple as a knight to save his mother. During his journey of wonders and mischief in the world of temples and demons, will he be able to ascend to become the strongest knight and inherit the throne?
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Tang Jia San Shao (神漫君)

title: Saiyuki Gaiden
alt_title: Saiyuuki Gaiden, 最遊記外伝
description: 500 years before the story of Saiyuki, a heretic child with golden eyes is brought into Heaven. He is given into the reluctant care of a minor deity named Konzen, the nephew of the Merciful Goddess Kanzeon Bosatsu. Konzen eventually gives the child the name "Goku". Goku becomes friends with two other minor gods, Marshal Tenpou and General Kenren of the Western Army of Heaven. He also meets a strange little boy who seems to be his own age, the War Prince Nataku. Although Goku is happy in his new home, Heaven is not kind to heretics. There are those who would use Nataku and Goku as tools in an attempt to seize the throne of Heaven, and Konzen, Tenpou, and Kenren may not be able to save them.
genre: Historical, Action, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Minekura Kazuya

title: Doushitara Osananajimi ♀️ no Kanojo ni Naremasu Ka!?
alt_title: どうしたら幼馴染♀の彼女になれますか！？, How Do I Turn My Best Friend Into My Girlfriend?, How Do I Get Together With My Childhood Friend?, 어떻게 해야 소꿉친구의 여친이 될 수 있나요?!, 怎样才能成为发小的女友呢！？
description: High schoolers Minami Ikoma and Yuzu Makita have been childhood friends since grade school. Since their parents are friends, they have always been together. However, as Minami sees her friend get confessed to, feelings in her own heart start to sprout. A romantic comedy of two childhood friend starts.
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Yasaka Shuu

title: Jashin-chan Dropkick
alt_title: Dropkick On My Devil!, Jyashin-chan Drop Kick, Jyashin-chan Dropkick, Демонический дропкик, 邪神ちゃんドロップキック, 邪神与厨二病少女, 사신짱 드롭킥
description:
Jashin-chan Dropkick is a violent slapstic comedy about a delusional gothic lolita, Yurine, who summons a demon girl with the tail of a cobra, Jashin-chan.
They'll have to live together until Yurine finds a way to send Jashin-chan back to hell, or until Jashin-chan kills Yurine.

---

[Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20484)
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Gore, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Yukiwo

title: The Archmage Returns After 4000 Years
alt_title: 4000년 만에 귀환한 대마도사, 4000Nyeon Mane Gwihwanhan Daemadosa, The Great Mage Returns After 4000 Years, Архимаг, который вернулся спустя 4000 лет, 4000年ぶりに帰還した大魔導士, 4000年後重生的大魔導士, 4000年后重生异世界的大魔导师
description:
Lucas Trowman was the greatest archmage in history until he was condemned by Demigod to spend eternity losing his mind. But 4,000 years later, he’s thrust back into this world, into the body of Frei Blake, the weakest, most un-talented student at the prestigious Westroad Academy for mages. After all this time, the world of magic has barely progressed. Could this be the work of Demigod? Determined to find out, Lucas seeks to reach the highest levels of power once again and get his revenge.

---

title: Dark Castle
alt_title: Тёмный Замок
description: A dark gloomy castle with endless stairways and an ancient library. Scary, mysterious creatures live here, hiding in the night. One day, a girl who lost her memory ends up there. Who is she and how can she get back? And, most importantly, how will the owner of the castle decide her fate?
genre: Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

title: L.A.G
alt_title: Unlimited Passive, 언리미티드 패시브, LAG, Безграничные пассивные навыки, Limitless Passive Skills
description:
L.A.G, an unknown space where humans use abilities or skills through awakening, monsters appear on each floor and room, and missions are given accordingly.

The goal here is to reach the bottom. The protagonist repeats death and life countless times in the unknown space L.A.G. However, in this life, he has the ability to own unlimited passive skills and finally has a chance to escape there.

However, unlike what he has been through so far, he will not know an inch of the future as L.A.G continues to change. This is a desperate survival story in which no one can be trusted and continues to survive the hellish L.A.G, where there is no end in sight, and fights for escape from the bottom.
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Survival, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

title: Moto Isekai Tenisha datta Kachou no Ojisan, Jinsei Nidome no Isekai wo Kake Meguru
alt_title: 元異世界転移者だった課長のおじさん、人生二度目の異世界を駆け廻る, The Section Chief Uncle Who's a Former Transferee to Another World Goes to Another World a Second Time, 전 이세계 전이자였던 과장 아저씨, 인생 두 번째 이세계를 누빈다, 西装科长的二次转生, 西裝科長的二次轉生
description:
Souya, the manager of a trading company in a small city, is a 37-year-old office worker who enjoys single life.

One day, when he wakes up in a strange meadow, he sees two moons floating in the night sky and regains the memory of being transferred to another world 20 years ago.

An uncle’s adventure in a different world, wearing a business suit, with a low amount of tension, a high level of ability, and a cool but slightly pathetic personality. It’s a different world transition, but it may have an old-fashioned fantasy atmosphere.
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: GinMugi

title: Saikyou Kenshi, Saiteihen Kishidan de Funsenchuu
alt_title: 最強剣士、最底辺騎士団で奮戦中, 最強剣士、最底辺騎士団で奮戦中　～オークを地の果てまで追い詰めて絶対に始末するだけの簡単？なお仕事です～, The Strongest Knight Works Hard in the Lowest Knight Order, The Strongest Knight Works Hard in the Lowest Knight Order: Hunting the Orcs Until the End of the Earth? That's Easy!
description: The "Anti Foreign Dangerous Species Knights" was formed to protect the people from dangerous monsters, however this is more of a black company and it's only a knight order in name only...! Orcs that keep coming like pests no matter how many times they are taken down... salaries that don't increase at all... quirky co-workers... This is the story of the strongest swordman of a commoner background, who works hard everyday cutting orc's heads in the lowest knight order which is ridiculed as "Pig Hunters."
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kuusengata

title: Fushi no Gunzei wo Hikiiru Bocchi Shiryoujutsushi, Tenshoku shite SSS-Rank Boukensha ni naru.
alt_title: The Solo Necromancer Leading an Immortal Army Transfers to become an SSS-Rank Adventurer, 不死の軍勢を率いるぼっち死霊術師、転職してSSSランク冒険者になる。
description:
_“The ultimate ambition of the most formidable necromancer… is to make friends?!”_

In the eleventh hour of the Saldia Empire’s impending defeat, salvation arrives in the form of Rogue, a lone necromancer. Armed with immense power and leading legendary aides, his solitary goal is to forge friendships. Employing the abilities of Kalfa, the most distinguished appraiser, he masks his loathed profession as that of an ‘adventurer.’ Rogue steps into the world as a rookie adventurer, but his extraordinary power can’t be completely hidden, sparking rumors that gradually trigger a grand disturbance in the kingdom. 

Embark on a fresh adventure with this lone necromancer! A long-awaited manga adaptation of a highly popular original work from Syosetu!
genre: Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Sakakibara Monsho

title: Kaiju No. 8
alt_title: Monster #8, Кайдзю No. 8, Монстр № 8, 怪獣8号
description:
A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation…! Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream…!

---

alt_title: 萌宝医仙三岁半
description: The most famous alchemist in the world of cultivation, Xuan Tianji, turned into a kid from the backlash of her attempt to seal the system that had been manipulating her. Ever since then, her childhood friend, ex-boyfriend, disciple, nemesis, etc. started looking for their “wife” to no avail. Instead, they find themselves happily becoming “Dad”...

title: The Legendary Spearman Returns
alt_title: 역대급 창기사의 회귀, 史詩級槍騎士再臨, Yeokdaegeup Changgisaui Hoegwi, Return of the Unrivaled Spear Knight, Return of the Legendary Spear Knight, Return of the Greatest Lancer, Возмездие величайшего копейщика, Возвращение величайшего лансера всех времен, 歴代級槍騎士の回帰, 史诗级枪骑士再临, 英雄槍騎士的復仇, El Regreso del Inigualable Caballero de la Lanza
description:
Joshua Sanders, the legendary spearman who ended the brutal civil war, shattered the belief that one must wield a sword to be a master knight.

He fought in the service of his friend, Emperor Caesar van Briton, but it is all for naught when his fearful comrades try to kill him. He’s on the brink of death when his trusty weapon, Lugia, shines and propels him back to the stables of his childhood.

With his mighty spear in hand, Joshua is dead set on revenge in this life!
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Joe Teacher

title: I Was Born as the Seventh Prince, What Should I Do?
alt_title: 第七王子に生まれたけど、何すりゃいいの？
description:
In rare cases, there are children that have reincarnated while holding the memories of their previous lives. Dependent on the god's caprice, they will be reincarnated into another world. One such case is the seventh prince of a certain kingdom.

The eldest son is the crown prince, the second, the third a diplomat, the fourth is bewed to the princess of another country, and the fifth and sixth are geniuses in music and art. Wait? Then what's left for me?
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Kago no naka no Usagi

title: Souei Sousho
alt_title: 双影双書, 双影双书
description: Shou, a young boy living in the red light district is suddenly taken to live in the imperial palace. He was selected to become the prince's shadow and act as his shield. In the palace where conspiracies swirl will Shou be able to protect himself and the prince?
genre: Historical, Comedy, Drama
author: Funamoto Erika

title: The Hero Is Standing in My Way
alt_title: 남자 주인공이 내 앞길을 가로막는다, Namja Juingong-i Nae Apgil-eul Garomagneunda, The Male Lead Is Blocking My Way, The Male Protagonist Is Blocking My Way, 主役が私の邪魔をする, 男主阻挡了我前进的道路, The Male Lead Won't Let Me Be!
description:
I reincarnated into a novel that I think I read sometime in the past. In the not far future, I'm fated to become the fiancée of the villain, but that's well... Won't it change following the way that I live?

"My ideal type is a man who is 190 cm, handsome, rich, has a rank at least above a Count, and won't grow a gut even when they get old!"

But before I could even find a husband I saved the life of the young male lead? After that my plan for an easy life kept getting messed up!

"I'm sorry, but Ariel said that she can't take her eyes off me because I'm the prettiest and handsomest person in the world."

"What? I did?"

"P-pardon my rudeness. Please forget my marriage proposal!"

"Hold on! No! Wait!"

---
