title: Mikiri kara Hajimeru Garyuu Kenjutsu
alt_title: 見切りから始める我流剣術, My Style Of Swordsmanship
description: Rio, a boy living in a remote village, attends the village dojo for self-defense, but gives up the idea that he cannot become stronger under the dojo’s teaching methods. However, the village is a dangerous place, and Rio decides to create his own way of fighting – “Garyu Kenjutsu” – in order to survive! A royal road fantasy of swords and magic is about to begin!
genre: Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Kori Jun

title: Time-Limited Genius Dark Knight
alt_title: 시한부 천재 암흑기사, Terminally-Ill Genius Dark Knight, Sihanbu Cheonjae Amheukgisa, El prodigioso caballero oscuro con tiempo limitado
description:
When there is no way out, the way is in.

Doomed to die next month, our terminally ill protagonist Chan is too frail and defeated to try anything at all.

No wonder he chooses to plunge himself into an RPG world he is only too familiar with. Why should this run be any different?

Well, other than the fact that he will wake up inside the game and get struck with an existential epiphany that will make him fight tooth and nail to give Nox, his equally ill-fated RPG persona, a better chance?

Maybe, it’s not over until it’s over.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Nagi (II)

title: Hitomi-chan Is Shy With Strangers
alt_title: Застенчивая Хитоми-чан, 瞳ちゃんは人見知り
description: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why…?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Natsumi Cyorisuke

title: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
alt_title: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!, Да будет благословенен этот прекрасный мир!, この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！, 为美好的世界献上祝福！, 이 멋진 세계에 축복을!, Bless This Wonderful World!
description: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma’s choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike…
genre: Reincarnation, Loli, Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Zombies, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Akatsuki Natsume

title: Josou wo Yamerarenaku Naru Otokonoko no Hanashi
alt_title: Парень, который не может перестать переодеваться, 女装をやめられなくなる男の子の話, A Boy That Can't Stop Crossdressing
description: Kazu likes to dress up as a girl. After a lot of training, he thinks he's perfect, and he just wanted someone to say that he is beautiful. Masaru, his childhood friend, sees him that way, thinking that he, indeed, had turned into a girl! Now Kazu must solve this misunderstanding.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Kobashiko

title: The Price of Breaking Up
alt_title: 파혼의 대가, Pahonui Daega, The Price of a Broken Engagement, The Price of Separation, 婚約破棄の対価, 解除婚约的代价
description:
Clearly, God must have been joking when he sent down another oracle proclaiming that “the companion of His Royal Highness, the Crown Prince, is to be the precious daughter of Marquis Lurhtella.” How could the oracle be mistaken?

As soon as I was born, I was selected to be the Crown Princess and have spent my entire life training to be a great Empress one day, but everything changed overnight: My power, my status, and the way people look at me. I thought only his love wouldn’t change, however, he did not hesitate to notify me of the breaking of our engagement, and that is how it ended between us. Giving up everything was a lot easier than I thought. But…

“It’s a pleasure to meet you, Princess Pesentria.”

“…”

“Speaking of the owner of the temple, I wonder if you remember me.”

He, who had the greatest divine power in the Empire, reached out to me. Can I hold his hand?

---
As the chosen one prophesized to bring stability to the empire, Ersia Fesentera had lived her entire life as the future crown princess... until it is revealed that another girl is the chosen one. In a day, Ersia loses her position and all that she worked hard to achieve, while her supporters and her own beloved fiancé abandon her. Enraged and hurt by this turn of events, Ersia swears to take revenge on those who turned their backs on her... starting with her former betrothed and his new fiancée.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Aidela

title: I Guess My Roommate Is Pretty?
alt_title: I Guess My Roommate Is Pretty?, Думаю мой сосед по комнате милый?
genre: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Self-Published, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Senukin

title: Ijin Tensei - Gokoku Warfare
alt_title: Wise Man's Reincarnation: Five Kingdoms, 伟人转生-五国大战, 偉人転生 五國WARFARE
description:
A world of war that has lasted for 100 years.
Fuugo and Roka, childhood friends of the Kingdom of Asdorm.
When the fates of two people who were once separated are reunited, a new threat that has never been seen before strikes them!

Einstein, Edison ...
Genius greats who have been reincarnated in a war-torn other world compete with all their best intellect, the Five Kingdoms War begins! !!
genre: Action, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy
author: Kurando Yukiaki

title: Yumenashi-sensei no Shinroshidou
alt_title: 夢なし先生の進路指導, Yumenashi-sensei's Guidance Counseling
description: A former career consultant, Takanashi now works for a school as a Guidance Counselor. During career guidance meetings, he gives headstrong students data and tells them the realities of the world around them, hoping that they rethink their dreams. Because of that, students call him “Yumenashi” (“Dream Crusher”).
genre: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kasahara Masaki

title: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji
alt_title: Previous Life was Sword Emperor. This Life is Trash Prince., 前世は剣帝。今生クズ王子, 前世是劍帝。今生是渣王子, Sword Emperor Previous Life, Prince Trash This Life.
description:
He was called a Sword Emperor who lived for the sword and died by the sword. And his end was a tragedy. 

However, by strange coincidence, he was reincarnated as the third prince in a country. He was enjoying his lazy lifestyle away from swords and heroism. As a consequence, people began referring to him as Prince Trash.

He never cared about his derogatory name until one day, he encounters someone who gets the wheel of fate to move in motion.
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Alto

title: Kimi no Kokoro wo Kanjitai
alt_title: 君の心を漢字たい, I Want to Write Your Heart into Kanji
description: A high school boy, Yomi Hashiba, is troubled. He is unable to understand what Mizuki Hanai, a cool girl who became his girlfriend a month ago, is thinking... One day, while he is worrying about his relationship with Mizuki Hanai, he starts to understand her "Kanji"...? (same pronunciation as feeling) This is the beginning of a thrilling coming-of-age romantic comedy about love and kanji!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Suga Atsushi

title: House Garnet's Archvillain
alt_title: 공작가의 흑막 영애님, Gongjakgaui Heungmang Yeongaenim, The Lady's Dark Secret, Devious Daughter of the Duchy, The Young Lady With the Black Soul, 公爵家の黒幕令嬢, 公爵家的黑幕小姐
description:
Born as an illegitimate child to the duchy, Estelle became the saint of the empire.

She spent her entire life trying to love everyone around her, but being betrayed and sacrificed to the devil, Estelle suffered in hell for 600 years.

[Do you desire revenge?]

[If you wish, I’ll send you back to their brightest moment. What do you think?]

The whispers from the devil reached her ears.

Holding the devil’s hand, Estelle came back from hell.

As the lady of the Garnet Duchy, the greatest family in the entire Empire.
To bring cruel destruction to all who betrayed her.

“I’ll steal everything from my enemies and make them meet their worst endings possible.”
genre: Historical, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yuin

title: I Swallowed the Heavenly Demon
alt_title: 천마를 삼켰다
description:
40 years ago, three mysterious seeds fell to Earth, unleashing countless monsters. Chosen beings arose to fight against these monsters. Those who manifested the powers of this world's heroic spirits into weapons or blessings were called heroes.

Min Jae-ha, who aspired to become a hero, wandered the front lines but couldn't achieve his dream. Giving up hope of becoming a hero, he now works at That’s Real Company.

One day, while investigating a mineral dungeon for work, Min Jae-ha steps on a mysterious summoning circle and unexpectedly gains an extraordinary heroic spirit, one he had always dreamt of contracting with.

However...

"How many times must I tell you? I am alive!"

"Aren't you technically neither dead nor alive?"
"So what can you even do inside my belly?"

Why has this extraordinary heroic spirit taken residence in Min Jae-ha’s belly instead of manifesting as a weapon or blessing?

"Look up to me, and I shall teach you martial arts."
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Stay

title: Goblin's Night
alt_title: 도깨비의 밤, Dokkaebi's Night, Night of the Goblin, Noche de Duendes
description:
“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Munsik

title: Shoukan sareta Kenja wa Isekai wo Yuku ~Saikyou nano wa Fuyou Zaiko no Item deshita~
alt_title: 召喚された賢者は異世界を往く ～最強なのは不要在庫のアイテムでした～, A Sage Is Summoned to Another World: The Undesired Items Are Now the Strongest, El sabio es invocado a otro mundo ~Los artículos más fuertes eran los menos deseados del inventario~, 소환된 현자는 이세계를 누빈다 ~최강인 것은 필요없는 재고 아이템이었습니다~, 被召喚的賢者前往異世界～廢棄庫存道具才是最強～, 被召唤的贤者前往异世界～废弃库存道具才是最强～
description:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Yashu

title: The Obsessive Second Male Lead Has Gone Wild
alt_title: 집착 서브 남주가 미쳐 날뛴다, Jipchang Seobeu Namjuga Michyeo Nalttwinda, El Obsesivo Segundo Protagonista se ha Vuelto Loco
description:
I remember the story of a novel I had read in my previous life just before my marriage. If you don’t mess up the wedding, you’ll be poisoned by your husband! So I just kissed the priest who was in charge of the ceremony.

"Commander, are you alright?" 
One of the holy knights shouted as he approached the priest who was kissed. Huh, what? Wait... are you the commander of the Holy Knights?

**

Rurutia, who was about to die, wanted to spend her last moment in a temple where she felt at ease the most. She started a business with her friends for the temple, and itwas a big hit.

"Miss, you have the world in the palm of your hands!"

"Are you a God who descended to earth?"

In the midst of being embarrassed by the large crown, the commander of the holy knights himself was also acting strange.

“All I wish for is to be your husband,” he said that with eyes shining with obsession, "Take responsibility for stealing my first kiss."

This is all so wrong. It seems that I changed my future.
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Subi (수비)

title: I'll Resign and Have a Fresh Start in This World
alt_title: I'm Going To Relax in This World After Submitting My Resignation, 사표내고 이계에서 힐링합니다, Resigning and Healing in Another World
description:
The main character, Cho Isu, lived an ordinary but happy life.
Five years ago, he suddenly loses his parents, and becomes a devastated man, as he struggles every day.
When he was exhausted from the suffocating daily life, a portal opened in the room. A place he has never been to, a place he doesn’t know what might be.
A healing life to enjoy in a different world starting as a commoner and turning into a feudal lord.
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Full Color
author: Deep Black

title: The Goal Is to Be Self-Made
alt_title: 목표는 자수성가입니다, My Goal Is to Achieve Success on My Own, The Goal Is to Become Self-Sufficient
description:
“Your Grace the Duke, please marry me.” 

When I woke up, I was in a game world. But the problem is that I became a supporting character that was to be sacrificed to break the hard mode. There is only one way out of this situation. Marry the Eastern Grand Duke Sedrick Etzel, avoid a predetermined death, quickly earn a lot of money and become self-made! I have a more cooperative contract husband than I thought. Exceeding the goal seems to be completely possible! Here comes the player, lay down the money path!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kim Daham

title: I Picked a Hammer to Save the World
alt_title: The Hammer, 더 해머
description:
If the name Tiny brings to mind a diminutive rogue befitting the name, think again: Tiny is a headstrong, muscle-bound warrior who would rather smash his way through obstacles with his trusty warhammer than use his brain. 

When Tiny and the legendary Ten Knights of Asran are defeated by the Demon Beastlord Gluttony, he is given a second chance at life as he is magically sent back to the past. 

Relying on his knowledge of the future, the young Tiny must right the wrongs of the past and prepare for the upcoming battle!
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Studio M

title: Hunter Academy’s Strongest Battle God
alt_title: 헌터 아카데미의 최강투신, Hunter Academy's Strongest Battle God, Hunter Academy's Greatest War God, Непобедимый бог академии охотников, El Dios de la Batalla de la Academia de Cazadores
description:
With an F-rank Trait, deemed the worst of the worst, 5-year-old Shin Yu-sung is abandoned by the Shin-oh family, which is famous for raising hunters.

The same year, he meets one of the strongest hunters, the Fist King, at the orphanage and is adopted by him. The Fist King became the strongest not through his Trait or special abilities — but by training his body.

He takes note of Shin Yu-sung's physique instead of his Trait — nine blocked yin pathways.

“Your blocked pathways cause your body’s mana to overflow, giving you an exceptional mind and god-like looks! But you also pass away before coming of age…”

An abundance of bodily yang.

“Your body is overflowing with the energy that can cure your nine blocked yin pathways!”
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yeon Mosmaen (연못맨)

title: A World Without You
alt_title: 사랑받는 언니가 사라진 세계, Sarangbanneun Eonniga Sarajin Segye, A World Without My Sister Whom Everyone Loved, A World Without My Sister Who Everyone Loved, The World Where the Beloved Sister Disappeared, Without My Evil Sister, El mundo sin mi hermana a quien todos amaban, 愛され悪女が消えた世界, 备受宠爱的姐姐消失的世界, 受宠姐姐消失的世界, 萬人迷姐姐消失的世界
description:
"I hate you enough to want to kill you, Sienna."

I was my sister’s shadow all my life, and I was betrayed by her and died. But… people have changed since the day I came back in time.

"You're the only child Nacht chose."

"His Highness recognizes you as family."

Something's wrong. These people seem to mistake me for my older sister.

"I beg you, believe in us for once, that we care for you."

I once wanted to be loved. Now I fear that this mindset will become my weakness. One betrayal was enough. Everything is over when you bet everything in love. I just want to get my life back so…

---
After being taken in by the noble house of Nacht, Sienna grew up with her adopted sister, Lorena, who she believed to be the sweetest, kindest person in the world. But after Lorena attempts to kill her, Sienna realizes how much her "loving" sister actually hated her. She tries to end her life with a magic potion but ends up going back in time instead. Determined to survive, she tries to use her memories to her advantage. For some strange reason though... Lorena is now nowhere to be found.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Na Yoo Hye

title: Boushoku-Hi no Ken
alt_title: The Sword of Princess Gluttony, Меч принцессы Чревоугодия, 暴食妃の剣, 폭식비의 검
description:
After Dean, a third rate adventurer, got surrounded by demonic beasts in the demonic labyrinth, he fled to a place where he found the strongest demon who devours power: The demon-fed sword Belzera, born to the Gluttony Empress Belzebuth. After obtaining such unexpected power, he once again aims to become a first rate adventurer he looked up to, and delves deeper into the labyrinth. However…  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054913513847) (Japanese)
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Nekoko.

title: The Monster Duke Mistook Me for His Wife
alt_title: 괴물 공작이 나를 아내로 착각한다, The Monster Duke Mistakes Me for His Wife, El Monstruoso Duque Me Confundió Con Su Esposa
description: El 'Duque Monstruoso' que está maldito y una figura oscura, Dillian Sinaize apareció ante mis ojos. “¿Quién diablos le hizo esto?” Está muriendo. No podía fingir que no lo había visto, así que lo traté. “¿No solo ha perdido la memoria, sino que también tiene extrañas ilusiones?” “Cuando te veo, mi corazón late tan rápido y mi mente se marea.” "Bueno eso es…" "Como era de esperar, éramos amantes.” “¡¿No, no nos conocíamos?!” Una vez que comenzó el malentendido todo se salió de control. "Si mi esposa me deja..." "¿No crees que podría matarte?" "No, tienes que matar al tipo que te secuestró". De este hombre aterrador… ¿Podré escapar…?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Changman

title: Ten to Chi to Hazama no Sekai Yelatium
alt_title: Yeratium - The World Between Heaven And Earth, 天と地と狭間の世界イェラティアム
description:
The long-awaited comicalisation of the Another world x Battle fantasy from the novel! 

Heaven, where gods dwell. On earth, where demons dwell. And people live in the world in between. There were seven floating continents. When a continent falls, demons appear and become stronger and when a continent rises, no demons appear and one can enjoy a moment of peace and tranquility. The Wheel of Fortune,given by the gods, is responsible for a continent’s levitation. After 2,000 years, the Wheel of Fortune begins to change. The time for inevitable destruction, One boy soars through the space between heaven and earth on blue wings…..
genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Haru Yayari

title: The Marquis and the Iron Wall Lady
alt_title: 결벽 후작과 철벽 레이디, El marqués corrupto y la dama de hierro, ¡¿Dónde está mi martillo?!, Where is My Little Stick?!
description:
Alpheus, the Marquis of Lothian and master of Silverglen Castle, is considered the perfect man with a brilliant mind and a handsome face. However, rumour has it that he suffers from a mysterious disease and always wears gloves.

His finance secretary Edith has been working for the marquis for years when he suddenly asks her to act as his fake fiancée. He seems to need an excuse to refuse the many marriage proposals offered to him, but what exactly is his plan that he strangely acts incredibly sincere in this contract relationship? The longer she pretends to be his fiancée, the more confused Edith becomes...

A cold-blooded noble and a lady with a defence as strong as an iron wall - the beginning of a workplace romance that starts with a contract!
genre: Romance, Fantasy
author: Yulibi

title: The Bad Ending of an Otome
alt_title: 그 오토메 게임의 배드엔딩, Geu Otome Game-ui Bad Ending, Geu otome geim-ui baedeuending, Lia's Bad Ending, The Otome Game's Bad Ending, The Bad Ending of the Otome Game, Плохой конец этой отомэ-игры, 那个乙女游戏的坏结局, The Bad Ending of an Otome Game, El Mal Final Del Juego Otome
description:
The game's heroine had a limited time to live. Meanwhile, I played the role of the villainous friend that vies for the male leads' attention before being eliminated by the player. However, after that kid died, I made the decison on my own to exit from this story.

But, what do I do? The reactions of those around me are a bit strange.

"I came to the marquess’s estate because Ophelia needed a friend around her age. And now, Ophelia's dead."

Their gaze seemed to be asking me why I was stating the obvious.
I said it plainly.

"So, I should leave now."

For some reason, the two men made an expression as if they were at a loss for words.
They used to consider me a fly that stuck to Ophelia's side, so why?

*Otome Game: A game targeted towards women where the protagonist (player) is female
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Video Games, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Cheomji (첨지)

title: Have You Seen My Brother?
alt_title: 兄台看见我弟了吗, 君、弟を見なかったか?
description: The martial arts master Chu Wenshan has lost his memories, but the only clue to finding out about himself is a threatening letter… Huh? My brother was kidnapped? Wait, who’s my brother? No, even if I don’t know, I have to rescue him. Excuse me my friend, have you seen my brother?
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Full Color
author: 深海裹茶

title: After School Mate
alt_title: アフタースクールメイト
description: Family, friends, himself... Rika is frustrated by his inability to gain understanding of the gender difference between his body and mind, and one day he gets into a fight with his mother and runs away from home. There he meets Satsuki, a boy who can share his feelings of not being understood... The two meet and confront the issues they have been running away from... A coming-of-age drama that questions "individuality"!
genre: Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Umino Kuon

title: 8th Loop for the Win! With Seven Lives’ Worth of XP and the Third Princess’s Appraisal Skill, My Behemoth and I Are Unstoppable!
description:
This is a story about Remille, an adventurer who died. Specifically, he’s died a lot — seven times now, always at the hands of vicious monsters.

Every time, though, he’s returned to the same day, three years prior. He’s tried everything at this point, from sword fighting to magical arts to beast taming, but it always ends the same way. Is there any hope for him in this 8th loop of his life?

Perhaps a chance encounter with Princess Ciel might change things? Her magical eye can see all possible futures—and with Remille’s vast stores of XP from seven lives of adventuring, just about anything is possible!

Add in the fact that his erstwhile feline friend Catra isn’t exactly what she seems (and how the princess herself wants to party up with him) and this 8th loop might just be the charm!
genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Skyfarm

title: The Genius Medicinal Mage
alt_title: Drug-Eating Genius Mage, 약먹는 천재 마법사, Yakmeokneun Cheonjaemabeopsa, El mago prodigio devorador de medicina, Genius Wizard Takes Medicine
description:
Renoc was supposed to be a video game character, so giving him a dying body in exchange for extreme magical prowess felt reasonable. However, when his creator wakes up inside Renoc's body, it doesn't feel like a game anymore!

His life in the game is unbearable until he discovers the mysterious drug Vyper, which gives him the strength to wield his magic to its full potential.

As Renoc walks a fine line with the drug that could save or destroy him, can he find a way to survive in this new world?
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yeoun (여운)

title: Our Aimless Nights
alt_title: 夜のまにまに, En medio de la noche
description: Cheerful, energetic high school girl Chika and shy, reserved boy Waya couldn’t be more different. But they have a secret: every Wednesday after 9PM they meet outside the convenience store where Waya works. Bit by bit, under the light of the moon, a unique connection begins to blossom in this enchanting coming-of-age love story!
genre: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kou Mori

title: The Legend of Heroes VI: Trails of Cold Steel
alt_title: 英雄伝説 閃の軌跡, 英雄傳說 閃之軌跡
description:
In the warmongering nation of Erebonia lies Thors Military Academy, a premier institution attended by both the nobility and the common folk alike. Rean Schwarzer, a new first year, learns that he, along with eight students of wildly different backgrounds, have been selected for the experimental Class VII - a new class in which the established social hierarchies are not recognized. But tensions are high in the Empire, and Rean and his new classmates may soon find themselves embroiled in conflicts far beyond those of the classroom.  
  
Based on the game Eiyuu Densetsu - Sen no Kiseki (The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel) by Nihon Falcom.
genre: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Emura Mao

title: Between the Years
alt_title: Years Between, 岁月间, 歲月間
description: That was the boy I loved, accompanying me through verdant days and brilliant, fleeting years.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Full Color
author: Miao Zi Jiang (笛子酱)

title: Jack Be Invincible
alt_title: 후작가의 역대급 막내아들, Величайший в истории младший сын маркиза, Legendary Youngest Son of the Marquis House, The Margravial Household's Phenomenal Youngest Son, The Marquess's Youngest Son, El legendario hijo menor de la casa del marqués
description:
After getting revenge on the Thulcaan Empire, Jack Valantier took his last breath. But just when he thinks it's all over, he finds himself transported back to when he was 14!

From his negligent and wicked family to his loyal servant and caring sister, it's all just as he had remembered. But this time, Jack is armed to the teeth with decades of experience from his previous life! He's ready to give them hell, and those that have wronged him will pay dearly.

Because this time, he's invincible.
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Nok Wolhi (넉울히)

title: Mao
alt_title: MAO, マオ, 摩緒
description:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)
genre: Thriller, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Medical, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Takahashi Rumiko

title: Second Life of a Trash Princess
alt_title: 망나니의 누님이시다, Mangnaniui Nunimisida, Crowning a Spoiled Prince, 暴れん坊のお姉様, 混球的姐姐, Ella es la hermana de un rufián
description:
After losing her father, bratty brother, and the Elias Empire to her traitorous fiancé's schemes, Princess Regina makes a wish upon a magic ancestral stone and returns to when she was fifteen. With one last chance to right everything, she comes up with a plan: train her spoiled sibling to be the next ruler by becoming an even bigger brat and get Aaron Vestein, the most beautiful man in the empire, to replace her fiancé! But will just wits, resolve, and a new suitor be enough to change Regina's fate?

---
Regina, whose father was the emperor who was assassinated, became the regent on behalf of her younger brother. While facing plenty of hardships, news about the depletion of national funds due to her maniac younger brother's behavior, as well as her fiancé having an affair, begin to spread...  In the end, she lost everything when her fiancé committed treason. In her last moments, she turned back time using the relic of the first emperor. In order to stop the main culprit, Regina declares that she will become a bigger brat than her younger brother and a love-crazed fool.

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56415968), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=9074379)

author: Wheedrian

title: My Love Tiger
alt_title: Lord Tiger and I, Me and the Tigress, My Loli Tiger, The Tiger and I, 나와 호랑이님
description:
Sunghoon was a normal high schooler until one day, he finds out he is engaged to a tiger from Korean mythology. It is foretold that the world will end unless Sunghoon marries the tiger. This story begins with the cute smile of the tiger girl.  
  
*Notice: This series reads like a manga, from right-to-left.*
genre: Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kanel

title: PEEP
alt_title: ピープ
description: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, School Life
author: Ueno Meguru

title: Astral Online - Maou no Noroi de Saikyou Bishoujo ni natta Ore, Saijaku Shoku da ga Cheat Skill de Chou Seichou shite Musou suru
alt_title: アストラル・オンライン 魔王の呪いで最強美少女になったオレ、最弱職だがチートスキルで超成長して無双する, Astral Online: I, Who Became the Strongest Beautiful Girl Due to the Demon King's Curse, Have the Weakest Job but I Grow Up Super Fast With My Cheat Skills and Become a Warrior.
description:
A high school boy, Sora Kamijo, who is addicted to VR games, starts playing Astral Online, a VRMMO that has been talked about as a god game, and suddenly finds himself fighting against the Demon King, the last boss. In addition to the sudden battle, the Demon King casts a curse on him and transforms him into a beautiful silver-haired girl...?　

A new VRMMO fantasy involving both the game and reality begins!
genre: Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kamina Fumu

title: Ao Ashi
alt_title: アオアシ, 青之芦苇, 青之蘆葦, 아오아시, Ао Аши
description:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
genre: Award Winning, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kobayashi Yuugo

title: The Player Who Can't Level Up
alt_title: 레벨업 못하는 플레이어, Игрок, который не может повысить уровень, The Player That Can’t Level Up, 无法升级的玩家, El jugador que no puede subir de nivel
description:
When Kim Gigyu received his invitation to become a player (a unique-ability player, at that), he thought his struggles were over. But no matter how hard he tries, he just can’t seem to get past level 1!

After five years of working as a guide on the lower floors of the tower, he’s finally discovered his ability to link with “Egos” and raise his stats. As his new skills unlock adventures in unexplored gates, Gigyu gets his chance to defy expectations and show the world that rank isn’t everything.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5EOX1gzHPZo)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A0%88%EB%B2%A8%EC%97%85-%EB%AA%BB%ED%95%98%EB%8A%94-%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4/2477)
---

author: Parrot Kim (앵무새)

title: Fake Saint of the Year: You Wanted the Perfect Saint? Too Bad!
alt_title: Фальшивая святая, отброс года. ~Идеальная святая? Нет, всего лишь подделка!~, 偽聖女クソオブザイヤー～理想の聖女？　残念、偽聖女でした！～
description:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] is a game ill-suited of being known as a galge, as the main heroine would – regardless of the chosen route – meet her demise.

Fudou Niito, a resident of Japan, went to bed dissatisfied with the ending of the game. When he next awoke, he found himself in the body of the game’s hated fake saint, Elrise. Confused, but with an understanding that Elrise’s actions would spell disaster for many lives in the future, he took advantage of the situation and acted to change the course of history.

As a result, despite her rotten personality, Elrise was adored by those around her as a perfect saint. Furthermore, the game itself was intrinsically linked to his original world and changed accordingly to suit Elrise’s actions. Without any knowledge of what the hell was going on, the fake saint Elrise continued to alter her fate.

A saint on the outside, but a man on the inside.

The transmigrator was a piece of shit and the person he transmigrated into was also a piece of shit. A combination of shit and shit would cause an accident – to create the greatest fake saint shitshow of the year!
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation
author: kabedondaikou

title: Elizabeth
alt_title: 엘리자베스
description:
Elizabeth is the most beautiful girl in town, she sells strawberries in the forbidden forest and lives life positively day by day without losing her pride.

“I am the Duke of Kaluk. The name is Matthias. No surname.”
“Oh, why are you taking off your clothes?”

It's obvious that he's a great person but he is also some strange duke. Besides, on the first day we met, he refused to ask for a date. On the contrary, he also offered her to work as a maid.

“My uncle's mansion needs a maid, Elizabeth.”

The Old lord's mansion. There was no maid in the mansion to accommodate the lord. So, there will be only one purpose to make yourself the maid of the mansion! It is to serve at night!

“I absolutely hate it! Never!"

This is a romantic fantasy novel full of misunderstandings between an innocent straight man, a duke, and a girl in a complex downtown area!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ma Cherie

title: Kill the Villainess
alt_title: Agnyeo Leul Jug-Yeojwo, Убить злодейку, 악녀를 죽여 줘, 悪女を殺して, 杀死恶女, 除掉那个恶女, Elimina a la Dama Villana
description:
Eris Miserian just wants to die.

Being overworked and underappreciated in the real world wasn’t great, but living as the villainess in a romance novel is even worse. If Eris can die in the novel, she might be able to return to reality, but the story won’t let her. Desperate to escape a life as the protagonist’s tormentor, she sets off on a journey with the help of a witch, a knight, and a high priest. Can she find her way back to her friends and family, or is Eris doomed to a fictional future?

---

title: Blue Lock Legions
alt_title: Blue Lock Fan Series
description:
Rai Genji always dreamed of being a top football player, especially one to play for Japan. And by the efforts of his passion, he was invited to the Blue Lock project, where he developed his ego. Coming across foes, rivals, teammates, and friends; Rai needs to learn and adapt to the constant improvement of everyone else to hone his skills to a professional level. Will he be able to conquer the Blue Lock? Or will he fall into the pit of losers.?

Blue Lock Legions is a Blue Lock knock-off created for the purpose of pure enjoyment and not profit. The series follows very similar concepts to the original Blue Lock series, but with an original twist on the characters, plot line, events, etc.
genre: Thriller, Action, Comedy, Sports, Self-Published, School Life, Web Comic
author: Cosmanga

title: Dricam!!
alt_title: ドリキャン！！, Dricam!!
description: “Drifting is a sport!” Rin Todoroki, a natural drifting genius, just wants to put driving aside and live out a normal, comfy university life. What will happen when she is confronted by the automobile club, or “auto” for short? Students who’ve put it all on the line… their stories start here!!
genre: Long Strip, Sports, School Life, Web Comic
author: Chiba Yuu

title: I Became the Emperor's Cat
alt_title: 황제의 고양이가 되었습니다
genre: Romance
author: Ravioli (라비올리)

title: Carnephelia's Curse Is Never Ending
alt_title: 저주는 끝나지 않았다, Jeojuneun Kkeunnaji Anatda, The Curse Is Not Over, 呪われ皇女の復讐は公爵様のために
description: Princess Carnephelia was unloved and neglected until she met Helis, her first love. However, under the evil plots of her half-brother, Prince lanfried, she ended up destroying the only boy she ever loved. Devastated by what she had done, the princess swears revenge... even if it entails her life being cursed for eternity.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Sookjoo

title: Moto Dorei Desu ga, Oni no Dorei wo Katte Mitara Seiryoku ga Tsuyosugiru node Sutetai...
alt_title: 元奴隷ですが、鬼の奴隷を買ってみたら精力が強すぎるので捨てたい……, I'm a Former Slave, but I Tried to Buy an Oni Slave Whom I Later Found to Have Too Much Energy, so I Want to Throw Him Away..., I Bought a Demon Slave but He's So Strong That I Want to Throw Him Away..., 本来身为奴隶，买了鬼做奴隶结果却因为精力太旺盛了好想扔掉
description: It has been seven years since Sora Ono was sent to another world, where she was enslaved. Because of a clerical error, her “slave” status was revoked, and Sora walked away a free woman. Then one day, she purchases a slave...
genre: Demons, Romance, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Amaharu Niko

title: Seeking a Beauty in the East Sea
alt_title: Searching for the Beauty in the East China Sea, 东海寻美人
description:
In a past life, the mountain deity took in a quiet child, only to find her care fostering an unexpected twist: the little one didn't want to be a servant but instead aspired to be the deity's most intimate companion! But fate played its cruel hand, turning the once inseparable pair into bitter enemies.

In this life, an adorable, water-fearing mermaid happens upon an aloof beauty with no memories of her past. A chance kiss during their first meeting sets off a chaotic companionship. However, what seemed to be a serendipitous meeting turns out to be a reunion of a relationship already rich with deep-seated emotions...

From lifetimes past to the present, love flourishes...
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: 桐子骨

title: The Extra Is Too Powerful
alt_title: 엑스트라가 너무 강함, Ekseuteura-ga Neomu Gangham, The Extra Is Too Strong, El Extra es Demasiado Fuerte
description:
Hit by a drunk driver and bedridden ever since, Um Tae-sung now only knows the cruel reality of pitying gazes, medical fees, and being half-paralyzed. 

His only escape is reading his favorite web novel, "The Mage That Devours the World". But when the last chapter ends with the hero destroying everything, Tae-sung realizes happy endings don't exist. That is until he wakes up one day as Mord, an extra from the novel!

Now, he’s determined to create the happy ending he’s always dreamed of.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kim Jae-han

title: A Former Delinquent Girl Falls in Love
alt_title: 元ヤン娘、恋をする
description: Spin-off/Spiritual Sequel of the authors other work "The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other"; with this story focusing on the mask wearing former delinquent and her budding romance with the little brother of the Female MC of the previous work.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Kato Mayumi

title: The Novel’s Extra
alt_title: 소설 속 엑스트라, The Novel’s Extra (Remake), Дополнение в новелле, The Novel’s Extra (2022), El extra de la novela
description:
Wouldn’t it be a dream to wake up in a world of your own creation? For Kim Hajin, it’s nothing short of a nightmare. 

With no clue how or why he’s been transported into his web novel — as a mere extra, no less! — Hajin has little choice but to see his story through until the end. Lucky for him, as the author, he knows this perilous world like the back of his hand. 

But when discrepancies in the plot begin popping up left and right, Hajin soon realizes that things aren’t quite so simple, after all…

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4mamlw_Z8eo)
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jee Gab Song (지갑송)

title: Henkyou no Renkinjutsushi: Imasara Yosan Zero no Shokuba ni Modoru Toka Mou Muri
alt_title: 辺境の錬金術師, 辺境の錬金術師 ～今更予算ゼロの職場に戻るとかもう無理～, The Frontier Alchemist ~ I Can't Go Back to That Job After You Made My Budget Zero, 邊境的鍊金術師 ～現今要回到零預算的職場已經不行～, The Frontier Alchemist
description:
Rust worked in the alchemist association. He specialized in basic research, but the current president, a former government official, failed to understand the importance of the basic research department and slashed its budget. To make matters worse, he was made to transmute basic materials for alchemists of other departments.

But one day, his budget for the next term was reduced to zero, and the president announced the basic research department was disbanded.

The same day, a friend from his academy days invited him to help develop her new dominion in the borderland, and Rust, seeing no future for himself in the association, decided to quit.

Rust was actually one of the greatest alchemists on the planet. The basic materials he transmuted were of the highest quality, and could not be acquired anywhere else. These high quality materials covered a lot of gaps in the association, and Rust’s departure made a big mess.

Feeling liberated after leaving the association, Rust worked in the borderland with a newfound enthusiasm and vigor.
genre: Monsters, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Oteteponta

alt_title: Jobless Reincarnation - I Will Go All Out When I'm Transported to Another World, Jobless Reincarnation - It Will be All Out if I Go to Another World, Mr. No-Job's New Life - If I Go to a Parallel World, Then I'll Get Serious, Mushoku Tensei: If I Get to a Parallel Universe I'll Bring Out my True Effort, Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation, Реинкарнация безработного ~История о приключениях в другом мире~, Реинкарнация безработного: Попав в другой мир, я стану сёръёзнее, 无职转生~在异世界认真地活下去~, 無職転生 〜異世界行ったら本気だす〜, 무직전생 〜다른 세계 가면 진심 낸다〜, 無職轉生~在異世界認真地活下去~, Реинкарнация безработного: Я серьёзно постараюсь, если отправлюсь в другой мир
description: A 34-year-old NEET gets killed in a traffic accident and finds himself in a world of magic. Rather than waking up as a full-grown mage, he gets reincarnated as a newborn baby, retaining the memories of his past life. Before he can even properly move his body, he resolves to never make the same mistakes he made in his first life ever again and instead live a life with no regrets with the new one that was given to him. Because he has the knowledge of a middle-aged man, by the age of two, he has already become a prodigy and possesses power unthinkable for anyone his age and even older. Thus begins the chronicles of Rudeus Greyrat, son of swordsman Paul and healer Zenith, as he enters a new world to become the strongest mage known to man, with powers rivaling even the gods themselves.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Rifujin na Magonote

title: Giant Ojou-sama
alt_title: Oriko the Giant, Гигантская дама, ジャイアントお嬢様
description:
I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy
author: Nikumura Q

title: The Elegant Sea of Savagery
alt_title: 우아한 야만의 바다, The Elegant Savage Sea, The Elegant Sea of Barbarism
description:
Irina Nodiac, the eldest daughter of the Marquis, was entrusted to Count Elenoa Schuberg after her father's business continued to fail. All rights were handed over to Elenoa, whom she has known since childhood.

"You belong to me. So don't go messing around."
"Are you treating me like an object?"

However, even though she became a maid, her reputation of a "Crazy Bitch" during Academy days will never change. And now, Irina, who is self-disciplined and confident, stands in front of Elenoa.

"I can do more than what meets the eye. I can carry a lot of stuff."

Elenoa, who wants to own her completely, and Irina, who is trying to move forward despite difficult situations. What kind of voyage will they embark on in the future?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Kim Tilda

title: Doubt
alt_title: Ｄｏｕｂｔ（ダウト）, ダブト, 疑惧Doubt
description: There's a game going around Japan called 'Rabbit Doubt'. The premise of the game is that all of the players are rabbits in a colony, and one amongst them is randomly chosen to be a wolf that infiltrated the group of rabbits. Every round, the wolf kills off a rabbit, and every round, the group tries to figure out which of the rabbits is actually a wolf in disguise. Sometimes the kids who play this game decide to meet up in person, and Yuu, Mitsuki, Rei, Hajime, Eiji, and Haruka have done just that. Unfortunately, one of them has decided to take on the mantle of the wolf and has already killed once. Who is the wolf, and can they be stopped before everyone meets a very unpleasant end?
genre: Action, Psychological, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Tonogai Yoshiki

title: Flawless Metropolitan Divine Emperor
alt_title: Flawless Divine Emperor in the City, Urban Immortal Emperor, 都市绝品仙帝
description: The first thing that Jiang Feng saw when he opened his eyes, is that his hands are on his class teacher's Breast!! Owwu~ This, this is the time before I cultivate! The Immortal emperor has once again return to the mortal world!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, School Life, Adaptation
author: Donkey Rider(骑驴夫子)

title: Dungeon Meshi
alt_title: Dungeon Meal, Подземелье вкусностей, ダンジョン飯, 舌尖上的地下城, 迷宫饭, Comida de Mazmorra, Delicious in Dungeon
description:
After his sister is devoured by a dragon and losing all their supplies in a failed dungeon raid, Laios and his party are determined to save his sister before she gets digested. Completely broke and having to resort to eating monsters as food, they meet a dwarf who will introduce them to the world of Dungeon Meshi - delicious cuisine made from ingredients such as the flesh of giant bats, walking mushrooms, or even screaming mandrakes.  
  
---
- **Ranked 1st in the 2016 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! for Male Readers (Shonen/Seinen)**
genre: Award Winning, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Cooking, Supernatural
author: Kui Ryoko

title: The Lord of Coins
alt_title: 영주님의 코인이 줄지 않음?!, The Lord’s Coins Aren’t Decreasing?!, 领主大人的金币用不完, Does The Lord's Coin Not Shrink?!, Yeongjunimui Koini Julji Aneum?!, 領主様のコインは減らない!?, Насколько же богат этот граф?!, El Dinero Del Señor No Disminuye
description:
Aaron Steelegard's fortune was basically set as he discovered a book that allowed him to trade across dimensions—until his enemies take both his life and his riches away. But Aaron is brought back as his younger self, armed with his past knowledge and a chance at revenge! Now free to amass coins, he's gaining powerful abilities and moving up the ranks of the interdimensional trading markets. Will Aaron gain enough coins to survive this journey of vengeance and reclaim his honor?

title: Saihate ni Madou
alt_title: 最果てに惑う, Lost at the Farthest Ends, Perdido en los extremos más bajos
description: After his little sister was raped and killed herself, a teenage boy took revenge and killed her rapist in return. Seven years later the boy's released from prison, determined to kill himself due to insufferable guilt but then he's confronted by the rapist's daughter. A dramatic tale of guilt and atonement.
genre: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Drama, Tragedy
author: Momoyama Hato

title: Osananajimi Kanojo no Morahara ga Hidoin de Zetsuen Sengen shite Yatta
alt_title: 幼馴染彼女のモラハラがひどいんで絶縁宣言してやった 〜自分らしく生きることにしたら、なぜか隣の席の隠れ美少女から告白された〜, I’m Sick and Tired of My Childhood Friend’s, Now Girlfriend’s, Constant Abuse so I Broke up With Her, I Dared Declare Goodbye To My Emotionally Abusive Childhood Sweetheart
description:
My childhood friend is also my girlfriend. A dream come true, right? Hell no. She insults me on a daily basis. She grinds my dignity into shreds and it takes a toll on my mental well-being. I can’t take it anymore.

So I’m left with no choice, I’m going to break up with her. In order to maintain my sanity, it’s the only option.

And thus, the story of my break up begins…
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
author: Ononata Manimani

title: The Fake Lady and Her Rabbit Duke
alt_title: The Fake Lady's Max Level Rabbit, The Fake Princess' Overpowered Bunny, The Fake Princess' OP Bunny, The Fake Lady and Her Rabbit Duke, 假千金的高级兔子, 偽公女様と秘密の黒ウサギ, 가짜 공녀님의 만렙 토끼
description:
Grand Duke Hadelrune de Strelitz is the hero of the empire and Lady Zernoa de Rhanterra is the “golden flower” of high society. What commonalities could they share besides their glowing reputations? Apparently, secrets. One day, Zernoa comes across an unassuming pile of clothes under which she is startled to find an adorable rabbit who also happens to be… Grand Duke Hadelrune. An ancient family curse and a fictitious upbringing… What else could these two be hiding?!

---

title: Death March kara Hajimaru Isekai Kyousoukyoku
alt_title: Death March to the Parallel World Rhapsody, Death Marching to the Parallel World Rhapsody, Марш смерти в рапсодию параллельного мирa, デスマーチからはじまる異世界狂想曲, 从死亡之旅开始的异世界狂想曲, 데스마치에서 시작되는 이세계 광상곡
description: 29-year-old programmer Suzuki Ichirou finds himself transported into a fantasy RPG. Within the game, he's a 15-year-old named Satou. At first he thinks he's dreaming, but his experiences seem very real. Due to his use of a 3-time-use special power (meteor shower), he ends up wiping out an army of lizardmen and becoming very high level. He hides his level and plans to live peacefully and meet new people, though developments in the game story (like the return of a demon king) might get in his way.
genre: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Ainana Hiro

title: The Reincarnated Assassin Is a Swordmaster
alt_title: 환생한 암살자는 검술 천재, 重生刺客是天才剑士, Hwansaenghan Amsaljaneun Geomsul Cheonjae, El asesino reencarnado es un genio de la espada
description:
Raon was once a loyal assassin for House Robert until Derus killed him. Not willing to give up, Raon prayed for vengeance and woke as a member of House Sieghart, the most powerful noble house!

He’ll need all of their near-infinite resources to get revenge. Though he carried over knowledge of a powerful Flame Link technique, he also carries the Curse of Bitter Frost, something that’s slowly killing him.

As if that weren’t enough, the demonic embodiment of Wrath is trying to take over his body!?
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Writing Ant

title: I Tamed a Tyrant and Ran Away
alt_title: 폭군을 길들이고 도망쳐버렸다, Pogguneur Girdeurigo Domachyeobeoryeossda, The Taming of the Tyrant, Я приручила тирана и убежала, Я сбежала, приручив тирана, 暴君を手懐けて逃げてしまった, 我在馴服暴君後落跑了, 驯服暴君后逃跑, 驯服君主后逃跑
description:
God gave me a chance to relive my life. Before my rebirth, I'd been used for the past 400 years as the empire's sword. And so, I swore to destroy the empire. I found the young prince of the country and became his teacher. I taught him how to become a tyrant and asked for the country.

"I will do as the lady wishes."

He conquered the whole empire for me, and I ran away.

"I came to take you, Charlize Ronan," Dylan had become a perfect tyrant and searched the entire empire for me.

"You tamed me, so why did you run away?"

---
All Charlize Ronan ever wanted was to bring honor to her family. But instead, she is forced into becoming a “living sword” -- a mere tool for the emperors. It is from this hell that she prays for justice… and awakens in her former body. Now, determined to tear down this horrible empire, Charlize seeks out the young prince, Dylan Blade. She will put him on the throne, not as an honorable ruler, but as a tyrant. It is time for Charlize to tame the one who will bring forth her revenge.

---

Rex is a half man half dog. He was created when a drunk old man forced himself on a stray female dog in the street. 
Because of his father, Rex has to live his life as a freak rejected by society.
So one day he’s gonna find that man, and RAPE him.

title: Kalli the Champion
alt_title: 권투사 칼리, Gwontusa Kalri
description:
After giving up his dream as a boxer, Park Kang-tae joined a gang. He was well-known inside the gang but got killed in the end. He had one regret when he died - giving up his dream as a boxer.

Did God know about his regret? In a world, where boxing exists in the form of pugilist games, Park Kang-tae pursues his unfulfilled dream.

title: Taming the Marquess
alt_title: 미친 후작을 길들이고 말았다, Michin Hujageul Gildeurigo Maratda, I Tamed the Crazy Marquis, I Tamed the Mad Marquis, キケンな侯爵を手なずけてしまった, 驯养疯侯爵, Domé al Marqués Loco
description:
Amid the dark secrets between the House of van Dyke and the royal House of Lomanic, Escal is used by the third prince, Hazen. That’s when he finds himself being shaken up by Laranoan. With her appearance, the hidden stories begin to be revealed one by one. Bearing the same scars, the two men end up falling in love with Laranoan, who has a light that is the complete opposite to them. The crooked love bombing of the two men who are ignorant about love brings about a huge change...

---
Laranora Ador gets more than she bargained for when she rescues a young boy from being sold off in an infamous auction house. The boy is actually Eskal van Dyck, the "Crazy Marquess," in disguise! Unaware of his violent and heartless true nature, Laranora takes Eskal under her wing. Determined to raise him with utmost care and respect, Laranora grows deeply attached to Eskal... and in return, the true Eskal begins to fall in love with her. Unfortunately, Eskal is often targeted for his powerful magic and ruthless ways, which leads to a tragic event that separates the two. But Eskal is determined to find her again as his true self. Will Laranora be able to accept who he really is? And more importantly, what will happen when something fishy brewing in the Imperial Palace may involve them both?

---

title: Sousou no Frieren
alt_title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End, Frieren at the Funeral, Фрирен, провожающая в последний путь, 葬送のフリーレン, 葬送的芙莉蓮, 장송의 프리렌, Frieren: Remnants Of The Departed, Frieren: Más allá del final, Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje
description: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
genre: Award Winning, Monsters, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Yamada Kanehito

title: Doctor Player
alt_title: 닥터 플레이어, Dr. Player
description:
Raymond was the illegitimate son of the king.

After being shamed and scorned, he ran away and became a healer… only to end up being ridiculed for getting an F rank.

Then, one day, a miracle came upon him.

[You have awakened as a player!]
[Job: Surgeon (SSS-rank)]

Raymond gained medical knowledge that had not existed in this world. The great legend of Raymond, the first surgeon, begins now!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Medical, Fantasy
author: yuin

title: Isekai de Slow Life wo (Ganbou)
alt_title: I Have a Slow Life in a Different World (I Wish), Slow Life In Another World (I Wish!), Размеренной жизни бы в ином мире (мечта), 異世界でスローライフを（願望）, 在異世界過慢生活（願望）
description: By the will of the goddess, Itsuki Shinomiya was given the privilege of choosing various abilities and being reborn in another world. However, before going to the other world, he didn't want to involve himself in scary, dirty, gross things like battles. Fiercely determined to live a slow life, he chose the unique skill [Pocket Money], giving him an amount of money once per day. "With this, I can hang out with girls without having to work!" Dreaming of avoiding battles and living with cute girls, Itsuki stepped into the other world! But the reality was not that simple. Getting attacked by giant bugs, getting caught up in arguments at the guild, and getting stuck with slaves?! In the end, will Itsuki be able to live his ideal slow life?! Using unique skills and manufacturing skills, an exciting other-world slow life with beautiful girls starts now! (hopefully)
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

alt_title: Dokumushi - The Ruins Hotel, Poisonous Insect - The Ruins Hotel, The Ruins Hotel, ドクムシThe Ruins Hotel
description: Six members of the occult circle will spend a few days at a ruined love hotel during their summer vacation. Upon arrival they meet two additional people who join them, but in the morning of the second day, a female member was found tied & naked. In addition, the exit was locked by someone and the building became a completely enclosed cage. Will this be a repeat of the 'kodoku' that happened 3 years ago?

title: Sirius The Jaeger - Rework
description:
The story revolves around two brothers whose home had been destroyed by vampires. They were separated, each believing the other to be dead, until they finally meet again years later. 

But now they face a new problem: while the younger brother, Yuliy, became a vampire hunter to avenge the loss of their family, his brother Mikhail got turned into a vampire himself. What must they do in this situation, and what is the mysterious relic called "The Ark of Sirius" that the vampires are after? 

Based on the original anime television series of the same name produced by P.A.Works in 2018, directed by Masahiro Andou and written by Keigo Koyanagi.

---

Disclaimer: This is a fan-made webcomic, for entertainment purpose only. We are not trying to make any money from it! The plot and some character designs have been changed and may differ from the original story at several points. This comic was born in the spirit of our respect, passion and love for the series. 

Rework written and created by: Cessalina & Diamond aka PhoenixDragonWorks

title: Accidental Warrior
alt_title: 저는 용사님이 아닌데요, Jeoneun Yongsanimi Anindeyo!, I'm Not a Warrior!, I'm Not the Hero!, I Am Not a Warrior!, 私は勇者ではないんです！, 魔女无法悠闲生活
description:
"I'm a witch!" 

After ending the difficult life of Cheon Eun-ha due to an accident and bad luck, Bris was reborn as a witch in a fairy tale. Even from his friend Sion, he hides the fact that he is a witch and lives alone a little far from the village. Then one day, her fairy appears in front of her and she calls herself her dragon lord. 

"Yes? Fairy Ariel? Maybe the protagonist of that fantasy fairy tale? It's unfair that the place of reincarnation is in a fantasy fairy tale I read by chance, but I have to become a hero to defeat the demon king! How can a witch do that?" 

And Bris finds out the truth about another witch... Is the villain in this fairy tale really the villain?

---
After a life full of hardship and heartache, Chon-Eun Ha died in the hospital all alone. However, she woke up suddenly in a lush forest, reincarnated as a witch an a wonderous fantasy world full of magicians, knights and other creatures. A world so wonderous, in fact, that suddenly she finds a fairy has moved into her house. "My brave warrior! I've been waiting for you! I'm sorry I must have startled you!" What is this fairy doing in my house?! "My name is Ariel!" No way, ***the*** heavenly Ariel from the *Tale of Ariel*?!

---
Eun-Ha Cheon was just an ordinary teenage girl until she woke up one day and discovered that she was not Eun-Ha Cheon anymore, but a witch named Blythe in a magical world. Fearful of prejudice and desirous of a quiet life, she hides the fact that she’s a witch, but this becomes tricky with the arrival of a beautiful fairy who won’t stop calling her a warrior. She doesn’t want to be a warrior or anyone’s hero. All she wants is an ordinary life… But as she learns more about her identity and her world, will she ultimately get what she wants?

---

title: No More Turning a Blind Eye
alt_title: 더는 못 본 척하지 않기로 했다, 더 는 못 본척 하지 않기로 했다, Deoneun Mon Bon Cheokaji Ankiro Haetda, Deoneun Mos Bon Cheog Haji Anhgiro Haessda, I Can No Longer Pretend I Don't See It, Can't Pretend to Be Blind Anymore, Я больше не стану притворяться, что ничего не замечаю, もう見て見ぬふりはしない, 我不會再視而不見, 我決定不再視而不見, 重生后，伯爵夫人要离婚！, 不会再视而不见
description:
Ophelia Heavenwalker dies a pitiful death, succumbing to a mysterious illness at the exact moment she witnesses her husband’s infidelity. So when fate gives her a chance to redo the last three years of her life, she decides she’s done being a doormat. She’s taking back her name, taking back her estate, and taking back her life! Now’s the time for Ophelia to enjoy her independence and budding romance, but will that be possible with her failing health and spiteful ex-husband still in the picture?

---
I realized after going back in time. My husband who had an affair had an affair again, and the woman he had an affair with appeared in front of me again. Also, I don't have much time left to live.

"Let's get a divorce."

"What..."

"I don't have a single penny to give you, so take out everything I bought you and leave. Hey, I mean everything. That includes your underwear too."

"Why are you suddenly doing this?"

"Suddenly?" I asked with a twisted smile on my face, I always knew he was a shameless person, but this is a bit too much, "You should know that better than me, you sex-crazed bastard."

---

title: The Possesive Tyrant and His Sleepy Cat
alt_title: 매일 밤 집착폭군과 잠드는 고양이가 되었다, I Became a Cat That Sleeps with an Obsessive Tyrant Every Night, 占有欲强的暴君和他的磕睡小猫, Me volví una gata que duerme con un tirano obsesivo todas las noches, La gata del tirano
description:
I've found myself trapped in a mature-rated novel as a cursed cat, whose mere existence is believed to be harmful to the empire. This place has killed every cat in every alley all because of one prophecy...
The moment anyone finds me will be my last moment in this life.
"What's this?"
Before I could even think of escaping, the male lead, who's fated to become a mad tyrant, effortlessly snatches me up.
genre: Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Sando (샌도)

title: The Archvillain's Daughter in Law
alt_title: 시한부라서 흑막의 며느리가 되었는데, Sihanburaseo Heugmag-eui Myeoneuriga Doeeossneunde, My Time Was Limited, so I Became the Villain's Daughter-in-Law, Because She Had a Time Limit, She Became the Villain's Daughter-in-Law, The Villain's Daughter-in-Law Has Limited Time, Мои дни сочтены, но мрачный герцог сделал меня своей невесткой, 应为生命有限而成了黑幕的媳妇, 余命わずかだから黒幕一家の嫁になったんだけど, Debido A Que Tenía Un Límite De Tiempo, Se Convirtió En La Nuera Del Villano
description:
I've reincarnated as the young daughter-in-law of a villain who was taken in for his deceptive plans. The problem is that I'm terminally ill, so I'm going to die when I become an adult.

"Luckily, I know how to cure it, but..."

If I don't die at the right time, my father-in-law—no, the villain, Duke Ecarde—might kill me just to achieve his goals!

But what kind of kid could actually adjust to this kind of household?

"I want to live happily with Father and Evan for a long time... cough! Cough!"

Me. I'm "that kid."

---
The final villain is being deceived by his young time-limited daughter in law who was possessed. If I die at the right time, I will marry his son. The problem is, I already know the cure! And I don't want to die, but if I don't get killed now, then I won't die quietly.

"Daddy, I love you so much. You are the most handsome man in the world. Cough, cough!"

"Evan, shall we read a fairy tale book together until we fall asleep?"

She will have to act a little better to let his guard down. Then, she would be able to do a great job.

I think I'll have to leave secretly after I get better. I have to make a lot of money and buy land under pseudonyms.

"Call all the council members on the continent. My daughter-in-law has to live."

Father? Shouldn't I be thrown away…?

"If you die, I'll follow you unconditionally. I can't live in a world without you."

Husband? You’re acting strange, too… You don’t love anyone, do you?

Even- "Who is this, Kyle Ravonis? The man who seduced my daughter-in-law deserves to die."

"Even if you cheated on me with another man, I will never break up with you."

You must have misunderstood my other name!

"When did this start, huh? You said you wanted to live as a sweet couple, but you tried to run away by creating a new identity behind our back?"

I want to quietly disappear, not die! I didn't know my husband, who has been like a friend to me ever since we were young, would come to me with such sore eyes.

"You're still my wife on paper. Live as my wife, and die as my wife."

"Evan?"

"You've shown me both heaven and hell…" his reddened eyes locked me up, "You'll never get away from me no matter where you go."

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%9C%ED%95%9C%EB%B6%80%EB%9D%BC%EC%84%9C-%ED%9D%91%EB%A7%89%EC%9D%98-%EB%A9%B0%EB%8A%90%EB%A6%AC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EB%8A%94%EB%8D%B0/2762), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58670925)
