author: Jeong Ryeong Ga

title: Favela no Mangaka
alt_title: ファヴェーラの漫画家, Favela Mangaka, Favela Comic Artist, Mangaka de Favela
description:
Japanese comic artist Takei Hiroto, who was rejected once again at a serialization meeting, decided to give up on his dream and go on a heartbroken trip to Brazil to get over everything.

In a favela (slum) he accidentally wandered into, Hiroto meets a poor boy with sharp eyes named João. Living on the exact opposite side of the Earth, João surprisingly has a dream of becoming a mangaka (Japanese comic artist)…!!

No matter who you are or where you live, you don’t have to give up. The story of two slum mangakas chasing their dreams begins!!
genre: Crime, Drama, Web Comic
author: Hagimoto Souhachi

title: Seirei Gensouki ~Konna Sekai de Deaeta Kimi ni~
alt_title: 精霊幻想記 ～こんな世界で出会えた君に～, Seirei Gensouki: Spirit Chronicles, Mythical Spirit Chronicle, 精靈幻想記, 정령환상기, Хроника мифического духа, Мифический дух: Хроники
description:
Meet Rio, a callous orphaned boy living in the slums. At only 7-years-old, he realizes he’s actually the reincarnation of Haruto Amakawa, a Japanese university student with a tragic past. 

While still reeling from this shocking epiphany, Rio also comes to learn that he possesses extremely potent magical abilities and uses his new powers to solve the kidnapping case of a little girl. 

His good deed is acknowledged, and he’s rewarded by being enrolled into… a prestigious academy for noble children...?

---

**Note:** This is a relaunch of the now discontinued alternate story: [Seirei Gensouki ~Konna Sekai de Deaeta Kimi ni~](https://mangadex.org/title/dfabad2b-10be-4f16-b779-7746e095d832)

author: Kitayama Yuri

title: Sekai Saikyou no Kouei: Meikyuukoku no Shinjin Tansakusha
alt_title: World Strongest Rearguard: Labyrinth Country and Dungeon Seekers, World's Strongest Rearguard - The Novice Seeker of Labyrinth Country, WSR, Самый сильный в мире Заступник – Страна лабиринта и искатели приключений, 世界最強の後衛, 世界最強の後衛 ～迷宮国の新人探索者～, 世界最強後衛～迷宮國的新人探索者～, 세계최강의 후위 ~미궁나라의 신인탐색가~, The World's Strongest Rearguard: Labyrinth Country's Novice Seeker, 世界最强后卫~迷宫国的新人探索者~
description:
Workaholic assistant Atobe Arihito fell asleep in his company's bus that was traveling for a vacation. When he awoke he learned he had died due to the bus getting into an accident, and that he had reincarnated into a world of reincarnators - to the Labyrinth Country. To his surprise he was discovered by his slave driving manager, Igarashi Kyouka, who further explains their role in this world.  
In Labyrinth Country, Reincarnators are expected to choose a job and form parties to fight against monsters in Labyrinths. "Valkyrie" Kyouka had expected Arihito to work with her once again, but he declines due to his knowledge of her demanding nature. As they depart she vows to make him regret not choosing her. And thus starts Arihito's adventure as a "Rear Guard".  


---

Even if it's denied, even if it's misunderstood, that's okay because that is my love for that person.  
  
The hated Ophelia, the young Duke Rosenstein's wife, is rumored to be a domineering woman and a huge spender. Yet all that is a ruse to fake her dedication to her husband. After their marriage, Ophelia soon realizes that Orpheus has a lover. In order to cleanly divorce him, she continues to act out her ruse.  
  
Ophelia wants to quickly separate from her marriage while on the other hand, Orpheus refuses to let her go…?

description:
An ordinary corporate slave, Ding Xueyang, has a secret - he has a special ability! But his special ability has a flaw; if he is seen using it, the special ability will be randomized to a new one.

For over twenty years, in order to keep this secret, Ding Xueyang has been living very cautiously. He didn't have a significant other, didn't make any friends, and didn't even keep a pet.

Until one day, a homeless person came across his secret, and from then on Ding Xueyang has plunged into an abyss of suffering!

title: The Princess Maid
alt_title: 공주보다 시녀가 천직이었습니다, Gongjuboda Sinyeoga Cheonjigieotseumnida, Being a Maid Is Better Than Being a Princess, It's Better to Be a Maid Than to Be a Princess, 比起公主，侍女才是我的天职, A Maid Was More of a Calling Than a Princess
description:
Siana was a princess of a small kingdom. Until the imperial army attacked…

Just before her neck was about to be cut by the cruel prince, Siana screamed, “Please spare me!”

Towards the prince with blood staining his beautiful face, Siana pleaded with a desperate voice.

“I have many skills learned in the palace. Wouldn’t I be useful as a maid?”

And so, Siana became a probationary maid of the palace. But surprisingly, the job suited her temperament?! When she swept the floors, the corridors became clean, when she kneaded dough, sweet cookies were baked, when she did laundry, the bedding became white and fragrant! She only did her best as a maid, but gradually, the royal family began to warm up to Siana.

“The tea you brewed is always the best.”

“The dress you made? Truly beautiful.”

“I want you to educate the prince.”

But she never thought of capturing this man’s heart…

“I feel the same.”

“…”

“I can’t live without you, Siana,” hearing the tender voice of the prince, Siana tightly closed her eyes.

Look, Your Highness. I just want to live as an ordinary maid!
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Kim Ppopi

title: Koibami Shoujo
alt_title: 恋喰少女, Love-Eating Girl, Las Chicas Devoradoras de Amor
description:
High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women.

Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again.

However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five! A brain-shaking, romantic comedy suspense begins!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Mystery
author: Kawabatao

No matter how many times I'm sold to a recycling shop, meeting new babies brings light into my life.
Now, I wonder what kind of baby I'll meet next?
N-...no matter how I look at him... he's an "adult", right...?

The power of the Vanadis invokes dread and fear from their enemies. description:
She is an illegitimate child of a count and is always careful not to tarnish her family's name. Since childhood, she has a secret that no one knows, and that is everytime she goes to sleep, her soul leaves her body and wanders around ─ she can control and enjoy this ability of hers. One night at the ball, she got involved into an unpleasant situation with the Duke, and as she wanders around that night, she was accidentally sucked into a teddy bear which the Duke owned...

---

title: Kuriko to Biyori
alt_title: くりことびより
description:
Sojiro, employed at a confectionery company, and his wife, Makoto, have joyfully opened their home to a foster child, Kuriko. But there's a catch – Kuriko seems to communicate mostly with a simple "mhm," perhaps due to nerves.

Sojiro, who has vague memories of his own early childhood, struggles to bridge the gap between him and Kuriko. However, Kuriko harbors a deep fascination with Sojiro's special talent – crafting delectable sweets! The art of confectionery becomes the thread that weaves this family closer together.

Join this heartwarming journey of a seemingly disconnected parent and child as they evolve into a bonded "family".
genre: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Yukimoto Shuuji

title: Erio and the Electric Doll
alt_title: エリオと電気人形, Erio and electric doll
description: The story centers around Anjie, an electric doll, and Erio, a human raised by her. In order for Erio to experience the outside world, the two set out on a journey.
genre: Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Shimazaki Mujirushi

title: Super Ninja Dan
alt_title: 風の戦士ダン, Wind Warrior Dan
description: The Kyosha and Jinma clans are ninja organizations living in the modern age. They were called "super ninja," or "super shinobi." However, these two clans have been fighting a fierce battle to exterminate each other. Why? The unique tag team of Tetsu Kariya and Kazuhiko Shimamoto unleash a painful work!
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Police, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Kariya Tetsu

title: He's Not Just a Pretty Face
alt_title: 얼굴밖에 볼 게 없어, Él no es solo una cara bonita
description: Frede, the most handsome bachelor of the empire is marrying Ayla, the only daughter of the powerful duke and a notoriously selfish woman. As much as he is unwilling, Frede is caught off guard when Ayla, who had been swooning over him, offers a deal to end the marriage after one year. Confused with her change in heart and softened attitude, Frede now struggles with a growing urge to stop the fated divorce.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jeongyiha

title: Aisare Tenshi na Classmate ga, Ore ni Dake Itazura ni Hohoemu
alt_title: 愛され天使なクラスメイトが、俺にだけいたずらに微笑む, The Classmate Who Is Adored by Everyone Smiles Teasingly Only at Me
description:
Girls and sweets are full of secrets!? 

Ichise Souma is a high school student who dreams of becoming a pastry chef and devotes himself to making sweets. He meets Satomi Chika, a female classmate, after receiving some sweets. 

Chika is a beautiful girl with a soothing personality, known at school as the “Angel of Peace.” Souma thought she was a good girl who would kindly listen to his worries about making sweets, but... 

"Ichise-san, your embarrassed face is really cute." 

Chika shows an unexpected side of herself only when they are alone, and Souma’s heart is on the verge of exploding! A sweet and stimulating boy-meets-girl story with a mischievous angel connected by sweets begins!
genre: Romance, School Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Takafumi Mizuguchi

title: Kutsu no Muku Mama
alt_title: 靴の向くまま, Good Shoes Take You Good Places., Wherever Your Shoes Take You, Wherever Your Shoes Take You, Good Shoes Take You Good Places.
description: "Good shoes will take you to a good place" - these are the words of Yusai Ayumi, who took over the workshop with her late mother, a shoemaker, in her heart. Yusai's shoes, which she makes while casting a spell for the wearer to go to a good place, gently wrap someone's first step today. A story of a shoemaker who is still inexperienced, but still warm.
genre: Slice of Life
author: Miyabi Akino

title: The Raven's Taming Game
alt_title: 渡鸦的驯服游戏
description: [Younger Top x Older Bottom | Mafia | Power Struggle] Late 19th Century, Paris, France. Vincent, a third-rate painter, accidentally witnesses a crime scene and, in order to survive, is forced to work at a gallery run by Roland, a mafia with ulterior motives. However, the seemingly fragile painter has a hidden identity. As they search for a stolen antique sketch, the situation between the underworld and the law spirals out of control. In the furnace of fame, fortune, and desire, who will ultimately tame whom? Watch as the weak painter turns the tables in Paris's underground world! Cold Younger Mafia x Cunning Older Painter
genre: Official Colored, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Crime, Mafia, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Yuanjiang Madoka

title: Kirawaremono no Akuyaku Reisoku ni Tensei shita no ni, Naze ka Mawari ga Hanatte Oite Kurenai
alt_title: 嫌われ者の悪役令息に転生したのに、なぜか周りが放っておいてくれない, I’ve Been Reborn as a Hated Villain, but for Some Reason People Around Me Won’t Leave Me Alone
description:
A modern Japanese office worker suddenly dies and finds himself reincarnated into a game world... as the ugly, pushover son of a villain, Klaus Muller! 

Realizing that if he plays out the game as it is in the original, he will be condemned and executed by the hero, he begins to take action to avoid the catastrophic ending. Klaus puts in a lot of effort and gains the trust of those around him, including the heroine and his family. In the midst of all this, he unintentionally makes a big impact and attracts attention…!? 

The grand opening of a fantasy about a scumbag’s big comeback!
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: AteRa

title: Love Wins
alt_title: LOVE WINS
description: Da-yeon was excited by the news of legalization of same-sex marriage. I filed a marriage registration with a woman I didn't know because I was drunk....!?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Mogdoli (목도리)

title: Ptolemy's Singularity
alt_title: 天动的特异日, 天動のシンギュラリティ, 천동의 싱귤러리티, Сингулярность Птолемея, 天動的特異日
description: Satoshi Hase, the writer who brought you technology, and worldviews such hIE and advanced artificial intelligence which appeared in BEATLESS, now takes his place as the World Design Editor in a brand new comic. Taking place in the floating city which was established as AHQ, Mega-float. What is the true nature of this "Magic" used in the near future…?
genre: Action, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Sunaaku Gan

title: 4-Thousand Fold Man
alt_title: 4000倍の男, 4000倍的男, Четырёхтысячекратный парень
description:
When you wake up after hitting your head, your sex drive will be multiplied by 4000?!

Seigo Hasegawa, a man who has suddenly acquired a cheat sex drive, and his childhood friend An Yagami, who feels responsible for Seigo and tries to help him (sexually). The battle between Seigo and his sexual desire begins now... (MTL)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Shota
author: Gangi Mari

title: Onban Kikou
alt_title: 音盤紀行, Record Journey, Record Travelog
description: The secret of the record left by my grandfather, the underground record shop dealing with forbidden pop music, and the old jukebox in the diner of the near future. A collection of short stories that traces the memories and feelings contained in the records.
genre: Historical, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery, Music
author: Kezuka Ryouichirou

title: Kantai Collection -KanColle- Shimakaze Tsumujikaze no Shoujo
alt_title: the Girl of the Whirlwind, KanColle Shimakaze, Kantai Collection - Kankore - Shimakaze Whirlwind Girl, 艦隊これくしょん -艦これ- 島風 つむじ風の少女
description:
Part of the [Kantai Collection](https://mangadex.com/?page=search&title=Kantai%20Collection) franchise.  
  
The world is in a state of isolation. The cause is due to mysterious deep sea entities the navy has dubbed the "Deep Sea Fleet" and their taking over the seas isolating all the countries of the world from one another. Refusing to just sit idly by and let the Deep Sea Fleet have its way, all the countries of the world pool their resources to make a new weapon to combat them… a weapon that is comparable in power to that of a battleship… and it's name is: The Fleet Girls. Will this new weapon be enough to combat the Deep Sea Fleet? Will the ensign that was just sent to the naval base where the "Fleet Girls" are kept be able to aid in their struggle… Only time will tell as this war against the Deep Sea Fleet begins to unfold.
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem
author: Yamazaki Kazuma

title: Yoru no Himeboku
alt_title: 夜の姫僕, The Princess Me of the Night
description:
Shoto is a 20-year-old part-time worker struggling with his first love (rejected but still friends) with his high school best friend. Suddenly one day he was unemployed because the restaurant he worked part-time at went bankrupt, and at the same time he discovered there was something floating under his butt. He decided to go to a dermatologist for a check-up when he met Hizuki, a dermatologist - and after an appointment with this doctor, he discovered that the doctor was also in an unrequited love like him.

Both of them had unrequited love so they decided to stay together temporarily to "fill the void in their hearts, bodies and wallets" but gradually they developed feelings again.!?
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Masaki Souko

title: Boushoku no Berserk: Ore Dake Level to Iu Gainen o Toppa Suru
alt_title: Berserk of Gluttony, Boushoku no Berserk: Ore Dake Level to Iu Gainen o Toppa Suru, Ненасытный Берсерк, 暴食のベルセルク～俺だけレベルという概念を突破する～ THE COMIC, 狂怒的暴食 ～僅自己突破了等級這概念～, 狂怒的暴食 ～只有我突破了等级这概念～, 폭식의 버서크, 폭식의 베르세르크 ~나만 레벨이라는 개념을 돌파한다~, Berserk of Gluttony: The One that Exceeds the Concept of Levels
description: In this world, there are two types of people. Those Who have powerful "skills", and those who don't. People born with powerful skills, exterminate monsters to level up and become successful, while people without them, become failures, who are treated harshly by society. Follow the story of Fate, a guy who works as a gatekeeper, and whose only skill is gluttony, a skill that only makes him hungry.
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Isshiki Ichika

title: The Savior's Bucket List
alt_title: 구원자의 버킷리스트, Guwonjaui Beokisliseuteu
description: Yonghak ultimately failed to save the world despite repeated regressions. At the next regression, he decides to quit being a savior. But suddenly, disciples show up, one by one... Will the world be kept safe?! Will the savior be able to fulfill his bucket list of wishes for rest?!
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Cho Meng (초멍)

title: Yome Gaki ssu
alt_title: ヨメガキッす, Bride Brat
description:
Super serious and uptight high school student Koutaro Suzuki and his obnoxious gyaru kouhai Sorako Mozu get along like cats and dogs. She spends her days tormenting him, while he spends his days getting outraged by her. However, the two of them share a secret...that they're living together as fiancés!! Under the condition that Koutaro marry Sorako, who comes from a wealthy real estate family, they've agreed to buy his father's company and save it from going under!!

Having to deal with Sorako, who uses this and that (and you know what) to torment him, can Koutaro make her yield and successfully marry her?!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64744)
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Gyaru
author: Aki Tokage

title: Ao to Midori
alt_title: 青と碧
description:
"For 8 years, I wished for a morning like this."
First place in midterms, winner in the relay. For academic-and-sports genius Ao, this is the first time he's wanted something from the bottom of his heart.
And that was Midori, always second place, who saw himself as his rival.
He can't control his love for him, and when he sees Midori, he's so happy that he can't help but run up to him.
But, afraid to ruin their relationship, he carries the pain and longs for him late at night...
"I want the first thing I see when I wake up to be your eyelashes."
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Roji

title: Majo Taisen - The War of Greedy Witches
alt_title: Война Ведьм, 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う, The War of Greedy Witches
description: Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches.” With the addition of the final witch, Joan of Arc, Walpurgis Night begins: Only one witch can survive, and have her wish granted!
genre: Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Martial Arts, Samurai, Magical Girls, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Kawamoto Homura

title: Ijime 0 no Gakkou
alt_title: イジメ０の学校, School of Bullying 0
description: A high school that has achieved zero bullying thanks to excellent teachers and a perfect monitoring system. Kiyokazu, a first-year student there, meets his former classmate Shijo, who was bullied in middle school. The two gradually connect with each other at this bully-free school. But one day, Kiyokazu finds out that Shijo was being bullied. And she jumps off the roof. A shocking "zero bullying" mystery!!
genre: Crime, Gore, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Mystery
author: Ishikawa Minoru

title: The Warrior Returns
alt_title: 용사가 돌아왔다, Hero Has Returned, The Warrior Is Back, Warrior Returns, Герой вернулся, 勇者が帰ってきた, 毁灭勇士, 勇士歸來, El héroe ha regresado
description:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Superhero, Post-Apocalyptic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Narack (나락)

title: Adashino Kishokan
alt_title: あだしの奇象官
genre: Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Wazawa Kiri

title: Moto Kyuutei Renkinjutsushi no Watashi, Henkyou de Nonbiri Ryouchi Kaitaku Hajimemasu!
alt_title: 宮廷錬金術師の私、辺境でのんびり領地開拓はじめます！, 元宮廷錬金術師の私、辺境でのんびり領地開拓はじめます！　～婚約破棄に追放までセットでしてくれるんですか？～, I'm a Former Court Alchemist, and I'm Going to Start Cultivating My Own Territory in the Middle of Nowhere!
description:
Amelia, who dreamed of becoming an alchemist and worked hard, became the youngest alchemist in history to be appointed court alchemist.
However, she was harassed daily in her work at court.
In addition, her fiancé broke off the engagement and she has been exiled from court.
Amelia, who has lost everything, finds happiness in a new place with her childhood friend Thomas, with whom she has reunited...?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Hinokage Sora

title: Marmalade Boy Little
alt_title: ママレード ボーイ little, ママレード・ボーイ little, 橘子酱男孩LITTLE
description: Set 13 years after the original series, the story focuses on Miki and Yuu's little siblings.
genre: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yoshizumi Wataru

title: Watashi no Tonari no Yandere-kun
alt_title: わたしの隣のヤンデレくん, My Yandere Neighbour
description:
"My kouhai Kishi-kun appears to be my stalker."
Rika, who works at a production company, is troubled by the presence of her kouhai, Kishi, who seems to hold an abnormal adoration for her.
At the office, he's always looking at her from behind, he notices even the smallest changes, and on top of all that he also turns out to live next door?!
He cares so much about Rika that he can't stop acting in mysterious ways that barely cross the line...! Yandere office love!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers
author: Anmitsu

title: Kannagi no Yomeiri
alt_title: 巫の嫁入り, The Marriage of a Miko
description:
Can they become a real couple?

Yoshioki, the eldest son of the village head family, takes Chitose, the descendant of the shrine maiden family, as his wife according to the village customs.
Yoshioki is furious when it is discovered that the bride is actually a "man"
Moreover, Chitose is beautiful, but he
is taciturn and unfriendly.

Their married life, which began as a temporary couple, was full of things that didn't go well, but after a certain incident, he came to know Chitose's true nature!?
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Kawano Akiko

title: Sentai Daishikkaku
alt_title: Go, Go, Loser Ranger!, Боевой отряд «Полный Провал», 戦隊大失格, 戰隊大失格, Ranger Reject, No Longer a Sentai Ranger
description:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Superhero, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Haruba Negi

title: Zeikin de Katta Hon
alt_title: 税金で買った本, Books Bought With Taxes, Books bought with tax, Books Bought with Taxpayer's Money
description: Ishidaira is a delinquent who visited the library for the first time since elementary school. But then, he was pointed out by Hayasemaru and Shirai, who works at the library, that he has not returned a book that he borrowed ten years ago. A manga about how Ishidaira went from trying to borrow a book from a library to working there instead.
genre: Comedy, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Zuino

title: TRUMP
alt_title: Trump
description:
Sophie, a boy with vampire and human blood, is transferred from an orphanage to an institution called Clan. The school houses vampire boys who have reached their Cocoon period, or puberty in human terms. Sophie has a fateful encounter with a boy named Ul while being coldly greeted by the vampires around him. As Ul continues to research the “power of immortality” that vampires once possessed, he learns of the existence of TRUMP, the original vampire that is said to live forever, and begins to crave eternal life.

Eventually, Sophie and Ul become entangled in the deep fate surrounding the legend of immortality...

A manga adaptation of the origin story of playwright Kenichi Suemitsu’s popular series! A Gothic school fantasy that beautifully spins the conflicts of impressionable and sensitive boysー!
genre: Action, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Suemitsu Kenichi

title: The Dragon Tamer (Webtoon)
description: What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: TinaFate1

title: Manager Kim
alt_title: 김부장, Менеджер Ким, Director Kim
description:
"Please don’t touch the guy wearing glasses…"
Department head Kim, who quit his job as a special agent only for his daughter Minji and chose to be normal. Then one day, Minji disappeared silently, and Manager Kim began to find his daughter by turning the country that monitors him into the enemy.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Mafia, Drama, Delinquents, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Park Tae Joon

title: Watari Tori to Katatsumuri
alt_title: Migratory Birds & Snail, 渡り鳥とカタツムリ, 候鳥與蝸牛
description:
Unpei Mochizuki is a second-year employee of a machine parts wholesaler.
One day, he makes a mistake that causes trouble for his clients, and he is troubled by the thought of "going somewhere far away..." where no one knows him.

She is a picture book author with a baby face, glasses, and an unknown age, who travels with her dog in her car.
They spend their days traveling together, and they use the car as their "Sumika" (dwelling place).

They sleep in the car and begin a new form of travel, free from the constraints of time.
After reading this book, you will surely want to try traveling overnight in a car!
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Slice of Life
author: Takatsu Makoto

title: All Hail the Sect Leader
alt_title: The Greatest Sect Leader of All-Time, 万古最强宗
description: All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots, and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Yuewen Manhua (阅文漫画)

title: Black Corporation: Joseon
alt_title: 블랙기업조선
description:
The maniac who was crazy about all kinds of fields such as military and steampunk had been reincarnated. However, his father was King Sejong the Great?
The mania-wise king and his crazy maniac son. Along with the ministers, and countless humans who were getting exploited.
Even today, the night of Joseon was filled with the light of overtime.
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Gukppong

title: Seikatsu Mahoutsukai no Gekokujou
alt_title: 生活魔法使いの下剋上, Rise of the Life Wizard
description:
I’m not “useless”! I’ll prove it by conquering dungeons! Suddenly, magic and dungeons appear in modern Japan, and life has changed completely. I, Midorimu Sakaki, am born with a talent for life magic that cannot be used for exploring dungeons or defeating demons. I was born with a talent for life magic, but while exploring dungeons, I got my hands on a rare item, the “Sage System,” which allows me to create new magic…?

[web novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816452218254294002)  (jp)
genre: Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy
author: Tsukita Gen

title: Sunyu of the Shadowless
alt_title: 대사형 선유, Sonnyu, The Great Master, The Great Master Sunyoo
description: Some children are raised in the hands of Kwak No, After establishing a Disciple-Master relationship, the children dream of their own dreams by practicing martial arts and walking in that path to become masters. In order to make a living, Kwak No always had to leave his seat, and Seon-yu, the eldest of the children, has to take care of the Children, and He’ll be the Great Master.
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy
author: No Kyoungchan (노경찬)

title: The Maxed-Out Player
alt_title: 만렙 플레이어, Max Talent Player, Jugador de nivel máximo, Max Level Player
description:
After 20 grueling years of hellish training, Juhyuk's stats are maxed-out, and he is ready to venture out into Olympus, a virtual reality game. 

His master's last dying wish is for Juhyuk to be the Ultimate Evil, the most powerful in Olympus. But when he steps out of the tutorial area, every player tries to kill him, and the game forces him to start over from Level 1! 

With these setbacks, Juhyuk will need all the help he can get to complete his SSS-rank quest and become the next Ultimate Evil.
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Nelpi

title: The World's Fastest Level Up!
alt_title: 世界最速のレベルアップ, 세계에서 가장 빠른 레벨 업
description:
It’s been 20 years since dungeons suddenly appeared in the world. Humanity got supernatural powers like Level, Status, and Skill.

Dreaming of becoming rich quickly, Amane Rin, an adventurer challenged to capture dungeons. Even though he possessed a skill unique to even adventurers, Transfer within dungeon, he was deemed as incompetent because of the poor usability of the skill. However, the turning point for him came.

After a year since he started capturing dungeons, Transfer within dungeon evolved with a level up. As a result, Rin became an existence unrestricted by the rules of the dungeon. Rin, who became the only singularity, continued to level up with overwhelming speed and climbed to the strongest position in the world in the blink of an eye.

This is the story of a boy who was looked down upon because of his incompetence but eventually became the strongest in the world.
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yamata Nagato

title: The Worst Villainess
alt_title: 막장 악녀, I Became the Villainess of a Third-Rate Drama, The Worst Villain
description: Possessing a character in a fictional story is one thing, but possessing a character in your own story is another… especially when you’ve become a dramatic villainess in a typical K-drama series. The only way Miso can escape from this world is to live through all of the episodes, but she has to deal with cliché tropes such as an arranged marriage with the male lead and an unnecessary rivalry with the female lead. Will Miso be able to break away from this predetermined destiny and find another happy ending for all of her characters?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color
author: LICO

alt_title: 女神のカフェテラス, Терраса-кафе богинь, Megami no Kafeterasu, Goddess Café Terrace
description:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!  
  
In this handsome harem under one roof by Koji Seo of *Suzuka*, *Kimi no Iru Machi*, and *Fuuka*, which girl will you fall in love with? A seaside love comedy with too many heroines!

Will our man thirsty heroine with aspiration to be the most popular slut ( her own words, not mine) break the village’s gay love curse and find true love? Read to find out.

title: Reincarnation of the Veteran Soldier
alt_title: 말년용사
description: Army veteran's last go at the obstacle course turns lethal after a simple fall. A goddess presents an opportunity at new life as a hero! The protagonist ain't having any of it, he was supposed to retire and become a civilian. The arrogant Goddess drops him down to survive while having her own evil schemes. How will his new life progress after encountering another Goddess, a spy and his past life's junior?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hooding

title: Regenerate Top Players
alt_title: 重燃吧，T0级玩家！, Apex Gamer Returns
description: "Bai Qi", an unknown game anchor, is about to reach the pinnacle of his life when he accidentally dies while streaming a game called "Soul Throne". Unexpectedly, he is reborn into the world of this high-difficulty action game. With his "T0-Level" game skills from his previous life and the blessing of the system's "100 Full-Achieved Max-Level Accounts", can Bai Qi ascend to the throne once again and become the one and only king of that world?
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Mystery, Full Color
author: Renshan Animation

title: Oshi no Shuuchakushin wo Namete Ita
alt_title: 推しの執着心を舐めていた, I Underestimated My Oshi's Attachment
description:
Estefania worked herself to the bone for her family’s sake, while they took her for granted. One day, Estefania realized that, reincarnated in the world of her favorite novel, she was a supporting character who didn’t have much time left to live. She closed the book on her days of living in her family’s shadow, and set out to meet her oshi, the Grand Mage Synil Crown. However, as Synil is cold-hearted and ruthless, she had thought to be satisfied with just seeing him once, but before she knew it, she became the target of his attachment―!?
“S- Synil-sama, isn’t this a bit too close…?”
“In what way?”

Note: An “oshi” is a favorite member in an idol group or a favorite character from a story, movie, game, etc.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hirano Ao

title: Kokou no Hito
alt_title: 孤高の人, The Climber
description: On his first day of transferring to a new high school, a loner named Mori Buntarou, is cajoled by a classmate into climbing the school building. Despite knowing that one misstep could send him spiraling to his death, he moves forward, and upon finally reaching the top, Mori experiences a sense of fulfillment. That feeling, which seems to be telling him, "You're alive!" gives birth to an adrenaline for rock-climbing.
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Sports, Philosophical, Drama, Tragedy
author: Sakamoto Shinichi

title: Exorcist no Kiyoshi-kun
alt_title: 悪祓士のキヨシ君, エクソシストのキヨシ君, Ultimate Exorcist Kiyoshi
description: The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak! It all comes together in this new dramatic exorcist battle comedy series!
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, Supernatural
author: Shouichi Usui

title: Bitten by the Dog I Abandoned
alt_title: 내가 버린 개에게 물렸을 때
description:
Evelyn Winter is the daughter of the House of Winter. She cruelly chases away the dog that only followed her, Gillas Black.

“Didn’t you say you loved me?”
"Love? Did you believe that word? You don’t know your place, you idiot.”
“You will regret this moment.”

Evelyn has no regrets, she marries Rowen, Delilah's heir and has a daughter, Sherry. But their happiness is short-lived when Rowen dies in a train accident and she is left a widow. To make matters worse, his family's financial situation deteriorates. And the boy I used to pet is missing. The dog I abandoned came back as a war hero.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Gimda

title: Reborn Ranker – Gravity User
alt_title: Adventurers aim for the strongest in hidden classes, 冒険者は隠しクラス〈重力使い〉で最強を目指す
description:
A few years back, monsters from different dimensions came to our world, and humans having abilities such as level and skills to fight them emerged. Ikoma, who had acquired the class of “thief” without knowing that he would reach his limits early on, rose to the rank of S-class adventurer. Still, his abilities failed him, and he lost his hope. On the fated day, the city of Ikoma was attacked by a vicious dragon. Ikoma boldly tried to stand up to the dragon, but he was no match for it and was mortally wounded. However, he Miraculously succeeds in stealing a rare item from the dragon that allows him to rewind time using his “thief” skill. Ikoma returns to ten years in the past and uses the knowledge he gained in the first life to acquire the hidden class of “gravity user.

This time I will become… the greatest adventurer!
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Nekoko.

title: Ore Dake 2-Shuume Gachizei - Tsuyo Sugite Game Balance wo Hakai Shita
alt_title: 俺だけ2周目ガチ勢～強すぎてゲームバランスを破壊した～, The Only New Game+ Hardcore Gamer ~I'm So Overpowered, I Shattered the Game's Balance~
description:
Rise to the top with knowledge and skills in your second life!

Former pro gamer Itsuki, who concealed his controversial past and worked as a VTuber, is attacked by problematic fans after getting doxxed, resulting in an accident that makes him lose consciousness. He wakes up only to find himself 10 years in the past, right after the launch of the hugely popular VRMMO Metasense!

There’s no need to hide his past in this world. Equipped with knowledge and skills from his first playthrough, becoming a top gamer and streamer is effortless!

I… will stand at the pinnacle of Metasense!
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Virtual Reality, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Roribasu

title: Nadai Tsuji Soba Isekaiten
alt_title: 名代辻そば異世界店
description:
A heartwarming dish even in a different world!
The skill that the reincarnated Yukito obtained was the skill to summon a chain soba shop!
A gourmet fantasy spun by standing buckwheat noodles is about to begin!
genre: Reincarnation, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Nishimura Sei

title: Oretama
alt_title: My Balls, Ore Tama, Oretama - Ore ga chikyū o sukūtte!?, オレたま, オレたま 〜オレが地球を救うって!?〜, 我与恶魔的H生活, Ore Tama ~I'll Save the Earth!?~
description:
After a night of drunken revelry, 19-year-old Kouta Satou decides to relieve himself near a seemingly secluded temple. Meanwhile, an angel is attempting to seal the queen of the underworld into a holy ball with his bow. Unfortunately, he misfires, trapping her instead inside of Kouta's unwitting balls. The angel departs, leaving Kouta a dire warning: if he fails to resist ejaculating before the end of the month, the queen will be released and mark the end of the world.  
  
For the lustful Kouta, such a commitment is easier said than done; on top of using any means necessary to resist temptation, he must also guard himself from advances made by Elyse, a lesser devil who would resort to drastic measures to free her queen. In Oretama, the fate of the entire world rests upon the improbability of one man's chastity.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Harada Shigemitsu

title: The Life of a Returning Officer
alt_title: 회귀 경찰의 리셋 라이프, Hoigui Gyeongchalui Riset Laipeu, Police Returner's Reset Life
description:
Choi Jong-hyuk, captain of the intellectual crime unit, loses his mother and his own life to a mysterious mastermind for digging too deeply into a case. In his last moments, Jong-hyuk catches a glimpse of the man who kills him before waking up as his 17-year-old self.

 To prevent his mother's death, Jong-hyuk swears to hunt down the one responsible. Luckily, he has knowledge about the future and his experience as an officer.

Will these tools be enough to catch the criminal that eluded him once?
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Police, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hangil

title: Damn Demonic Swords
alt_title: 빌어먹을 마검들, Damned Cursed Swords, Bileomeokeul Mageomdeul
description:
Zegar is a hero who avoids problems at all costs. The only thing he fears are demonic swords, evil weapons that try to possess their wielders. But for some reason, they don't stop chasing him and sticking to him.

Zegar just wanted to live a quiet life, doing small missions and staying out of trouble. But, unintentionally, he becomes the center of several events that shake the fantastic continent.

“Ah… Damn.”

He regrets it, but it's too late. If he can't run away, he only has one option: cut his enemies with demonic swords!
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: G.CafeGun

title: Jinruishoku
alt_title: 人類蝕, Jinrui-Shoku: Blight of Man, The Devouring Eclipse Of Man
description: “You just die one day and turn into a mummy!” Mysterious mummified corpses that people have nicknamed “Mummily-sans” keep being found one after another, causing a lot of fuss. One day, a boy named Seita notices that his friend is acting strangely…?! Don’t miss this thrilling suspense story about an invasion by the unknown!
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Ghosts, Zombies, Web Comic, Aliens, Mystery

alt_title: Рон Камонохаши: Невменяемый детектив, 鴨乃橋ロンの禁断推理
description: This unusual duo brings the hidden truth into the light! Ron Kamonohashi, a private investigator with serious issues, and Totomaru Ishiki, a pure-hearted but dim police detective, team up to solve the most baffling mysteries! A thrilling detective story for a new generation from Akira Amano, creator of "Reborn!" and "Ēldlive"!
genre: Comedy, Crime, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

title: The Demon King Dad and His Hero Daughter
alt_title: The Devil's Father's Brave Daughter, Demon Daddy Warrior Daughter, 마왕 아빠 용사 딸
description:
Selene, the daughter who dreams of becoming a hero, and Shion, the demon king who adopted her. Shion has to conceal his true identity at all costs, unable to cheer on his daughter’s dreams or attempt to stop her.
This is the story of Selene’s journey to becoming a true hero amidst this dilemma… Or is it the parenting story of the demon king?!
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Ppangbagsa

title: Tougen Anki
alt_title: 桃源暗鬼, Tougen Anki: Legend of the Cursed Blood
description: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!
genre: Action, Demons, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: Urushibara Yura

title: The Vampire
description:
I am a hungry Vampire. I longed to suck the blood of my destined one, which is said to be the finest, but somehow I satisfied my hunger on social media as an internet influencer. But one day, I got a hateful comment--.

Based on the song Vampire by DECO*27
genre: Romance, School Life, Vampires, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music, Gyaru
author: Yamori Shiki.

title: Childcare Diary With the Villain
alt_title: Childcare Diaries, 흑막과의 육아일기, El diario de crianza con el Villano
description: Mary didn’t know what to expect of the afterlife, but it certainly wasn’t becoming the evil, murderous nanny of the novel she was reading. Her circumstances become secondary concerns when she realizes that no matter what, Briel must remain safe. It’s the only way to keep his uncle, Count Kentryle Chalant, from the path of revenge. Can she keep her new charge safe and change the entire plot, or will the true villain get the best of them all? And is she going to find love on the way?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Bompyote Giok

title: The Guide's Fatal Failure
alt_title: 제가 죽었다고 각성하시다니요, I Woke Up To Find Myself Dead, 我的结局应该是死亡, You Awakened while I Was Dead
description:
I possessed an extra who died as soon as the original work started.
I was the hero’s incompetent guide.
Only until I die, will the hero meet his new guide, the heroine.

To safely stray from the original work,
I pretended to be dead after consuming a toxic flower that throws you into a coma, but-

“My guide isn’t breathing anymore.”
……?
“Who the hell can stop me?”
The hero awakened and went berserk?

You awakened after thinking I died?
You can’t possibly awaken like this….!

***

“You’re leaving me?”

Bliss scoffed at Shana’s resignation letter.

“Is this a new joke?”

“No. You don’t need a guide anymore so I…….”

“Shana.”

Bliss called her in a soft but determined voice.

“You can make fun of me, you can deceive me like a fool, or you can play with me as much as you want.
So don’t even joke about trying to leave me.”
Bliss whispered to Shana with a beautiful smile that looked like a painting.

“I just can’t let that slide.”
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jayo

title: Black Madougushi Guild wo Tsuihousareta Watashi, Oukyuu Majutsushi to shite Hirowareru ~White na Kyuutei de, Shiawase na Shin Seikatsu wo Hajimemasu!~
alt_title: ブラック魔道具師ギルドを追放された私、王宮魔術師として拾われる ～ホワイトな宮廷で、幸せな新生活を始めます!～, My Magical Career at Court: Living the Dream After My Nightmare Boss Fired Me from the Mages' Guild!, I Was Expelled From a Black Magicians' Guild and Picked up as a Royal Court Magician
description:
Noel, a girl who was suddenly fired from the magic tool guild, wallowing in her sadness she meets Luke, a wizard who was a rival at her academy, inviting her to become a Royal Palace Magician. She was assigned to Luke, who named Noel as his sidekick. While there are many people in the royal palace who do not believe in her power, Noel overcomes everything with her talent and efforts, the bond with her friends, and the feeling of "I love magic!"

Noel, a commoner who loves magic, and Luke, the next head of a large noble family.
Two young geniuses create a whirlwind in the kingdom!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Office Workers, Magic, Military, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hazuki Shusui

title: Tetsuya - The Man Called Mahjong Master
alt_title: 哲也～雀聖と呼ばれた男～
description:
Based on the life of a famous Mahjong Novelist, Asada Tetsuya, this manga chronicles the history of the man who is now known as the "Mahjong Saint" in his journey through the world of Mahjong and gambling in general.  
  
In the year 1947, the people of Shinjuku are down on their luck. With little money to buy food or necessities, some resort to gambling in order to survive. Traveling Tetsuya chooses to spend his time at Mahjong parlors where he is wiping the floor clean with his adversaries. However, Tetsuya meets the intensely-skilled Boushu-san, this is when he realizes that his skills are still lacking.  

---  
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2000**
genre: Award Winning, Traditional Games, Psychological, Drama
author: Sai Fuumei

title: My Dear Aster
alt_title: 마이 디어 아스터
description:
A few years ago, Lihen’s daughter said.

“If mother ever lives again, don’t give birth to me.”

“What are you talking about all of a sudden?”

“You don’t have to give birth to me. Meet someone better than Dad. You said you had a first love. If you live again, confess. Who knows? Maybe it will work out?”

The mother and daughter giggled together.

Then Lihen Copland woke up. As a nineteen-year-old.

Living again didn’t change her life much. But maybe she could make her daughter a little happier. To do so, she would have to marry her husband again.
But that resolve soon began to waver.

After meeting her first love, Sir Schudermel Laft.

---

description: Lin Tian, a genius game designer, was ordered to be executed because he knew too much of the company secrets. At a critical moment, he was betrayed by his lover Luo Yue and was killed in the jungle. When he woke up, he found he became a low-level monster in the jungle. In order to avenge the past, the male protagonist started on his path as a Monster in The Jungle.

author: 绘境社

title: Level 596 no Tanya Minarai
alt_title: レベル596の鍛冶見習い, Apprentice Blacksmith of Level 596, The Level 596 Apprentice Blacksmith
description:
The beasthuman Noa has a dream of becoming a blacksmith, as Noa's father, Nomad, used to be the acclaimed Divine Blacksmith.

Since Noa's mother died, Nomad has drowned his days in liquor and grief, so Noa ventures to dangerous places to get Nomad's smithing materials. This leads to Noa's life being in continual risk.

Noa is now 14 and doing normal work as a smithy to support Nomad, when Nomad makes an unreal discovery about his child! All of the materials Noa's collected are unbelievably rare! Nomad calls his familiar adventurer to check Noa's level...and it's at an amazingly high 596!

What's the secret to this super-high level, higher than even the kingdom's hero?! Check out this adventuring fantasy that unfolds around a puppy-human apprentice that's out of this world!
genre: Action, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Terao Yuuki

title: Corpse Knight Gunther
alt_title: 시체기사 군터, Cadaver Gunther, Dead Knight Gunther, Рыцарь труп Гюнтер, Мёртвый рыцарь Гюнтер
description: The war between humans and vampires will come to an end with the victory of the vampires, as expected by all. In the yet-to-be-invaded Holy Land of Bahal, after a concerted effort to counterattack mankind, he succeeds in creating a "corpse knight" who never dies and a "power source" that can move him, thus reviving the gladiatorial "Gunther" as a "corpse knight."
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Zombies, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy

title: Flaming Ball Girl Dodge Danko
alt_title: 炎の闘球女 ドッジ弾子, Flaming Fightball Girl Dodge Danko
description: A modern version of the legendary manga "Flaming Ball boy Dodge Danpei" a hot blooded dodgeball manga! Danko, who inherited Danpei's soul struggles to create the strongest super dodgeball team in the Reiwa era! Will Danko be able to overcome the common sense of the modern world!? Look forward to all the beautiful girls passionately drawn by Koshita Tatsuhiro.
genre: Comedy, Sports, School Life, Web Comic
author: Koshita Tetsuhiro

title: Infinite Dendrogram
alt_title: Инфинитто Дэндорогураму, インフィニット・デンドログラム, 无限树图, Бесконечный Дендрограм, 無限樹圖, ＜Infinite Dendrogram＞-インフィニット・デンドログラム-, 〈Infinite Dendrogram〉-無盡連鎖-, 〈Infinite Dendrogram〉-無盡連鎖-, 인피니트 덴드로그램
description:
July 15, 2043.  
  
On that day, a Full-Dive VRMMO was released, with its unique system called "Embryo" allowing each player to follow an extremely varied—or rather, an "infinitely" varied pattern of evolution. That game's name?  
  
"<Infinite Dendrogram>"  
  
Possessing an element that, until now, had never been achieved by VRMMOs and was considered a technical impossibility, "<Infinite Dendrogram>" took over the entire world, becoming a major hit in the blink of an eye.  
  
One and a half year had passed since the launch of "<Infinite Dendrogram>." A young man named Mukudori Reiji had finished his university entrance exams and began living alone in Tokyo. In order to celebrate the end of that lengthy studying period, after being invited by his older brother long ago, he finally started playing the game.  
  
This is a story where the line between game and reality is blurred.  
  
And also, a tale of reminiscences.
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kaidou Sakon

title: My Messy Marriage
alt_title: 내겐 너무 소란한 결혼, Marriage Is Too Noisy for Me, My noisy marriage, My Far Too Tumultuous Marriage, El matrimonio es algo problemático para mi
description: "I'll do this marriage." Woo So-ran, a dedicated lawyer, is the only person who's aware of Baek Kang-ho's contract. She agreed to marry him instead of his runaway bride. “You'll regret it.” Well, I don't make decisions which I’ll regret in the first place. She entered the tiger's den with confidence. Even though her life has been quiet and boring so far, a messy and secret romance begins. Will I regret this marriage?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Full Color
author: 이지이 / l-포스 / 노승아

title: Uzaki-chan wa Asobitai!
alt_title: Узаки хочет тусоваться!, 宇崎ちゃんは遊びたい!, 宇崎酱想要玩耍!, 우자키 양은 놀고 싶어!, Uzaki-chan Wants to Hang Out!
description: Annoying! Cute! But Annoying!  Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone,  but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, whom he has known since high school.     Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge."
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Take

title: Hikyouiku kara Nigetai Watashi
alt_title: I Want to Escape from Princess Lessons, 妃教育から逃げたい私
description:
The Prince, my fiancé, was flirting with a lady who was not me. Does that mean he's breaking it off?! "Finally!"   
  
I can finally escape from the strict princess training. As I head back to the countryside the prince chases after me?! He won't break off the engagement?! Why?!  
  
A highly exciting romantic comedy of a prince who chases after his fiancée who has run away.
genre: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Adaptation
author: Sawano Izumi

title: Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusenmochi Datta node, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei toshite Jiyuu ni Ikitai
alt_title: Reborn as a Space Mercenary: I Woke Up Piloting the Strongest Starship!, 目覚めたら最強装備と宇宙船持ちだったので、一戸建て目指して傭兵として自由に生きたい, 一觉醒来坐拥神装和飞船，我决定以买一套独门独户的房子为目标作为佣兵自由地活下去, 覺醒起來就持有最強裝備和宇宙飛船，所以我決定以買一個私人住宅為目標作為傭兵自由地活下去, Я очнулся, будучи пилотом сильнейшего космического корабля, а потому решил стать межгалактическим наёмником, When I Woke Up, I Got the Strongest Equipment and a Starship, so I Went and Became a Mercenary in Order to Live as I Please while Aiming for a Detached House
description:
Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceship–one that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, he’s going to make the most of his good luck and create the life he’s always dreamed of!


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/reborn-as-a-space-mercenary-i-woke-up-piloting-the-strongest-starship-light-novel/)
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Harem, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Aliens, Adaptation
author: Ryuto

title: Together With the Gods of Music
alt_title: 음악의 신들과 함께한다, Eum-ag-ui sindeulgwa hamkkehanda
description:
A producer who had no talent but wanted to make it as a singer.
Death came on what he thought was his last chance, but the music gods didn't turn their backs on him.

-If the music gods don't abandon you, can you really do it?

With the gods of music, change began.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music, Full Color
author: Jeff(WHYNOTME)

title: I'm the Emperor's Lost Daughter
alt_title: 나는 황제의 잃어버린 딸, Ella Es La Hija Perdida Del Emperador
description:
Embodying the culture that I experienced in my previous life,
A ‘reincarnator’ with the ability to make the empire flourish.
Rossite is able to use her unique ability, the power of implementation.
Being bullied by the reincarnator Karina she was even accused of attempting to murder the Duke of Identino, which lead to her execution.
At that moment, I recalled the memories of my past life as a paramedic,
Rossite realizes that she is the real reincarnator and regresses in the brink of death.
The first thing Rossite saw after her regression was Duke Identino, saying he has come to find the ‘Emperor’s lost daughter.’
Rossite goes to the imperial capital with him, but even there, Karina slanders Rossite by spreading rumors that she is a fake
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Full Color
author: Honeyshoe

title: Top Tier Providence
alt_title: 顶级气运，悄悄修炼千年, Top Tier Providence- Secretly Cultivate for a Thousand Years, Top Tier Providence: Secretly Cultivate for a Thousand Years
description:
Being reincarnated in a cultivation world, Han Jue realizes that he can live his life like a video game. He can reroll his cultivation potential and connate providence.

So, he spends 11 years rerolling for a good one…

[Unparalleled: Immortal beauty, top-notch charm]

[Destined Sword fanatic: Top-notch Sword Dao aptitude, top-notch Sword Dao comprehension]

[Unparalleled Movement Technique: Top-notch movement technique aptitude]

[Descendant of the Immortal Emperor: You will receive an unparalleled cultivation technique and 1,000 superior-grade spirit stones]

In pursuit of longevity, Han Jue decides to cultivate in a low-profile manner.
A thousand years later, generations of cultivators have become history.

That is when beings of the fairyland start cleansing the mortal world. Han Jue can no longer hide and has no choice but to take action.

Then he realizes, that deities and gods aren’t that powerful after all!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Xing Kong (星空社)

title: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be A Chef
alt_title: 요리사가 되고 싶은 천마님
description:
Due to a gate-related accident, Woojin regains the memories of his past life... a life as the Heavenly Demon, ruler of China! 

However, as the Heavenly Demon, there was a dream he never managed to achieve. Now, in this life, he'll do whatever it costs to fulfill his lifelong dream of becoming a chef! 

This is the legendary(?) story of Cheon Woojin, the former Heavenly Demon, chasing his dreams!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Cooking, Full Color
author: Jeomdori

title: Class Saiyasune de Urareta Ore wa, Jitsu wa Saikyou Parameter
alt_title: I Was Sold at the Lowest Price in My Class, However, My Personal Parameter Is the Most Powerful, クラス最安値で売られた俺は、実は最強パラメーター, 以全班最低價格賣出的我，實際上是最強
description:
Yuta, a boy who was sent to another world with his classmates. A world that has been summoning earthlings, who tend to have high inherent power, to operate humanoid machines called "magic-machines" using the special power "Ludia" contained within humans.

However, Yuta’s Ludia value has an abysmally low reading of "2". Although his peers are auctioned off at a high price, Yuta is sold at the "lowest price" and turned into a slave.  However, will an encounter with the white, magic-machine, Arleo, change his fate?

A journey from being an unwanted slave to becoming the strongest hero who shakes the world! The new world Mecha Battle Entertainment has begun
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Adventure, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: RYOMA

title: The Grand Duke Is Mine
alt_title: El Gran Duque es Mío, 정략결혼 대공님은 제가 갖겠습니다
description:
If you got a second chance at life, what would you do differently?

If Ignette's life was a Shakespearean story, the genre would be a tragedy. But when her death triggers a do-over for some of her life's most significant events, she is determined to approach each choice carefully, and with the most informed intentions.

But with so many obstacles in the way, will she succeed in creating a different life than her last? Her pursuit of happily-ever-after with the Grand Duke is only about to begin.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Modoljjona

title: Kaji Ryuusuke's Agenda
alt_title: 加治隆介の議
description:
Kaji Ryusuke is a second son of a great politician. However, his father and brother both pass away from a car accident. Now, those who supported Ryusuke's father want Ryusuke to carry on the family business as a politician. At first, Ryusuke tries to get out of the responsibility, but he eventually enters an election to become a politician.  
The manga chronicles Ryusuke's rise in the world of Japanese politics.
genre: Drama, Slice of Life
author: Hirokane Kenshi

title: Saiaku no Avalon
alt_title: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer, 災悪のアヴァロン, 災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～
description:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dan-Ex. During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server.
Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Akito Narusawa

title: My Husband's Scandal
alt_title: El escándalo de mi marido, 내 남편의 스캔들
description: Jung Seohyun has just about had it with married life. She wants nothing more than to divorce her cheating husband, Ma Kijin, and move on from their loveless marriage. All she needs is his signature on the divorce papers, but… next thing she knows, Kijin has gotten into a major car accident. And to top it all off, it seems he's forgotten everything about her! Could this be Seohyun's opportunity to fix things between them? Or will the shards of their broken marriage just end up hurting them both?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Tae So Young

title: Konaide Kounotori
alt_title: こないでコウノトリ, I Don't Want a Visit From a Stork
description:
A childless couple in their 30s. One day the husband asks if his wife doesn't want to have a baby. Unable to reply on the spot, she notices divorce papers in his bag.
How much is a woman worth who doesn't want to have kids?
genre: Romance, Drama
author: Takase Umi

title: Musician Genius Who Lives Twice
alt_title: 두 번 사는 음악천재
description: Even if a musician dies, he never dies. It's just covered. Singer-songwriter Kim Han-seok, who became a legend in Korea with just a guitar... Waking up as a college student in the streaming era 30 years after his death!
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Music, Full Color
author: Lee Han-i

title: The Villainess Just Wants To Live In Peace!
alt_title: 악녀는 조용히 살고 싶을 뿐인데!
description:
I transmigrated as the villainess of a novel.

I wanted to get rid of my death flag and live in peace, but apparently I’ve already been whipping and tormenting the final villain. I wasn't the one who did it, but since I still felt responsible for it, I’ve been taking care of him, and the villain's loyalty towards me keeps increasing.

I just want to enjoy my wealth and honor in peace.
I don't know why the story keeps going astray!
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Lee Halin

title: I Became a Terminally-Ill Knight
alt_title: 시한부 기사가 되었다, A Knight With a Time Limit, I Have Become A Time Limited Knight
description:
Levis Cloyd, a man who transmigrated from Earth to another world, is bound to live a time-limited life. To survive, he must kill living beings.

Living with the motto of "if you are going through hell, keep going, " he meets another opportunity.
- - -
Minhyuk, a bedridden man in Korea, meticulously counts his waning days when suddenly, he's transmigrated to another world where he gains the new identity of Levis, the Soul Harvester. 

In this world, Levis must claim lives to extend his own, a haunting paradox that he must come to terms with.

Forced to grapple with a life tethered to a merciless ticking clock, Levis becomes a harbinger of fate, tasked with the daunting responsibility of ending the lives of others in order to preserve his own.

How far does the will to survive stretch? Is one life's preservation worth another's demise?
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Kim Durumi (김두루미)

title: The Emperor, A Thousand Years Younger Than Me, Is Obsessed
alt_title: 천 살 연하 황제가 집착한다, An Emperor 1000 Years Younger Than Me is Obsessed, El Emperador Más Joven Qué Yo Terminó Obsesionado Conmigo
description: A thousand-year plan was ruined by a beautiful boy raised in the forest. In the end, Ariel abandoned the boy. 10 years later. That same boy, Cedric, who harbored a grudge for being abandoned, invades the forest. And Cedric, in the midst of the blazing fire that burns the forest, "Let's get married, Ariel." He proposed. Ariel, age-1000+ , occupation-great wizard. I guess... I need to rewrite my life plan?!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yunhoo Lee (이윤후)

title: Ittsumo Shiotaiou na Osananajimi dakedo, Ore ni Kataomoi shite iru no ga Barebare de Kawaii.
alt_title: いっつも塩対応な幼なじみだけど、俺に片想いしているのがバレバレでかわいい。, 外冷內熱的青梅對我的暗戀暴露無遺, My Tsundere Childhood Friend Is Very Cute, She's My Childhood Friend Who Is Always Acting Coldly Towards Me but Clearly She Has a Crush on Me and That Makes It Cute
description: 《 Today, I’ll confess to Ko-chan! 》 A voice suddenly heard by Kota Nitake, a high school boy who is not particularly popular. It was the voice of Ayano Yumemigasaki, a childhood friend who always has an attitude that doesn’t look like him! Kota didn’t know that Ayano fell in love with him.《 I really wanted Ko-chan to talk to me … 》 Kota begins to be aware of Ayano’s unrequited love. However, an unexpected side effect of “voice of the heart” ……! ??
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Rokumasu Rokurouta

title: Divorce Is a Condition
alt_title: El divorcio es una condición, 이혼이 조건입니다
description:
“Choose. Will you leave this place alone, leaving the child behind… Or will you marry me and stay with the child?”

After a fiery night spent with a man who happened to save her life, a night that seemed abnormally intense. A single day’s mistake comes back with a tremendous price.

“I’m pregnant.”

Rosena, who had been hiding and raising her child, abandoned everything.

After 7 years, the empire she returned to had changed in many ways. But wait, my child’s father is the mad third prince?
genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy
author: Jinwon

title: Killing Killer
alt_title: 킬링킬러
description:
The main character, Siwoo Lee, lost his parents to a murderer ten years ago. Finally, he meets Jack, the killer who killed his parents, and beheads him. “It wasn’t me who killed your parents.”
After learning that the real culprit is a "contractor" belonging to a group of killers using superpowers, Si-woo Lee decides to hunt down the registrants with Jack’s help.
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
author: A_backk

title: A Boyish Girlfriend in High Humidity
alt_title: 湿度高めのボーイッシュ彼女
description:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/115806876)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Ouchi Kaeru (御家かえる)

title: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Dreaming Girl
alt_title: 青春ブタ野郎はゆめみる少女の夢を見ない, Этот глупый свин не понимает мечту девочки-мечтательницы
description:
The Shouko arc of "Rascal" series, Dengeki Bunko's popular works, serialized as manga!

Just before summer vacation starts, Makinohara Shouko, a middle school second year student, met a high school student named Azusagawa Sakuta. Sakuta gave Shouko a desire to live, then...
Experience the love story, with Shouko as the main character, in a way only possible through manga.

*From ComicWalker, translated*
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: errant

title: Falling For Danger
description:
I could kill you if I wanted.
Hale Windsor was a renowned hitman until he is betrayed and loses the love of his life. With nothing left to live for, he begins a war of revenge on the very organization he used to work for. That is, until he meets Marine, a girl who brings color back into his black and white existence.
genre: Thriller, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Crime, Gore, Drama, Full Color
author: Dolce soup

title: Guardian Tales - Kanterbury Days!
alt_title: かんたべりーでいず！
description: An official slice of life themed 4 panel webmanga of the Guardian Tales series.
genre: Comedy, Adventure, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Junsui na Fujunbutsu

title: Onee Chan wa Koi Youkai
alt_title: My Big Sister Is A Love Youkai, お姉ちゃんは恋妖怪, 我的姐姐是恋妖怪
description:
♪A little ecchi Love-Comedy Between Apparition Onee-san and Human Shota-ish.  
  
Yuuki Kuwahara, a boy who decided to live alone at his father 's parents house when he entered high school.  
He used to plays alone at his grandparents house … with a pleasant expectation that he may meet again with a longing person He met when He was a child!  
However, in that house where nobody was supposed to be live in. But, the unexpected welcome waited for Yuuki …!  
  
Boy and Youkai Girls will living under the "one roof"! Heartwarming oneshota love comedy started!♪
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Monster Girls, Shota, Supernatural
author: Aoshima Kanae

title: The Villainess Wants to Go Home
alt_title: 악녀는 집으로 돌아가고 싶습니다, El demonio quiere volver a casa
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: VrK

title: Fairy Tail Blue Mistral
alt_title: FAIRY TAIL ブルー・ミストラル
description:
*Fairy Tail Blue Mistral* depicts Wendy and Charles's adventures soon after joining Fairy Tail. Wendy faces the ghost of a dragon, a cursed mansion, and other tough challenges, desperate to prove herself as a Fairy Tail member.
________
[Alt Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/fairy-tail-blue-mistral)
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Watanabe Rui

title: Kanan-sama wa Akumade Choroi
alt_title: カナン様はあくまでチョロい, Kanan-sama Is Easy as Hell!, Канан-сама до чертиков проста
description:
Kanan is a demon hiding in a high school in the human world to feed on the souls of humans. She sets her sights on a single high school boy, but somehow ends up in a lovers contract with him!? Kanan, who has never been in love, is now filled with new feelings!

The romantic comedy of a pure-hearted demon's first love, begins!

(Source: Shounen Magazine, translated)
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: nonco

title: Contract Grand Duchess
alt_title: 계약직 대공비, Gyeyagjig Daegongbi, Contract Grand Duchess, The Contractual Grand Duchess, 契約職大公妃, El contrato con el Gran Duque
description:
The sixth marriage of Princess Lien, whose husband died every first night. This time, I expected a happy married life, but what I came to know was my husband's lover, his illegitimate child, and a cup of poison.

---
Princess Rien Digrit, plagued by a curse where her husbands die on their wedding night, faces betrayal in her sixth marriage. After being murdered, she reawakens on the day of her fifth husband's funeral. Now solely driven by revenge, Rien seeks the ruthless Grand Duke Clocean Ellagadar and agrees to enter a marriage pact with him. But as Clocean erases and alters their contract's terms, insisting she forget its existence, Rien questions his understanding of their arrangement. Is this truly just a contract marriage, or is something deeper unfolding?
genre: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: MON Swel (MON쉘)

title: Foul's Start
alt_title: 파울즈 스타트
description:
Growing up, Eun Hae-il is unable to forget the boy he had his very first crush on.
This year, he gets accepted into his dream college after retaking the entry test 4 times.
However, one day he saves a child from drowning in the ocean but, attempting to save him, he submits to exhaustion and drowns.
Right before he stops breathing, he closes his eyes and thinks of the boy he has longed had a crush on, but when then he opens his eyes again he's no longer drowning in the ocean, but on a bus.
Hae-il, a man who has crossed between time and has survived death, now stands in front of the man he has longed loved, Yoon Pado. “Has God really given me a second chance?”
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Brothers Without a Tomorrow

title: The Castle: Gwian's Bride
alt_title: 더 캐슬 - 귀안의 신부, 더 캐슬, The Castle, Замок — Невеста Гвиана
description:
In modern-day Korea, the Imperial Family holds a secret duty of exorcizing "Imae," creatures that lurk within paintings to feed on the grief of humans.

But such beings can only be detected by people like Jo Yuyeon who possess the Sacred Eye.
Despite knowing that Crown Prince Geon needs her special vision, Yuyeon gets caught up in a deceptive marriage plan to make it seem like another woman has her ability instead. 

But no secret can be kept forever.

What will become of Yuyeon once it’s revealed that she is the keeper Geon has always been looking for?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Hyeyong (혜용)

title: The Handsome Male Lead Won't Let Me Log Out
alt_title: El apuesto protagonista masculino no me deja cerrar la sesión, 상자 속의 마리골드, 신간 알림 신청하기, Marigold in a Box
description: The development of <Marigold in a Box>, a virtual reality game, is stopped after an unfortunate accident. Sun-ah can't help but be sad and disappointed as the manager of the development team. She decides to log on to the game as a farewell... But she can't customize her character? She can't even log out?! She is forced into becoming the protagonist of the game, Cloe Marigold. What choice does she have? She just has to kill herself and reach the 'dead ending' in the game. Then, she'll be free! However, due to interfering NPC characters, she always fails. She almost makes it out once... but she doesn't. Now, there's only one way to get out. She must beat the game.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Tou

title: How to Be a Family
alt_title: 가족이 되는 방법, 如何成为一家人, 家族になる方法
description: Do-yeon and Eun-ha, who became a family due to their parents' remarriage, become strangers again due to their parents' divorce. The two met again after many years. Eun-ha is obsessed with Do-yeon, and Do-yeon is burdened by his younger brother... What's even worse is that his feelings for Eunha are not 'brotherly love'.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: MOZU (모주)

title: The Broken Ring: This Marriage Will Fail Anyway
alt_title: 이 결혼은 어차피 망하게 되어 있다, Gyeolhon'eun Eochapi Manghage Doeeoissda, This Marriage Is Bound to Fail Anyway, This Marriage Is Bound to Sink Anyway, この結婚はどうせうまくいかない, 这个婚反正也要完蛋, 反正这段婚姻注定失败, 這場婚姻注定凋零
description:
When six-year-old Inés laid eyes on the handsome heir to House Escalante, she promptly made the boy her fiancé. Since noblemen are all the same, she figured she might as well choose a pretty one. But Lord Cárcel isn't ready for this sort of commitment just yet, and he spends the next decade and a half avoiding the marriage at all costs! Luckily, that's no trouble for Inés, as this marriage failing is exactly what she wants. In fact, he has her blessing to sow his wild oats as long as he stays out of her business. Unfortunately, being a playboy isn't as fun when your fiancée gives you permission. And doesn't this mean she's cheating on him too? Now, Cárcel is determined to change Inés' mind about him and prove he can be the husband she's always wanted.

---
Note: The webtoon is released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel.

[Original Novel](https://ridibooks.com/event/15574)

genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Kim Chacha

title: Snow Thaw & Love Letter
alt_title: 雪解けとアガパンサス
description:
Natsuki, the prince of an all-girls school meets an innocent (girl) transfer student, Shun, who doesn't treat Natsuki like a prince, but instead treats her as a "friend."

Natsuki excels in everything she does and even has a fan club at school.
Even though she was looked at with admiration, her days were somehow unfulfilled...

Although Natsuki feels uncomfortable with her first "friend", Shun's innocent smile and bright personality make Natsuki's heart flutter...?
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life

title: Takane no Hana wa Midasaretai

title: Love Doesn't Matter
alt_title: El amor no es importante, 상관없어, 사랑 따위
description: One might think being engaged to Hadius Myer, the son of one of the most prestigious families in the kingdom, sounds like a fairy tale, but for Emilia Bern, a commoner, her reality is nothing but a nightmare. Tired of the constant criticism she receives from other nobles and her fiancé’s cold attitude, all Emilia wants now is to end this charade. But when Hadius turns 19, his attitude suddenly changes. The truth is, Hadius has always been in love with Emilia, but he has been keeping his distance from her because of his unstable position within his family. Unfortunately, Hadius has already lost Emilia’s trust and must prove his sincerity to gain it back. Will the two be able to overcome adversity and hardship and find a way to be together?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

description: Reincarnated from a bottom-tier salaryman to an adventurer, he possessed only one skill: [Game]. A seemingly dead-end second life enveloped in games even in another world… This is the record of a man’s meteoric rise from the depths to cheat-level life in another world!
