title: A Dance of Swords in the Night
alt_title: 칼에 취한 밤을 걷다, Kare Chwihan Bameul Geotda, In the Night Consumed by Blades, I Walk, Sword Fanatic Wanders Through the Night, Camino en la noche consumido por las espadas, 醉剑夜行, 刀に酔った夜を歩く
description:
The Mystic Lunar Dance Troupe took in Jin Sohan as an orphan, and he spent his childhood with them. But one day, one of the four great demons, the Venom Demon, discovered that he was special and kidnapped him. After all kinds of tests, he decided to raise him as his disciple. Ten years later, Jin Sohan tried to look for traces of the Mystic Lunar Dance Troupe, but the Sword Dance Troupe had already been destroyed at the hands of the Unorthodox Faction that’s now ruling over his hometown.

---
Kidnapped as a child to be trained in the art of poison, Sohan Jin returns to his hometown in search of the group of New Moon Sword Dancers who raised him. However, upon his return, Sohan discovers the sword dancers have been defeated by a nefarious sect that now rules the area, with some members having been abducted. What would have been a heartwarming reunion transforms into a quest for revenge as Sohan begins his search for the remaining sword dancers, and he’s willing to poison anyone who gets in his way.

---

title: Skip Beat!
alt_title: スキップ・ビート!, Skip Beat, Не Сдавайся!, 下一站巨星, 華麗的挑戰, 스킵 비트!
description:
Kyouko Mogami lived solely for her childhood friend Shoutaro "Shou" Fuwa. She follows Shou to Tokyo so that he may realize his dream of becoming a famous singer. When his dream is realized, Kyouko overhears the truth behind his decision to bringing her with him: he was using her as a maid.  
  
Shocked and enraged, Kyouko swears to take revenge by outdoing him in show business. With a new look and a new attitude, she joins LME, the agency where Ren Tsuruga (Shou's rival and the #1 actor of LME) works, in the hopes of achieving her goal of destroying Shou's pride.  
  
Along the way, she discovers her true self, makes new friends (and enemies), and finds herself at the heart of some interesting situations that will change her life, and the lives of all others involved, forever.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Nakamura Yoshiki

title: The Lone Necromancer
alt_title: 나 혼자 네크로맨서, Solo Necromancy, The Only Necromancer, Некромант-одиночка, 死灵法师：亡灵支配者, 末日獨尊：死靈法師, Nigromante en Solitario
description:
Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

alt_title: Врата 0: Сражение Сил самообороны в Гинзе., ゲート0 -ZERO- 自衛隊 銀座にて、斯く戦えり
description: In the summer of 20XX, a ``gate to another world'' suddenly appeared in Ginza, Tokyo. What came pouring in from inside was a mysterious army and a group of hideous monsters. They go around slaughtering people, and Ginza in broad daylight quickly turns into a hellscape. While everyone was helplessly thrown into confusion in this state of emergency, there was one man who was brave enough to move around. That man was Yohji Itami, an otaku Self-Defense Force officer who would later be called the "Hero of Nijubashi"!
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Adventure, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Yanai Takumi

title: He's My Real Brother, Duke
alt_title: 그 남자는 제 친오빠인데요,공작님, Geu Namjaneun Je Chinoppaindeyo, Gongjangnim, Duke, That Man Is My Real Brother, 公爵様、その人は私のお兄ちゃんです！, 那个男人是我亲哥哥，公爵, Duque Él Es Mi Verdadero Hermano
description:
In a fantasy novel, I suddenly became Astel, the younger sister who never appeared. While my brother Cassian is fighting for revenge of the clan, it is my duty to find and deal with the final villain that remains unrevealed even at the end of the series! In order to do that, I must first enter the mansion of the northern duke, where the traitors of the family are hiding. But somehow, I became the 'mate' of duke Anais, a beast and a prime candidate for the ultimate villain. Besides...

"Kiss me now, Astel."

In order to live, I have to communicate with my 'mate' every day, but there’s no such thing in the original!

"Shouldn’t we go see the ocean you like today?"

"I-I don’t think I can. I have to go see Mr. Cassian today."

The duke gritted his teeth with a cold face. I was a little scared when I saw this look on his face. Maybe he’s teething? Because he’s a wild beast!

===

The other day, when I was living under the duke’s care. My brother, Cassian, left his son in my care for a while. However, it seems the duke has been entangled in a huge misunderstanding.

"They will become our child."

"What...?"

"Cassian Gray will disappear from this world right now, so you won't be his bride anymore."

Yes...? Since when did I become Cassian Gray’s bride?

---

title: Taming the Corrupted
alt_title: 흑화한 노예남을 길들였다, Taming a Corrupted Slave Man, Tamed a Blackened Enslaved Man, Heukwahan Noyenameul Gildeuryeotda, Domé A Un Esclavo corrompido
description:
I succeeded in taking the man who would, in the future, become the best in swordsmanship, one step ahead of the Prince and enlisted him as my younger brother. I treat my younger brother, who is not blood related to me, more kindly than anyone else, and I fed and raised him well. He will be my younger brother who will protect me from the damn fiancé who killed me in my previous life, and will be the replacement to go to war on my father’s behalf.

"I have never thought of you as a family from the moment I first saw you. My dear sister."

His eyes, filled with possessive desires, shone. It was a beast that I brought as my younger brother.

title: I Tamed My Ex-Husband's Mad Dog
alt_title: 전남편의 미친개를 길들였다, Jeonnampyeonui Michingaereul Gildeuryeotda, I Tamed My Ex-Husband's Crazy Dog, 驯服了前夫的疯狗, Domé Al Perro Rabioso De Mi Exmarido
description:
"Father, please allow me to end Mikael Alanquez."

From the moment she had foreseen her death, Reinhardt continued to repeat her final wish. When she came to her senses, she found herself at her father's funeral fifteen years earlier. Back to when she had been divorced by Crown Prince Mikael Alanquez, the reason why her father lost his life. As revenge, Reinhardt stabbed the Crown Prince’s leg. And as a consequence, she was exiled to a faraway territory. While she was on her rough journey, she encountered someone unexpected… The dirty, pitiful kid she picked up, in the previous time-line, was not only a war hero, but the emperor's illegitimate child — the "mad dog" whom her ex-husband had tamed.

---

title: Jitsu wa Imouto Deshita. ~Saikin de Kitagiri no Otouto no Kyorikan ga Yatara Chikaiwake~
alt_title: じつは義妹でした。～最近できた義理の弟の距離感がやたら近いわけ～, She was Actually My Stepsister.: Recently, the Sense of Distance Between Me and My New Stepbrother is Incredibly Close, На самом деле она была моей сводной сестрой, En realidad era mi hermanastra ~Recientemente, la sensación de distancia entre mi nuevo hermanastro y yo es increíblemente cercana~
description:
***A little brother-like secret relationship with his little sister!? A romantic comedy between siblings with a misunderstanding begins!***

Akira, my stepbrother, was brought into my life as a high school student after my parents remarried. He is a cute boy but shy because of the complicated family environment he grew up in. I had a crush on my brother, so I always spent time playing with Akira for his sake…. He loves me… We hit it off, and the distance between us grew rapidly! I asked him,
"......Brother, do you like me by any chance?"
"Of course I do."
The misunderstanding between the two of us deepens. And finally, I realized that Akira was my "sister" and I was confused...
"I like the distance between my brother and me as we have always been. I'd rather be with you more than I am now."
Akira's approach to me, aiming to make us "lovers" instead of "siblings," has begun!
A flirtatious romantic comedy with a little sister who is too cute and carefree to be a brother!
 
---

description:
In this life, I will live doing only what I want to do!

Boku is reincarnated as "Allen", the third son of a noble family, in a different world of swords and magic, which he had longed for. However, this other world is a world where "academic background," which I was bound to in my previous life, is more important than anything else! I am no longer bound by my academic background. In this life, I will live freely and let the wind blow my way!
I decided to do as I pleased, but for some reason I became the center of attention everywhere I went..?!

This is the start of a painful fantasy in which you can enjoy your freedom in a different world!
genre: Reincarnation, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Nishiura Mao

title: Secretary Deviance
alt_title: 비서 일탈, Desviación de la secretaría
description: "Will this relationship change if we kiss?" Lee Seung-jo, the eldest son of the Jaekyung group, which is said to be the cornerstone of the royal family, and Chu Yi-yeon, who worked as Seungjo's secretary while hiding her unrequited love for him. And during the same time, Lee Moon-jo, the illegitimate child of the Jaekyung group, always wanted her to win her man. At a certain moment, Lee Yeon's troubles begin between Seungjo, who keeps approaching Lee Yeon, and Munjo, who wants Lee Yeon as usual... ! A breathtaking romance between the perfect but salty reincarnation master Seungjo and the openly wretched illegitimate illegitimate son Munjo, and secretary Lee Yeon who is dangerously entangled with the two.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Office Workers, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ban Ji Young

title: The Shikisaki Sisters Want to Be Exposed
alt_title: 四季崎姉妹はあばかれたい
description: One day, Tarou Yamada, who runs a detective business, slips on a banana peel and reincarnates into Tsukushi Shikisaki, the younger brother of three beautiful big-breasted sisters who will all die on the same day. As he spends time surrounded by the three beautiful sisters, he finds out that the boy he is reincarnated as will be killed by one of the three sisters ...!?
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Harem, Shota, Slice of Life
author: Asakura Ryousuke

title: Ura Baito: Toubou Kinshi
alt_title: 灰色兼职：逃亡禁止, 灰色兼職：逃亡禁止, 裏バイト:逃亡禁止, Gray Part-Time Jobs: No Escape
description:
Ura baito, also known as a shady part-time job: a gray area job that pays very well. The price you pay is your life.  
Yume Kokuryo and Nagomi Shirahama are seeking a large sum of money for some reason. 
To that end, they casually dive into various shady part-time jobs. 

This work may affect you physically and mentally. Read it at your own risk. 
We are not responsible for any damage to your health.
genre: Ghosts, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Web Comic, Mystery
author: Taguchi Shoutarou

title: Taming Master
alt_title: 테이밍 마스터, テイミングマスター, Мастер Укрощения, 馴獸大師, 驯兽大师, El Maestro Domador
description: Jinsung may look like your average college student, but in the harsh VR world of Kaillan, he’s Ian, a mighty level 93 archer! So when he suddenly resets his character, everyone thinks he’s totally nuts! What they don’t realize is that Jinsung has unlocked a powerful, new hidden class. Now, taming monsters is tough, and leveling up is a slog. But when his VR-loving teacher threatens to fail him, Jinsung has just two months to level up and achieve glory as the one and only Taming Master!
genre: Monsters, Action, Animals, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: 박태석

title: Lycoris Recoil Koushiki Comic Anthology: Reload
alt_title: リコリス・リコイル 公式コミックアンソロジー リロード, Lycoris Recoil Official Comic Anthology: Reload
genre: Action, Comedy, Anthology, Girls' Love, Police, Slice of Life
author: Spider Lily

title: Like a Cat
alt_title: 猫が如く
description:
The Yakuza boss is... a cat?! The "brown tiger" group boss, Oyaji. Yanagi, the new recruit in the Yakuza, and the gang members are once again at the mercy of the carefree Oyaji today... But it's not that bad. A lively comedy about a cat... Begins!!

The title "Like a Cat", or "Neko ga Gotoku", is a parody of the Yakuza game series' title which is "Like a Dragon" or "Ryu ga Gotoku".
genre: Animals, Comedy, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Yuuki Sumida

title: Kiraware Majo to Karada ga Irekawatta Keredo, Watashi wa Kyou mo Genki ni Kurashiteimasu!
alt_title: 嫌われ魔女と体が入れ替わったけれど、私は今日も元気に暮らしています！, I Swapped Bodies With a Wicked Witch, but Today I'll Keep Having Fun!
description: A happy slow life begins with a switch! Marietta, princess of the snow country of Snewe, is trapped in a magic tower because she can't use magic. 8 years later, on her wedding day with the prince of the silver country, she thought she had succeeded in summoning a holy beast, but then... What appeared was...?
genre: Animals, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Emoto Mashimesa

title: Artificial Temperature 36.7°C
alt_title: 人造体温36.7℃
description: Su, born in prison, has always wanted to see the "crow" from what her mother told her. On the day when she was about to be secretly executed, Gill, the artificial intelligence, was thrown into prison for a test run. She compasses everything from the outside world in her database. Su developed special feelings for Gill, although she didn't care that the words Gill spoke were programmed or from her own consciousness. Unable to distinguish her own human feelings... in this small cell, the lonely Su got her first doll--she met a "person" who could bring her solace.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 不学禅

title: Memento (mori): Pseudo-Daycare
description: To achieve their goal of traveling back to the past, three adventurers that usually spend their time fighting monsters are ready to do anything to achieve it! Including becoming workers at a... daycare...?
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Dae Dind

title: Wish Upon a Husband
alt_title: I Am Living in Two Houses, 두 집 살림을 하는 중입니다만, Deseo un esposo
description:
One wrong wish and now I have two husbands?!
After finding a wish-granting statue, Renea jumps at the chance to turn her love life around. However, what was supposed to be a wish to make her cheating husband fall in love with her ends up as a wish to marry the hunky statue instead! Can Renea pull off having two husbands without getting caught?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Haesaesae

title: Akairo Crossroads
alt_title: Перекресток Акаиро, あかいろ交差点, 赤色交叉点, 赤色交叉點
description:
Is being unable to see the red string of fate better?!  
Since the encounter on the day of the high school entrance ceremony, dog-like boy, Makita Keita and cat-like girl, Ohara Tamaki have had the worst relationship.  
The story starts to progress when the both of them are put in the same class.  
A little mysterious heart racing school youth graffiti begins!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Hino Natsumi

title: Debut or Die!
alt_title: 데뷔 못 하면 죽는 병 걸림, デビューできないと死ぬ病気にかかってしまいました, Debut Mot Hamyeon Jungneun Byeong Geollim, Debuta o muere
description: After a night of drinking, aspiring civil servant Ryu Gunwoo passes out, only to awaken three years in the past in the body of a young man named Park Moondae. Before he can even assess the situation, he's given a mission: Debut or Die! Now, Moondae has one year to debut as an idol or face his doom. Luckily, he's able to snag a spot on the famous survival program "Idol Inc.," but with his skills so low and the competition so high, does Moondae stand a chance at becoming a shining star?
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Music, Full Color
author: Baek Deoksoo

title: It Starts With A Mountain
alt_title: Starting with a mountain, 开局一座山, It Starts With A Mountain, I Have a Shanzhai, Kāijú Yī Zuò Shān, Kāijú Yīzuò Shān, Start a Mountain, Ta Có Một Sơn Trại, 퀘스트 : 지상 최고의 산적, 퀘스트: 지상 최고의 산적, Kaiju Yi Zuo Shan
description: It starts with a mountain. A strategic leader gets isekai-ed into a war dynasty. He only has a group of members who were planning to ditch him. Facing this war era, he thinks of stealing food and girls to live a king’s life. He is hot-blooded, picks fights with war heroes. How will he bring chaos to the war? Will he be able to rise up high?
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Full Color
author: VV

title: First Impressions
alt_title: The Junior's Evolution, The Younger Generation Evolves, Cuando los juniors cambian
description: Hyeseo and Seoha were only supposed to be tutor and tutee. But why are they becoming something more...?
genre: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Fiorenti

title: I Raised My Younger Sister Beautifully
alt_title: 동생을 예쁘게 키웠다, I Raised My Little Sis Beautifully, 妹を可愛く育てたら大公 様に溺愛されました, Я прекрасно воспитала свою сестру
description: The imperial family collapsed during one night by the basilisk, the summoned beast of darkness which was summoned by the cursed princess, Fleta. “If there is a next life, then… Can I really be your younger sister?” If I had approached you a little earlier, would it have been different from now? The last time everyone regretted it, the time miraculously returned to 6 years ago. If this is the second chance we've been given.
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Naryan

title: A Dating Sim of Life or Death
alt_title: Мир, который я считал симулятором свиданий, оказался смертельной игрой, 俺の現実は恋愛ゲーム？？～かと思ったら命がけのゲームだった～, 我的现实是恋爱游戏, Is My Reality a Love Game?? ~I Thought it Was a Life Like Game~
description:
One day, 25-year-old Hasegawa Ryou wakes up to see a holographic screen floating in front of him. The screen prompts him to save/load files and an item shop, as well as his stats. It seems like he's been sucked into some erotic love game, since his stats depend on seducing women and "capturing" them.  
  
After finding a target and going through game-like options, Ryou thinks he knows what he has to do to "capture" his target. Surely he needs to have sex with her, right? And yet when the woman turns out to be a murderer, Ryou finds out the shocking truth: he has to capture these women and unveil their secrets! And if he fails, he dies…
genre: Thriller, Time Travel, Psychological, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Warui Otoko

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 8: JoJolion (Official Colored)
alt_title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 8: JoJolion - Digital Colored Comics, JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 8: JoJolion (Official Colored), JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Parte 8 : JoJolion - Color Digital, Невероятные Приключения ДжоДжо Часть 8: Джоджолион (цветная версия), ジョジョの奇妙な冒険, ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ジョジョリオン, ジョジョリオン, ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第8部 ジョジョリオン カラー版, JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: JoJolion
description: In 2011, childhood friends Yasuho Hirose and Joushuu Higashikata discover a naked man buried in the ground just outside the town of Morioh. The man has no memory of his name or previous life; the only thing he remembers about himself is how to use his Stand, a supernatural ability that takes the form of a humanoid creature. The stranger is quickly given a name, Jousuke, and Joushuu's father Norisuke decides to adopt him into the Higashikata household until he can find his own home.  As Jousuke begins to investigate his past, it becomes apparent that he is no ordinary amnesiac. There is much more to his identity than he first suspected, and, as he is thrust into a series of high-stakes Stand battles, he soon begins unravelling a deadly conspiracy that encompasses the entire town.
genre: Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Araki Hirohiko

title: K-ON! Brazil (Doujinshi)
genre: Comedy, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Music
author: Medeiros/Moretto

title: Against the Odds
description: Emily, trapped in an abusive relationship, seeks escape and finds solace in Ava, who is haunted by the tragic loss of her lover. As their bond deepens, they navigate the scars of their pasts, finding hope, healing, and love in unexpected places.
genre: Romance, Self-Published, Girls' Love, Full Color
author: Soojung

title: Kyuuseishu «Messiah» ~ Isekai wo Sukutta Motoyuusha ga Mamono no Afureru Genjitsu Sekai wo Musou suru
alt_title: 救世主《メシア》～異世界を救った元勇者が魔物のあふれる現実世界を無双する～, The Savior «Messiah» ~ The Former Hero Who Saved Another World Beats the Real World Full of Monsters, 救世主《彌賽亞》～現實世界無雙～
description: The "former" savior, Takeru Yamato, was summoned to another world and executed because of his strength. When he wakes up, he finds himself in Japan, where he spent time before being summoned. However, in the city, demons appearing from "gates" rampage, and those called hunters fight using magic. Returning from another world, Takeru decides to hide his powers and live, but...
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Tragedy
author: Heisei Owari

title: Pure Cohabitation
alt_title: Convivencia pura, 순수한 동거생활
description:
I work from morning to night, both at home and out!
I joined the same company as my brother's best friend and who is my creepy owner. Just living together makes my heart flutter, but this guy... Why is he being nice to me? Scary... The story of 'Oh Sojeong', a young girl, and 'Cha Gangwoo', a man who falls in love with his friend's younger sister, while living together.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Full Color
author: Flada

title: My Lovely Fox Wife
alt_title: The Fox Girl is My Wife, Повседневная жизнь с девушкой-лисой, 狐のお嫁ちゃん, 我的妻子是狐妖
description: In Kyoto, the capital of a thousand years, a fox spirit and a young man meet and fall in love. And so begins the lovey-dovey life of a human-kitsune newlywed couple. Of course, it's full of fluff!
genre: Romance, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Batta

title: City of Souls
description: Saebyuk is the only person who can see the souls of others; at least that's what she thought until she met Sori. The fated encounter between the two leads them to be stranded in another world with no clear way home. However, in their attempt to get home they begin to discover their true destiny.
genre: Magical Girls, Self-Published, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Amaiiuwu

title: Last Order wa Ojou-san de Dekiai Jouren Kyaku ni Kyuuai saretemasu
alt_title: ラストオーダーはお嬢さんで 溺愛常連客に求愛されてます
description:
"Let's do it until I can't hold back my moans, shall we?"

I must be weird. I want to be embraced by this person who doesn't even know his own name...

Mei, the daughter of a restaurant owner, is troubled by a certain 'regular customer,' Chikage. I've been warning him not to smoke, but he won't listen to me at all! But he's a mysterious person who somehow interests her... When Chikage finds out that Mei has gone to a party, he suddenly changes his tune and his mind...? Mei is constantly being pushed around, including being taken to a hotel for shelter on a rainy day. While Mei is glued to an AV video that she accidentally turned on, he asks her if she'd like to "imitate them"…!

"I'll teach you everything from scratch starting now."

This is the first and last true love of the uncontrollable Chikage.
genre: Romance
author: Fukita Mafuyu

title: Depressed Hero
description: The hero in this story is struggling with depression and feels like he has no purpose in life. One day, he is approached by a 500 year old demon lord who takes an interest in him. The demon lord, who is beautiful and powerful, offers to care about a depressed hero from another world the hero and take care of him.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Kod0me

title: Their Phantom
alt_title: 她们的幻影
description: A shady undercover police officer x an innocent university student. In an accident, university student Song Xiao An is kidnapped and brought deep into the mountains, ripping her away from her peaceful and happy life. There, an undercover police officer named Zhou Si Han secretly takes care of her, and Xiao An thinks she can escape through her. However, she discovers that the policewoman is hiding a dark secret...
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Full Color
author: 冬日农民

title: Myst, Might, Mayhem
alt_title: 괴력 난신, The Chaotic God of Extraordinary Strength
description: All Jeong wants is a second chance -- for revenge! His grandfather’s gruesome death has transformed him into the bloodthirsty and ruthless Scythe Demon. He will stop at nothing until he has killed the man responsible. Yet rage and determination alone are not enough. He must train in martial arts if he ever wants to stand a chance against such a formidable foe. Will he succeed in his revenge on the murderer of his grandfather?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hanjung Wolya (한중월야)

title: Moteharune, Ashiya-kun
alt_title: モテはるねえ蘆屋くん, Well Aren't You Popular, Ashiya-kun
description:
Kyoto has become a place where humans and monsters have chosen to coexist, and Chimi-Mouryo has become rampant. Saki, a succubus who attends a school in Kyoto that has turned into a magical land, uses her beauty and abilities to become the school's princess!!

Even such a reckless girl had a natural enemy. His name is Ashiya Yuu! A tough-looking man who won't fall for only himself and is loved by other demi-humans!!!

Saki, who calls herself the queen, can't stand this sight, so she tries to bring down Ashiya faster than the other demi-humans, but...!!?
genre: Demons, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, School Life, Monster Girls
author: Kurihara Kazuaki

title: Hired To Love
alt_title: Contratada para amar
description:
Henley never thought she'd see so many zeros on one check$10,000 to be billionaire Bennett Calloway's fake girlfriend! And that's just the advance! She's barely scraping by, working two minimum wage jobs just to afford the worst apartment ever and the lawyer fees from her brother's wrongful conviction. Calloway is rude and entitled, but the opportunity seems too good to pass up. The only catch? Don't fall in love. In desperate need of cash, Henley finds herself caught up in a whirlwind business arrangement, pretending to date Calloway so his mother will ease up on the pressure for him to find a wife. But once Henley is enmeshed in Bennett's world, he falls for her, and she starts to develop feelings for him as well. 

Despite her romance with Bennett, it's clear something is wrongare the Calloways involved in the conviction that put her brother in jail? What secrets are their family hiding? Journeying deeper into a world of wealth and conspiracies, Henley is forced to rely on Bennett. But how much can she really trust himwhen doing so could cost her everything?
genre: Romance, Self-Published, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jordan Lynde

title: The Duke of Death and His Maid
alt_title: Смертоносный герцог и его черная горничная, 死神坊ちゃんと黒メイド, The Duke of Death and His Black Maid
description:
In a large mansion lives a boy, an aristocrat who was cursed by the witch to "let everything he touches die." With him is his maid Alice, who besides serving him, likes to tease him. The boy who is interested in her doesn't mind the teasing, but not being able to touch her is painful!  
  
If they are unable to hold hands, how will their love ever bloom?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Inoue Koharu

title: Hybrid
alt_title: 사기캐
description:
the Grand Hybrid, born from the union of angels and demons, is believed to possess the highest lineage among hybrids. When awakened, this extraordinary being, known as the ‘Apex Hybrid’, is said to have the power to blow up the universe.

Contrary to Jake’s desire for a simple and ordinary life, angels and devils eventually seek him out as the ultimate ‘Apex Hybrid’. They employ various strategies to convince him to join their respective sides.
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Hooressha (후렛샤)

title: How to Survive Sleeping With the Emperor
alt_title: 황제와의 잠자리에서 살아남는 법, 與皇帝同床共枕的求生法則, Cómo sobrevivir durmiendo con el emperador
description:
'It’s been a couple of months since I became empress, and I’m avoiding sleeping with the emperor.’

The powerful empire led by inheritors of the golden dragon's bloodline, ‘Duhaleut.’
The emperor that reins over that empire, 'Karmond.'
And the one who rose to the seat of empress after marrying him, Princess 'Rovelia.'
Since she became empress, she’s expected to help continue the powerful imperial bloodline.

And to do this, she needs to sleep with the emperor, but...
For the sake of her 'true goal,' she ends up in a situation where she has to decline sleeping with Karmond...!

Indeed, she has to survive sleeping with the emperor. Will she be able to safely achieve her goal?
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color
author: gasseul (가쓸)

title: Lord Demon King Always Teases Me
alt_title: 魔王大人总撩我, 게임 속 마왕이 자꾸 날 괴롭혀!
description: He Mian, a college student who has social anxiety, cleared his favorite game for the 100th time. Gareth, the devil of the game, accidentally transmigrated into the modern world where He Mian was. He Mian is determined to let the devil return to the game as soon as possible. In order to get rid of Gareth's pranks and entanglement, the two must collect magical artifacts from the game which has been spread across the world when Gareth was traversing.
genre: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 100g Rice Noodles (是那个两切粉)

title: Be-bop High School
alt_title: ビー・バップ・ハイスクール
description:
The story revolves around the lives of two rough-and-tumble high school friends Kato Hiroshi and Nakama Toru, who seemed to make a habit of getting into trouble and starting up fights. In keeping with the spirit of the manga, Toru and Hiroshi sport slicked back 50's style ducktails and adopted exaggerated swaggers that made them comical and yet also oddly cool. The drama also features an assortment of outlandish characters who sport even weirder fashions and hairdos. To describe the action in this drama, think Fight Club meets The Breakfast Club.  
  
---
 - **Won the 12th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 1988, which it shared with Bonobono**
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Kiuchi Kazuhiro

title: Girlfriends
alt_title: 여자친구, ガールフレンド, 女朋友, Girl Friends, GFs, Romance Or Friendship, Love Or Schoolmates
description: High school is shaping up to be much different than what Young had imagined. First of all, the girls and boys are in separate buildings, which means Young’s got zero chance of casually running into her handsome, dreamy, kind, sexy, gorgeous crush, Bitna. Second, there’s a psycho chick in Young’s class…that no one else knows about! And to make things worse, she is Bitna’s dream girl. Young must find a way to get back at psycho chick and win Bitna’s heart…but luck is not on her side and things quickly spiral out of control.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Cheonggeon

title: Toraware no Minoue
alt_title: Body of Captivity, Bức tranh rồng, Captive Heart, Captive Hearts, Captive of Love, Gefangene Herzen, Your Prisoner, أسير الحب, とらわれの身の上, 爱情魔力
description:
Carefree Megumi Kuroishi was living a life of luxury until the day a girl named Suzuka Kogami walked into his life. All of a sudden, Megumi finds himself kneeling at Suzuka's feet and prostrating himself like a servant! What Megumi doesn't know (until that very moment anyway) is that his family is cursed to follow the orders of the Kogami family.  
  
Also contains the extra one-shots:  
- Let the Time Freeze  
- Realistic Storm  
- Tell Me the Real Meaning of That Kiss  
- The Long Night of Pere Noel
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural
author: Hino Matsuri

title: Plum Candy Love
alt_title: 자두사탕러브, Jadusatang Love
description: "Let's go out with me." While Ki Young Hyun, a timid model student, was leaving school early, the person he bumped into in an alley was Daehan, who was famous for being a bully at school. He was scared and tried to sneak away from him, but he suddenly grabbed his wrist and dragged him into the cafe....
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Haejeo 500M (해저500M)

title: MAN OF RUST
alt_title: Человек из Ржавчины, マンオブラスト
description:
The "sixth sense" is the ability to perceive the providence of nature with one's "mind" and transform it into "power".

The "Falling World" at the bottom of the earth.

One day, Ruo, a boy who dreams of the skies, comes into possession of "relic iron," the carcass of Tetsuzin, a monster from the earth. However, it is a forbidden power that must not be touched! The goal is to go to the ground.

The "super-royalistic boys' manga" in which a "rokudenashi" changes the world is about to begin!
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Superhero, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Urushiro Kei

title: The Boomerang Duke
alt_title: 각설이 공작, Gagseol'i Gongjag, A Deceitful Marriage, Duke, The Beggar Duke, A Gypsy's Trick to the Duke, Duke of Deception, 乞丐公爵
description:
Silvia Lauren is the duchess of the Aswan estate and the wife of the bloodthirsty war addict, Duke Victor Aswan. She is also one-month pregnant with Victor's first child. At least, that's the façade she has created in order to secretly reside in the duke's castle while he is away fighting in a war. But when Victor returns from battle much earlier than anticipated, Silvia fears that her intricate lies will all come to light. However, instead of throwing her out of his home right away, Victor decides to go along with her scheme and happily awaits the birth of his nonexistent child—and by happily, it's more like threateningly. How long will Silvia be able to keep up with her lies and remain by the ruthless duke's side?

title: Genkai OL to Joshi Daisei ga 〇〇 Suru Hanashi
alt_title: 限界OLと女子大生が〇〇する話, 한계 OL과 여대생이 OO하는 이야기, An OL at Her Limit and a College Girl
description: Segawa-san is the star of the office who everyone depends on. But she's stretched thin, and the state of her apartment has gotten dire. After a fateful encounter, the college student next door offers to lend a helping hand!
genre: Office Workers, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Obata Rui

title: At the Northern Fort
alt_title: 北の砦にて
description:
Paw pads wrapped in white fur. Fluffiness around the neck. 
A bushy tail. A rounded figure that was the very definition of fur ball! 
A certain Japanese girl had been reincarnated into such a fox cub, Milfiria.
Milfiria was told to watch the house by her mother, as she left for the capital. 
However, unable to bear with the loneliness, she decided to follow her mother
but lost her way until she reached a fort protected by strong knights.
genre: Reincarnation, Animals, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Mikuni Tsukasa

title: Failed to Log Out, but Succeeded in Marriage (Promo)
alt_title: 로그아웃은 실패했는데요 결혼은 성공했습니다, Failed to Log Out but Marriage Was Successful
description:
I woke up from a game I was playing to raise my daughter. To make matters worse, I've lost the "player" who could have saved her. I can't log out, and all I have is a pile of debt and a heroine to raise. To get out of the game, I must raise my nephew well and see the ending. Then, a mysterious figure appears and hands her a mysterious proposal of marriage....

Eden Bertenon, the Grand Duke, who was only mentioned in the game, has asked me to marry him. A man who proposes to a woman he's never met before without even blinking an eye. I don't know why or how, but he might be a clue to the hidden ending.

A contract marriage with a promise of divorce at the same time as the proposal. Now that I have a reasonable husband, I thought all that was left was to raise the heroine safely and see the ending....

*Cover Artist: Cocorip
Promo Artist: Yooani*
genre: Oneshot, Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Virtual Reality, Fantasy, Villainess, Full Color
author: Chae Yoohua (채유화)

title: I Tried Asking My Cool Girlfriend for a Favor
alt_title: クール彼女にお願いしてみた, I Tried asking a favor to my Cool Girlfriend
genre: Romance, Web Comic
author: Sanjo Kei

title: No Way I'll Go into the Cornfield With You!
alt_title: 我可不跟你去苞米地！
description:
Jiang Lieyang, a spoiled rich kid  who was born in the Jiangnan region, was deceived by his own mother and sent to the Dongbei countryside. Where the mysterious local resident Xun Zao became Jiang Lieyang’s “acting guardian”

Not being used to the living habits and the difference in local customs make the pampered Jiang Lieyang want to escape, but he couldn't help but getting closer and closer to Xun Zao...
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 王圆脸w

title: Quick Transmigration: Addictive Relationship
alt_title: 快穿：上瘾关系
description: Ling Qi, a mischievous rabbit spirit, stole the Celestial Emperor's prized carrots and was punished with trials across three thousand lesser realms. In each realm, he diligently cosplays various roles, from pervert to villain, with one goal: sabotage the central couple! However, despite his intentions not to seduce anyone, his attempts often fail. As the trials progress, Ling Qi realizes that everything was manipulated by the Celestial Emperor…
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 佳思君

title: Hina to Bambi
alt_title: ヒナとバンビ, Hina and Bambi
description: Taku and Hinata are childhood friends who will be attending high school in the city this spring. Their daily life together in a village deep in the mountains, which had been taken for granted for so long, is vividly changed...?
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Komaki Maria

title: Cheeky Brat
alt_title: なまいきざかり。, 盛气凌人, His Cheekiness is in Full Bloom
description: I, Yuki, have no intention of admitting it. Never. The last thing I will ever do is plead guilty to the crime of maybe possibly having a soft spot for my cheeky playboy of an underclassman—who’s an absolute brat—Naruse. Speaking of which, instead of focusing on his strange grade school rivalry with this Shizuka guy, he needs to get his head in the game and focus on our qualifiers…!! Maybe I was expecting too much from him, after all…
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, School Life
author: Miyuki Mitsubachi

title: The King's Beast
alt_title: 王の獣, 王之从兽, La bestia del rey
description:
The world shared by humans and ajins (those who are half beast and half human) is not paradise. On the contrary, humans rule over ajins with strictness and contempt, using them at their own convenience: men as soldiers for their special powers and women as prostitutes, downgraded to the lowest rank.  
  
To change that destiny, Kogetsu serves the king under the guise of a man.
genre: Historical, Action, Romance, Sexual Violence, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Toma Rei

title: THE LAST MAN
alt_title: LAST MAN, Last Man (EGAWA Tatsuya), ラストマン
description:
A mysterious boy lies naked and unconscious on the street. The story begins when ninth grader, Ai Oomori, and his third grader brother, Seigi, find him. This boy has no memory of the past and doesn't even know his real name. He is like a little baby. Ai names this boy Makoto and takes him back home. Makoto has superhuman physical powers and can even recover quickly from injuries. Who is Makoto? Makoto is easygoing and not at all bothered by everyone's curiosity. Until that is he is pursued by a cruel woman who disguises herself as a spider. A neo sapiens, this spider woman has been dispatched by a mystery organization called, "Love & Peace." Her mission is to bring back Makoto dead or alive.  
  
Source: MU
genre: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Horror, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Egawa Tatsuya

title: The Baby Dragon and the Rabbit Spirit
alt_title: 밀토담, 새끼용과 토끼신령, Miltidam
description:
Rabbit spirit, Bi-yeon, who has nothing to do except take care of rabbits, picks up a cute little dragon that was badly injured one day.
From that day onwards, he starts dreaming of his past life.

Among the divine beasts, the rabbit spirit 'Biyeon' is on the lowest level.
Although he is the highest level of divine beast, 'Do-ryu' was born with a prophecy that he would destroy the country.
Their meeting, disguised as chance, and his other self from his previous life, start opening his eyes to new things.

-
genre: Action, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy
author: Bong

title: Super no Ura de Yani Suu Futari
alt_title: スーパーの裏でヤニ吸うふたり, Historias que ocurren al fumar en la parte trasera del supermercado, История о перекуре за супермаркетом, 在超市後門吸菸的二人, Smoking Behind the Supermarket with You, Behind the Supermarket, Smoking With You, A Story About Smoking at the Back of the Supermarket
description:
Sasaki, an overworked salaryman, goes through an average stressful day just for a single light at the end of the tunnel: Yamada, the always-cheerful clerk at his favorite convenience store. 

One day, Sasaki takes an extra amount of time at a company meeting, and by the time he gets to the convenience store Yamada has already clocked out. However, as he leaves, he notices a young woman with piercings smoking behind the store?

---

title: Giri no Kyoudai Dakedo Koibito no Futari wa Doudou to Tsukiaitai
alt_title: 義理の兄弟だけど恋人のふたりは堂々と付き合いたい, Stepbrothers Are Dating and Want To Be Open About It
description:
Kazuma and Yuuya are stepbrothers who are actually lovers and live under one roof (in their parents' house), secretly doing the things lovers do under their parents' radar.

A particular close call is intercepted by Kazuma's quick-thinking. While Yuuya is determined to keep their relationship under wraps, he also begins to feel anxious and conflicted for how long they can keep it a secret.

On the other hand, Kazuma meets Yuuya's student, Matsubara, from his part-time as a cram school tutor by chance when they're out shopping. Seeing their closeness, Kazuma's instincts tells him that he should keep an eye out for him.
He is also curious how Yuuya is doing at the cram school, with Yuuya having a charm that attracts those younger than him...

A possessive younger brother who loves his brother x A popular, soft-type older brother
The two face the feelings they can't hide for each other...
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Sakumoto Ayu

title: The Fable
alt_title: ザ・ファブル, 杀手寓言, Фэйбл
description:
A fabled genius at killing resides somewhere hidden in Tokyo. Taught since childhood to obey the orders of his boss, he is ordered to live in Osaka as a normal person for one year in order for the boss to lay low.    ---- **Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2017**

title: Bidou Wakadanna, Koi Shitau Wa Koushoku Otoko
alt_title: 美童若旦那、恋慕ふは好色男, A Beautiful Young Master Longs for a Sensual Man
description: The stage is Edo. The second son of a draper store, Tenji is a beautiful boy that is earnest and kind as Bodhisattva. Tenji, who loves pretty things — especially hairpins — accidentally meets his favorite hairpin artisan, Shunsuke, one day, and ends up being shown around his workplace. Elated, he even follows Shunsuke to his home, but Shunsuke mistook Tenji for a woman and assaulted him! Shunsuke is actually a sensual man who welcomes all comers but never concerns himself with those who leave! And when he realizes Tenji is a man!? A beautifully and bewitchingly composed Edo picture scroll of passion of two straight men!
genre: Historical, Romance, Boys' Love
author: Shimeji

title: King of the Labyrinth
alt_title: 迷宮の王
description:
Within the tenth-floor boss room of the Sazardon Labyrinth, the mighty minotaur awakens once more. Unlike its predecessors, slain at the hands of treasure-seeking adventurers, this monster’s primal urges push it further than ever before. Kill. Consume. Grow stronger. The more powerful its opponent, the more powerful it becomes. Even the very rules of the labyrinth seem to bend to its indomitable will. Can none triumph against this bovine behemoth? Will the minotaur ever meet its match…?

---

title: Real Not Equal Game Root H
alt_title: Real ≠Game √ H, りある≠げえむ√H
description: Hinata is a playboy who conquers the men he's after like it's a game. So when he encounters Kaisei, a guy who loves otome games and is only interested in 2D men, he can't help but be interested in such a new kind of target. Unable to believe that someone wouldn't fall for him, Hinata gets desperate, and even starts playing Kaisei's beloved otome games in order to get closer to him. Will he be able to beat this game of love?!
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Video Games, School Life

title: Shiganbana
alt_title: シガンバナ
description: In this seemingly peaceful country, there lives a hitman that hunts down others of his kind - an assassin of assassins. Before eliminating his targets, he always questions their motives for killing - this is his way of embracing his destiny. From the author of "Until Your Bones Rot" and "The Shadows of Who We Once Were," Utsumi Yae presents a thrilling drama about the lives of those existing on the edge between life and death.

title: Hoshizora no Karasu
alt_title: Crow in the Starry Sky, 星空のカラス, 星空之鸦
description: Waka is a 13 year-old Go-lover! Learning from her grandfather, a pro go player, she comes to enjoy connecting with the people around her, regardless of age or gender. One day, she meets the young genius go player, Sagisaka Souji, in a match that tore at both body and soul, and so she decides to become a pro go player herself!
genre: Traditional Games, Romance, Drama, School Life
author: Morie Satoshi

title: Tonari wa Futsuu no Nijika (-chan)
alt_title: となりはふつうのニジカ（ちゃん）, Next to me is the Ordinary Nijika (-chan)
description:
Since Aira was a little girl, boys have protected her because of her lovable appearance.

However, she never asked for their protection, or for people to gossip about how she’s so full of herself. Troublesome occurrences like those happen to her because of her appearance, so she decided that once she entered high school, she’d play the “girlish Aira” role so she wouldn’t have to deal with more bothersome situations.

One day, a person named Nijika, came to live in Aira’s house. Nijika’s family had been transferred overseas and they wanted Nijika to stay with an acquainted family they knew.

However, Aira finds out later that Nijika is actually… a guy!? Nijika who was biologically born a male, wears the clothes they want to wear, puts on the makeup they want to put on, and confidently expresses their feelings without a care in the world.

Aira doesn’t know if they are a guy, a girl, or even her friend, but one thing is certain. Aira’s extraordinary everyday life with Nijika has now started!
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mizuka Yuzuhara

author: Mizuka Yuzuhara

genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Tagura Tohru

alt_title: 청춘,예찬, Cheongchun, Yechan

Just when the anger between them builds up and is about to explode, Unho gets caught with his secret by Cheongwook.

alt_title: 탑아이돌의 막내 멤버가 되었다
description: “25…that’s too old to become an idol.” Do Seohan, who got eliminated from the successful idol survival audition program ‘Stardust Project’. Giving up his dreams, he is trying to find his way working part-time jobs. When all of a sudden, he wakes up 8 years in the past after an accident. Right before the ‘Stardust Project’ started! As the youngest (but most experienced), can he make it to the final lineup this time?
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Music, Full Color

title: Meccha Shoukan Sareta Ken
alt_title: Oversummoned, Overpowered, and Over It!, めっちゃ召喚された件 THE COMIC, Summoned to a parallel fantasy world many times
description:
Name’s Inori Takafuji. I’m not really much of a “go-getter,” if you catch my drift — sleep’s more my style — but getting summoned to another world kinda messed things up.

Bit hard to chill when you’ve got a king in your face telling you there’s a bad guy you’ve gotta go slay or whatever, you know? Plot twist, though — it’s actually not so bad. Getting the hero treatment sounds pretty nice, right?

But then it happens again! Some other clown summons me, I get my obligatory superpower, and off I go. And sure, that’s fine. It happens, sometimes you get isekai’d to the wrong place. But then it happens AGAIN! Someone ELSE summons me, I get ANOTHER superpower, and then I’m somewhere totally new.

Repeat ad nauseam.

No idea what’s going on, but all I want is one thing: stop !@#$ing summoning me!

This is the "official english" translation of the description... holy shit braindamaged rewrite like this should be punished...
genre: Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Saitousa

title: Fist Demon of Mount Hua
alt_title: 화산권마, Hwasangwonma, 华山拳魔, Кулак демона с горы Хуа, Hua Mountain Demon Fist, 華山拳魔
description:
Dam-Ho, the sole survivor of a raid on his village, has a lame leg, the worst possible condition for a martial artist. Nonetheless, he refuses to stop training. Whilst everyone around him tells him he cannot become a martial artist, Dam-Ho refuses to give up on his dream. Will he really be able to become the best martial artist?

One day, he meets the Acting Spirit, Yeonghwi, who he signs a contract with, and begins to shine in his career. In fact, he was always an acting genius,  but he was overshadowed by his weak presence. He creates a perfect character for every work he takes and slowly raises to stardom. However, Yeonghwi, who he saw as his benefactor, starts to seem suspicious…

alt_title: 从野怪开始升级
description: After Lu Chen entered the cranial neuron quantum transferring game《Empyrean God Realm》—he found himself stripped of his human character, becoming the weakest wild monster in the game, a "Weak Gnoll." Facing players who are ready to use him to level up, Lu Chen lifts the broken Gnoll club and starts to upgrade from a Lv.1 Gnoll. As Lu Chen keeps on killing more and more species, gaining new talents, and levelling up talents, his status keeps getting enhanced. Normal, Strong, Super strong... Soon enough, he...
