title: A Middle-aged Man Who Returned From Another World Becomes Unrivaled In The Apocalyptic World
alt_title: 異世界還りのおっさんは終末世界で無双する
description:
The stage is set with an unrivaled middle-aged man in a world overflowing with zombies…! 

––It’s been three years since he was first summoned to another world. Having the unique Class of “Samurai”, he defeated the Demon King along with his party of warriors: “Azami”, 38 years old.

When he finally makes it back to Japan, he comes to know that the world is now filled with zombies…?! Realizing that his skills acquired from the Other World remain, he sets out into the city to seek the truth and search for survivors.

From a hardware store to a school, through the city hall and the police station…. Using his magical powers for increased physical strength and strengthening his weapons, slashing through a sea of zombies on a motorcycle, what is it that awaits Azami…?!
genre: Action, Zombies, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Isekai, Horror, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Habanero

title: From Acting Genius To Top Idol!
alt_title: 연기 천재, TOP 아이돌!, Acting Genius, TOP Idol!
description: “The brilliant actor, famous Baekhyun, before he dies, encounters a miracle and travels back in time! But there’s nothing free about time travel. His lifespan ends at thirty, and he has only ten years left. To return as an actor and stay alive, he must become an ‘idol’! Experience the journey of the talented performance star as he rises to the top ranks of idols, an exciting story awaits!”
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Han Gyeol (한결)

title: A Genius Writer's Random Workplace
alt_title: 천재작가의 랜덤 작업실
description: Jinwoo Kim had been slaving as an assistant writer for 6 years with nothing to show for it. He quits his workplace. Later, he abruptly has a notification pop up and now he has scenes popping into his head and system prompts telling him he must be at a location to write. Maybe this is how he will become a star writer??
genre: Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: 펭스

title: Counterattacking System Available At The Grand Ascension Stage
alt_title: 大乘期才有逆袭系统, Dacheng Qi Cai You Ni Xi Xitong, Only in the Mahayana Period Does the Counterattack System Exist
description: Jiang Li, after crossing over, discovered he possessed no cheat abilities so he had no choice but to diligently cultivate. Five hundred years later, he became the strongest in the Nine Provinces. Suddenly, a system appeared, claiming it could help the host go from the Qi Refining stage to becoming the number one in the Nine Provinces. Jiang Li stared at the first task, lost in thought. “Host, please defeat your cousin (at the sixth level of Qi Refining).” “Your system seems to have quite a delay, doesn’t it?”
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 猪画

title: Chairman Kang, the New Employee
alt_title: Chairman Kang: The Newcomer, The New Employee Chairman Kang, 신입사원 강 회장, Shinibsawon Kang Hoijang
description:
I’m Kang Yong-ho, the Chairman of Choi Sung Group, one of South Korea’s top 10 conglomerates.
Just when I was basking in the glory of my retirement declaration, out of the blue, a new employee fell from the sky and landed on my head. But hey, where’d my body go, and now I’ve turned into a new Employee?!

“What’s this? Are you telling me to start with Excel or something?
genre: Long Strip, Adventure, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Seung Seungi

title: Astral Pet Store
alt_title: 超神宠兽店, Super God Pet Shop
description:
In the era of astral pets, only the might of pets was essential! However, making the pets stronger has always been a slow and arduous process for pet warriors. That was until the appearance of a mysterious pet shop that changed everything!

The weakest skeleton could slay a great golden dragon with a single strike after training at this pet shop! Even the humble watchdog of the shop possessed ten legendary skills, and the female worker in the shop claimed to be a Goddess...

As for what the shopkeeper Su Ping thinks: I'm merely training these cute pets to become exceptional overlord beasts. What? Is it not normal?
- - -
In the era of beasts, pet strength determines everything! The battle pet master works hard and slowly to improve the strength of the pet. Until a mysterious pet store came out of nowhere!

In just a few days of cultivation, the lowly skeleton can kill the golden dragon with a single slash. Does the guard dog have ten secret skills of pet beats? The working girl even calls herself a god...

As for the owner, Su Ping: Isn't it a regular practice to breed cute pets into prehistoric king beasts?
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Ancient Xi

title: Tanikamen
alt_title: Masked Tani, Tani the Mask, 谷仮面
description: The story is of a masked boy, Tani, a strong young man, who has a crush on a girl named Shima Rihoko, the school volleyball star. He gets into trouble trying to get her attention, besides facing the thugs of the school. He’s a very jealous guy, and will not let anyone get close to Shima-san.
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Shibata Yokusaru

title: KINGDOM OF THE "Z"
alt_title: KINGDOM OF "Z", Kingdom of the Z, Z之王国, Королевство Z, キングダムオブザZ, キングダムオブザゼット
description: Five days after the sudden appearance of zombies… The protagonist, Masaru, who is having it rough surviving at school, is splendidly saved from this predicament by high schoolers Sekigahara Miki and Nakiri Karin. Though Masaru is at first relieved, he ends up realizing their true intentions…!!
genre: Action, Romance, Survival, Zombies, Harem, School Life, Horror
author: Harawata Saizou

title: Tensei Shitara Hime Datta node Dansou Joshi Kiwamete Saikyou Mahou Tsukai Mezasuwa
alt_title: 転生したら姫だったので男装女子極めて最強魔法使い目指すわ, I Was Reincarnated as a Princess, so I’m Going to Become the Strongest Wizard in the World!
description:
Ikuto, an ordinary high school boy, is reincarnated as Isabella, a sheltered princess in a world of magic?!
Although he is happy to be able to use magic, Ikuto's ambitions are crushed when he discovers that, in this world, women are not allowed to use magic.
Still, Ikuto is not ready to give up, and at the age of 16, he decides to leave the castle and embark on a journey to learn magic...?!
A new sensation about a princess disguised as a man (while inwardly a high school boy) and a handsome wizard with special circumstances!

(Source: Hakusensha, translated via DeepL)
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Romance, Adventure, Crossdressing, Isekai, Mystery
author: Akira (輝)

title: Cheese in the Trap
alt_title: Сыр в мышеловке, チーズ・イン・ザ・トラップ, 치즈인더트랩, 치즈인더트랩 (순끼)
description: Having returned to college after a year long break, Hong Sul, a hard-working over-achiever, inadvertently got on the wrong side of a suspiciously perfect senior named Yoo Jung. From then on, her life took a turn for the worse - and Sul was almost certain it was all Jung's doing. So why is he suddenly acting so friendly a year later?
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Mystery, Full Color
author: Soon-Ki

title: Akuninzura shita B-kyuu Boukensha: Shujinkou to Sono Osananajimi-tachi no Papa ni Naru
alt_title: 悪人面したＢ級冒険者 主人公とその幼馴染たちのパパになる, B-Rank Adventurer With an Evil Look Becomes a Daddy to the Protagonist and His Childhood Friends, B-GRADE ADVENTURER WITH A BAD GUY FACE Becomes A Daddy To The Hero And His Fellow Children, A B-Rank Adventurer With an Evil Face Becomes a Father for the Hero and His Childhood Friends
description:
Gray, a B-rank adventurer, was supposed to be just a mob character in the RPG "Bright Fantasy." However, by chance, he saved an orphan who was attacked by thugs on the roadside and decided to raise him as his father. But the orphan turned out to be the protagonist of this world, "Isuka"!

This choice would greatly change the fate of the world.
___
Note: While even the English on the Japanese covers gets this wrong, the orphan saved is the *protagonist*, not the *hero*.
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Enji (えんじ)

title: Omae no Hou kara Kiss Shite Kure yo
alt_title: お前のほうからキスしてくれよ, Can You Kiss Me First?
description:
Ueno is an accountant who strikes fear into the hearts of his co-workers with his strict ways. Kanda, on the other hand, is the star of the sales department, and is next in line for the manager position.

Despite seeming like complete opposites on the surface, they're actually pretty close friends! Kanda even crashes at Ueno's place quite often.

But Ueno has mixed feelings about Kanda's constant closeness, even after confessing his own homosexuality. Meanwhile, Kanda has been hung up over the time that Ueno told him he was not his type, so nothing would happen.

As they navigate their days as friends, they start becoming more aware of each other...
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Yamayade

title: To the Dear F - Phantom of the Opera
alt_title: 深愛なるFへ～オペラ座の怪人～
description:
In the mysterious Paris of the 19th century, the Opera House is famous for its great plays and shows. 
However, no one imagines that behind that place where everyone lives magical moments, hides a ghost so terrifying that the fifth box of the theater is forbidden to all the cast. "F", a ghost whom everyone fears, lives surrounded by rumors about his existence. However... not everyone believes in it. Christina Dae, a chorus girl with a voice like no other, refuses to consider that such a thing could exist, even though a part of her thinks that not everything said about "F" is real. Therefore, Christina is not afraid to go to practice and walk where no one else does. What if those rumors about that mysterious ghost were real?
genre: Historical, Romance, Drama, Adaptation, Music
author: Nanao Mio

title: Take Moon
alt_title: Carnival Phantasm, テイクムーン
description: A TYPE-MOON staff member artist Takenashi Eri has created many side stories to most of the group's projects; 'Tsukihime' & 'Kagetsu Tohya', 'MELTY BLOOD', 'Fate/stay night' – you'll find your favorite characters in various hilarious situations that weren't covered by any of the original products.
genre: Comedy, Adventure, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: TYPE-MOON

title: Daifuku-chan to Ouji-sama
alt_title: 大福ちゃんと王子さま, Shared House Kitten Blue
description: For the first time, 19-year-old Setoya Kinari is striking out on her own, swapping life in the countryside for the bright city lights of Tokyo before her first semester of college begins. She has a few goals for her new life. Among them is goal one: move into the rowdy but lovable Kitten Blue Boarding House. Goal two: find a new love in Tokyo. But this boarding house has one problem—an extremely hot resident named Towa who totally mistakes her for a stalker. Yikes
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Chiba Kozue

title: Odoru Sennen Kazoku
alt_title: 踊る千年家族
description: Seven siblings born in England are characterized by immortality. The underworld, a corrupt hospital, and an international military organization target them as they fulfill mankind's dream! ! For the first time in hundreds of years, a family begins to live together, dancing with fate even if they live for a thousand years...!
genre: Action, Comedy, Supernatural
author: Kasugai Sho

title: Tabetemo Oishiku Arimasen
alt_title: 食べてもおいしくありません, 你要吃了我吗、可是我并不美味
description: A world where demons prevail and humans are rare. Hiyori, a human, is considered to be delicious to demons. However, his classmate, Hodaka, a pushy big-horned demon, found out his secret. On top of that, he kissed and tasted him…Charming a demon—a troublesome situation?! Surrendering to one's instinct and pleasure leads to…
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Yamada Nichoume

title: Daily Life In TS School
alt_title: TS学園の日常
description: At a boy's school where there are multiple students with OTMS constitutions that temporarily become female due to various reasons, commonly known as TS Gakuen, a childhood friend who was attending school together suddenly becomes a beautiful girl who feels embarrassed and serious There are a lot of special everyday scenes and exciting school life such as the discipline committee member who cannot accept his own female constitution and the students who are positively dressed in female uniforms and enjoy the cuteness!
genre: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kaneko Naoya

title: Panzer Princess Punie
alt_title: Panzer Princess Punie, 大魔法峠
description: Punie is next in line to become queen of Magical Land. However, she must spend a year on Earth before she can inherit the throne, so she transfers into a school in Japan. She's usually a sweet and gentle girl... that is unless someone does something to displease her, then she'll drop the act. She won't hesitate to whip out her magic stick and cheerfully rain bloody destruction down on the hapless fool, or barring that, simply use brutal wrestling moves to punish them. Accompanied by her animal mascot Paya-tan, who makes regular attempts on her life (still bitter about being defeated and then forcibly recruited from Waku Waku Mascot Village), and forced to fend off random attacks by various people from her Kingdom who all have different reasons for wanting her dead, she must complete this year of training on Earth without fail.
genre: Comedy
author: Owada Hideki

title: Reincarnation of the Sword Master
alt_title: 소드마스터의 환생
description:
At the threshold of life, a radiant white aura emerges. And… death! 

Yet, in a twist of fate, the man is once again granted a new life. With a newfound purpose, he sets out to complete his existence as an unfinished “Swordmaster” from his previous life.
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Drawways (Bongsoo)

title: Childhood Friend Complex
alt_title: 소꿉친구 컴플렉스, Sokkupchingu Complex, Complejo De Amigos De La Infancia
description: Haneul and Mincheol are childhood friends who have been together for 20 years and have been together for 20 years. A childhood friend's secret you don't want to know...
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 은하이 (Eunhi)

title: My Sect's Senior Disciple Has a Hole in His Brain
alt_title: There's a Pit in My Senior's Brain, There's Something Wrong with My Da Shixiong's Brain, 我家大师兄脑子有坑
description:
The hilarious adventures of the eldest disciple of a sect who has a problem with his brain. Dong Fang Xian Yun was reincarnated as the most senior disciple of the Carefree sect. But the only thing that goes through his mind is to make sure he doesn't end up dying by the hands of the "main character". Read as he makes no sense to his fellow disciples while avoiding flags left and right.  
  
*Note : Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing, some of chapter combining into one.*
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Ling Yumo

title: Ascendance of a Bookworm Official Comic Anthology
alt_title: 本好きの下剋上~司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません~ 公式コミックアンソロジー
genre: Reincarnation, Loli, Comedy, Anthology, Survival, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Shota, Slice of Life
author: Hayashine

title: The Gale Kisses the Moonlight
alt_title: 疾风吻月光
description:
One is a dazzling star who dreams of shining in the world of showbiz. Another is a new designer who has the reputation of being “delicate as a flower” due to her simple beauty.

She sees your thirst for success and yearning for authenticity behind your angelic facade. She approaches, like a gale that kisses a rose, and moves away, like a moonbeam. They get involved, they let go, they take the seduction game to the limit. She becomes the rose that blooms in her blood, and reaches the height of glory with her.

Tang Wanting: “I will pluck the moon for you with my hands.”
Shang Yi: “You are my moon.”
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ji Tong Culture (季桐文化)

title: 2 Saisa no Osananajimi
alt_title: ２歳差の幼なじみ, A Two-Year Age Gap Between Childhood Friends, Childhood Friends With A 2-Year Age Difference, Childhood Friends With a Two-Year Age Difference
description:
Feelings that have remain unchanged from back then...

Please be aware of me soon!

When did he become so cool……! No, no, there's no way!

I thought he was just a normal cute "little brother"-like childhood friend, but
6 years later he……
genre: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Itonoko (イトノコ)

title: How a Time-Limited Villainess Gets Revenge
alt_title: 시한부 악녀가 복수하는 방법, How Can a Time-Limited Evil Gain Her Vengeance?, The Villainess's Road to Revenge, Como se venga la villana en tiempo limitado
description:
"I just wanted to be loved." 

To support the family after her father's untimely death, Milvia sacrifices her life force to make gold using the forbidden practice of alchemy. But after being accused of trying to kill her step-sister, Relliana, she is sentenced to death. 

Just before taking her last breath, Milvia realizes she's been betrayed by her own family and is mysteriously given a second chance at life. 

Now, with the help of a knight named Deus, she's determined to get revenge, but things are not as simple as they seem...
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Myo Myo-hee (묘묘희)

title: Yowa Yowa Sensei
alt_title: よわよわ先生, Weak-kneed Teacher, Учитель Ёваёва
description: It's the start of a new school year. The new homeroom teacher for Abikura-kun, a second-year high school boy, is Hiyori Hiwamura, who is known as a "Scary Teacher", rumored to curse you if she gets offended! One day after school, Abikura-kun witnessed the other side of "YowaYowa-sensei"... and he is shocked by the gap between reputation and reality! The opening of a romantic comedy that will stir up your protective instincts!!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Fukuchi Kamio

title: How to Satisfy the Devil
alt_title: Ways to Satisfy a Devil, 악마를 배불리는 법, Como Satisfacer Al Demonio
description: Did our runt Vanessa Blake encounter another god because yours abandoned you? May we, the lord of evil Belzebuth, tell you something interesting? Most humans seek your god when they end up meeting us. They seem to think their lord will save them and seeing their desperation never fails to make us laugh. That is because their god is just our other half. You may see your many reincarnations as a sign of your god’s disdain, but we feel you are beloved. Thus, we shall give you whatever you desire.
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Demons, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Yusoi

title: Machi and Oboro
alt_title: おぼろとまち
description: From Miyagi to the bustling life of a Tokyo high school, Machi Nishina wanted anything but the ordinary. Her wish is granted in the most unexpected way when she encounters Oboro Kasumi, a classmate harboring a secret, who ends up following her home...?! A new era of friendship and youthful comedy unfolds!
genre: Ninja, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic
author: Ishito Yuura

title: Isekai Samurai
alt_title: 異世界サムライ, Samurai in Another World
description:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!
genre: Action, Comedy, Samurai, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy
author: Saitou Keigo

title: Taming the Emperor's Hound
alt_title: 백작가 영애가 황제의 번견을 길들이는 방법, How the Count's Young Lady Tames the Emperor's Dog, 伯爵小姐馴服國王看門狗的方法, 伯爵小姐驯服国王看门狗的方法, 伯爵令嬢が皇帝の番犬を手懐ける方法, How the Countess Tames the Emperor's Guard Dog, Baekjakga Yeongaega Hwangjeui Beongyeoneul Gildeurineun Bangbeop, Cómo la joven condesa doma gentilmente al perro del emperador
description:
Esmeralda, the Count's daughter, is forced to enter into a political marriage by her father. But she asks Alphonse, whom she first met at a ball, to date her, as she wants to find her own destiny. Alphonse's identity turns out to be the Emperor's 'watchdog', who settles cases in the underground society for the Empire. It was Alphonse who started this relationship only to use Esmeralda for his mission, but his heart is gradually drawn to her, rushing without hesitation. Meanwhile, Esmeralda who has been working hard and dating hard gets caught up in the middle of Black German-Iris's conspiracy...

TW: Borderline toxic relationship in the beginning of the series. Please read with caution.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/4446000746)

**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/95283)
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: JYUN

title: Flame Peacemaker
alt_title: 화염의 피스메이커
description:
전설 속 용의 던전에서 살아 돌아온
괴짜 탐험가 “에드몽 단테스”… 그로부터 전파된
마법제련술은 세상을 크게 바꾸어 놓았다.

그러나 그와 더불어 정체를 알 수 없는 
기이한 마석들과 영문 모를 던전들이 생겨나며...
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Mozza

title: Paranoia Cage
alt_title: ぱらのいあけ〜じ
description: Mizuki a female ero-mangaka with the aid of her staff, contemplate daily life and the best methods to develop good porn comics. However, this is often a difficult task as she herself has no sexual experiences beyond her own obsessive fantasies.
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Cool-kyou Shinja

title: Isekai Ryouridou
alt_title: Cooking with Wild Game, Готовка в другом мире, 異世界料理道
description: Main protagonist is Tsurumi Asuta. 17 yrs old, 2nd year high schooler. He was working as an apprentice cook at Tsurumi-ya, managed by his father. One day a fire broke out in Tsurumi-ya, for the sake of his father's cherished knife 'Santoku Houchou' he ran back inside to retrieve it and thus met his end. Before he knew it he awoke to an unknown environment. He was then attacked by a beast resembling a boar but a girl named Aifa, from the People of Morihen, saved him. It was then that he realized he was really in different world.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Eda

title: Ore wa Subete o “Parry” Suru ~Gyaku Kanchigai no Sekai Saikyou wa Boukensha ni Naritai~
alt_title: 俺は全てを【パリイ】する　～逆勘違いの世界最強は冒険者の夢をみる～, I Parry Everything: What Do You Mean I’m the Strongest? I’m Not Even an Adventurer Yet!, I Parry All ~With A Reverse Misunderstanding, The World's Strongest Dreams Of Being An Adventurer~
description:
Ever since he was a young boy, Noor has wanted to be like the adventurers in his father’s stories — dragonslayers, cursebreakers, heroes who always save the day. But as everyone knows, to be an adventurer, you’ve gotta have the right skills! 

Unfortunately for Noor, his [Parry] is bottom-of-the-barrel useless, his prospects are nonexistent, and everybody he knows is telling him to throw in the towel. Faced with this harsh reality, he figures there’s only one thing to do: make up for it with effort! An intense, solitary training regimen ought to do it. If one year won’t cut it, he’ll train for five! If not five, ten! 

Now facing the tail end of his twenties with no new skills to show for his labors, Noor sets out to become an adventurer anyway, determined to try one last time to make his dream come true. He might be clueless when it comes to adventuring, but he’s no stranger to hard work! 

Now, if only he can figure out why everyone keeps looking at him like that...
 
---
 
Original Web Novel: <https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6537fu/>
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Nabeshiki

title: Rain Advisory
alt_title: 단비주의보
description:
“What?! I'm supposed to be the guardian of this tentacle monster?"
In a research facility specializing in monster biology, Monster Veterinarian Doha finds himself under a slimy assault from a pubescent tentacle monster.

During this encounter, the tentacle monster comes to recognize Doha as its 'maternal figure,' and he ends up becoming its guardian for a year, taking on the responsibility of its training.

However, controlling this tentacle monster, which has an insatiable sexual appetite, proves to be nearly impossible on his own. Eventually, for safety reasons, he is introduced to Kyunghwan, the son of the research facility's director, as his partner.

"Dr. Yoo, if it's okay with you… May I assist with the training?"
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: dodGe

title: A Princess Who Reads Fortune
alt_title: 점괘보는 공녀님, A Fortune-Telling Princess, Fortune Telling Princess, Fortune-Telling Lady
description:
Top actress Lee Sia has the ability to see ghosts.
After an accident, she wakes up in the body of 'Camilla Sorfelle'.

But here's the problem.

"Oh, Father, help me!"

This woman's fate always ends in death!

I need to extend my life, so might as well talk to the ghosts first.

Ugh, but why do I keep getting involved with people I want to avoid!?
genre: Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Saidin

title: Mietemasu yo! Aizawa-san
alt_title: I See You, Aizawa-san!, 見えてますよ！　愛沢さん, ¡Te veo, Aizawa-san!
description:
Michi, plagued forever by her ability to see ghosts, pretends like she can't in order to avoid them at all costs. But recently she found a ghost she just can't ignore: Aizawa Honami, ex-classmate and ex-member of the famous idol group De:LPhinus, hanging around school from some lingering attachment.

Still, no matter what ghost it is, Michi's not getting involved. Though while she steels her heart, her eyes keep coming back to Honami's bizarre antics and passionate fanservice...(?)
genre: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Horror, Supernatural
author: Odoroo Dorothy

title: Possessed by Mary-san
alt_title: メリーさん
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Yabunoki

title: Left Handed Mutation
alt_title: 我的左手能异变
description: Human genes mutate, those with extraordinary genes may gain superpowers, and those with monster genes may mutate into monsters. Xingcun, who became a monster, was awakened and later reborn after the sacrifice of the heroine. In this life, the prodigal son shall use the mutation to fight back and protect the heroine. While he may lay hidden among the supermen, and he shall secretly use his mutation to hunt monsters, seize the power of the ancient demon god, and prevent his resurrection.
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Superhero, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 莒小暗

title: Warrior Grandpa and Supreme Granddaughter
alt_title: Grandfather Warrior and Supreme Granddaughter, Grandpa Samurai and Granddaughter of the Supreme, 할배무사와 지존 손녀, Halbaemusawa Jijon Sonnyeo
description: Just when Liu Jinshan thought he could die without regrets, his family was annihilated! As a result, he became determined to live just so that he could see his only surviving granddaughter, Liu Seol, reach adulthood. As he struggled to raise her and train her with his aging body, Liu Seol, who was born with the talent of a supreme martial artist, grew up much faster than he thought she would. "Don't worry, Grandpa, I'll protect you from now on!"
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Shin Ui-Cheol

title: Mermaid Melody Pichi Pichi Pitch: Aqua
alt_title: マーメイドメロディー ぴちぴちピッチ aqua
description: Lukia Nanami is turning seventeen. Her family has just moved to a town by the sea, and on her first walk down to the beach, she saves a handsome surfer from drowning. The next day, she’s shocked to discover he’s not only a classmate at her new school, but has no idea who she is, and insists he was saved by a mermaid! A new chapter in the saga of *Mermaid Melody Pichi Pichi Pitch*, from original artist Pink Hanamori! [Kodansha]
genre: Magical Girls, Drama, Monster Girls
author: Hanamori Pink

title: Savage Castle
alt_title: 새비지 캐슬, Castillo Salvaje
description: Due to his uncle's conspiracy, the king leaves the throne and hides in a desolate land. The story unfolds with the king and a pitiful yet beautiful noble lady, who has made him her slave, entangled in obsession and affection.
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color
author: byeol bora

title: Futago Saien
alt_title: 双子菜園, Vegetable Garden of Twins
description: Yuuya starts his dream of living alone. Then Sera, a famous beautiful girl at school and his self-proclaimed ex-girlfriend, and her younger sister Rise rush in. In order for the three of them to be self-sufficient, an exciting life together begins where they grow vegetables in their home garden and eat delicious food!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yumeno Tanuki

title: Enrolling in the Transcendent Academy
alt_title: 초월자 학원의 수강생이 되었다, Я стал студентом Трансцендентальной Академии, I Became a Student at the Transcension Academy, I Became a Student at Transcendental Academy, Transcension Academy, Academia de la Ascension
description:
After a hundred years of monsters, it’s become the norm to train at hunter academies if you want to become a professional monster hunter. And that’s just what hard-working orphan Seojun Kim dreams of.

But after a freak accident dashes his hopes, ads for the mysterious Transcendent Academy pop up on his phone, offering him a chance to train virtually with history’s most legendary warriors. As he levels up, he’s soon caught up in the world of hunter academies, dungeon raids, and competitive tournaments.

But the more he learns, the more questions he has about the people surrounding him, his past, and the secrets of the Transcendent Academy.
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dupachitapa (두파치타파)

title: Tomodachi Nano ni Kiss o Shita
alt_title: 友達なのにキスをした, We Kissed Even Though We Are Just Friends
description: Aoi and Keita, who attend the same high school, live next door to each other and have been childhood friends ever since Keita moved in when they were in middle school. Even though they're just friends who always goof around together, Aoi suddenly notices that Keita has been looking cool lately...
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Full Color
author: Murakami Michiko

title: The Villainess Captured the Grand Duke
alt_title: 악녀는 대공을 사로잡았다, Capturé el corazón del gran duque siendo una villana
description:
In this novel, my favorite character died.
After being rejected by the female lead and losing his emotions, he could no longer use his abilities,
and as he became weak, the North collapsed.
Even his body was never to be found,
but the novel only depicted the happy ending of the protagonists.

And I possessed the body of the villainess "Schuer" from that novel.

"Rather, I'll make him regain his emotions before he meets the female lead."

Thus, I left for the North.

"Grand Duke, can you hold my hand just once?
Or maybe a signature. I'll keep it as a heirloom."
"If you want my signature, you too should sign and stamp here, my Lady."
"What's this?"
"A marriage certificate."

Huh?

"You can just act you usually do.
It seems like your behavior is
is somewhat getting on my nerves."

...Did I win the jackpot?
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Bbiab

title: Ebichu Minds the House
alt_title: Ebichu, おるちゅばんエビちゅ
description: A very unique, funny manga that follows the exploits of Ebichu, a talking female hamster with a dirty mind. This manga includes sexual dialogue, some nudity, and the occasional sex scene. There's also some violence against hamsters. It's all pretty lighthearted, but if any of this stuff offends you, don't read it.
genre: Animals, Comedy, Sexual Violence, 4-Koma
author: Itou Risa

title: Hazure Skill "Soine" ga Kakuseishi, Boku ga Saikyou Harem wo Kizuku Made ~Micchaku Soine de Ganbou Kaihou!? Yuuwakusare Makutte Komattemasu!!~
alt_title: ハズレスキル『添い寝』が覚醒し、僕が最強ハーレムを築くまで～密着添い寝で願望解放!? 誘惑されまくって困ってます!!～, Until My Loser Skill [Sleeping Together] Is Awakened and I Build the Strongest Harem ~ Unleash Your Desires by Sleeping Close to Each Other!? I’m Getting Tempted So Much and I’m in Trouble!!~
description:
Regnard defies expectations by enrolling in the esteemed Royal Academy of Lasarzia despite being a dropout. 

However, during the Blessing Ceremony, he receives a peculiar skill called "Blessing of Sleeping Together," leading to ridicule from classmates. 

Despite the mockery, Regnard discovers the true potential of this skill when he spends the night with Frost, an honor student.

 This revelation leads to unexpected adventures and a harem fantasy, as Regnard navigates the challenges of his newfound abilities and hidden desires.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Fantasy
author: Marusei

title: Emperor's Sword
alt_title: 황제의 검 (류신)
description:
Zhu Yunwen, who barely survived the Jingnan campaign, received the souls of two of the world's strongest martial artists, the First Heavenly Demon of the Demonic Cult and Huineng, the Sixth Patriarch of the Shaolin Temple, in his body, and was reborn as Heaven Destroyer.

This is the story of the Heaven Destroyer's journey to become an absolute existence!
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: RDH

title: The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Gamer
alt_title: 백작가 막내아들은 플레이어, The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Player
description: Dohyeon is a top-ranking gamer in Connect, an immersive VR game that is overrun by corrupt guilds. After being murdered for discovering a mythical item, he wakes up as Lord Raul Ashton, an NPC in a closed beta version of Connect. Now the sole player in this realm, he decides to use his knowledge from his past life to prevent the downfall of House Ashton and unlock unprecedented powers. For Dohyeon, Connect is no longer just a game—it’s now his reality. Join him as he embarks on a thrilling quest to reshape his fate!
genre: Long Strip, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Konsonan

title: Succeed
alt_title: サクシード
description:
The state of progress is where one must look to the past in order to protect the future…but what must be done for the present? 
From legendary WSJ mangaka Osamu Akimoto comes a one-shot where memories are the key to understanding everything: 
past, present and future…
genre: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Drama, Mystery
author: Akimoto Osamu

title: Tokuni Maketemo Kamawanai
alt_title: Especially if the Match Will Be Held Here, 特に負けても構わない戦いがそこにはある
description:
From Suimasen Scanlations:  
  
Milan’s father is a soccer manager. On his deathbed, he entrusts her with the team, FC Sudden Death. Once a great power in J1, they’ve found themselves kicked out of the league and on the skids. Will Milan be able to turn the team around, or will she fall victim to the numerous pranks the team members play on each other?
genre: Oneshot, Comedy, Sports
author: Kumeta Kouji

title: Curse Cultivation
alt_title: 靠诅咒修仙的我有点不对劲
description:
You don’t belong to this world, and yet you wish to step onto the path of cultivation. Targeted by the Heavens, they cast a curse on you, one unbreakable even by immortals. All changes in your body will be reversed, and you will no longer be able to cultivate again.

Jiang Chen tries to cultivate, but realises that his spiritual energy flows backwards, and scatters in all directions.

When he was in despair, he was struck by lightning.

[You’ve been struck by lightning, your flesh and blood is eroded and your dantian is shattered. The curse takes effect, and regenerates your body, granting you the power of vitality.]

[Your dantian regenerates, and become invincible.]

[The lost spiritual energy gathers in the body automatically, and flows through the meridians. You’ve stepped into the Qi Refinement stage first layer… second layer… third layer!]

Jiang Chen fell into silence, “???”

I have to cultivate like this?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Candle Sky Animation (烛天动漫)

title: Fushigi Yuugi - Byakko Senki
alt_title: ふしぎ遊戯 白虎仙記
description:
From Nyan-Nyan Rampage:  
  
"The final arc of the story begins…  
  
When Takao Osugi receives the mysterious "Universe of the Four Gods" book from his mentor, Einosuke Okuda, he does everything to keep it away from his young daughter, Suzuno. But when disaster strikes Tokyo, can he still protect her from her fate?  
  
Shortly after the tragic finale of Genbu Kaiden, young Suzuno Osugi's tale as the Priestess of Byakko beings to unfold!"
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Watase Yuu

title: Kokoro no Koe ga Moreyasui Maid-san (Serialization)
alt_title: 心の声が漏れやすいメイドさん, The Maid whose Inner Thoughts Leak Out Easily, 容易漏出心聲的女僕小姐到我家來了
description:
Being honest is good. Probably.

With Shuuji’s parents overseas on business, a maid has come to his house. She’s cute but she can’t keep a secret?! With her expressionless gaze, she thoughtlessly says the craziest things…! Living with this maid whose true thoughts are laid bare, a second year high school boy is thoroughly made fun of!
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Ginmoku

title: Carneades
alt_title: カルネアデス
genre: Action, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ayasato Keishi

title: Blue Giant Supreme
alt_title: 블루 자이언트 슈프림
description:
After leaving his mark on Japan, Dai is taking on Europe!

Direct continuation of Blue Giant, a manga about the evolution of the young saxophonist Dai Miyamoto in the jazz world. Blue Giant Supreme sees our protagonist travel to Europe. Having just arrived in Munich, without being able to speak a word of German and with just average English, he manages to secure a roof over his head, food and drink, but struggles to get the most important thing: a place where he can have his music heard.
 
A whole new element added on top of the enthralling story that enchants every music lover: the discovery of a new culture. Dai will travel all over Europe, from Germany to France, accompanied by his instrument, growing as a musician and a person in the process of fulfilling his dream of becoming the best in the world.


[Official Site](https://bluegiant.jp/)
genre: Drama, Slice of Life, Music
author: Ishizuka Shinichi

title: Solo Leveling: Arise
alt_title: 나 혼자만 레벨업: 어라이즈, Only I Level Up: Arise
description: Webtoon series based on the game "Solo Leveling: Arise", this spin-off is set around the original series and is focused on various characters.
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Chugong (추공)

title: RaiRaiRaise
alt_title: 雷々来世
description: High school student Nanase has a dream that he keeps seeing. That dream contained memories of his past life and there, Nanase was a knight who faithfully served his precious master. Nanase doubts whether those memories are real, but one day, Leo—his master—transfers into his class as Reo. Reo also has memories of his past life and is simply happy to reunite with Nanase. However, he forgot the most important thing. To Nanase, he is the last person he wants to see—
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Nojiro Guri

title: Touhou Suzunaan ~ Forbidden Scrollery.
alt_title: Eastern Bell Hermitage ~ Forbidden Scrollery., 東方鈴奈庵　～ Forbidden Scrollery.
description: Touhou official comic published by Kadokawa in Comp Ace that began publishing on October 26, 2012. The story is written by ZUN, with illustrations by Moe Harukawa. It introduces a human book renter and collector Kosuzu Motoori as the main character, with the story centered around her mysterious ability to decipher any book no matter the language or script, and her assortment of various rare and dangerous demon books.
genre: Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: ZUN

title: Please Pretend to Cultivate For a While
alt_title: 你假装修炼一下吧，球球了
description:
Reborn 99 times, Ye Fan was betrayed and killed by the system for various reasons each time. This lifetime, he just wants to live a happy life and let cultivation go to hell! With tears in its eyes, the system helps Ye Fan check in. The top-grade spiritual pet almost ended up on Ye Fan’s dinner table, and the top-grade cultivation techniques were used as table legs by Ye Fan.
System: Host, can’t you just pretend to cultivate for a while?
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 17K漫画

title: Zatsuon
alt_title: 雑音, 電幻, The Noise, Virtual Illusion
description:
A collection of oneshots.

• Braces Kiss
• Mismatched
• Virtual Illusion: In order to preserve our love forever, we made a decision together... We believed that this was the best choice for the two of us.
• Spring Slumber
• The Noise
• Someone Else
• Puppy Love
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Anthology, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Syundei

title: Kaifuku Jutsushi no Yarinaoshi
alt_title: El Reinicio Como Sanador ~La Magia de Muerte Instantánea Con La Habilidad de Copiar La Curación Trascendental~, Redo of Healer, 回復術士のやり直し～即死魔法とスキルコピーの超越ヒール～, Redo OF healer, 回復術士のやり直し
description:
"Healing magicians cannot fight alone."   
Keyaru, who was bound by this common knowledge, was exploited again and again by others.  
But one day, he noticed what lay beyond healing magic, and was convinced that a healing magician was the strongest class. However, by the time he realized that potential, he was deprived of everything. Thus, he used healing magic on the world itself to go back four years, deciding to redo everything.  
This is a heroic tale of one healing magician who became the strongest by using knowledge from his past life and healing magic.
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Loli, Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Tsukiyo Rui

title: My Classmates Are All Very Strange
alt_title: 我的同学都很奇怪, My Strange Classmates
description:
Liao Yuqing, who’s just an ordinary female high schooler, somehow bumps into a Prince Charming-like* student on her way to school?! At the same time, the highly anticipated foreign mad dog, pretty boy student, Ryan, finally meets the frightening Demon King—Chu Feng. Surrounded by these four people, an ordinary teenage girl and her eccentric schoolmates begin living an unordinary daily life.  
  
T/N: "Prince Charming" literally translates to "White Horse Prince" in Chinese.
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Lu Yixin (路一心)

title: Dragon Ball Super (Official Colored)
alt_title: Dragon Ball Super - Digital Colored Comics, ドラゴンボール超 カラー版, 드래곤볼 슈퍼, ドラゴンボール超, Dragon Ball Chou, DBS
description: Having defeated Boo, Goku is starting to get bored with his life on Earth. His wife, Chi-chi, wants him to get a job, but all he wants to do is train and fight stronger enemies. Elsewhere in the universe, the God of Destruction, Beerus, and his attendant Whis are traveling from planet to planet in search of food and entertainment. After blowing up some hapless victims, Beerus is reminded of a man from his dreams with the moniker “Super Saiyan God,” or something like that... The God of Destruction sets his sights on Earth to track down this mysterious man! Maybe this will give Goku something to do?
genre: Official Colored, Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Toriyama Akira

title: Piercing (INOUE Takehiko)
alt_title: ピアス (井上雄彦)
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Inoue Takehiko

title: Paripi Koumei
alt_title: パリピ孔明, Ya Boy Kongming!, 派对咖孔明, 派對咖孔明, 派对浪客诸葛孔明, 파티피플 공명, Тусовщик Кунмин
description: General of the Three Kingdoms, Kongming had struggled his whole life, facing countless battles that made him into the accomplished strategist he was. So on his deathbed, he wished only to be reborn into a peaceful world...and was sent straight to modern-day party-central, Tokyo! Can even a brilliant strategist like Kongming adapt to the wild beats and even wilder party people?!
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Music
author: Yotsuba Yuuto

title: Mone-san no Majime Sugiru Tsukiaikata
alt_title: Mone-san's Overly Serious Way of Dating, モネさんのマジメすぎるつき合い方, 萌音同学太过认真的交往方式, 모네 양의 완전 진지한 사귀는 법
description: An alluring and popular honor student who goes by the name of Mone. Steadfast and diligent, she only has one foreseeable flaw; her philosophy on love is utterly trash! But both her mind and her heart might be swayed sooner than she thinks in this school love manga.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life
author: Gotou Masaki

title: Falling Into the Deep End
alt_title: Suddenly I Have a Husband and Children, 갑자기 남편과 자식이 생겨버렸습니다, 目覚めたら愛する夫と離婚協議中でした, Caí en el fondo del abismo
description: It’s love at first sight when Estella, princess of the kingdom, meets Isaac, the margrave’s heir. She pines and pines after him only to learn that he’s already engaged! Devastated by the wedding, she hears a voice calling to her, when she suddenly falls into a pond and loses consciousness. She wakes to find out seven years have passed and she’s… married to Isaac?! Now, she has a collapsing marriage, two children, and a host of strange decisions to unravel and figure out why she ended up here!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Full Color
author: Sinyangi (신양이)

title: Eye Exam Delusion Spiral
alt_title: ケンガンモウソウスパイラル
description: A boy and a girl who are taking their eye exams at the same eye center get a little too caught up in their wild delusions.
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Medical, Slice of Life
author: Arai Mamare

title: Haraiso Days
alt_title: 酒処 春來荘日乗
description: Fifteen years have passed since the end of the Great War. Thriving at the bottom of the Imperial City of Flowers is the bar Haraiso, run by an idiosyncratic owner, Miss Haru. Various customers visit the restaurant every night, attracted by the delicious sake and snacks...
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Maruoka Kuzo

title: Looking for My One-Night Villainess
alt_title: 첫날밤을 보낸 그 악녀를 찾습니다, Looking for The Villainess Who Took My First Night, Looking for the Villainess Whom I Spent My First Time With, 寻找度过初夜的恶女, Buscando a mi villana de una noche
description:
Since becoming the villainess 'Liberata' in the novel 'Leoni's Turbulent Life,' I have faced execution on the gallows twenty times!
Tired of the repetitive regression, I just got drunk with a mind of "Whatever happens, happens."
But why is the Grand Duke lying next to me?

"Don't worry, I won't let you die."
But...
"If you don't put everything back in its place in your 20th life, this world will be destroyed."
The fortune-teller leaves an ominous prophecy that can't be understood.
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Eunla Gyeom

title: Orange Flavor
description: Orange Flavor is a comedy comics anthology written and drawn by Micah Rockandroll. A mix of short stories, comedy features, and one-page gags—It’s Cartoon Network meets Dan Clowes’s Eightball.
genre: Comedy, Anthology, Self-Published, Video Games, Delinquents
author: Micah Rockandroll

title: Double Helix Blossom
alt_title: ダブルヘリクス ブロッサム
description: The manga is set in the near future, and begins with the awakening of police officer Kiku Shinonome, who was put into cryogenic stasis for 60 years to stave off what would have been a fatal wound. In a new world unfamiliar to her, she is forced to team up with Kyo Tsukisagari, a criminal with a big rap sheet but equipped with psychic powers. Together, they solve paranormal incidents, even while their personalities butt up against each other.
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Crime, Fantasy, Police, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Asaura

title: Witch Hat Atelier
alt_title: Ателье колдовских колпаков, 尖帽子的魔法工房, 고깔모자의 아틀리에, とんがり帽子のアトリエ, Atelier of Witch Hat
description:
In a world where everyone takes wonders like magic spells and dragons for granted, Coco is a girl with a simple dream: she wants to be a wizard. 
But everybody knows magicians are born, not made, and she was not born with a gift for magic. 
Resigned to her un-magical life, Coco is about to give up on her dream until the day she meets Qifrey, a mysterious traveling magician. After secretly watching him perform magic in a way she’s never seen before, Coco soon learns what everybody “knows” might not be the truth and discovers that her magical dream may not be as far away as it seems…
  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award for Best U.S. Edition of International Material-Asia.  
- Winner of the Best Manga award at the 2020 Harvey Awards.  


---

title: Kiss You Every Day
alt_title: 하루에 한 번씩 뽀뽀해 줘, キスで育てる私の王子様, 每天亲吻一次, Bésame Una Vez Al Día
description: Ji Na, the beautiful game anchor, challenges to dig treasure at the bottom of the lake late at night. She didn’t manage to dig treasure but she dug a young and cute vampire. As soon as the young and cute vampire, Li Chen kissed Ji Na, he turned into a handsome man, and his combat power exploded! He can repel monsters, and also do magic romantic fireworks. If the female lead, Ji Na does not kiss him, he will become a little cute boy and be bullied by others … With questions and curiosity, Ji Na and he began a “shameless” cohabitation life. Sure enough, soon the hunter came looking for them …
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Supernatural, Full Color
author: You Lu Wen Hua

title: Angelica: My Wife Has Changed
alt_title: 안젤리카 : 우리 아내가 달라졌어요, 우리 아내가 달라졌어요!, Ángelica: Mi esposa ha cambiado
description: After years of unrequited love, Angelica finally marries Lord Dominic, but he remains cold and distant. To make matters worse, Angelica’s uncle selfishly betrays the family. As endless debt and sorrow pain the poor girl, she tragically decides to end it all... Yet, she somehow wakes up in the past, returning to the day she proposed to Dominic. Was it all a dream? One thing is clear—Angelica won’t commit the same mistakes again. “I don’t love you anymore, Dominic. Let’s break off the engagement!”
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Macherie

title: To My Kind and Evil Relationship
alt_title: 다정하신 나의 악연에게, A mi dulce némesis
description: Selena y Millard, miembros de una familia de enemigos y amantes desde hace mucho tiempo. Después del incidente de la noche anterior a la ceremonia de graduación de la academia, pensaron que nunca se volverían a ver, pero se les ordena casarse para resolver la repentina aparición de “personas no muertas”. Selena decide utilizar a Millard para su propio beneficio, pero se enamora del infinitamente amable Millard…

author: Lee Inhye

title: Resetting Lady
alt_title: 리셋팅 레이디, The Resetting Lady, Reset Lady, The Crimson Lady
description:
I entered the world of a novel suddenly. I thought that I could return to reality by falling in love, but death was what awaited me in the end. Defenestration, strangulation, poisoning, drowning, and burning to death... Even after dying a hundred times and returning, the novel still doesn't end...

Karen Haier, who greets her 117th birthday trapped within a novel, now decides to become a murderer.
genre: Thriller, Historical, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Crime, Survival, Gore, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Baekwoo

title: The Duke's Villainous Daughter Is Depressed
alt_title: 사악한 공작 영애의 우울, The Melancholy of the Wicked Duke's Lady, The Melancholy of the Evil Duke's Young Lady
description: Irene Song had transmigrated inside a novel and became the villainous daughter of a duke. However, the duke, who was unaware of this fact, simply thought she had amnesia and sends her off to marry the second prince of Rennes Empire. Little did she know that the second prince was cursed by an evil wizard and turned him into a dog during the day and could only turn back to a human at night. What’s worse, she even named it “Tofu” after she found it wandering in the Imperial Palace. Who would have known it was her own husband!

alt_title: 从哥布林到哥布林神, Goblin's Life Simulator
description: Lin Tian reincarnated as a goblin, the lowest rank of magical creatures, and initially, he had to lie low. Later, he fully unleashed the true nature of a goblin. Blessed with many offspring, the more children he has, the stronger he becomes thanks to the blessings from the gods!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Yuan Dian Ge Zi Manhua (原点格子漫画)
artist: Yuan Dian Ge Zi Manhua (原点格子漫画)

title: Maxed Strength Necromancer
alt_title: 力量点满？我可是亡灵法师啊！, Maxed Strength Stats Necromancer
description: Qiao Yu enters the world of the meta-Universe and gains the hidden class of a Necromancer. Unfortunately, his initial intelligence and spirit stats are both at 0, and he even draws a strangely unique talent. In a fit of anger, Qiao Yu puts all his attribute points into strength! Who says a Necromancer can’t engage in hand-to-hand combat? As Qiao Yu punches the World serpent, Yemojia, to death, players in the meta-Universe are driven mad. Bro, please, stop brawling! You’re a Necromancer! Just summon an undead, please!

title: The Heavenly Path Is Not Stupid
alt_title: 这个天道不昏庸, This Heavenly Law Is No Muddlehead
description:
Heaven and earth are benevolent towards everything…
Bullshit, I don’t agree with this! The former heavenly Dao was the villain, and the same heavenly Dao is full of slaughter and death! Watch me and how I straighten the yin and yang, reshape the cycle of reincarnation, and create a perfect world of cultivation. One in which all the rebels will….cough cough! In a nutshell, just watch and learn!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

His eldest disciple is the leader of the Nether Sect with thousands of minions, and his second disciple—Sword Devil—always slaughters others at the slightest disagreement…

alt_title: 勇者X女魔王
description: The demon queen was defeated by the dog I raised… I, who merely wanted to return to the countryside, was transmigrated into a foreign world. I managed to become a foundation level existence in a novice village. Even the demon queen, who dominated the world, was defeated by the dog I raised. From then on, the demon queen has lived in my house, and my adventures in aforeign world began.

title: Log into the Future
alt_title: 高武：登陆未来一万年, Martial Art: Future's Ten Thousand Years, Apex Future Martial Arts, Subiendo de nivel 10.000 años en el futuro, Logging 10,000 Years into the Future
description: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanity’s martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then there’s the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later… Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, he’s exactly that last spark of hope!
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

title: Fake Snow
alt_title: 페이크 스노우
description:
"Did I take away their lover?"

Seo Ino, an average man from South Korea, wakes up after losing consciousness to find himself in a strange place. He soon comes to the realization that he is inside the body of Cassius, the Vice Captain of the Royal Knights. The only person he can rely on is Cassius's fellow knight and former lover, Alberto Noe, who has always protected Cassius. But knowing that Alberto is all he has now, Cassius (Ino) makes a vow to protect him instead.
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Lee Minu

title: I Hold the Heart of a Tyrant
alt_title: 폭군의 심장을 쥐었다, I Grabbed the Tyrant's Heart, I Captured the Tyrant's Heart
description:
The Crown Prince’s only friend, me, Euseniel Heartland.

One day, our family was expelled from the capital for having had a bad influence on the Crown Prince. But after 14 years, we finally reunite, However,  he has changed drastically.

When asked why he changed, the Crown Prince answers that it is because he wanted to be the ideal man for me. But no, this is not the friend I used to know anymore, And it's not only his appearance what has changed, I'm sure there something else on the inside that's not the same as before. What could it be?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yoo se yu

title: Uramiya Honpo
alt_title: 怨み屋本舗, 怨恨屋本舖, Uramiya Honpo
description:
The world is filled with cruel scum, ranging from petty thieves to sociopath maniacs. When a vile low-life inflicts pain and suffering on innocent victims, sometimes their anger becomes overwhelming. Whether their damage stems from romance, finance, reputation or even a death, these victims feel trapped in their own skins and lives. 

Those victims who can't stand it anymore call for the mysterious woman Houjou Shiori, owner of Uramiya, the "Revenge Shop". 

The Uramiya specializes in executing revenge schemes. The vengeance their customers request on their bitterly resented enemies could range from financially destroying them, to smearing their social reputation, to even taking their lives. As long as you pay a fair price, the Uramiya will guarantee you get the revenge you deserve.
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Sexual Violence, Drama
author: Kurihara Shoushou

title: Konbini de Kimi to no 5-funkan
alt_title: コンビニで君との５分間, The 5 Minutes We Share At The Convenience Store.
description:
The Office Lady (OL-san), who looks forward to stopping by at the convenience store on the way home from work. And Shibasaki-kun, the poker-faced high school part-timer, who gets stirred up by OL-san for some reason. A heartwarming manga about two people who pass by each other at the convenience store!
___
Links:
 - [Official Square Enix page](https://magazine.jp.square-enix.com/yg/introduction/conveni/)
 - Author's Twitter: <https://twitter.com/nozo717>

title: Catulus Syndrome
alt_title: かとるすしんどろーむ, 猫娘症候群
description:
Catulus Syndrome - A strange illness which causes girls to develop catlike traits. Modern science has figured out two things about this illness:  
  
1. They're really cute!  
2. There's a high chance of other girls making their hearts flutter.
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Nekotarou

title: Mikane and The Sea Woman
alt_title: ぼくと海彼女
description: It's not like I don’t belong here… One year ago, a young boy named Mikane moved back to a small island in Kyushu. The locals are warm, his father is brusque yet kind, and he has a good friend who worries for him. Despite having so much, Mikane feels dissatisfied and lonely. Then, one day, he saves a mysterious, beautiful woman from the sea. His meeting with this “onee-san” will drastically change his destiny!!
genre: Romance, Drama, Monster Girls, Web Comic
author: Aoko Kizaki

title: Yonezawa-san Is Done Being Human
alt_title: Yonezawa-san Is Done Being Human
description: Haru Yonezawa is an outstanding office manager who is looked up to by all his teammates. On the surface, he is cool and collected, never getting his feathers ruffled by his grouchy boss. But the truth is he has a secret hobby that, if anyone found out about would destroy his elite image. Every night, after a long, stressful day at work, he unwinds by dressing up and roleplaying... as a dog. Looking for a new master to help meet his needs, he calls upon a call girl, who shows up and is none other than one of his subordinates from work!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Eisuke Kawata

title: Ghoul ga Sekai wo Sukutta Koto wo Watashi dake ga shitteiru
alt_title: グールが世界を救ったことを私だけが知っている, Only I Know the Ghoul Saved the World
description:
“I’m not a hero. I’m a monster that devours monsters.” In a chaotic world where ferocious monsters run rampant, there was a “monster” who inherited the title of “hero” in the holy city, the last bastion of humanity on the brink of extinction. Alice, a rookie adventurer, was attacked by a large pack of dog people (Kobolds) during her first ‘dungeon’ exploration. The one who saved her life was Leon, the third-generation “Savior” hero, who, despite having the body of a monster (Ghoul), possesses a human heart.

“I’m nothing but a defiled ghoul who keeps on killing monsters.”

“No, you’re the only hero who can save the world.”

For some reason, Alice, who admires him, applies to become Leon’s disciple.
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Katou Myoujin

title: Dame Skill [Auto Mode] ga Kakuseishimashita ~Are, Guild no Scout-san, Ore wo "Iranai"-tte Itte Masendeshita?~
alt_title: ダメスキル【自動機能】が覚醒しました～あれ、ギルドのスカウトの皆さん、俺を「いらない」って言ってませんでした？～, The Useless Skill [Auto Mode] Has Been Awakened: Huh, Guild's Scout, Didn't You Say I Wasn't Needed Anymore?
description:
Young boy Claus was gifted with a Skill called [Auto Mode]. It is an extremely rare skill and he was so pleased when first received it...

Turns out, the skill's abilities [Auto Return] for "only to go home" and [Auto Travel] for "only to go to places that have been visited" are a completely useless ability for both combat and making money!

However, the now leveled up Claus has come to know the true nature of [Auto Mode]!

author: Lagun

title: Kimi ni Todoke: From Me to You
alt_title: Reaching You, 君に届け, 好想告诉你
description:
Sawako Kuronuma is the perfect heroine… for a horror movie. With her jet-black hair, sinister smile and silent demeanor, she's often mistaken for the haunting movie character Sadako. But behind her scary facade is a very misunderstood teenager. Too shy to fit in, all she wants to do is make some friends. But when a popular boy in class befriends her, she's sure to make more than just that–she's about to make some enemies too!  
  
---

title: Inkya de Wotaku de Binbou Dakedo Bijin Ojou-sama ni Osaretemasu
alt_title: 陰キャでヲタクで貧乏だけど美人お嬢様に推されてます, Я застенчивый и бедный отаку, но эта красивая богатая юная леди одержима мной., I'm a Shy and Poor Otaku, but This Beautiful Rich Young Lady Is Obsessed With Me
description: Eiji is a high school student who lives with his father, an unsuccessful novelist. He is a shy, otaku, and poor boy, but he is an honest boy who never forgets the compassion for others that his late mother taught him. Even he yearns for Aoi, the daughter of the president of a large company. However, Eiji is unable to look Aoi in the eye because of the huge disparity between her and himself. One day after school, Aoi greets Eiji when he comes home. Aoi says one surprising thing to the surprised Eiji...
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Mitsuki Rin

title: Konbini Goutou kara Tasuketa Jimi Tenin ga, Onaji Kurasu no Ubu de Kawaii Gyaru datta
alt_title: コンビニ強盗から助けた地味店員が、同じクラスのうぶで可愛いギャルだった, The Sobbing Clerk I Helped From the Convenience Store’s Robbery Is in Fact a Naive and Cute Gal From My Class
description:
_"Will you stay over at my house starting today?"_ 

Riku Kuromine, a second-year high school student, became despondent after being rejected by his childhood friend. He happens to enter a convenience store and saves a clerk who was being attacked by a robber. The clerk turns out to be Ayana Hoshimiya, the most popular and beautiful gal in school. As a result of this incident, Ayana asks Riku to protect her from a stalker and they start living together under the guise of him protecting her as she lives alone.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru
author: Aboun

title: Plum Fragrance
alt_title: 梅香
description:
Yuan Jing accidentally had his soul scattered during a lightning trial. With no other choice but to search for it, he enters the mortal world without any spiritual power in hopes of rebuilding his scattered soul....

Unexpectedly, his senior had secretly followed him, and his ice-covered heart gradually began to beat faster for him. "No matter where you are, I will hold you in my arms again."
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 归尘不是尘

title: A Three-legged Hero
alt_title: 다리 세 개 용사님
description:
One day, a 'Gate' suddenly opened on Earth, and through that Gate came pouring out monsters from the dungeon. To combat that, humans awakened special abilities. ...And here is a  S-grade ability user who is depressed over not being able to date anyone because of his awakened ability. That person is Ashe, a Paladin who literally wields a lightsaber, for he possesses a ginormous glowing penis. 

On a certain day, Ashe was clearing out a dungeon as usual when an ability user named Roose, who posseses the ability of 'Nullification' appears before him, and starts playing with him. In that instant, Ashe instinctively feels it - 'This person is the only one who can handle my XXX!!'

Can Ashe obtain Roose's heart?!

A full-blown erotic comedy between a Hero and a Villain!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ponpacha

title: 2nd Virgin no Jouzu Sutekata
alt_title: 2ndバージンのじょうずな捨て方, How To Skillfully Lose Your 2nd Viriginity
description:
Chiaki ended up being called a dead fish after his first time having sex with his boyfriend didn't go so well. Afterward, he ended up drunkenly calling a gay AV company to apply as a gay actor, and the perfect guy he meets there is...?! 

Drawn by Zunda Mochiko-sensei, an exceptionally thorough private lesson!

"You're the only one who can fix my complex!"

Su-jeong, a handsome boy who gains popularity with his mysterious atmosphere, suddenly visits the main character, Ma Eun-ha, and asks him to fix his huge xxx complex.

"Why must it be me?!" Eun-ha finally accepts the request because of Su-jeong's persistent attack, but this guy is crazy!! What is this awesome XXX?!

This Spinoff Manga has content based starting from Volume 4 of the Light Novel.

Against the odds, the little slime Rimuru has established Tempest, his magical country for all monsters, and it’s thriving. Three visitors, Phos the fox girl, Stella the dragon girl, and Nemu the winged girl, come to pay Tempest a visit, and they’re stunned at just how quickly it’s developed.

title: Apeiron of Recollection
alt_title: 追憶のアペイロン, 追忆无垠
description: In a world where an epidemic causing amnesia is spreading, a group of two boys and two girls are discharged from the hospital. Shortly afterwards, a mysterious accident involves the four young people who, disoriented, begin to doubt their memories while trying to understand the truth.

author: Kusaka Shinya

title: The House of Diana's Choice
alt_title: Do You Like Mom or Dad?, Do You Like Mommy or Daddy?, Who Do You Like More, Mom or Dad?, Who Do You Like More, Mommy or Daddy?, ¿Te gusta tu mamá o tu papá?, 엄마가 좋아, 아빠가 좋아?
description: After being orphaned at the tender age of 7, poor Diana had little choice but to slave away as a maid to survive. But her fortune takes a turn when she encounters a mysterious mage who introduces himself as her mother's friend. He gifts her better clothes, a beautiful house, and even her mother's inheritance. All that's left is for Diana to spend her days living happily... until another chance meeting with a certain individual reveals a family secret that will change her life forever.

author: Malubyeol

title: Danberu Nan Kiro Moteru?
alt_title: ¿Cuántos kilos puedes levantar?, How Heavy Are The Dumbbells You Lift?, How Many Kilos Are the Dumbbells You Lift?, Насколько тяжелые гантели ты сможешь поднять?, ダンベル何キロ持てる?, 덤벨 몇 킬로까지 들 수 있어?
description:
Want to diet? Want to train? School-girl body modification comedy!  
Join gyaru Sakura Hibiki and ojou Souryuuin Akemi as they lift weights and exercise with the help of macho-man Machio! Learn for yourself how good form, good diet and plenty of exercise will help with healthy living!! Let's muscle!!!

title: 11-banme no Neko wa Nene
alt_title: 11番目のねこはねね
description:
Nene is a tiny waitress in a country where cat people live. She looks like a kitten, but she has a big dream and a secret...?

Let's start a thrilling life as a cat, as nene learns "cat-ness" from her seniors!
genre: Animals, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Harikamo

title: I'll Save the Heroine!
alt_title: Why Do I Have to Be the Sister-In-Law?, 왜 하필 시누이죠?, Wae Hapil Sinuijyo?, ¿Por Que Soy Una Cuñada?
description: Imagine Lee Sangyeo's surprise when she wakes up one day inside her favorite novel... and her horror when she realizes she's in the body of the adorable heroine's evil sister-in-law, Aylee Brydon! Knowing that the story will end terribly if nothing changes, Aylee is determined to save the heroine at all costs. However, her complete character reversal leads to problems in high society and causes friction with her cold fiancé, Duke Van Drave. At this rate, Aylee might be the one who needs saving!
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Dok Yeon

title: Mobile Suit Gundam Aggressor
alt_title: 機動戦士ガンダム アグレッサー
description: Set during the Universal Century’s One Year War, this story followers exiled soldiers from Zeon join the Earth Federation Space Force (E.F.S.F.) and form a unit called "Aggressor."
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Tragedy
author: Daichi Banjo

title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (MICHIHARA Katsumi)
alt_title: Легенда о героях Галактики, 銀河英雄伝説, 银河英雄传说
description:
Manga adaptation of 1980s.  
  
Five hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  
  


---
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Tanaka Yoshiki

title: Rosario to Vampire Season II
alt_title: Rosario + Vampire Season 2, Rosario + Vampire Season II, Rosario and Vampire II, ロザリオとバンパイア Season 2, ロザリオとバンパイア Season II, 十字架与吸血鬼 season II, 吸血鬼与十字架2
description:
The story continues where the first season left off only months into the future. Yuokai Gakuen has been repaired and the new semester is underway. Tsukune and gang are back, and more powerful then ever. Anti-Thesis's true identity is relieved. With new adversaries looming on the horizon, and something much more sinister then the gang has ever faced before.   
  
Tsukune is battling with the monster inside him. With the help of Moka, Mizore, Kurumu, Ruby, and Yukari. Tsukune trains to get his vampire blood under control and the strength to protect what he holds dear.  
  
The new season focuses more on the girls, their past, and their families. New confrontations await them. New friends and allies will join them by their side. Together they will discover the secrets of Moka's rosary, and her lineage…  
  


---
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural
